examples.en: We met by coincidence at the airport.
examples.cn: 我们在机场偶然相遇。

examples.en: By coincidence, they both chose the same restaurant.
examples.cn: 碰巧的是，他们都选择了同一家餐厅。

examples.en: Many students do part-time work to support their studies.
examples.cn: 许多学生做兼职工作来支持学业。

examples.en: She decided to do part-time work while raising her children.
examples.cn: 她决定在抚养孩子的同时做兼职工作。

examples.en: The final exam will cover all chapters of the textbook.
examples.cn: 期末考试将涵盖教科书的所有章节。

examples.en: He studied hard for the final exam and got an A.
examples.cn: 他为期末考试努力学习，得了A。

examples.en: She took the responsibility on herself to organize the event.
examples.cn: 她主动承担了组织活动的责任。

examples.en: He took the task on himself without being asked.
examples.cn: 他未经要求就主动承担了这项任务。

examples.en: For the time being, we'll stay in this hotel.
examples.cn: 目前，我们将住在这家酒店。

examples.en: The project is on hold for the time being.
examples.cn: 这个项目暂时搁置了。

examples.en: She was fascinated by the ancient artifacts in the museum.
examples.cn: 她被博物馆里的古代文物迷住了。

examples.en: He is fascinated by the mysteries of the universe.
examples.cn: 他对宇宙的奥秘着迷。

examples.en: The diagram shows a cross section of the building's foundation.
examples.cn: 该图显示了建筑物基础的横截面。

examples.en: A cross section of the tree reveals its age rings.
examples.cn: 树的横截面显示了它的年轮。

examples.en: The survey included a cross section of the population.
examples.cn: 这项调查包括了人口的典型群体。

examples.en: A cross section of opinions was gathered from the meeting.
examples.cn: 从会议中收集了代表性的意见。

examples.en: She runs an online business selling handmade crafts.
examples.cn: 她经营一家销售手工制品的在线业务。

examples.en: Running an online business requires good marketing skills.
examples.cn: 经营在线业务需要良好的营销技巧。

examples.en: She picked out a dress for the party.
examples.cn: 她为聚会挑选了一件连衣裙。

examples.en: Can you pick out the best candidate from the list?
examples.cn: 你能从列表中选出最佳候选人吗？

examples.en: He could pick out his friend in the crowded room.
examples.cn: 他能在拥挤的房间里辨认出他的朋友。

examples.en: The detective picked out the suspect from the lineup.
examples.cn: 侦探从列队中识别出了嫌疑人。

definitions.meaning_cn: 承认自己说错话，收回前言

examples.en: After the election results came in, he had to eat his words about the candidate's chances.
examples.cn: 选举结果出来后，他不得不收回关于候选人胜算的言论。

examples.en: She predicted the project would fail, but when it succeeded, she had to eat her words.
examples.cn: 她预测项目会失败，但当它成功时，她不得不承认自己说错了。

examples.en: I decided to switch to a healthier diet to improve my energy levels.
examples.cn: 我决定切换到更健康的饮食以提高精力水平。

examples.en: The company plans to switch to renewable energy sources next year.
examples.cn: 公司计划明年转换到可再生能源。

examples.en: Let's switch to a more positive topic; this discussion is getting too negative.
examples.cn: 让我们换个更积极的话题；这个讨论变得太消极了。

examples.en: He quickly switched to a different subject when he realized the mistake.
examples.cn: 当他意识到错误时，迅速转换到了另一个话题。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have the shoe on the other foot

examples.en: Now that he's the boss, he has the shoe on the other foot and understands the pressures his employees faced.
examples.cn: 现在他是老板了，情况反转，他理解了员工们曾面临的压力。

examples.en: After years of criticizing others, she had the shoe on the other foot when her own work was reviewed harshly.
examples.cn: 多年来批评别人后，当她的作品受到严厉评价时，她体验到了角色互换。

examples.en: The remote village is isolated from the rest of the country by mountains.
examples.cn: 这个偏远村庄因山脉而与国家的其他部分隔离。

examples.en: During the pandemic, many people felt isolated from their friends and family.
examples.cn: 疫情期间，许多人感到与朋友和家人隔离。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在社交或情感上被疏远

examples.en: He became isolated from his colleagues after the disagreement.
examples.cn: 那次分歧后，他与同事们疏远了。

examples.en: She felt isolated from the group because of her different opinions.
examples.cn: 由于不同的意见，她感到被团体疏远。

examples.en: The team had a disagreement on the best approach to solve the problem.
examples.cn: 团队在解决问题的最佳方法上有分歧。

examples.en: They often have disagreements on political issues during family dinners.
examples.cn: 他们在家庭晚餐时经常在政治问题上产生分歧。

examples.en: After 40 years of service, the old machine was finally put out to pasture.
examples.cn: 服务了40年后，那台旧机器终于被退役了。

examples.en: The company decided to put the veteran employee out to pasture with a generous retirement package.
examples.cn: 公司决定让那位资深员工退休，并提供丰厚的退休金。

examples.en: He had to rush through his homework to make it to the party on time.
examples.cn: 他不得不匆忙完成作业以准时参加派对。

examples.en: The bill was rushed through parliament without proper debate.
examples.cn: 该法案在没有适当辩论的情况下被快速通过议会。

examples.en: She rushed through the crowded street to catch the bus.
examples.cn: 她急促地穿过拥挤的街道去赶公交车。

examples.en: The water rushed through the broken dam, causing flooding downstream.
examples.cn: 水急促地冲过破损的水坝，导致下游洪水泛滥。

valid_entries.original_phrase: come in out of the rain

definitions.meaning_cn: 进来避雨，比喻寻求庇护或改善处境

examples.en: He invited the stray dog to come in out of the rain and gave it some food.
examples.cn: 他邀请那只流浪狗进来避雨，并给了它一些食物。

examples.en: After losing his job, he was grateful to come in out of the rain with a new opportunity.
examples.cn: 失业后，他很感激能有一个新机会来改善处境。

examples.en: The sudden change in weather brought on a headache for many people.
examples.cn: 天气的突然变化引起了许多人的头痛。

examples.en: Stress at work can bring on health problems if not managed properly.
examples.cn: 如果处理不当，工作压力可能导致健康问题。

examples.en: The company decided to bring on a new manager to handle the expanding team.
examples.cn: 公司决定引入一位新经理来处理不断扩大的团队。

examples.en: They brought on additional staff during the busy holiday season.
examples.cn: 在繁忙的假日季节，他们带来了额外的员工。

examples.en: The spicy food really brought on the tears during dinner.
examples.cn: 晚餐时，辣食真的催出了眼泪。

examples.en: Her encouraging words brought on a sense of confidence in the team.
examples.cn: 她鼓励的话语加速了团队中的信心感。

definitions.meaning_cn: 面临，遇到（困难、挑战或问题）

examples.en: The company was confronted with a sudden financial crisis.
examples.cn: 公司突然面临财务危机。

examples.en: She was confronted with a difficult decision about her career.
examples.cn: 她面临着一个关于职业生涯的艰难决定。

examples.en: He was confronted with an angry customer at the store.
examples.cn: 他在店里面对一位愤怒的顾客。

examples.en: The suspect was confronted with the evidence by the police.
examples.cn: 嫌疑人被警方用证据对峙。

examples.en: They sold the house at a profit after renovating it.
examples.cn: 他们翻新后以盈利的方式卖掉了房子。

examples.en: The investment yielded returns at a profit within a year.
examples.cn: 这项投资在一年内以盈利的方式产生了回报。

examples.en: The company operated at a profit despite market challenges.
examples.cn: 尽管市场有挑战，公司仍有利可图地运营。

examples.en: She managed to exit the business at a profit.
examples.cn: 她成功地以有收益的方式退出了生意。

examples.en: Please put down the book when you're finished reading.
examples.cn: 请读完书后把它放下。

examples.en: He put down his keys on the kitchen counter.
examples.cn: 他把钥匙搁置在厨房台面上。

examples.en: She put down the appointment in her calendar.
examples.cn: 她把约会记在日历上。

examples.en: The secretary put down the minutes of the meeting.
examples.cn: 秘书写下了会议纪要。

examples.en: He always puts down his colleagues in front of others.
examples.cn: 他总是在别人面前贬低他的同事。

examples.en: Don't put yourself down; you did a great job.
examples.cn: 不要贬低自己，你做得很好。

definitions.meaning_cn: 变得身体接触，动手（尤指打架或暴力）

examples.en: The argument escalated and they started to get physical.
examples.cn: 争论升级，他们开始动手了。

examples.en: In sports, players sometimes get physical during intense moments.
examples.cn: 在体育中，球员有时在紧张时刻会变得身体接触。

definitions.meaning_cn: 进行身体锻炼，变得活跃

examples.en: After a long day at work, she likes to get physical at the gym.
examples.cn: 工作一整天后，她喜欢在健身房进行身体锻炼。

examples.en: It's important to get physical regularly for good health.
examples.cn: 定期进行身体锻炼对健康很重要。

examples.en: As soon as he entered the party, he made a beeline for the food table.
examples.cn: 他一进入派对，就径直走向食物桌。

examples.en: She made a beeline for the exit when the meeting ended.
examples.cn: 会议结束时，她直奔出口。

definitions.meaning_cn: 直接前往，迅速接近（目标）

examples.en: The kids made a beeline for the playground after school.
examples.cn: 放学后，孩子们直接前往操场。

examples.en: He made a beeline for the manager to discuss the issue.
examples.cn: 他迅速接近经理讨论这个问题。

definitions.meaning_cn: 储存或储备某物以备将来使用

examples.en: She lays by a portion of her salary every month for emergencies.
examples.cn: 她每月存一部分工资以备不时之需。

examples.en: Farmers often lay by grain during harvest season for winter.
examples.cn: 农民常在收获季节储存谷物以备过冬。

definitions.meaning_cn: 暂时搁置或停止处理某事

examples.en: We decided to lay the project by until we have more resources.
examples.cn: 我们决定暂时搁置这个项目，直到有更多资源。

examples.en: He laid his worries by and focused on the task at hand.
examples.cn: 他把忧虑搁置一边，专注于手头的任务。

examples.en: After hearing the bad news, she went to pieces and couldn't stop crying.
examples.cn: 听到坏消息后，她情绪崩溃，无法停止哭泣。

examples.en: He went to pieces during the stressful exam, forgetting everything he studied.
examples.cn: 在压力大的考试中，他崩溃了，忘记了所有学过的内容。

examples.en: The old vase went to pieces when it fell off the shelf.
examples.cn: 旧花瓶从架子上掉下来时摔碎了。

examples.en: The car went to pieces in the accident, scattering debris everywhere.
examples.cn: 汽车在事故中解体，碎片散落一地。

examples.en: Fresh fruits are in ample supply at the market during summer.
examples.cn: 夏季市场上新鲜水果供应充足。

examples.en: The company has resources in ample supply to handle the new project.
examples.cn: 公司有充足的资源来处理新项目。

definitions.meaning_cn: 稳定的工作，通常指有保障的长期职位

examples.en: Many people prefer steady jobs with benefits over freelance work.
examples.cn: 许多人更喜欢有福利的稳定工作，而不是自由职业。

examples.en: He found steady jobs in the government sector after graduation.
examples.cn: 毕业后，他在政府部门找到了稳定的工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 存在，指某物当前存在或存活

examples.en: This ancient artifact has been in existence for over a thousand years.
examples.cn: 这件古代文物已经存在了一千多年。

examples.en: The company has been in existence since 1995, serving customers worldwide.
examples.cn: 这家公司自1995年成立以来，一直为全球客户服务。

definitions.meaning_cn: 限制自己只做某事，不涉及其他活动

examples.en: During the lockdown, she confined herself to doing home workouts.
examples.cn: 封锁期间，她限制自己只做家庭锻炼。

examples.en: He confines himself to doing research and avoids administrative tasks.
examples.cn: 他限制自己只做研究，避免行政任务。

definitions.meaning_cn: 成功完成困难或令人惊讶的事情

examples.en: She pulled off a stunning performance in the competition.
examples.cn: 她在比赛中成功完成了一场惊艳的表演。

examples.en: They pulled off the deal despite many obstacles.
examples.cn: 尽管有许多障碍，他们还是成功完成了这笔交易。

examples.en: He pulled off his jacket as the room got warmer.
examples.cn: 随着房间变暖，他脱掉了夹克。

examples.en: Can you help me pull off this stubborn lid?
examples.cn: 你能帮我拧开这个顽固的盖子吗？

examples.en: Children love to play with toys in the park.
examples.cn: 孩子们喜欢在公园里玩玩具。

examples.en: He often plays with his phone during meetings.
examples.cn: 他经常在会议期间摆弄手机。

definitions.meaning_cn: 不认真地考虑或对待某事

examples.en: Don't play with the idea of quitting your job without a plan.
examples.cn: 不要不认真地考虑在没有计划的情况下辞职。

examples.en: She's just playing with the notion of moving abroad.
examples.cn: 她只是不认真地考虑移居国外。

examples.en: He put his point across clearly during the debate.
examples.cn: 他在辩论中清晰地表达了自己的观点。

examples.en: It's important to put across the message effectively in advertising.
examples.cn: 在广告中有效地传达信息很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 控制或限制某物，防止其过度

examples.en: She keeps her emotions in check during stressful situations.
examples.cn: 在压力大的情况下，她控制自己的情绪。

examples.en: The government tries to keep inflation in check with policies.
examples.cn: 政府试图通过政策控制通货膨胀。

definitions.meaning_cn: 经济困难，指财务上的困境或挑战

examples.en: Many families face economic hardships during recessions.
examples.cn: 许多家庭在经济衰退期间面临经济困难。

examples.en: The pandemic caused widespread economic hardships globally.
examples.cn: 疫情在全球范围内造成了广泛的经济困难。

definitions.meaning_cn: 考虑到或为某事留出余地

examples.en: We need to allow for extra time in case of traffic delays.
examples.cn: 我们需要考虑到额外时间，以防交通延误。

examples.en: The budget should allow for unexpected expenses.
examples.cn: 预算应该为意外开支留出余地。

definitions.meaning_cn: 试图获取或谋取某物，通常通过间接手段

examples.en: He's angling for a promotion by taking on extra projects.
examples.cn: 他通过承担额外项目来谋取晋升。

examples.en: She angled for compliments by showing off her new dress.
examples.cn: 她通过炫耀新裙子来试图获取赞美。

definitions.meaning_cn: 社交互动，指人与人之间的交流和联系

examples.en: Regular social interaction is important for mental health.
examples.cn: 定期的社交互动对心理健康很重要。

examples.en: Online platforms facilitate social interaction across distances.
examples.cn: 在线平台促进了跨距离的社交互动。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被锁在笼子里，通常指动物或比喻性的禁锢

examples.en: The animals were locked in cages at the zoo for safety.
examples.cn: 动物园里的动物被锁在笼子里以确保安全。

examples.en: She felt like she was locked in cages by societal expectations.
examples.cn: 她感觉自己被社会期望禁锢住了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 生活技能，指处理日常事务的能力

examples.en: Schools should teach life skills like budgeting and cooking.
examples.cn: 学校应该教授预算和烹饪等生活技能。

examples.en: Developing life skills helps individuals become more independent.
examples.cn: 培养生活技能有助于个人变得更加独立。

definitions.meaning_cn: 默认情况下，指在没有其他选择或行动时的状态

examples.en: The software saves files by default in the Documents folder.
examples.cn: 软件默认将文件保存在文档文件夹中。

examples.en: He became the team leader by default when no one else volunteered.
examples.cn: 当没有其他人自愿时，他默认成为了团队领导。

examples.en: I messed up the presentation by forgetting my notes.
examples.cn: 我忘了带笔记，搞砸了演示。

examples.en: Don't mess up the room; we just cleaned it.
examples.cn: 别把房间弄乱；我们刚打扫过。

definitions.meaning_cn: 认识某人，但关系不深，通常指熟人

examples.en: I have an acquaintance with him from work, but we're not close friends.
examples.cn: 我通过工作认识他，但我们不是亲密朋友。

examples.en: She has an acquaintance with the author through a mutual friend.
examples.cn: 她通过共同的朋友认识了这位作者。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因某事获得认可或赞扬

examples.en: She got credit for organizing the successful event.
examples.cn: 她因组织这次成功的活动而获得赞扬。

examples.en: He got credit for his innovative solution to the problem.
examples.cn: 他因创新解决问题而获得认可。

examples.en: Students can get credit for completing online courses.
examples.cn: 学生完成在线课程可以获得学分。

examples.en: She got credit for her internship experience toward her degree.
examples.cn: 她的实习经历为她获得了学位学分。

examples.en: I am satisfied with the quality of the product.
examples.cn: 我对产品的质量感到满意。

examples.en: She was satisfied with her performance in the exam.
examples.cn: 她对自己在考试中的表现感到满意。

examples.en: He keeps up with current affairs by reading the newspaper daily.
examples.cn: 他通过每天读报来了解时事。

examples.en: The course covers important current affairs from around the world.
examples.cn: 这门课程涵盖了世界各地的重要时事。

examples.en: In ancient times, people used barter systems for trade.
examples.cn: 在古代，人们使用物物交换系统进行贸易。

examples.en: Many myths originated in ancient times.
examples.cn: 许多神话起源于古代。

examples.en: We need to fix a date for the meeting next week.
examples.cn: 我们需要为下周的会议确定一个日期。

examples.en: They fixed a date for their wedding in June.
examples.cn: 他们为婚礼确定了六月的日期。

definitions.meaning_cn: 拥有必要的资源或能力

examples.en: She has the wherewithal to start her own business.
examples.cn: 她拥有创办自己企业的必要资源。

examples.en: Do you have the wherewithal to complete this project on time?
examples.cn: 你有按时完成这个项目的能力吗？

examples.en: He worked up the courage to ask for a promotion.
examples.cn: 他鼓起勇气要求升职。

examples.en: She worked up a sweat during her workout.
examples.cn: 她在锻炼中出了一身汗。

examples.en: I need to work up a proposal for the new project.
examples.cn: 我需要为新项目制定一个提案。

examples.en: They worked up a plan to improve efficiency.
examples.cn: 他们制定了一个提高效率的计划。

examples.en: We are running short of time to finish the report.
examples.cn: 我们完成报告的时间不多了。

examples.en: The store ran short of supplies during the sale.
examples.cn: 商店在促销期间供应短缺。

examples.en: This model differs from the old one in its design.
examples.cn: 这个型号在设计上与旧型号不同。

examples.en: She differs from her sister in personality.
examples.cn: 她在个性上与她的姐姐不同。

examples.en: We saw herds of elephants on the safari.
examples.cn: 我们在野生动物园看到了成群的象。

examples.en: Herds of cattle grazed in the field.
examples.cn: 成群的牛在田野里吃草。

examples.en: Let's get straight down to business without any delays.
examples.cn: 让我们立即开始谈正事，不要拖延。

examples.en: She got straight down to studying after dinner.
examples.cn: 她晚饭后立即开始学习。

examples.en: Don't throw away that old book; it might be valuable.
examples.cn: 不要扔掉那本旧书；它可能很有价值。

examples.en: He threw away the broken toy.
examples.cn: 他扔掉了那个坏掉的玩具。

examples.en: She threw away her chance to study abroad by not applying.
examples.cn: 她没有申请，浪费了出国留学的机会。

examples.en: Don't throw away this opportunity to learn new skills.
examples.cn: 不要浪费这个学习新技能的机会。

examples.en: The company hired a think-tank to develop new strategies.
examples.cn: 公司聘请了一个智囊团来制定新策略。

examples.en: This think-tank focuses on environmental issues.
examples.cn: 这个智库专注于环境问题。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在偏僻的地方，荒无人烟

examples.en: Their cabin is in the middle of nowhere, far from any town.
examples.cn: 他们的小屋在偏僻的地方，远离任何城镇。

examples.en: We got lost and ended up in the middle of nowhere.
examples.cn: 我们迷路了，最终到了一个荒无人烟的地方。

examples.en: We must protect the environment at all costs.
examples.cn: 我们必须不惜一切代价保护环境。

examples.en: He was determined to win the competition at all costs.
examples.cn: 他决心不惜一切代价赢得比赛。

definitions.meaning_cn: 休学一年（通常用于旅行或工作）

examples.en: She decided to take a gap year to travel around Asia.
examples.cn: 她决定休学一年去亚洲旅行。

examples.en: Many students take a gap year before starting university.
examples.cn: 许多学生在开始大学前休学一年。

examples.en: He had to hold his tongue during the argument to avoid making it worse.
examples.cn: 在争论中，他不得不保持沉默以避免情况恶化。

examples.en: She held her tongue even though she disagreed with the decision.
examples.cn: 尽管她不同意这个决定，但她忍住了没说。

examples.en: Table tennis is a popular sport in many countries.
examples.cn: 乒乓球是许多国家流行的运动。

examples.en: They play table tennis every weekend for fun.
examples.cn: 他们每个周末打乒乓球娱乐。

examples.en: He gets a charge out of watching comedy shows.
examples.cn: 他从观看喜剧节目中获得乐趣。

examples.en: She gets a charge out of solving difficult puzzles.
examples.cn: 她从解决难题中获得兴奋感。

examples.en: We are all in the same boat when it comes to dealing with this crisis.
examples.cn: 在处理这场危机时，我们都处境相同。

examples.en: Since we're in the same boat, let's work together to find a solution.
examples.cn: 既然我们同舟共济，就一起努力找到解决方案吧。

definitions.meaning_cn: 承认...为，正式认可...的身份或地位

examples.en: The government recognized the new state as an independent nation.
examples.cn: 政府承认这个新国家为独立国家。

examples.en: She was recognized as the leading expert in her field.
examples.cn: 她被公认为该领域的顶尖专家。

definitions.meaning_cn: 辨认出...是，识别出某物或某人的身份

examples.en: I recognized the song as one from my childhood.
examples.cn: 我认出这首歌是我童年时的一首。

examples.en: He recognized the handwriting as his brother's.
examples.cn: 他认出笔迹是他兄弟的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 抽出，取出（尤指液体或长物体）

examples.en: She drew out a long thread from the spool.
examples.cn: 她从线轴上抽出一根长线。

examples.en: The dentist drew out the infected tooth carefully.
examples.cn: 牙医小心地拔出了那颗感染的牙齿。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使...畅谈，鼓励某人表达更多

examples.en: The interviewer drew out the shy candidate with gentle questions.
examples.cn: 面试官用温和的问题让害羞的候选人畅谈起来。

examples.en: A good teacher can draw out students' ideas in class.
examples.cn: 好老师能在课堂上引导学生表达想法。

examples.en: The negotiations were drawn out over several months.
examples.cn: 谈判被拖长了好几个月。

examples.en: He drew out the story to keep the children entertained.
examples.cn: 他拖长故事来让孩子们保持兴趣。

definitions.meaning_cn: 死于（外部原因，如事故、疾病等）

examples.en: Many people die from heart disease each year.
examples.cn: 每年许多人死于心脏病。

examples.en: He died from injuries sustained in the car crash.
examples.cn: 他死于车祸中受的伤。

definitions.meaning_cn: 开辟前景，创造新的机会或可能性

examples.en: The new technology opens up prospects for renewable energy.
examples.cn: 这项新技术为可再生能源开辟了前景。

examples.en: Studying abroad can open up prospects for international careers.
examples.cn: 出国留学能为国际职业开辟前景。

examples.en: The training put the recruits through rigorous exercises.
examples.cn: 训练让新兵经历了严格的练习。

examples.en: She put her car through a thorough inspection.
examples.cn: 她让她的车经历了一次彻底检查。

examples.en: Can you put me through to the manager, please?
examples.cn: 请帮我接通经理的电话，好吗？

examples.en: The operator put the call through to the emergency line.
examples.cn: 接线员将电话接通到紧急热线。

examples.en: We need to put the proposal through the approval committee.
examples.cn: 我们需要让提案通过批准委员会。

examples.en: He put the application through quickly to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 他快速完成了申请以赶上截止日期。

definitions.meaning_cn: 声名狼藉，失去信誉或尊重

examples.en: The company fell into disrepute after the scandal.
examples.cn: 公司在丑闻后声名狼藉。

examples.en: The practice has fallen into disrepute among professionals.
examples.cn: 这种做法在专业人士中已声名狼藉。

examples.en: You can substitute honey for sugar in this recipe.
examples.cn: 在这个食谱中，你可以用蜂蜜代替糖。

examples.en: She substituted for the absent teacher yesterday.
examples.cn: 她昨天替代了缺席的老师。

definitions.meaning_cn: 费力地生产或完成（尤指机械性或单调的工作）

examples.en: He ground out a report late into the night.
examples.cn: 他熬夜费力地完成了一份报告。

examples.en: The factory grinds out thousands of units daily.
examples.cn: 工厂每天费力生产数千个单位。

examples.en: Be cautious of strangers offering deals that seem too good to be true.
examples.cn: 对提供好得不像真的交易的陌生人要谨慎。

examples.en: Investors should be cautious of volatile markets.
examples.cn: 投资者应对波动市场保持谨慎。

examples.en: It took me a while to take in all the details of the plan.
examples.cn: 我花了一段时间才理解计划的所有细节。

examples.en: She quickly took in the instructions and started working.
examples.cn: 她快速吸收了指示并开始工作。

examples.en: They took in a stray cat during the winter.
examples.cn: 他们在冬天收留了一只流浪猫。

examples.en: The shelter takes in homeless people every night.
examples.cn: 收容所每晚接纳无家可归的人。

examples.en: The tour takes in all the major landmarks of the city.
examples.cn: 这次旅行涵盖了城市的所有主要地标。

examples.en: Her report takes in data from the last five years.
examples.cn: 她的报告包括了过去五年的数据。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...密切相关，同时发生或存在

examples.en: Success often goes hand in hand with hard work.
examples.cn: 成功通常与努力工作密切相关。

examples.en: Economic growth goes hand in hand with increased employment.
examples.cn: 经济增长与就业增加密切相关。

definitions.meaning_cn: 当心，警惕（危险或有害事物）

examples.en: Beware of pickpockets in crowded areas.
examples.cn: 在拥挤区域要当心扒手。

examples.en: You should beware of scams when shopping online.
examples.cn: 网上购物时，你应该警惕诈骗。

definitions.meaning_cn: 驱使某人做某事，强迫或强烈促使

examples.en: Poverty drove him to work multiple jobs.
examples.cn: 贫困驱使他做多份工作。

examples.en: Her passion for art drove her to study abroad.
examples.cn: 她对艺术的热爱驱使她出国留学。

definitions.meaning_cn: 避免某事，有意避开或防止

examples.en: To stay healthy, avoid excessive sugar in your diet.
examples.cn: 为了保持健康，避免饮食中过多的糖。

examples.en: He avoided the topic to prevent an argument.
examples.cn: 他避开这个话题以防止争论。

definitions.meaning_cn: 摆阔气，炫耀或表现得非常正式或奢华

examples.en: For the gala, they really put on the dog with fancy decorations.
examples.cn: 为了晚会，他们真的摆阔气，用了华丽的装饰。

examples.en: He put on the dog to impress his new colleagues.
examples.cn: 他摆阔气以给新同事留下印象。

definitions.meaning_cn: 积极推进，不顾困难继续前进

examples.en: The team pushed ahead with the project despite setbacks.
examples.cn: 尽管有挫折，团队积极推进项目。

examples.en: She pushed ahead with her plans to start a business.
examples.cn: 她积极推进她创业的计划。

examples.en: Can you speak up? I can't hear you in the back.
examples.cn: 你能大声点说吗？我在后面听不见。

examples.en: He spoke up to ensure everyone heard the announcement.
examples.cn: 他大声说以确保每个人都听到通知。

definitions.meaning_cn: 直言不讳，表达意见或反对

examples.en: It's important to speak up against injustice.
examples.cn: 对不公正直言不讳很重要。

examples.en: She spoke up in the meeting to suggest a better approach.
examples.cn: 她在会议上直言不讳，建议一个更好的方法。

definitions.meaning_cn: 金融危机，经济体系中的严重动荡或崩溃

examples.en: The 2008 financial crisis affected economies worldwide.
examples.cn: 2008年的金融危机影响了全球经济。

examples.en: Governments often intervene during a financial crisis to stabilize markets.
examples.cn: 政府常在金融危机期间干预以稳定市场。

definitions.meaning_cn: 只需说，表示无需多言或细节已足够

examples.en: Suffice it to say, the project was a huge success.
examples.cn: 只需说，这个项目是一个巨大的成功。

examples.en: Suffice it to say that we learned a lot from the experience.
examples.cn: 只需说我们从这次经历中学到了很多。

definitions.meaning_cn: 依某人之见，表达个人观点

examples.en: In my opinion, this is the best solution to the problem.
examples.cn: 依我之见，这是解决问题的最佳方案。

examples.en: In her opinion, the movie was not worth watching.
examples.cn: 依她之见，这部电影不值得看。

examples.en: She had to work overtime to meet the project deadline.
examples.cn: 她不得不加班以赶上项目截止日期。

examples.en: Employees are compensated for working overtime on weekends.
examples.cn: 员工在周末加班会得到补偿。

examples.en: I'm on the way to the airport to pick up my friend.
examples.cn: 我正在去机场接朋友的路上。

examples.en: She stopped for coffee on the way to work.
examples.cn: 她在上班的路上停下来喝了杯咖啡。

examples.en: The company is on the way to becoming a market leader.
examples.cn: 这家公司即将成为市场领导者。

examples.en: He's on the way to recovery after the surgery.
examples.cn: 手术后他正在康复中。

examples.en: Drivers must give way to pedestrians at crosswalks.
examples.cn: 司机必须在人行横道处给行人让路。

examples.en: He refused to give way in the negotiation.
examples.cn: 他在谈判中拒绝让步。

examples.en: The old bridge gave way under the weight of the truck.
examples.cn: 旧桥在卡车的重压下倒塌了。

examples.en: Her resolve gave way after hours of pressure.
examples.cn: 在数小时的压力下，她的决心动摇了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 冲昏头脑；使人骄傲自大

examples.en: The sudden fame went to his head, and he became arrogant.
examples.cn: 突然的名声冲昏了他的头脑，他变得傲慢起来。

examples.en: Don't let success go to your head; stay humble.
examples.cn: 不要让成功冲昏了头脑，保持谦逊。

examples.en: That strong drink went straight to my head.
examples.cn: 那杯烈酒直接让我头晕了。

examples.en: Be careful with the wine—it can go to your head quickly.
examples.cn: 小心这葡萄酒，它很快就会让你上头。

examples.en: She works full time as a software engineer.
examples.cn: 她是一名全职软件工程师。

examples.en: The position requires a full-time commitment.
examples.cn: 这个职位需要全职投入。

examples.en: The referee blew the whistle at full time.
examples.cn: 裁判在全场结束时吹响了哨子。

examples.en: The score was tied at full time, leading to extra minutes.
examples.cn: 全场结束时比分持平，进入了加时赛。

examples.en: She took pity on the stray cat and brought it home.
examples.cn: 她同情那只流浪猫，把它带回了家。

examples.en: The judge took pity on the defendant due to his difficult circumstances.
examples.cn: 法官因被告的困境而怜悯他。

examples.en: He is an expert on ancient Roman history.
examples.cn: 他是古罗马历史方面的专家。

examples.en: She consulted an expert on climate change for her research.
examples.cn: 她为研究咨询了一位气候变化专家。

examples.en: The project is more or less complete, with just a few details left.
examples.cn: 这个项目或多或少完成了，只剩下一些细节。

examples.en: It will take more or less an hour to get there by car.
examples.cn: 开车到那里大约需要一小时。

examples.en: Please take off your shoes before entering the house.
examples.cn: 请进屋前脱掉鞋子。

examples.en: He took off his jacket because it was too warm.
examples.cn: 因为太热，他脱下了夹克。

examples.en: The plane will take off in ten minutes.
examples.cn: 飞机将在十分钟后起飞。

examples.en: Her new business really took off after the marketing campaign.
examples.cn: 她的新业务在营销活动后真的起飞了。

examples.en: He loves to take off famous politicians in his comedy sketches.
examples.cn: 他喜欢在喜剧小品中模仿著名的政治家。

examples.en: She took off her boss's mannerisms, making everyone laugh.
examples.cn: 她模仿老板的举止，逗得大家大笑。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's hand in the till

examples.en: The accountant was fired for having his hand in the till.
examples.cn: 那名会计师因监守自盗被解雇了。

examples.en: She suspected her partner of having his hand in the till when funds went missing.
examples.cn: 当资金失踪时，她怀疑她的合伙人挪用了公款。

examples.en: Hold fast to the railing to avoid slipping on the stairs.
examples.cn: 紧紧抓住栏杆，以免在楼梯上滑倒。

examples.en: She holds fast to her beliefs despite criticism.
examples.cn: 尽管受到批评，她仍坚持自己的信念。

examples.en: Please hand on this message to the manager when you see him.
examples.cn: 当你见到经理时，请把这个消息转交给他。

examples.en: The tradition is handed on from generation to generation.
examples.cn: 这个传统代代相传。

examples.en: The diet restricts sugar intake to 20 grams per day.
examples.cn: 这种饮食将糖的摄入量限制在每天20克。

examples.en: Access to the building is restricted to authorized personnel only.
examples.cn: 进入这栋大楼仅限于授权人员。

examples.en: Please remove the old files from the computer to free up space.
examples.cn: 请从电脑中移除旧文件以释放空间。

examples.en: The doctor removed the splinter from her finger.
examples.cn: 医生从她的手指中取出了碎片。

examples.en: Make sure all the tools are in place before starting the repair.
examples.cn: 在开始修理前，确保所有工具都已就位。

examples.en: The new policy is now in place to improve safety.
examples.cn: 新政策现已就位以改善安全。

examples.en: She used a temporary solution in place of the broken part.
examples.cn: 她用临时解决方案代替了损坏的部件。

examples.en: He served as manager in place of his absent colleague.
examples.cn: 他代替缺席的同事担任经理。

examples.en: As a librarian, she keeps all the reference books at her fingertips.
examples.cn: 作为图书管理员，她将所有参考书都放在手边。

examples.en: He keeps the latest data at his fingertips for quick decisions.
examples.cn: 他将最新数据放在手边以便快速决策。

valid_entries.original_phrase: give credit where credit is due

definitions.meaning_cn: 功劳归于应得之人；给予应有的认可

examples.en: We should give credit where credit is due and acknowledge her hard work.
examples.cn: 我们应该给予应有的认可，承认她的辛勤工作。

examples.en: The manager always gives credit where credit is due to motivate the team.
examples.cn: 经理总是将功劳归于应得之人以激励团队。

examples.en: The team went all out to win the championship.
examples.cn: 团队全力以赴以赢得冠军。

examples.en: She went all out in preparing for the exam, studying day and night.
examples.cn: 她为准备考试竭尽全力，日夜学习。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将某人登记为...；认为某人是...

examples.en: I'll put you down as a guest for the event.
examples.cn: 我会把你登记为活动的客人。

examples.en: She put him down as a reliable friend after he helped her in need.
examples.cn: 在他需要时帮助她后，她认为他是一个可靠的朋友。

examples.en: She offered her help in return for his promise to keep it confidential.
examples.cn: 她提供帮助，作为他承诺保密的回报。

examples.en: He gave her a gift in return for her hospitality during his visit.
examples.cn: 他送她一份礼物，以回报她在他访问期间的款待。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get a free hand with sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 获得对某事的完全控制或自由处理权

examples.en: The manager got a free hand with the project, allowing her to implement her own strategies.
examples.cn: 经理获得了对该项目的完全控制权，使她能够实施自己的策略。

examples.en: After the promotion, he got a free hand with the budget, making decisions without needing approval.
examples.cn: 晋升后，他获得了对预算的自由处理权，无需批准即可做出决定。

examples.en: After working 80 hours a week, he started to go round the bend and needed a break.
examples.cn: 每周工作80小时后，他开始变得疯狂，需要休息一下。

examples.en: The constant noise from the construction made her go round the bend with frustration.
examples.cn: 建筑工地的持续噪音让她沮丧得快要发疯。

examples.en: The horizontal movement of the pendulum was measured to analyze its oscillation patterns.
examples.cn: 测量了摆锤的水平移动，以分析其振荡模式。

examples.en: In dance, horizontal movement across the stage requires precise coordination and balance.
examples.cn: 在舞蹈中，舞台上的水平移动需要精确的协调和平衡。

definitions.meaning_cn: 失去冷静或理智，变得慌乱

examples.en: During the crisis, it's important not to lose your head and stay focused on the solution.
examples.cn: 在危机期间，重要的是不要失去冷静，保持专注于解决方案。

examples.en: She lost her head when she saw the accident and started screaming uncontrollably.
examples.cn: 她看到事故时失去了理智，开始无法控制地尖叫。

examples.en: His indifference to the suffering of others made him seem cold and unfeeling.
examples.cn: 他对他人苦难的漠不关心让他显得冷漠无情。

examples.en: The company's indifference to customer complaints led to a decline in its reputation.
examples.cn: 公司对客户投诉的漠不关心导致其声誉下降。

examples.en: When planning the trip, make allowance for possible delays due to traffic.
examples.cn: 计划旅行时，要考虑到交通可能造成的延误。

examples.en: The teacher made allowance for the student's illness by extending the deadline for the assignment.
examples.cn: 老师考虑到学生生病，延长了作业的截止日期。

examples.en: The comedian's jokes had the entire audience in stitches throughout the show.
examples.cn: 喜剧演员的笑话让整个观众在演出期间笑得前仰后合。

examples.en: Her funny story about the mishap had her friends in stitches at the party.
examples.cn: 她关于那场事故的搞笑故事让她的朋友在聚会上笑得前仰后合。

examples.en: The defendant decided to appeal against the court's verdict, seeking a reduced sentence.
examples.cn: 被告决定对法院的判决提出上诉，寻求减刑。

examples.en: They plan to appeal against the decision to deny their application for a permit.
examples.cn: 他们计划对拒绝他们许可证申请的决定提出上诉。

examples.en: The loud noise interrupted my train of thought, and I lost track of what I was saying.
examples.cn: 巨大的噪音打断了我的思路，我忘记了自己在说什么。

examples.en: She followed a logical train of thought to solve the complex problem step by step.
examples.cn: 她遵循一个逻辑思路，逐步解决了这个复杂问题。

examples.en: The new art collection is on show at the museum until the end of the month.
examples.cn: 新的艺术收藏在博物馆展出，直到月底。

examples.en: His latest invention will be on show at the technology conference next week.
examples.cn: 他的最新发明将在下周的技术会议上公开展示。

examples.en: The new law will go into effect on January 1st, changing the regulations for businesses.
examples.cn: 新法律将于1月1日生效，改变对企业的规定。

examples.en: The policy changes are scheduled to go into effect after the board meeting next month.
examples.cn: 政策变更计划在下个月的董事会会议后生效。

examples.en: Parents need to be patient with young children as they learn new skills.
examples.cn: 父母需要对年幼的孩子有耐心，因为他们正在学习新技能。

examples.en: The teacher was patient with the struggling student, offering extra help after class.
examples.cn: 老师对学习困难的学生有耐心，课后提供额外帮助。

examples.en: The charity event was held in aid of the local homeless shelter.
examples.cn: 慈善活动是为了帮助当地的无家可归者收容所而举办的。

examples.en: They organized a fundraiser in aid of the disaster relief efforts.
examples.cn: 他们组织了一次筹款活动，以支持救灾工作。

examples.en: On the positive side, the new job offers more opportunities for career growth.
examples.cn: 从积极的一面看，新工作提供了更多职业发展的机会。

examples.en: Despite the challenges, there is a positive side to the situation that we should focus on.
examples.cn: 尽管有挑战，但这种情况有积极的一面，我们应该关注。

examples.en: A great opportunity came his way when he least expected it, changing his career path.
examples.cn: 一个绝佳的机会在他最意想不到的时候降临，改变了他的职业道路。

examples.en: Good luck seems to come her way often, as she wins prizes in many contests.
examples.cn: 好运似乎经常降临到她身上，因为她在许多比赛中获奖。

examples.en: She took an interest in photography after visiting a stunning art exhibition.
examples.cn: 在参观了一个令人惊叹的艺术展览后，她对摄影产生了兴趣。

examples.en: He took an interest in learning a new language to better communicate with international clients.
examples.cn: 他对学习一门新语言产生了兴趣，以便更好地与国际客户沟通。

definitions.meaning_cn: 悬而未决，处于不确定状态

examples.en: The outcome of the negotiation hangs in the balance, with both sides reluctant to compromise.
examples.cn: 谈判的结果悬而未决，双方都不愿妥协。

examples.en: His future at the company hangs in the balance after the recent performance review.
examples.cn: 在最近的绩效评估后，他在公司的未来悬而未决。

examples.en: The company's success is largely due to internal factors like employee motivation.
examples.cn: 公司的成功很大程度上归功于员工积极性等内部因素。

examples.en: We need to analyze both internal factors and external market conditions.
examples.cn: 我们需要同时分析内部因素和外部市场条件。

examples.en: Her anxiety stems from internal factors such as perfectionism.
examples.cn: 她的焦虑源于完美主义等内在因素。

examples.en: Personality development is influenced by both genetic and internal factors.
examples.cn: 人格发展受遗传和内在因素共同影响。

examples.en: We'll set off for the mountains at dawn tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我们明天黎明时分出发去山区。

examples.en: The explorers set off on their journey with high hopes.
examples.cn: 探险者们满怀希望地启程了。

examples.en: The loud noise set off the car alarm.
examples.cn: 巨大的声响触发了汽车警报。

examples.en: His comment set off a heated debate among the panelists.
examples.cn: 他的评论引发了小组成员间的激烈辩论。

examples.en: The blue frame sets off the painting beautifully.
examples.cn: 蓝色画框完美地衬托了这幅画。

examples.en: Her red dress was set off by the neutral background.
examples.cn: 她的红色连衣裙在中性背景衬托下格外醒目。

examples.en: I prefer to read news online rather than buy newspapers.
examples.cn: 我更喜欢在线阅读新闻而不是买报纸。

examples.en: Many people now read news online during their commute.
examples.cn: 现在很多人在通勤时在线阅读新闻。

examples.en: The boxer knocked down his opponent in the third round.
examples.cn: 拳击手在第三回合击倒了对手。

examples.en: The cyclist was knocked down by a speeding car.
examples.cn: 骑自行车的人被一辆超速汽车撞倒了。

examples.en: They plan to knock down the old building next month.
examples.cn: 他们计划下个月拆除这栋旧建筑。

examples.en: The wall was knocked down to create an open-plan space.
examples.cn: 这堵墙被拆除了，以打造一个开放式空间。

examples.en: The seller knocked down the price by 20% for quick sale.
examples.cn: 卖家为了快速出售将价格降低了20%。

examples.en: I managed to knock down the cost through negotiation.
examples.cn: 我通过谈判成功降低了成本。

examples.en: Meditation helps me reduce stress after a long day.
examples.cn: 冥想帮助我在漫长的一天后减轻压力。

examples.en: Regular exercise is an effective way to reduce stress.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼是减轻压力的有效方法。

examples.en: The kids ran me ragged all day at the amusement park.
examples.cn: 孩子们在游乐园让我一整天筋疲力尽。

examples.en: Her demanding job runs her ragged by the end of each week.
examples.cn: 她要求苛刻的工作让她每周结束时都筋疲力尽。

examples.en: This antique vase is worth at least $5,000.
examples.cn: 这个古董花瓶至少值5000美元。

examples.en: How much do you think my car is worth now?
examples.cn: 你觉得我的车现在值多少钱？

examples.en: The movie is definitely worth watching.
examples.cn: 这部电影绝对值得一看。

examples.en: It's not worth arguing over such a small matter.
examples.cn: 为这么小的事争吵不值得。

examples.en: Pedestrians have the right-of-way at this crosswalk.
examples.cn: 在这个人行横道上，行人拥有优先通行权。

examples.en: The vehicle already in the roundabout has the right-of-way.
examples.cn: 已经在环岛内的车辆拥有优先通行权。

examples.en: We can conclude from the data that sales are increasing.
examples.cn: 我们可以从数据中得出结论：销售额正在增长。

examples.en: What did you conclude from his ambiguous statement?
examples.cn: 你从他模棱两可的陈述中得出了什么结论？

examples.en: The team has a winning streak of ten games.
examples.cn: 这支球队取得了一连串十场比赛的胜利。

examples.en: She has a streak of bad luck recently.
examples.cn: 她最近有一连串的坏运气。

examples.en: A streak of lightning illuminated the dark sky.
examples.cn: 一道闪电照亮了黑暗的天空。

examples.en: There's a streak of paint on the wall.
examples.cn: 墙上有一道油漆痕迹。

examples.en: I have a lot in common with my new roommate.
examples.cn: 我和新室友有很多共同点。

examples.en: These two theories have little in common with each other.
examples.cn: 这两种理论彼此之间几乎没有共同点。

examples.en: There is a shortage of skilled workers in this industry.
examples.cn: 这个行业缺乏熟练工人。

examples.en: The drought caused a severe shortage of water.
examples.cn: 干旱导致严重的水资源短缺。

examples.en: The book describes a sequence of historical events.
examples.cn: 这本书描述了一系列历史事件。

examples.en: Follow this sequence of steps to complete the installation.
examples.cn: 按照这一系列步骤完成安装。

examples.en: The doctor on duty will see you now.
examples.cn: 值班医生现在可以为您看诊。

examples.en: Security guards must remain alert while on duty.
examples.cn: 保安人员在值班时必须保持警惕。

examples.en: The children made a mess of the living room with their toys.
examples.cn: 孩子们用玩具把客厅弄得一团糟。

examples.en: I made a mess of the presentation by forgetting my notes.
examples.cn: 我忘了带笔记，把演示搞得一团糟。

examples.en: Paper is primarily made from wood fiber.
examples.cn: 纸主要由木纤维制成。

examples.en: Wood fiber insulation is an eco-friendly building material.
examples.cn: 木纤维绝缘材料是一种环保建筑材料。

examples.en: The team is working at full stretch to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 团队正全力以赴以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: She ran at full stretch to catch the bus.
examples.cn: 她竭尽全力跑去赶公交车。

examples.en: After their argument, they made up with each other the next day.
examples.cn: 争吵后，他们第二天就和好了。

examples.en: It's time to make up with your brother and end this feud.
examples.cn: 是时候和你哥哥和解，结束这场争执了。

examples.en: They cast lots to decide who would go first.
examples.cn: 他们抽签决定谁先走。

examples.en: In ancient times, people often cast lots to make important decisions.
examples.cn: 在古代，人们经常通过抽签来做重要决定。

examples.en: The car ran over a pedestrian at the crosswalk.
examples.cn: 汽车在人行横道上撞倒了一名行人。

examples.en: Be careful not to run over any small animals on the road.
examples.cn: 小心别在路上碾到小动物。

examples.en: The meeting ran over by 30 minutes due to lengthy discussions.
examples.cn: 由于讨论冗长，会议超时了30分钟。

examples.en: Her speech ran over the allotted time, so we had to cut the next session short.
examples.cn: 她的演讲超过了规定时间，所以我们不得不缩短下一个环节。

examples.en: Let's run over the key points before the exam tomorrow.
examples.cn: 明天考试前，我们来快速复习一下要点。

examples.en: She ran over her notes one last time before the presentation.
examples.cn: 她在演示前最后一次快速浏览了笔记。

examples.en: The store offers a wide range of products from electronics to clothing.
examples.cn: 这家商店提供从电子产品到服装的多种商品。

examples.en: We discussed a range of topics during the meeting, including budget and marketing.
examples.cn: 我们在会议上讨论了一系列话题，包括预算和营销。

examples.en: The temperature in this region has a range from -10°C to 30°C throughout the year.
examples.cn: 该地区全年温度范围在零下10摄氏度到30摄氏度之间。

examples.en: The salary for this position falls within a range of $50,000 to $70,000 annually.
examples.cn: 这个职位的年薪范围在5万到7万美元之间。

examples.en: A great many people attended the concert last night.
examples.cn: 昨晚有很多人参加了音乐会。

examples.en: She has read a great many books on history over the years.
examples.cn: 多年来，她阅读了大量历史书籍。

examples.en: As a business owner, she is responsible for all financial decisions.
examples.cn: 作为企业主，她负责所有财务决策。

examples.en: Many business owners struggle with balancing work and personal life.
examples.cn: 许多企业主在平衡工作和个人生活方面感到困难。

definitions.meaning_cn: 悄悄接近，不知不觉地到来

examples.en: The deadline for the project is creeping up on us, so we need to work faster.
examples.cn: 项目截止日期正悄悄逼近，我们需要加快工作速度。

examples.en: Winter crept up on the town, with the first snow falling unexpectedly.
examples.cn: 冬天不知不觉地降临到这个小镇，第一场雪意外地落下。

examples.en: A sense of dread crept up on him as he walked through the dark alley.
examples.cn: 当他走过黑暗的小巷时，一种恐惧感逐渐袭来。

examples.en: Happiness crept up on her after she started volunteering at the shelter.
examples.cn: 在开始在收容所做志愿者后，幸福感逐渐在她心中产生。

examples.en: The situation is now under our control after the emergency response.
examples.cn: 经过应急响应，局势现在在我们的控制之下。

examples.en: Keep your emotions under your control during the negotiation.
examples.cn: 在谈判期间，控制好你的情绪。

examples.en: The community works hard to preserve traditions passed down from their ancestors.
examples.cn: 这个社区努力保护从祖先传承下来的传统。

examples.en: It's important to preserve traditions while also embracing modern changes.
examples.cn: 在拥抱现代变化的同时，保护传统很重要。

examples.en: She has a fever and should stay in bed to rest.
examples.cn: 她发烧了，应该卧床休息。

examples.en: If you have a fever, it's a sign that your body is fighting an infection.
examples.cn: 如果你发烧了，那是你身体在抵抗感染的迹象。

examples.en: The president will make a speech at the conference tomorrow.
examples.cn: 总统明天将在会议上发表演讲。

examples.en: She was nervous about making a speech in front of hundreds of people.
examples.cn: 她对于在数百人面前发表演讲感到紧张。

examples.en: It's essential to communicate with your team regularly to avoid misunderstandings.
examples.cn: 定期与你的团队沟通以避免误解至关重要。

examples.en: He uses sign language to communicate with his deaf friends.
examples.cn: 他用手语与他的聋人朋友交流。

examples.en: On her birthday, she made a wish and blew out the candles on the cake.
examples.cn: 在她生日那天，她许了个愿，然后吹灭了蛋糕上的蜡烛。

examples.en: The children took turns blowing out candles during the party games.
examples.cn: 在派对游戏中，孩子们轮流吹灭蜡烛。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人结交，开始与某人交往

examples.en: He took up with a new group of friends after moving to the city.
examples.cn: 搬到城市后，他开始与一群新朋友交往。

examples.en: She advised her son not to take up with people who have bad habits.
examples.cn: 她建议儿子不要与有坏习惯的人结交。

definitions.meaning_cn: 向某人提出（问题或投诉）

examples.en: If you have any issues, you should take them up with the manager directly.
examples.cn: 如果你有任何问题，应该直接向经理提出。

examples.en: The customer decided to take up the complaint with the company's headquarters.
examples.cn: 顾客决定向公司总部提出投诉。

examples.en: After his recovery, he decided to turn over a new leaf and live a healthier lifestyle.
examples.cn: 康复后，他决定改过自新，过上更健康的生活方式。

examples.en: She turned over a new leaf by quitting her job and pursuing her passion for art.
examples.cn: 她通过辞职并追求对艺术的热爱来重新开始。

examples.en: As a translator, her job is to interpret messages accurately between different languages.
examples.cn: 作为翻译，她的工作是在不同语言之间准确解释信息。

examples.en: It can be challenging to interpret messages in a noisy environment.
examples.cn: 在嘈杂的环境中解读消息可能具有挑战性。

examples.en: Psychologists help patients interpret messages from their dreams.
examples.cn: 心理学家帮助患者理解他们梦中的信息。

examples.en: You need to interpret the messages in the data to make informed decisions.
examples.cn: 你需要解读数据中的信息以做出明智的决策。

examples.en: Students should meet with their academic advisor regularly to plan their course schedule.
examples.cn: 学生应定期与学术顾问会面以规划课程安排。

examples.en: The academic advisor provided guidance on choosing a major and career path.
examples.cn: 学术顾问在选择专业和职业道路方面提供了指导。

examples.en: Freedom of speech is considered one of the basic rights in a democracy.
examples.cn: 言论自由被认为是民主国家的基本权利之一。

examples.en: The constitution guarantees basic rights such as equality and privacy to all citizens.
examples.cn: 宪法保障所有公民的基本权利，如平等和隐私。

examples.en: His dedication to work is akin to that of a professional athlete training for the Olympics.
examples.cn: 他对工作的投入类似于职业运动员为奥运会训练。

examples.en: The new policy is akin to the previous one, with only minor adjustments.
examples.cn: 新政策与之前的类似，只有微小的调整。

examples.en: To maintain good health, it's important to exercise regularly, such as going for a run three times a week.
examples.cn: 为了保持健康，定期锻炼很重要，比如每周跑步三次。

examples.en: She exercises regularly by attending yoga classes every morning.
examples.cn: 她通过每天早上去上瑜伽课来定期锻炼。

examples.en: He went ape over the new video game release.
examples.cn: 他对新发布的电子游戏兴奋不已。

examples.en: She went ape over the mess in the kitchen.
examples.cn: 她对厨房的混乱大发雷霆。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人击掌（表示问候、庆祝或同意）

examples.en: After winning the game, they gave each other some skin.
examples.cn: 赢得比赛后，他们互相击掌庆祝。

examples.en: Give me some skin to show we're on the same page.
examples.cn: 和我击个掌，表示我们意见一致。

examples.en: The project's success relied on collaborative teamwork among all departments.
examples.cn: 项目的成功依赖于所有部门之间的协作团队合作。

examples.en: We encourage collaborative teamwork to solve complex problems efficiently.
examples.cn: 我们鼓励协作团队合作以高效解决复杂问题。

valid_entries.original_phrase: stand on one's own two feet

examples.en: After college, he learned to stand on his own two feet financially.
examples.cn: 大学毕业后，他学会了在经济上自立。

examples.en: It's important for young adults to stand on their own two feet.
examples.cn: 年轻人学会独立自主很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 员工休息室（尤指学校或办公室）

examples.en: The teachers gathered in the staff room during their break.
examples.cn: 老师们在休息时间聚集在员工休息室里。

examples.en: She left her coffee mug in the staff room.
examples.cn: 她把咖啡杯忘在了员工休息室。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将...融入或整合到某物中

examples.en: They plan to build safety features into the new car design.
examples.cn: 他们计划将安全功能融入新车型设计中。

examples.en: Flexibility was built into the software from the start.
examples.cn: 灵活性从一开始就被整合到了软件中。

examples.en: Small disagreements can build into major conflicts if not addressed.
examples.cn: 如果不解决，小分歧可能逐渐发展成重大冲突。

examples.en: Her savings built into a substantial amount over the years.
examples.cn: 多年来，她的储蓄逐渐积累成了一笔可观的金额。

examples.en: The new law strengthens consumer rights regarding product returns.
examples.cn: 新法律加强了消费者在退货方面的权益。

examples.en: It's important to be aware of your consumer rights when making purchases.
examples.cn: 购物时了解自己的消费者权益很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 发起大规模活动（如广告、军事或社会运动）

examples.en: The company launched massive campaigns to promote its new product.
examples.cn: 该公司发起了大规模活动来推广其新产品。

examples.en: The government launched massive campaigns against illegal logging.
examples.cn: 政府发起了大规模打击非法伐木的活动。

valid_entries.original_phrase: look as if butter wouldn't melt in one's mouth

definitions.meaning_cn: 看起来天真无邪或无辜（但可能并非如此）

examples.en: She looks as if butter wouldn't melt in her mouth, but she's actually quite mischievous.
examples.cn: 她看起来天真无邪，但实际上相当调皮。

examples.en: He acted as if butter wouldn't melt in his mouth during the interview.
examples.cn: 面试时他表现得一副无辜的样子。

valid_entries.original_phrase: build up a network of contacts

examples.en: She built up a network of contacts in the industry over many years.
examples.cn: 多年来，她在行业内建立了一个人脉网络。

examples.en: Building up a network of contacts is essential for career advancement.
examples.cn: 建立人脉网络对职业发展至关重要。

examples.en: People crowded in to see the celebrity at the event.
examples.cn: 人们涌入活动现场去看那位名人。

examples.en: Memories of the past crowded in as she visited her old school.
examples.cn: 当她参观母校时，过去的记忆涌上心头。

definitions.meaning_cn: 认真着手处理或深入参与某事

examples.en: He finally got his teeth into the challenging research project.
examples.cn: 他终于认真着手处理那个具有挑战性的研究项目。

examples.en: She loves to get her teeth into a good book.
examples.cn: 她喜欢深入阅读一本好书。

examples.en: He hardly ever goes to the movies.
examples.cn: 他几乎从不看电影。

examples.en: She hardly ever complains about her workload.
examples.cn: 她几乎从不抱怨工作量。

examples.en: I'm uncertain about the details of the plan.
examples.cn: 我对计划的细节不确定。

examples.en: They were uncertain about which direction to take.
examples.cn: 他们对该走哪个方向不确定。

examples.en: The project failed for lack of funding.
examples.cn: 该项目因缺乏资金而失败。

examples.en: For lack of evidence, the case was dismissed.
examples.cn: 由于缺乏证据，该案被驳回。

examples.en: A good sense of humor can help in stressful situations.
examples.cn: 良好的幽默感有助于应对压力情境。

examples.en: She has a great sense of humor that makes her fun to be around.
examples.cn: 她有很强的幽默感，让人乐于与她相处。

examples.en: The lawyer had to withdraw due to a conflict of interests.
examples.cn: 由于利益冲突，该律师不得不退出。

examples.en: Companies must disclose any potential conflict of interests.
examples.cn: 公司必须披露任何潜在的利益冲突。

examples.en: She started the business on her own account.
examples.cn: 她独立创办了这家企业。

examples.en: He traveled to Europe on his own account after graduation.
examples.cn: 毕业后，他独自前往欧洲旅行。

examples.en: He apologized on his own account for the mistake.
examples.cn: 他因自身错误而道歉。

examples.en: She felt guilty on her own account, not because of others.
examples.cn: 她因自身原因感到内疚，而非因为他人。

examples.en: The two dogs went at each other in the yard.
examples.cn: 两只狗在院子里互相攻击。

examples.en: He went at the problem with full energy.
examples.cn: 他全力以赴地处理这个问题。

definitions.meaning_cn: 以某种速度或方式处理

examples.en: They went at the task with great enthusiasm.
examples.cn: 他们以极大的热情处理这项任务。

examples.en: She went at her studies diligently every day.
examples.cn: 她每天勤奋地学习。

examples.en: He is on medication for high blood pressure.
examples.cn: 他因高血压而服药治疗。

examples.en: She has been on medication for anxiety for several months.
examples.cn: 她因焦虑症服药治疗已经几个月了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 咨询服务，提供专业建议或心理支持的服务

examples.en: The university offers free counselling service to students experiencing stress.
examples.cn: 大学为经历压力的学生提供免费咨询服务。

examples.en: She sought a counselling service to help with her career decisions.
examples.cn: 她寻求咨询服务以帮助她的职业决策。

definitions.meaning_cn: 忠实的粉丝，对某人或某事极度忠诚和支持的追随者

examples.en: The band's devoted fans waited in line for hours to get concert tickets.
examples.cn: 乐队的忠实粉丝排队数小时以获取音乐会门票。

examples.en: Devoted fans of the author eagerly await each new book release.
examples.cn: 作者的忠实粉丝热切期待每一本新书的发布。

definitions.meaning_cn: 嘲笑，因觉得某事有趣或荒谬而发笑

examples.en: It's rude to laugh at someone when they make a mistake.
examples.cn: 嘲笑别人犯错是不礼貌的。

examples.en: The children laughed at the clown's funny antics.
examples.cn: 孩子们被小丑滑稽的动作逗笑了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对...一笑置之，不认真对待

examples.en: He just laughed at the criticism and continued with his work.
examples.cn: 他对批评一笑置之，继续工作。

examples.en: She laughed at the idea that she couldn't succeed.
examples.cn: 她对认为自己不能成功的想法一笑置之。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与优秀的人为伍，处于良好的同伴中

examples.en: If you're feeling nervous about the presentation, you're in good company—many others are too.
examples.cn: 如果你对演示感到紧张，你并不孤单——很多人也一样。

examples.en: As a new employee, she found herself in good company with experienced mentors.
examples.cn: 作为新员工，她发现自己与经验丰富的导师为伍。

examples.en: I need to set the record straight about what happened yesterday.
examples.cn: 我需要澄清昨天发生的事情。

examples.en: She set him straight on the company's policies.
examples.cn: 她纠正了他对公司政策的误解。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与时俱进，跟上时代的发展

examples.en: Businesses must keep up with the times to remain competitive.
examples.cn: 企业必须与时俱进以保持竞争力。

examples.en: He reads tech blogs daily to keep up with the times.
examples.cn: 他每天阅读科技博客以跟上时代。

definitions.meaning_cn: 努力尝试并取得成功，尽力做好某事

examples.en: They decided to make a go of it and start their own restaurant.
examples.cn: 他们决定努力尝试，开一家自己的餐厅。

examples.en: Despite the challenges, she's determined to make a go of her new career.
examples.cn: 尽管有挑战，她决心在新职业上取得成功。

examples.en: Can you point out the errors in this report?
examples.cn: 你能指出这份报告中的错误吗？

examples.en: She pointed out that we were running late for the meeting.
examples.cn: 她指出我们开会要迟到了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 商业领袖，企业或行业中的高层管理者或决策者

examples.en: Business leaders from around the world attended the conference.
examples.cn: 来自世界各地的商业领袖参加了会议。

examples.en: Effective business leaders inspire their teams to achieve goals.
examples.cn: 有效的商业领袖激励团队实现目标。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...平行，在几何或比喻意义上相似或对应

examples.en: The road is parallel to the river for several miles.
examples.cn: 这条路与河流平行数英里。

examples.en: His career path is parallel to that of his mentor.
examples.cn: 他的职业道路与他的导师相似。

definitions.meaning_cn: 化为灰烬，字面或比喻上彻底失败或毁灭

examples.en: The old building went up in flames during the fire.
examples.cn: 旧建筑在火灾中化为灰烬。

examples.en: Their business plan went up in flames after the market crash.
examples.cn: 他们的商业计划在市场崩溃后彻底失败。

definitions.meaning_cn: 做好准备，为某事做准备或加速

examples.en: The team is gearing up for the big game next week.
examples.cn: 团队正在为下周的大赛做准备。

examples.en: We need to gear up production to meet the increased demand.
examples.cn: 我们需要加速生产以满足增长的需求。

definitions.meaning_cn: 乏味的工作，单调、无聊或令人厌烦的任务

examples.en: Data entry can be a tedious job that requires a lot of patience.
examples.cn: 数据录入可能是一项需要很多耐心的乏味工作。

examples.en: He found the repetitive tasks of the assembly line to be a tedious job.
examples.cn: 他发现装配线的重复任务很乏味。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have the right to do sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 有权做某事，拥有法律或道德上的许可或资格

examples.en: Every citizen has the right to vote in democratic countries.
examples.cn: 在民主国家，每个公民都有权投票。

examples.en: Employees have the right to a safe working environment.
examples.cn: 员工有权拥有安全的工作环境。

definitions.meaning_cn: 广泛阅读，大量阅读以获取知识或提高技能

examples.en: Extensive reading is key to improving vocabulary in a foreign language.
examples.cn: 广泛阅读是提高外语词汇量的关键。

examples.en: She credits her success to years of extensive reading on various topics.
examples.cn: 她将自己的成功归功于多年来对各种主题的广泛阅读。

definitions.meaning_cn: 融入，成为整体的一部分或适应新环境

examples.en: It took time for the new software to integrate into the existing system.
examples.cn: 新软件需要时间融入现有系统。

examples.en: Immigrants often work hard to integrate into the local community.
examples.cn: 移民通常努力融入当地社区。

definitions.meaning_cn: 做某事没有意义，逻辑上不合理或不明智

examples.en: It makes no sense to drive when you can walk there in five minutes.
examples.cn: 当你可以步行五分钟到达时，开车没有意义。

examples.en: It makes no sense to invest in a failing business.
examples.cn: 投资一家失败的企业没有意义。

definitions.meaning_cn: 著名运动员，在体育领域知名的人物

examples.en: Famous sportspeople often serve as role models for young athletes.
examples.cn: 著名运动员通常作为年轻运动员的榜样。

examples.en: The event attracted many famous sportspeople from around the globe.
examples.cn: 这次活动吸引了来自全球的许多著名运动员。

definitions.meaning_cn: 擅长处理或与...相处得好，在某方面有技巧或亲和力

examples.en: She is good with children and works as a teacher.
examples.cn: 她擅长与孩子相处，是一名教师。

examples.en: He is good with numbers, so he excels in accounting.
examples.cn: 他擅长数字，因此在会计方面很出色。

definitions.meaning_cn: 更不用说，用于强调还有更重要或更明显的事情

examples.en: The hike was difficult due to the steep terrain, to say nothing of the bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于陡峭的地形，这次徒步很困难，更不用说糟糕的天气了。

examples.en: He lost his job, to say nothing of the financial stress it caused.
examples.cn: 他失去了工作，更不用说由此造成的财务压力了。

examples.en: If he studied hard, it stands to reason that he would pass the exam.
examples.cn: 如果他努力学习，通过考试是合乎逻辑的。

examples.en: Given the evidence, it stands to reason that she is the best candidate.
examples.cn: 根据证据，她显然是最佳候选人。

examples.en: The local dialect in that village has unique words not found in standard English.
examples.cn: 那个村庄的当地方言有标准英语中没有的独特词汇。

examples.en: She learned the local dialect to better communicate with the residents.
examples.cn: 她学习了当地方言以便更好地与居民交流。

examples.en: They aim to live a sustainable life by reducing waste and using renewable energy.
examples.cn: 他们旨在通过减少浪费和使用可再生能源来过可持续的生活。

examples.en: Living a sustainable life involves making eco-friendly choices daily.
examples.cn: 过可持续的生活包括每天做出环保选择。

examples.en: She decided to take on part-time employment while studying at university.
examples.cn: 她决定在大学学习期间从事兼职工作。

examples.en: Many students take on part-time employment to gain work experience.
examples.cn: 许多学生从事兼职工作以获得工作经验。

examples.en: The rain is expected to persist for several hours.
examples.cn: 预计雨将持续几个小时。

examples.en: His symptoms may persist for a few days after the treatment.
examples.cn: 治疗后他的症状可能会持续几天。

examples.en: The old equipment was relegated to storage after the upgrade.
examples.cn: 升级后，旧设备被降级到仓库存放。

examples.en: He was relegated to a minor role in the project due to poor performance.
examples.cn: 由于表现不佳，他被贬低到项目中的次要角色。

examples.en: She only picked at her food because she wasn't hungry.
examples.cn: 她只是挑剔地吃了一点食物，因为她不饿。

examples.en: The child picked at his vegetables, leaving most on the plate.
examples.cn: 孩子挑剔地吃蔬菜，大部分留在盘子里。

examples.en: He kept picking at the loose thread on his shirt.
examples.cn: 他不停地拨弄衬衫上的松线。

examples.en: Stop picking at that scab; it needs to heal.
examples.cn: 别抓挠那个痂；它需要愈合。

examples.en: The senator resigned his seat after the scandal.
examples.cn: 丑闻后，参议员辞去了他的席位。

examples.en: She resigned her seat on the board to pursue other opportunities.
examples.cn: 她辞去了董事会席位以追求其他机会。

examples.en: The company plans to phase in the new software over the next six months.
examples.cn: 公司计划在未来六个月内逐步引入新软件。

examples.en: They will phase in the policy changes to minimize disruption.
examples.cn: 他们将逐步实施政策变更以最小化干扰。

definitions.meaning_cn: 考试工厂，指过度强调考试的教育机构

examples.en: Some schools are criticized as exam factories for focusing solely on test scores.
examples.cn: 一些学校因只关注考试成绩而被批评为考试工厂。

examples.en: The education system should avoid becoming an exam factory that neglects creativity.
examples.cn: 教育系统应避免成为忽视创造力的考试工厂。

examples.en: I share the view on the importance of environmental protection.
examples.cn: 我对环境保护的重要性持有相同观点。

examples.en: Many experts share the view on the need for economic reform.
examples.cn: 许多专家对经济改革的必要性持有相同观点。

examples.en: She was annoyed with her brother for being late.
examples.cn: 她对弟弟迟到感到恼火。

examples.en: He is often annoyed with coworkers who don't meet deadlines.
examples.cn: 他经常对不按时完成工作的同事感到恼火。

examples.en: By comparison with last year, sales have increased significantly.
examples.cn: 与去年相比，销售额显著增加。

examples.en: This model is more efficient by comparison with the older version.
examples.cn: 与旧版本相比，这个型号更高效。

examples.en: The assumption is implicit in the contract terms.
examples.cn: 这个假设隐含在合同条款中。

examples.en: Her support was implicit in her actions, though not stated outright.
examples.cn: 她的支持隐含在她的行动中，尽管没有明确说明。

definitions.meaning_cn: 最好，应该（表示建议或警告）

examples.en: You had better finish your homework before going out.
examples.cn: 你最好在出门前完成作业。

examples.en: We had better leave early to avoid traffic.
examples.cn: 我们最好早点出发以避免交通拥堵。

examples.en: She is eager to start her new job next week.
examples.cn: 她渴望下周开始新工作。

examples.en: The children were eager to open their presents on Christmas morning.
examples.cn: 孩子们渴望在圣诞节早上打开礼物。

examples.en: Even if they lose, they will go down fighting with dignity.
examples.cn: 即使输了，他们也会尊严地战斗到底。

examples.en: He vowed to go down fighting for his principles.
examples.cn: 他发誓要为他的原则战斗到底。

examples.en: The heavy rain washed away the dirt from the streets.
examples.cn: 大雨冲走了街道上的污垢。

examples.en: Use soap to wash away the grease from your hands.
examples.cn: 用肥皂洗掉手上的油脂。

examples.en: Time can wash away the pain of past mistakes.
examples.cn: 时间可以消除过去错误的痛苦。

examples.en: She tried to wash away her guilt by helping others.
examples.cn: 她试图通过帮助他人来消除内疚感。

examples.en: People from all walks of life attended the community event.
examples.cn: 来自各行各业的人们参加了社区活动。

examples.en: The charity helps individuals regardless of their walk of life.
examples.cn: 该慈善机构帮助个人，无论其社会阶层如何。

examples.en: She is on a diet to lose weight before the wedding.
examples.cn: 她在婚礼前节食以减肥。

examples.en: He has been on a diet for months to improve his health.
examples.cn: 他为了改善健康已经节食几个月了。

examples.en: He took apart the old clock to see how it worked.
examples.cn: 他拆开了旧钟表，想看看它是如何工作的。

examples.en: The mechanic will take apart the engine to diagnose the problem.
examples.cn: 机械师将拆卸发动机来诊断问题。

examples.en: The critic took apart the new movie in his review.
examples.cn: 评论家在他的评论中严厉批评了这部新电影。

examples.en: She took apart his argument point by point during the debate.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她逐点剖析了他的论点。

examples.en: Students at that school receive a well-rounded education that includes arts and sciences.
examples.cn: 那所学校的学生接受包括艺术和科学在内的全面教育。

examples.en: She believes it's important for children to receive a well-rounded education to develop various skills.
examples.cn: 她认为孩子们接受全面教育以发展多种技能很重要。

examples.en: The two companies teamed up to develop a new product.
examples.cn: 两家公司合作开发了一款新产品。

examples.en: Let's team up to finish this project faster.
examples.cn: 让我们组队以更快完成这个项目。

examples.en: Please throw the empty bottle in the trash can.
examples.cn: 请把空瓶子扔进垃圾桶。

examples.en: The trash can in the kitchen needs to be emptied.
examples.cn: 厨房的垃圾桶需要清空。

examples.en: Solar and wind power are examples of renewable resources.
examples.cn: 太阳能和风能是可再生资源的例子。

examples.en: We should invest more in renewable resources to reduce pollution.
examples.cn: 我们应该更多地投资于可再生资源以减少污染。

examples.en: He is set on becoming a doctor and studies hard every day.
examples.cn: 他决心成为一名医生，每天努力学习。

examples.en: She was set on finishing the marathon despite the rain.
examples.cn: 尽管下雨，她仍专注于完成马拉松。

examples.en: The dog was set on by a group of stray cats.
examples.cn: 那只狗被一群流浪猫袭击了。

examples.en: The protesters were set on by the police during the demonstration.
examples.cn: 示威者在示威期间遭到警察攻击。

examples.en: She put her ideas across clearly during the presentation.
examples.cn: 她在演示中清晰地表达了她的想法。

examples.en: He struggled to put his feelings across to his friend.
examples.cn: 他很难向朋友传达他的感受。

examples.en: Let's put aside our differences and work together.
examples.cn: 让我们搁置分歧，一起工作。

examples.en: She puts aside some money each month for emergencies.
examples.cn: 她每月留出一些钱以备紧急情况。

examples.en: After missing the deadline, he is on thin ice with his boss.
examples.cn: 错过截止日期后，他与老板的关系如履薄冰。

examples.en: You're on thin ice if you keep breaking the rules.
examples.cn: 如果你继续违反规则，你的处境会很危险。

examples.en: They danced like crazy at the party last night.
examples.cn: 昨晚他们在派对上疯狂地跳舞。

examples.en: I've been working like crazy to meet the project deadline.
examples.cn: 我一直在疯狂工作以赶上项目截止日期。

examples.en: I am ready to start the meeting whenever you are.
examples.cn: 无论你何时准备好，我都准备好开始会议了。

examples.en: She was ready to help her friend in need.
examples.cn: 她准备好帮助有需要的朋友。

examples.en: The yolk can be separated from the egg white easily.
examples.cn: 蛋黄可以很容易地从蛋白中分离出来。

examples.en: He decided to separate from his business partner due to disagreements.
examples.cn: 由于分歧，他决定与商业伙伴分开。

examples.en: She built up her savings over several years.
examples.cn: 她几年来积累了储蓄。

examples.en: Exercise helps to build up muscle strength.
examples.cn: 锻炼有助于增强肌肉力量。

examples.en: They plan to build up a new team for the project.
examples.cn: 他们计划为这个项目逐步建立一个新的团队。

examples.en: The company built up its reputation through quality products.
examples.cn: 公司通过优质产品逐步建立了声誉。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在...的链条中，属于...的一部分

examples.en: Each worker is an important link in the chain of production.
examples.cn: 每个工人都是生产链条中的重要一环。

examples.en: This step is crucial in the chain of events leading to the discovery.
examples.cn: 这一步在导致发现的事件链条中至关重要。

examples.en: We had to turn back because of the heavy snow.
examples.cn: 由于大雪，我们不得不返回。

examples.en: He turned back to get his forgotten keys.
examples.cn: 他折回去拿他忘记的钥匙。

examples.en: The security guard turned back the unauthorized visitors.
examples.cn: 保安拒绝了未经授权的访客。

examples.en: They turned back the enemy's advance during the battle.
examples.cn: 他们在战斗中阻止了敌人的推进。

examples.en: The engine seized up due to lack of oil.
examples.cn: 发动机因缺油而卡住了。

examples.en: My muscles seized up after the intense workout.
examples.cn: 剧烈锻炼后，我的肌肉停止了运转。

examples.en: She is an outstanding student who always gets top grades.
examples.cn: 她是一名总是取得最高分的优秀学生。

examples.en: The school awarded scholarships to outstanding students this year.
examples.cn: 学校今年向优秀学生颁发了奖学金。

examples.en: He got a red face when he realized his mistake in front of everyone.
examples.cn: 当他在大家面前意识到自己的错误时，他脸红了。

examples.en: She got a red face after being praised unexpectedly.
examples.cn: 意外受到表扬后，她脸红了。

examples.en: The weather delay was beyond our control, so we had to reschedule.
examples.cn: 天气延误超出了我们的控制范围，所以我们不得不重新安排。

examples.en: Some factors in the project are beyond my control, but I'll do my best.
examples.cn: 项目中的一些因素超出了我的控制范围，但我会尽力而为。

examples.en: Scientists carry out experiments to test their hypotheses.
examples.cn: 科学家进行实验以测试他们的假设。

examples.en: The students will carry out experiments in the chemistry lab next week.
examples.cn: 学生们下周将在化学实验室进行实验。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have the time of one's life

definitions.meaning_cn: 度过一生中最快乐的时光，玩得非常开心

examples.en: At the amusement park, the children had the time of their lives on the roller coasters.
examples.cn: 在游乐园里，孩子们在过山车上玩得非常开心。

examples.en: She had the time of her life traveling through Europe last summer.
examples.cn: 去年夏天她在欧洲旅行时度过了最快乐的时光。

definitions.meaning_cn: 受到严厉的斥责或责骂

examples.en: The employee got a tongue-lashing from the boss for missing the deadline.
examples.cn: 这名员工因错过截止日期而受到老板的严厉斥责。

examples.en: He got a tongue-lashing from his parents after failing his exams.
examples.cn: 考试不及格后，他受到了父母的严厉责骂。

examples.en: It took her a few weeks to adjust to the new time zone after moving abroad.
examples.cn: 搬到国外后，她花了几个星期才适应新的时区。

examples.en: He quickly adjusted to the fast pace of city life.
examples.cn: 他很快适应了城市生活的快节奏。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在（投资或交易中）遭受重大损失

examples.en: He took a bath on the stock market crash, losing most of his savings.
examples.cn: 他在股市崩盘中遭受重大损失，失去了大部分积蓄。

examples.en: The company took a bath on the failed product launch.
examples.cn: 该公司在产品发布失败中遭受了重大损失。

definitions.meaning_cn: 受到严厉的惩罚或批评

examples.en: He got it in the neck from his coach for missing practice.
examples.cn: 他因缺席训练而受到教练的严厉批评。

examples.en: The team got it in the neck after losing the important match.
examples.cn: 输掉重要比赛后，球队受到了严厉的惩罚。

definitions.meaning_cn: 步调不一致，不合拍；与主流观点或行为不符

examples.en: His old-fashioned ideas are out of step with modern society.
examples.cn: 他过时的想法与现代社会的步调不一致。

examples.en: The dancer was out of step with the music during the performance.
examples.cn: 表演时，这位舞者与音乐的节奏不合拍。

definitions.meaning_cn: 充满，布满（通常指令人不快或危险的事物）

examples.en: The old castle bristled with hidden dangers and secret passages.
examples.cn: 这座古老的城堡充满了隐藏的危险和秘密通道。

examples.en: The report bristled with errors and inaccuracies.
examples.cn: 这份报告充满了错误和不准确之处。

examples.en: Good team spirit is essential for winning the championship.
examples.cn: 良好的团队精神对于赢得冠军至关重要。

examples.en: The manager encouraged team spirit by organizing group activities.
examples.cn: 经理通过组织团体活动来鼓励团队精神。

examples.en: She pored over the legal documents to find any loopholes.
examples.cn: 她仔细阅读法律文件以寻找任何漏洞。

examples.en: Students often pore over their textbooks before exams.
examples.cn: 学生们经常在考试前仔细研读课本。

examples.en: The new factory will provide job opportunities for hundreds of local residents.
examples.cn: 新工厂将为数百名当地居民提供就业机会。

examples.en: Government programs aim to provide job opportunities for the unemployed.
examples.cn: 政府计划旨在为失业者提供就业机会。

definitions.meaning_cn: 显而易见，明摆着（通常指事实或真相）

examples.en: The solution to the problem was staring us in the face, but we didn't see it.
examples.cn: 问题的解决方案明摆着，但我们没有看到。

examples.en: The evidence of his guilt was staring the jury in the face.
examples.cn: 他有罪的证据对陪审团来说是显而易见的。

examples.en: The teacher addressed the student's poor behaviour in class.
examples.cn: 老师处理了这名学生在课堂上的不良行为。

examples.en: Poor behaviour at work can lead to disciplinary action.
examples.cn: 工作中的不当举止可能导致纪律处分。

definitions.meaning_cn: 鞠躬致意（通常在表演后）；接受赞扬或认可

examples.en: After the concert, the musicians took a bow to acknowledge the applause.
examples.cn: 音乐会后，音乐家们鞠躬致意以感谢掌声。

examples.en: She took a bow for her outstanding contribution to the project.
examples.cn: 她因对项目的杰出贡献而接受赞扬。

examples.en: He enjoys keeping company with artists and musicians.
examples.cn: 他喜欢与艺术家和音乐家交往。

examples.en: She kept company with her grandmother during the holidays.
examples.cn: 假期期间她陪伴着她的祖母。

examples.en: The athlete made a record by running the fastest mile in history.
examples.cn: 这位运动员创造了历史上跑得最快的一英里纪录。

examples.en: The band plans to make a record of their new songs next month.
examples.cn: 乐队计划下个月录制他们的新歌。

definitions.meaning_cn: 忍受，容忍（不愉快的事物）

examples.en: She had to put up with noisy neighbors for years.
examples.cn: 她不得不忍受吵闹的邻居多年。

examples.en: I can't put up with his constant complaining anymore.
examples.cn: 我再也无法忍受他不断的抱怨了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 一楼，底层（建筑）；早期参与（机会）

examples.en: The restaurant is located on the ground floor of the building.
examples.cn: 餐厅位于这栋建筑的一楼。

examples.en: Investors got in on the ground floor of the tech startup.
examples.cn: 投资者早期参与了这家科技初创公司。

examples.en: The company uses advanced technology to improve its manufacturing processes.
examples.cn: 该公司使用先进技术来改进其制造流程。

examples.en: Advanced technology has revolutionized the healthcare industry.
examples.cn: 先进技术已经彻底改变了医疗保健行业。

definitions.meaning_cn: 林荫大道，两旁种有树木的街道

examples.en: The city is famous for its beautiful tree-lined avenues.
examples.cn: 这座城市以其美丽的林荫大道而闻名。

examples.en: They took a stroll down the tree-lined avenues of the historic district.
examples.cn: 他们在历史街区的林荫大道上散步。

definitions.meaning_cn: 等等，诸如此类（用于列举未尽事项）

examples.en: She bought fruits like apples, bananas, oranges, and so on.
examples.cn: 她买了苹果、香蕉、橘子等水果。

examples.en: The store sells electronics, clothing, toys, and so on.
examples.cn: 这家商店销售电子产品、服装、玩具等等。

examples.en: Reducing greenhouse gas emission is crucial for combating climate change.
examples.cn: 减少温室气体排放对于应对气候变化至关重要。

examples.en: The report shows a significant increase in greenhouse gas emission from industrial activities.
examples.cn: 报告显示工业活动导致的温室气体排放显著增加。

examples.en: Despite rumors to the contrary, the company is not going bankrupt.
examples.cn: 尽管有相反的谣言，公司并没有破产。

examples.en: He insisted on his innocence, and no evidence to the contrary was presented.
examples.cn: 他坚称自己无罪，也没有提出相反的证据。

examples.en: Many unique species thrive in a tropical environment.
examples.cn: 许多独特物种在热带环境中茁壮成长。

examples.en: The island's tropical environment attracts tourists year-round.
examples.cn: 该岛的热带环境全年吸引游客。

examples.en: He is usually punctual, but that may not always be the case.
examples.cn: 他通常很准时，但可能并非总是如此。

examples.en: Success in business does not always be the case for everyone.
examples.cn: 商业上的成功并非对每个人都是如此。

examples.en: Vaccines help protect children against diseases.
examples.cn: 疫苗帮助保护儿童免受疾病侵害。

examples.en: This software is designed to protect your computer against viruses.
examples.cn: 这款软件旨在保护你的电脑免受病毒侵害。

examples.en: How about we go to the movies tonight?
examples.cn: 我们今晚去看电影怎么样？

examples.en: How about trying the new restaurant for lunch?
examples.cn: 午餐去试试那家新餐厅怎么样？

examples.en: The company discharged him for repeated misconduct.
examples.cn: 公司因他屡次行为不端而解雇了他。

examples.en: She was discharged for violating company policies.
examples.cn: 她因违反公司政策被解雇。

examples.en: I am not in the least interested in that topic.
examples.cn: 我对那个话题一点也不感兴趣。

examples.en: The noise did not bother me in the least.
examples.cn: 噪音一点也没有打扰到我。

examples.en: The city plans to redevelop run-down urban areas to attract new businesses.
examples.cn: 该市计划重新开发破败的城区以吸引新企业。

examples.en: Efforts to redevelop run-down urban areas have improved living conditions.
examples.cn: 重新开发破败城区的努力改善了居住条件。

examples.en: Let's have a coffee and discuss the project.
examples.cn: 我们喝杯咖啡讨论一下这个项目吧。

examples.en: I usually have a coffee in the morning to start my day.
examples.cn: 我通常早上喝杯咖啡开始一天。

examples.en: Managers answer to the board of directors.
examples.cn: 经理们对董事会负责。

examples.en: You will have to answer to your actions in court.
examples.cn: 你必须在法庭上对你的行为负责。

examples.en: The dog answers to the name 'Max'.
examples.cn: 这只狗对名字'Max'有回应。

examples.en: He didn't answer to my calls yesterday.
examples.cn: 他昨天没有回应我的电话。

examples.en: I was impressed by her dedication to the project.
examples.cn: 我被她对项目的奉献精神打动了。

examples.en: The audience was impressed by the performer's skills.
examples.cn: 观众被表演者的技巧打动了。

examples.en: She bought a dozen eggs from the market.
examples.cn: 她从市场买了一打鸡蛋。

examples.en: We need a dozen pens for the meeting.
examples.cn: 我们需要一打笔用于会议。

examples.en: We went shopping at the new department store downtown.
examples.cn: 我们去市中心的百货商店购物了。

examples.en: The department store offers a wide range of products.
examples.cn: 这家百货商店提供广泛的产品。

examples.en: He eventually came around to our point of view.
examples.cn: 他最终改变了主意，接受了我们的观点。

examples.en: She didn't like the idea at first, but she came around after discussing it.
examples.cn: 她起初不喜欢这个想法，但讨论后改变了主意。

examples.en: My friends come around every weekend.
examples.cn: 我的朋友们每个周末都来访。

examples.en: Will you come around for dinner tonight?
examples.cn: 你今晚会来吃晚饭吗？

examples.en: Linear algebra is a fundamental subject in engineering courses.
examples.cn: 线性代数是工程课程中的基础学科。

examples.en: Students often find linear algebra challenging but rewarding.
examples.cn: 学生常觉得线性代数有挑战性但有益。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get time to catch one's breath

examples.en: After the marathon, I need to get time to catch my breath.
examples.cn: 马拉松后，我需要时间喘口气。

examples.en: In this busy schedule, it's hard to get time to catch one's breath.
examples.cn: 在这个繁忙的日程中，很难有时间喘口气。

examples.en: We must take into consideration all factors before making a decision.
examples.cn: 在做出决定前，我们必须考虑所有因素。

examples.en: The committee will take your suggestions into consideration.
examples.cn: 委员会会考虑你的建议。

examples.en: A growing population puts pressure on urban infrastructure.
examples.cn: 增长的人口给城市基础设施带来压力。

examples.en: The city is adapting to a growing population by building more schools.
examples.cn: 该市通过建设更多学校来适应增长的人口。

examples.en: I am used to waking up early for work.
examples.cn: 我习惯于早起上班。

examples.en: She is used to the cold weather after living in Canada.
examples.cn: 在加拿大生活后，她习惯了寒冷的天气。

definitions.meaning_cn: 过去常常做某事（表示过去的习惯）

examples.en: He used to play soccer every weekend when he was younger.
examples.cn: 他年轻时过去常常每个周末踢足球。

examples.en: We used to visit our grandparents every summer.
examples.cn: 我们过去常常每个夏天去看望祖父母。

examples.en: We arrived in time for the movie's start.
examples.cn: 我们及时赶上了电影的开场。

examples.en: Submit your report in time to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 及时提交报告以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: In time, you will understand why this decision was made.
examples.cn: 最终，你会明白为什么做出这个决定。

examples.en: The wound healed in time with proper care.
examples.cn: 伤口在适当护理下最终愈合了。

examples.en: I have time off next week to go on vacation.
examples.cn: 我下周休假去度假。

examples.en: Employees are encouraged to have time off to recharge.
examples.cn: 鼓励员工休假以恢复精力。

examples.en: He bought traveller's checks for his trip to Europe.
examples.cn: 他为去欧洲旅行购买了旅行支票。

examples.en: Traveller's checks are a secure way to carry money abroad.
examples.cn: 旅行支票是携带资金出国的安全方式。

examples.en: I need to check up on the project's progress.
examples.cn: 我需要检查项目的进展。

examples.en: The doctor advised her to check up regularly for health issues.
examples.cn: 医生建议她定期检查健康问题。

examples.en: The police will check up on the suspect's alibi.
examples.cn: 警方将调查嫌疑人的不在场证明。

examples.en: We should check up the references before hiring.
examples.cn: 在雇佣前我们应该查证推荐信。

examples.en: When planning the budget, take into account unexpected expenses.
examples.cn: 规划预算时，要考虑意外开支。

examples.en: The judge took into account the defendant's clean record.
examples.cn: 法官考虑了被告的清白记录。

examples.en: He will have to answer for his mistakes in the report.
examples.cn: 他将不得不为报告中的错误负责。

examples.en: The company must answer for the environmental damage.
examples.cn: 公司必须为环境破坏承担责任。

examples.en: The lawyer answered for the client in court.
examples.cn: 律师在法庭上代表客户回答。

examples.en: Can you answer for your friend's actions?
examples.cn: 你能为你朋友的行为辩护吗？

examples.en: So far as I am concerned, the plan is acceptable.
examples.cn: 就我而言，这个计划是可以接受的。

examples.en: So far as the budget is concerned, we need to cut costs.
examples.cn: 关于预算，我们需要削减成本。

examples.en: Many people are against the new policy.
examples.cn: 许多人反对新政策。

examples.en: She is against eating meat for ethical reasons.
examples.cn: 出于道德原因，她反对吃肉。

examples.en: This action is against the law.
examples.cn: 这个行为是违法的。

examples.en: Lying is against his principles.
examples.cn: 说谎违反了他的原则。

examples.en: The news website provides up-to-the-minute updates on the election.
examples.cn: 这个新闻网站提供选举的最新更新。

examples.en: We have up-to-the-minute data on stock prices.
examples.cn: 我们有股价的最新数据。

examples.en: He presented himself at the interview with confidence.
examples.cn: 他自信地出现在面试中。

examples.en: You must present yourself at the office by 9 AM.
examples.cn: 你必须在上午9点前到办公室报到。

examples.en: She always presents herself professionally in meetings.
examples.cn: 她在会议上总是专业地展现自己。

examples.en: Present yourself well to make a good impression.
examples.cn: 好好表现以留下好印象。

examples.en: The tourist sector is a major contributor to the country's economy.
examples.cn: 旅游业是该国经济的主要贡献者。

examples.en: Investments in the tourist sector have increased recently.
examples.cn: 最近对旅游业的投资增加了。

examples.en: He always takes digs at his colleagues during meetings.
examples.cn: 他总是在会议上挖苦同事。

examples.en: She took a dig at her friend's fashion sense.
examples.cn: 她讽刺了朋友的时尚感。

examples.en: English is her mother tongue, but she also speaks French.
examples.cn: 英语是她的母语，但她也会说法语。

examples.en: Learning in one's mother tongue can improve understanding.
examples.cn: 用母语学习可以提高理解力。

examples.en: Face-to-face communication is often more effective than emails.
examples.cn: 面对面交流通常比电子邮件更有效。

examples.en: We prefer face-to-face communication for important discussions.
examples.cn: 对于重要讨论，我们更喜欢面对面交流。

examples.en: Parents should set a good example for their children.
examples.cn: 父母应该为孩子树立好榜样。

examples.en: Leaders need to set a good example in the workplace.
examples.cn: 领导者需要在工作场所树立好榜样。

examples.en: The crowd went wild when the band started playing.
examples.cn: 乐队开始演奏时，人群变得疯狂。

examples.en: After hearing the news, she went wild with excitement.
examples.cn: 听到消息后，她兴奋得失控了。

examples.en: The garden has gone wild with weeds.
examples.cn: 花园里杂草肆意生长。

examples.en: Without maintenance, the plants will go wild.
examples.cn: 没有维护，植物会不受约束地生长。

definitions.meaning_cn: 认真投入某事，深入研究

examples.en: He sank his teeth into the new project with enthusiasm.
examples.cn: 他热情地投入了新项目。

examples.en: Once she sinks her teeth into a book, she can't put it down.
examples.cn: 一旦她深入研究一本书，她就放不下了。

examples.en: The dog sank its teeth into the bone.
examples.cn: 狗咬住了骨头。
