examples.en: Be careful not to sink your teeth into something too hard.
examples.cn: 小心不要咬太硬的东西。

examples.en: Petty crimes like shoplifting are common in urban areas.
examples.cn: 像商店行窃这样的轻微犯罪在城市地区很常见。

examples.en: The police focus on reducing petty crimes in the neighborhood.
examples.cn: 警方专注于减少社区的轻微犯罪。

examples.en: The shipbuilding industry in South Korea is one of the most advanced in the world.
examples.cn: 韩国的造船业是世界上最先进的之一。

examples.en: Investments in the shipbuilding industry have boosted the local economy significantly.
examples.cn: 对造船业的投资显著提振了当地经济。

examples.en: The origins of this tradition can be traced back to ancient times.
examples.cn: 这个传统的起源可以追溯到古代。

examples.en: His family lineage can be traced back to a noble ancestor.
examples.cn: 他的家族血统可以追溯到一位贵族祖先。

examples.en: The report provides data in relation to climate change impacts.
examples.cn: 这份报告提供了关于气候变化影响的数据。

examples.en: She made several points in relation to the new policy.
examples.cn: 她就新政策提出了几点意见。

examples.en: The government decided to bail out the failing bank to prevent economic collapse.
examples.cn: 政府决定救助这家濒临倒闭的银行以防止经济崩溃。

examples.en: They had to bail out the company with a large injection of funds.
examples.cn: 他们不得不通过大量注资来救助这家公司。

examples.en: He bailed out his friend by paying the debt.
examples.cn: 他通过偿还债务救了他的朋友。

examples.en: The lifeguard bailed out the swimmer who was struggling in the water.
examples.cn: 救生员救出了在水中挣扎的游泳者。

examples.en: Let's run through the agenda before the meeting starts.
examples.cn: 让我们在会议开始前快速浏览一下议程。

examples.en: She ran through her notes one last time before the exam.
examples.cn: 她在考试前最后一次快速检查了她的笔记。

examples.en: He ran through his savings in just a few months.
examples.cn: 他在短短几个月内就花光了他的积蓄。

examples.en: The team ran through all their supplies during the expedition.
examples.cn: 团队在探险期间用完了所有补给。

examples.en: The detective poked around the crime scene for clues.
examples.cn: 侦探在犯罪现场四处翻找线索。

examples.en: I like to poke around in antique shops on weekends.
examples.cn: 我喜欢在周末去古董店四处翻找。

examples.en: After working for three hours, she decided to take a break.
examples.cn: 工作了三个小时后，她决定休息一下。

examples.en: Let's take a break and have some coffee.
examples.cn: 让我们休息一下，喝点咖啡。

examples.en: A cup of tea can take the edge off your stress.
examples.cn: 一杯茶可以缓解你的压力。

examples.en: The painkiller took the edge off his headache.
examples.cn: 止痛药缓解了他的头痛。

examples.en: Children wear out their shoes quickly because they play so much.
examples.cn: 孩子们因为玩得多，鞋子很快就穿破了。

examples.en: The old machine has worn out after years of use.
examples.cn: 这台旧机器在使用多年后已经用坏了。

examples.en: The long journey wore out the travelers.
examples.cn: 长途旅行使旅行者们疲惫不堪。

examples.en: Constant stress can wear you out both mentally and physically.
examples.cn: 持续的压力会使你在精神和身体上都感到疲惫。

examples.en: The company is on the threshold of a major breakthrough.
examples.cn: 这家公司即将迎来重大突破。

examples.en: She stood on the threshold of a new career.
examples.cn: 她站在新职业生涯的开端。

examples.en: He loves to tell a joke to lighten the mood.
examples.cn: 他喜欢讲笑话来活跃气氛。

examples.en: Can you tell a joke that everyone will find funny?
examples.cn: 你能讲一个大家都会觉得好笑的笑话吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 本应该做某事（表示过去未实现的义务或建议）

examples.en: You should have studied harder for the exam.
examples.cn: 你本应该为考试更努力学习的。

examples.en: He should have apologized for his mistake.
examples.cn: 他本应该为他的错误道歉的。

examples.en: After failing the test, he got wise and started studying regularly.
examples.cn: 考试失败后，他明白过来并开始定期学习。

examples.en: She got wise to their tricks and avoided being scammed.
examples.cn: 她识破了他们的诡计，避免了被骗。

examples.en: The manager gave the new employee the once-over during the interview.
examples.cn: 经理在面试时快速打量了新员工。

examples.en: She gave the car the once-over before deciding to buy it.
examples.cn: 她在决定购买前对汽车进行了粗略检查。

examples.en: He got behind with his rent payments and faced eviction.
examples.cn: 他拖欠了房租，面临被驱逐。

examples.en: Students who get behind with their assignments often struggle to catch up.
examples.cn: 作业落后的学生常常难以赶上。

examples.en: The problem can be traced to a software bug.
examples.cn: 这个问题可以追溯到一个软件漏洞。

examples.en: Her success traces to years of hard work and dedication.
examples.cn: 她的成功归因于多年的努力和奉献。

examples.en: I'm stuck with this boring task because no one else wants to do it.
examples.cn: 我不得不处理这个无聊的任务，因为没人愿意做。

examples.en: They were stuck with a huge bill after the party.
examples.cn: 派对后他们不得不处理一大笔账单。

examples.en: Stop messing about and get to work!
examples.cn: 别胡闹了，开始工作吧！

examples.en: The kids were messing about in the garden instead of doing their homework.
examples.cn: 孩子们在花园里胡闹，而不是做作业。

examples.en: No kidding, I saw a celebrity at the mall yesterday.
examples.cn: 说真的，我昨天在商场看到了一位名人。

examples.en: He won the lottery? No kidding!
examples.cn: 他中了彩票？不开玩笑！

definitions.meaning_cn: 就某事进行辩论或争论

examples.en: The politicians debated over the new tax policy for hours.
examples.cn: 政客们就新税收政策辩论了好几个小时。

examples.en: We often debate over which movie to watch on Friday nights.
examples.cn: 我们经常在周五晚上争论看哪部电影。

definitions.meaning_cn: 关于某事的争议或讨论

examples.en: There is a heated debate over climate change in scientific circles.
examples.cn: 科学界关于气候变化有一场激烈的辩论。

examples.en: The debate over school uniforms continues among parents.
examples.cn: 关于校服的争议在家长中持续不断。

definitions.meaning_cn: 失物招领处，负责处理丢失物品的地方

examples.en: I left my umbrella on the train, so I checked the lost-and-found office.
examples.cn: 我把雨伞忘在火车上了，所以去失物招领处查了一下。

examples.en: The lost-and-found office at the airport helped me retrieve my passport.
examples.cn: 机场的失物招领处帮我找回了护照。

examples.en: I love chocolate as much as she does.
examples.cn: 我和她一样喜欢巧克力。

examples.en: He earns as much as $100,000 a year.
examples.cn: 他一年能赚多达10万美元。

examples.en: As much as I want to help, I'm too busy right now.
examples.cn: 尽管我想帮忙，但我现在太忙了。

examples.en: As much as it pains me, I have to decline the offer.
examples.cn: 虽然这让我很痛苦，但我不得不拒绝这个提议。

definitions.meaning_cn: 自流井，一种地下水自然涌出的井

examples.en: The village relies on an artesian well for its water supply.
examples.cn: 这个村庄依靠一口自流井供水。

examples.en: Artesian wells are common in areas with high water pressure underground.
examples.cn: 在地下水位高的地区，自流井很常见。

definitions.meaning_cn: 胃口很大，能吃很多食物

examples.en: After the hike, I had a big appetite and ate two pizzas.
examples.cn: 徒步后我胃口大开，吃了两个披萨。

examples.en: My brother always has a big appetite at dinner.
examples.cn: 我弟弟晚餐时总是胃口很大。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事物有强烈的兴趣或渴望

examples.en: She has a big appetite for adventure and travels often.
examples.cn: 她对冒险有强烈的渴望，经常旅行。

examples.en: The company has a big appetite for innovation in technology.
examples.cn: 这家公司对技术创新有强烈的兴趣。

definitions.meaning_cn: 渴望做某事，非常想做某事

examples.en: I'm keen to learn how to play the guitar this summer.
examples.cn: 今年夏天我渴望学习弹吉他。

examples.en: She is keen to start her new job next week.
examples.cn: 她非常想下周开始新工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 购物街，商店集中的街道

examples.en: Fifth Avenue in New York is one of the most famous shopping streets.
examples.cn: 纽约的第五大道是最著名的购物街之一。

examples.en: We spent the afternoon exploring the shopping streets of Tokyo.
examples.cn: 我们花了一下午探索东京的购物街。

examples.en: It finally dawned on me that I had forgotten my keys at home.
examples.cn: 我终于意识到我把钥匙忘在家里了。

examples.en: The importance of the meeting dawned on him too late.
examples.cn: 他太晚才明白这次会议的重要性。

examples.en: We need to send out the invitations for the party by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我们需要在明天前发出派对的邀请函。

examples.en: The company sends out newsletters to its customers every month.
examples.cn: 公司每月向客户发送新闻通讯。

examples.en: The government sent out rescue teams after the earthquake.
examples.cn: 地震后政府派出了救援队。

examples.en: Our boss sent out a team to investigate the issue.
examples.cn: 老板派出了一个团队去调查这个问题。

examples.en: Don't forget to include your return address on the envelope.
examples.cn: 别忘了在信封上写上你的回信地址。

examples.en: The package was undeliverable because it lacked a return address.
examples.cn: 这个包裹无法投递，因为没有回信地址。

examples.en: Electric cars are starting to take the place of gasoline vehicles.
examples.cn: 电动汽车开始取代汽油车。

examples.en: She took the place of her colleague who was on sick leave.
examples.cn: 她代替了请病假的同事。

examples.en: The singer made a comeback after a decade away from the music industry.
examples.cn: 这位歌手在离开音乐界十年后复出了。

examples.en: Vinyl records have made a comeback in recent years.
examples.cn: 黑胶唱片近年来重新流行起来。

examples.en: If you don't study, you're in for a tough exam.
examples.cn: 如果你不学习，你将会面临一场艰难的考试。

examples.en: We're in for a storm tonight, so stay indoors.
examples.cn: 今晚我们将迎来一场风暴，所以待在室内。

examples.en: I'm in for the marathon next month.
examples.cn: 我报名参加了下个月的马拉松。

examples.en: Are you in for the team-building activity this weekend?
examples.cn: 你参加这周末的团队建设活动吗？

examples.en: He loves to drive prestigious cars like Ferraris and Lamborghinis.
examples.cn: 他喜欢驾驶法拉利和兰博基尼这样的豪华汽车。

examples.en: Many celebrities drive prestigious cars to show their status.
examples.cn: 许多名人驾驶豪华汽车来显示他们的地位。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事有发言权，能影响决定

examples.en: Employees should have a say in company policies.
examples.cn: 员工应该对公司政策有发言权。

examples.en: As a shareholder, I have a say in the board's decisions.
examples.cn: 作为股东，我对董事会的决定有发言权。

definitions.meaning_cn: 尽自己的责任，贡献自己的一份力量

examples.en: Everyone needs to do their part to keep the environment clean.
examples.cn: 每个人都需要尽自己的一份力来保持环境清洁。

examples.en: She did her part by volunteering at the local shelter.
examples.cn: 她通过在本地收容所做志愿者尽了自己的责任。

definitions.meaning_cn: 造成损害，产生负面影响

examples.en: The long hours at work are taking their toll on his health.
examples.cn: 长时间工作对他的健康造成了损害。

examples.en: The drought has taken its toll on the farmers' crops.
examples.cn: 干旱对农民的庄稼造成了负面影响。

examples.en: By and large, the project was a success despite some minor issues.
examples.cn: 总的来说，尽管有一些小问题，这个项目是成功的。

examples.en: By and large, people in this city are friendly and welcoming.
examples.cn: 大体上，这个城市的人们友好且热情。

definitions.meaning_cn: 进行试探性调查，无明确目标地搜寻信息

examples.en: The lawyer went on a fishing expedition to find evidence against the defendant.
examples.cn: 律师进行了一次试探性调查，以寻找对被告不利的证据。

examples.en: Don't go on a fishing expedition; ask specific questions to get clear answers.
examples.cn: 不要进行无目标的搜寻；问具体的问题以获得明确的答案。

examples.en: We plan to go on a fishing expedition at the lake this weekend.
examples.cn: 我们计划这周末去湖边钓鱼。

examples.en: He loves to go on a fishing expedition with his friends during the summer.
examples.cn: 他喜欢在夏天和朋友们一起去钓鱼。

examples.en: After the manager left, the company started to go to pot.
examples.cn: 经理离开后，公司开始衰败。

examples.en: If you don't maintain your car, it will go to pot quickly.
examples.cn: 如果你不保养你的车，它会很快变糟。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人处境困难，给某人制造麻烦

examples.en: The new regulations will make it hot for businesses that don't comply.
examples.cn: 新规定将使不遵守的企业处境困难。

examples.en: He made it hot for his rival by exposing their secrets.
examples.cn: 他通过揭露对手的秘密给他们制造了麻烦。

examples.en: This book is the same as the one I read last year.
examples.cn: 这本书和我去年读的那本相同。

examples.en: Her opinion is the same as mine on this matter.
examples.cn: 在这个问题上，她的意见和我的一样。

examples.en: We cut across the park to save time.
examples.cn: 我们横穿公园以节省时间。

examples.en: The new highway cuts across several neighborhoods.
examples.cn: 新高速公路横穿几个社区。

examples.en: This issue cuts across political parties and affects everyone.
examples.cn: 这个问题超越了政党界限，影响到每个人。

examples.en: Her research cuts across multiple disciplines.
examples.cn: 她的研究跨越了多个学科。

examples.en: The two departments are at odds over the budget allocation.
examples.cn: 这两个部门在预算分配上有分歧。

examples.en: His actions are at odds with his words.
examples.cn: 他的行动与他的言论不一致。

definitions.meaning_cn: 引起某人对某事的注意

examples.en: She called the error to my attention so I could fix it.
examples.cn: 她引起我对错误的注意，以便我能修正它。

examples.en: The report calls several issues to the public's attention.
examples.cn: 这份报告引起了公众对几个问题的注意。

definitions.meaning_cn: 祈求好运，希望一切顺利

examples.en: I'm keeping my fingers crossed for your job interview tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我为你明天的求职面试祈求好运。

examples.en: Keep your fingers crossed that the weather stays clear for the picnic.
examples.cn: 祈求天气晴朗，以便野餐顺利进行。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's head in the clouds

definitions.meaning_cn: 心不在焉，做白日梦，不切实际

examples.en: He always has his head in the clouds during meetings.
examples.cn: 开会时他总是心不在焉。

examples.en: Stop having your head in the clouds and focus on the task.
examples.cn: 别做白日梦了，专注于任务吧。

examples.en: The thief managed to get away before the police arrived.
examples.cn: 小偷在警察到达前成功逃脱了。

examples.en: We need to get away from the city for a relaxing weekend.
examples.cn: 我们需要离开城市去度一个轻松的周末。

examples.en: They're planning to get away to the beach next month.
examples.cn: 他们计划下个月去海滩度假。

examples.en: A short get away can help reduce stress.
examples.cn: 短暂的休假有助于减轻压力。

examples.en: Engineers do calculations to ensure the bridge is safe.
examples.cn: 工程师进行计算以确保桥梁安全。

examples.en: Students must do calculations accurately in math exams.
examples.cn: 学生在数学考试中必须准确进行计算。

examples.en: The actors waited in the dressing room before the show.
examples.cn: 演员们在演出前在更衣室等待。

examples.en: She changed her clothes in the dressing room at the store.
examples.cn: 她在商店的更衣室换了衣服。

examples.en: All at once, the lights went out in the building.
examples.cn: 突然，大楼里的灯全灭了。

examples.en: The children started talking all at once, creating chaos.
examples.cn: 孩子们一下子都开始说话，造成了混乱。

examples.en: We can't handle all these tasks all at once.
examples.cn: 我们不能同时处理所有这些任务。

examples.en: The flowers bloomed all at once in the spring.
examples.cn: 春天时，花朵一起绽放了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 集体到达，成群结队地到达

examples.en: The protesters arrived in a body at the city hall.
examples.cn: 抗议者们集体到达市政厅。

examples.en: The team arrived in a body for the important meeting.
examples.cn: 团队集体到达参加重要会议。

examples.en: Pollution can disrupt the balance of nature in an ecosystem.
examples.cn: 污染会破坏生态系统的自然平衡。

examples.en: Conservation efforts aim to maintain a balance of nature.
examples.cn: 保护工作旨在维持自然平衡。

examples.en: Can you remind me of the meeting time tomorrow?
examples.cn: 你能提醒我明天的会议时间吗？

examples.en: This song reminds me of my childhood.
examples.cn: 这首歌使我想起我的童年。

definitions.meaning_cn: 感到成就感，觉得有所成就

examples.en: After finishing the project, she felt a sense of accomplishment.
examples.cn: 完成项目后，她感到一种成就感。

examples.en: Volunteers often feel a sense of accomplishment from helping others.
examples.cn: 志愿者常因帮助他人而感到成就感。

examples.en: The witness gave an account of the accident to the police.
examples.cn: 目击者向警察描述了事故经过。

examples.en: He gave a detailed account of his travels in Asia.
examples.cn: 他详细叙述了他在亚洲的旅行。

examples.en: Learning cursive script can improve writing speed.
examples.cn: 学习草书可以提高书写速度。

examples.en: Her signature is in a beautiful cursive script.
examples.cn: 她的签名是漂亮的草书字体。

examples.en: The new product was a commercial success, selling millions of units.
examples.cn: 新产品取得了商业成功，售出了数百万件。

examples.en: Achieving commercial success often requires good marketing.
examples.cn: 取得商业成功通常需要良好的营销。

definitions.meaning_cn: 充分利用某物，最大限度地利用

examples.en: We should make the most of this opportunity to learn.
examples.cn: 我们应该充分利用这个机会来学习。

examples.en: He makes the most of his time by planning each day carefully.
examples.cn: 他通过仔细规划每一天来充分利用时间。

examples.en: The company had to give him the ax due to budget cuts.
examples.cn: 由于预算削减，公司不得不解雇他。

examples.en: If you keep making mistakes, they might give you the ax.
examples.cn: 如果你继续犯错，他们可能会解雇你。

examples.en: They decided to give the project the ax after it failed to meet deadlines.
examples.cn: 在项目未能按时完成后，他们决定终止它。

examples.en: The TV show was given the ax due to low ratings.
examples.cn: 由于收视率低，这个电视节目被取消了。

examples.en: The kitchen smells of freshly baked bread.
examples.cn: 厨房里有新鲜烤面包的气味。

examples.en: His clothes smelled of smoke after the campfire.
examples.cn: 篝火后，他的衣服有烟味。

examples.en: His excuse smells of dishonesty.
examples.cn: 他的借口带有不诚实的迹象。

examples.en: The deal smells of corruption to many observers.
examples.cn: 许多观察者认为这笔交易有腐败的迹象。

examples.en: We often go out for a meal on weekends to try new restaurants.
examples.cn: 我们经常在周末外出就餐，尝试新餐厅。

examples.en: Let's go out for a meal to celebrate your promotion.
examples.cn: 让我们外出就餐庆祝你的晋升。

examples.en: The store is back in business after the renovation.
examples.cn: 装修后，这家商店重新营业了。

examples.en: She has been in business for over 20 years as an entrepreneur.
examples.cn: 作为企业家，她已经在商业领域工作了20多年。

examples.en: Once you sign the contract, you're in business.
examples.cn: 一旦你签了合同，你就参与其中了。

examples.en: With the new software, we're finally in business for the project.
examples.cn: 有了新软件，我们终于可以开始这个项目了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 轻而易举地；毫无疑问地

examples.en: She won the competition hands down with her outstanding performance.
examples.cn: 她以出色的表现轻而易举地赢得了比赛。

examples.en: This is hands down the best pizza I've ever had.
examples.cn: 这毫无疑问是我吃过的最好的披萨。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与朋友闲逛或消磨时间

examples.en: I like to hang out with friends at the park on sunny days.
examples.cn: 我喜欢在阳光明媚的日子和朋友在公园闲逛。

examples.en: We often hang out with friends after school to relax.
examples.cn: 放学后，我们经常和朋友一起消磨时间放松。

examples.en: She has a way with children, always calming them down easily.
examples.cn: 她善于与孩子相处，总能轻易让他们平静下来。

examples.en: He has a way with words, making his speeches very persuasive.
examples.cn: 他善于言辞，使他的演讲非常有说服力。

examples.en: I need to buy a new pair of shoes for the party.
examples.cn: 我需要为派对买一双新鞋。

examples.en: She gave me a pair of gloves to keep my hands warm.
examples.cn: 她给了我一双手套来保暖。

examples.en: The movie was a huge success at the box office, earning millions.
examples.cn: 这部电影在票房上取得了巨大成功，赚了数百万。

examples.en: You can buy tickets at the box office before the show.
examples.cn: 你可以在演出前在售票处买票。

examples.en: He left in haste without saying goodbye.
examples.cn: 他匆忙离开，没有道别。

examples.en: Decisions made in haste often lead to regrets.
examples.cn: 仓促做出的决定常常导致后悔。

examples.en: Her unique talent helps her stand out from the crowd in auditions.
examples.cn: 她独特的才华帮助她在试镜中脱颖而出。

examples.en: To succeed, you need to stand out from the crowd with innovative ideas.
examples.cn: 要成功，你需要用创新的想法与众不同。

examples.en: Many small businesses go under during economic recessions.
examples.cn: 许多小企业在经济衰退期间破产。

examples.en: The company went under after losing its major client.
examples.cn: 在失去主要客户后，这家公司失败了。

examples.en: The ship went under in the storm, but all passengers were rescued.
examples.cn: 船在风暴中沉没了，但所有乘客都被救起。

examples.en: He went under the water to retrieve the lost item.
examples.cn: 他潜入水中找回丢失的物品。

examples.en: He amused the children by doing funny magic tricks.
examples.cn: 他通过表演有趣的魔术逗乐了孩子们。

examples.en: She amused her friends by telling hilarious stories.
examples.cn: 她通过讲搞笑的故事逗乐了她的朋友们。

examples.en: The government implemented a family planning policy to control population growth.
examples.cn: 政府实施了计划生育政策来控制人口增长。

examples.en: Many countries have revised their family planning policies over the years.
examples.cn: 多年来，许多国家修订了他们的计划生育政策。

examples.en: She is content with her simple life in the countryside.
examples.cn: 她对乡村的简单生活感到满意。

examples.en: He is content with the progress he has made so far.
examples.cn: 他对迄今为止取得的进展感到满意。

examples.en: Scientists study asteroid explosions to understand cosmic events.
examples.cn: 科学家研究小行星爆炸以理解宇宙事件。

examples.en: An asteroid explosion in space can release immense energy.
examples.cn: 太空中的小行星爆炸可以释放巨大的能量。

examples.en: Children in the US typically attend elementary school from ages 5 to 11.
examples.cn: 美国的孩子通常从5岁到11岁上小学。

examples.en: She teaches math at the local elementary school.
examples.cn: 她在当地的小学教数学。

examples.en: She works as a teacher but also tutors students on the side.
examples.cn: 她是一名教师，但也在业余时间辅导学生。

examples.en: He runs a small business on the side to supplement his income.
examples.cn: 他兼职经营一家小生意来增加收入。

examples.en: He ordered fries with a salad on the side.
examples.cn: 他点了薯条，旁边配了一份沙拉。

examples.en: They had an affair on the side without anyone knowing.
examples.cn: 他们秘密地有一段婚外情，无人知晓。

examples.en: This song reminds me of my childhood.
examples.cn: 这首歌让我想起了我的童年。

examples.en: The smell of fresh bread reminds him of his grandmother's kitchen.
examples.cn: 新鲜面包的味道让他想起了祖母的厨房。

examples.en: Please remind me to call the doctor tomorrow.
examples.cn: 请提醒我明天给医生打电话。

examples.en: She reminded her friend of the meeting at 3 PM.
examples.cn: 她提醒她的朋友下午3点有会议。

examples.en: Rome is an ancient city with a rich history.
examples.cn: 罗马是一座历史悠久的古城。

examples.en: Archaeologists are excavating the ruins of an ancient city in Egypt.
examples.cn: 考古学家正在埃及挖掘一座古城的遗址。

examples.en: He worked off his debt by taking extra shifts.
examples.cn: 他通过加班来偿还债务。

examples.en: I need to work off these calories with some exercise.
examples.cn: 我需要通过运动来消耗这些卡路里。

examples.en: She worked off her anger by going for a run.
examples.cn: 她通过跑步来发泄愤怒。

examples.en: He worked off his stress by playing video games.
examples.cn: 他通过玩电子游戏来缓解压力。

examples.en: At the end of the year, the company takes stock of its financial performance.
examples.cn: 年底时，公司会评估其财务表现。

examples.en: She took stock of her life and decided to make some changes.
examples.cn: 她审视了自己的生活，决定做出一些改变。

examples.en: She is an expert in computer programming.
examples.cn: 她是计算机编程领域的专家。

examples.en: He is considered an expert in ancient Greek history.
examples.cn: 他被认为是古希腊历史方面的专家。

examples.en: She enrolled in a Spanish course at the local college.
examples.cn: 她在当地大学报名参加了一门西班牙语课程。

examples.en: He plans to enroll in the university next fall.
examples.cn: 他计划明年秋天注册入学这所大学。

examples.en: The two recipes are much the same, with only minor differences.
examples.cn: 这两个食谱几乎相同，只有细微差别。

examples.en: His opinion on the matter is much the same as mine.
examples.cn: 他对此事的看法和我几乎一样。

examples.en: The thief disappeared in a flash when the police arrived.
examples.cn: 警察到达时，小偷瞬间消失了。

examples.en: She finished her homework in a flash and went out to play.
examples.cn: 她立刻完成了作业，然后出去玩。

examples.en: Travelers should avoid coming in contact with sick people.
examples.cn: 旅行者应避免接触生病的人。

examples.en: He came in contact with many interesting ideas during his studies.
examples.cn: 他在学习期间接触到了许多有趣的想法。

examples.en: The government tried to damp down public protests by imposing curfews.
examples.cn: 政府试图通过实施宵禁来抑制公众抗议。

examples.en: She damped down her excitement to appear calm.
examples.cn: 她抑制住兴奋，显得很平静。

examples.en: Firefighters damped down the embers to prevent the fire from spreading.
examples.cn: 消防员弄湿余烬以防止火势蔓延。

examples.en: Farmers damp down the soil before planting seeds.
examples.cn: 农民在播种前弄湿土壤。

examples.en: You can buy train tickets at the ticket office in the station.
examples.cn: 你可以在车站的售票处购买火车票。

examples.en: The ticket office for the concert opens at 9 AM.
examples.cn: 音乐会的售票处上午9点开门。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put one's hand to the plow

definitions.meaning_cn: 开始认真工作或承担责任

examples.en: After years of hesitation, he finally put his hand to the plow and started his own business.
examples.cn: 经过多年的犹豫，他终于开始认真工作，创办了自己的企业。

examples.en: She put her hand to the plow and dedicated herself to the project.
examples.cn: 她开始承担责任，全身心投入这个项目。

examples.en: His formal attire was appropriate to the wedding ceremony.
examples.cn: 他的正式着装适合婚礼仪式。

examples.en: The teacher's feedback was appropriate to the student's level of understanding.
examples.cn: 老师的反馈适合学生的理解水平。

examples.en: While hiking, they stumbled across an old abandoned cabin.
examples.cn: 徒步时，他们偶然发现了一座废弃的小屋。

examples.en: I stumbled across this interesting article while browsing the internet.
examples.cn: 我在浏览互联网时偶然发现了这篇有趣的文章。

examples.en: The nurse showed compassion to the patients in the hospital.
examples.cn: 护士对医院里的病人表现出同情。

examples.en: He showed compassion by helping the homeless man find shelter.
examples.cn: 他通过帮助无家可归者找到住所来表现怜悯。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get off to a bad start

examples.en: The project got off to a bad start due to poor planning.
examples.cn: 由于规划不善，这个项目开局不利。

examples.en: Their relationship got off to a bad start with a big argument.
examples.cn: 他们的关系以一场大争吵开局不利。

examples.en: The police accused him of stealing the car.
examples.cn: 警察指控他偷了那辆车。

examples.en: She accused her colleague of spreading rumors about her.
examples.cn: 她指责她的同事散布关于她的谣言。

examples.en: Many companies are getting on the bandwagon of using renewable energy.
examples.cn: 许多公司正在跟风使用可再生能源。

examples.en: After the movie became popular, everyone got on the bandwagon and watched it.
examples.cn: 电影流行后，每个人都跟风去看了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 学校课程，指学校提供的教学计划和内容

examples.en: The school curriculum includes mathematics, science, and literature.
examples.cn: 学校课程包括数学、科学和文学。

examples.en: Parents reviewed the school curriculum to understand what their children would learn.
examples.cn: 家长们审查了学校课程，以了解孩子们将学习什么。

definitions.meaning_cn: 本地植物，指原产于特定地区的植物

examples.en: Native plants are well-adapted to the local climate and soil.
examples.cn: 本地植物很好地适应了当地的气候和土壤。

examples.en: The garden features only native plants to support local wildlife.
examples.cn: 这个花园只种植本地植物，以支持当地野生动物。

definitions.meaning_cn: 飞快地，立即地，形容动作迅速

examples.en: When he heard the news, he ran like a shot to tell his friends.
examples.cn: 当他听到这个消息时，他飞快地跑去告诉他的朋友们。

examples.en: She accepted the job offer like a shot without hesitation.
examples.cn: 她毫不犹豫地立即接受了这份工作邀请。

definitions.meaning_cn: 不熟悉，对某事物不了解

examples.en: I am unfamiliar with the new software, so I need some training.
examples.cn: 我对新软件不熟悉，所以需要一些培训。

examples.en: She was unfamiliar with the city's public transportation system.
examples.cn: 她不熟悉这座城市的公共交通系统。

definitions.meaning_cn: 避开某事，不参与或介入

examples.en: He decided to stay out of the argument to avoid conflict.
examples.cn: 他决定避开这场争论，以避免冲突。

examples.en: You should stay out of trouble if you want to keep your job.
examples.cn: 如果你想保住工作，就应该避开麻烦。

valid_entries.original_phrase: see the handwriting on the wall

definitions.meaning_cn: 看到不祥之兆，预见到失败或灾难

examples.en: After the company lost its biggest client, employees saw the handwriting on the wall and started looking for new jobs.
examples.cn: 在公司失去最大客户后，员工们看到了不祥之兆，开始寻找新工作。

examples.en: He saw the handwriting on the wall when his investments began to fail.
examples.cn: 当他的投资开始失败时，他预见到了灾难。

definitions.meaning_cn: 已出版，指书籍、文章等被印刷发行

examples.en: Her novel is finally in print and available in bookstores.
examples.cn: 她的小说终于出版了，可以在书店买到。

examples.en: The article appeared in print in yesterday's newspaper.
examples.cn: 这篇文章刊登在昨天的报纸上。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为某人破例，对某人特殊对待

examples.en: The teacher made an exception for the student due to his illness.
examples.cn: 老师因为这位学生生病而为他破例。

examples.en: We don't usually allow pets, but we'll make an exception for your service dog.
examples.cn: 我们通常不允许宠物，但会为你的服务犬破例。

definitions.meaning_cn: 通勤上班，指往返于家和办公室之间

examples.en: She commutes to the office by train every day.
examples.cn: 她每天乘火车通勤上班。

examples.en: Commuting to the office during rush hour can be stressful.
examples.cn: 在高峰时段通勤上班可能会很有压力。

examples.en: It's easy to make friends with people who share your interests.
examples.cn: 与有共同兴趣的人交朋友很容易。

examples.en: He made friends with his new neighbors soon after moving in.
examples.cn: 他搬进来后不久就和邻居们交上了朋友。

examples.en: Please get to the point; we don't have much time.
examples.cn: 请切入正题，我们时间不多。

examples.en: After a long introduction, she finally got to the point of her presentation.
examples.cn: 经过漫长的介绍后，她终于切入演讲的重点。

definitions.meaning_cn: 展览文物，展示人工制品

examples.en: The museum will exhibit artefacts from ancient Egypt next month.
examples.cn: 博物馆下个月将展览古埃及的文物。

examples.en: They exhibited artefacts found at the archaeological site to the public.
examples.cn: 他们向公众展示了在考古遗址发现的文物。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某人造成伤害，损害某人的利益或声誉

examples.en: The false accusations did damage to his reputation.
examples.cn: 虚假指控损害了他的声誉。

examples.en: Her harsh words did damage to their friendship.
examples.cn: 她尖刻的话语损害了他们的友谊。

examples.en: He learned to drive cars when he was sixteen.
examples.cn: 他十六岁时学会了驾驶汽车。

examples.en: She drives cars for a living as a delivery driver.
examples.cn: 她以驾驶汽车为生，是一名送货司机。

definitions.meaning_cn: 农业歉收，指农作物收成不好

examples.en: A bad harvest in agriculture can lead to food shortages.
examples.cn: 农业歉收可能导致食物短缺。

examples.en: Farmers suffered from a bad harvest in agriculture due to drought.
examples.cn: 由于干旱，农民们遭受了农业歉收。

definitions.meaning_cn: 数十万的，形容数量巨大

examples.en: Hundreds of thousands of people attended the concert.
examples.cn: 数十万人参加了这场音乐会。

examples.en: The charity raised hundreds of thousands of dollars for the cause.
examples.cn: 该慈善机构为这项事业筹集了数十万美元。

examples.en: He was beaten up by a group of bullies after school.
examples.cn: 放学后，他被一群欺凌者殴打了。

examples.en: The victim reported being beaten up in the alley.
examples.cn: 受害者报告说在小巷里被殴打了。

examples.en: The long hike beat me up, and I needed to rest.
examples.cn: 长途徒步让我精疲力尽，我需要休息。

examples.en: Working two jobs has been beating her up lately.
examples.cn: 最近做两份工作让她疲惫不堪。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为某人辩护或支持某人，源自棒球术语

examples.en: She went to bat for her colleague during the meeting to defend his proposal.
examples.cn: 她在会议上为同事辩护，支持他的提议。

examples.en: He always goes to bat for his friends when they're in trouble.
examples.cn: 当朋友们遇到麻烦时，他总是支持他们。

examples.en: Students who break school rules may face detention or suspension.
examples.cn: 违反校规的学生可能会面临留校察看或停学处分。

examples.en: He decided to break school rules by sneaking out after curfew.
examples.cn: 他决定违反校规，在宵禁后偷偷溜出去。

examples.en: Her original viewpoint on climate change sparked a lively debate.
examples.cn: 她对气候变化的原创观点引发了一场热烈的辩论。

examples.en: The author's original viewpoint challenged traditional theories in the field.
examples.cn: 作者的原创观点挑战了该领域的传统理论。

examples.en: Please sit down and make yourself comfortable.
examples.cn: 请坐下，让自己舒服一点。

examples.en: After a long walk, she was glad to sit down and rest.
examples.cn: 走了很长一段路后，她很高兴能坐下来休息。

examples.en: We need to sit down and negotiate the terms of the contract.
examples.cn: 我们需要坐下来谈判合同的条款。

examples.en: The team will sit down tomorrow to address the project issues.
examples.cn: 团队明天将坐下来处理项目问题。

examples.en: The storm began to bear down on the coastal town.
examples.cn: 风暴开始逼近沿海小镇。

examples.en: The manager bore down on the team to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 经理向团队施加压力以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: She bore down on her studies to prepare for the final exams.
examples.cn: 她专注于学习，为期末考试做准备。

examples.en: He bore down on the task, ignoring all distractions.
examples.cn: 他专注于任务，无视所有干扰。

examples.en: The witness gave the police an account of the accident.
examples.cn: 目击者向警方描述了事故的情况。

examples.en: She gave her boss an account of the project's progress.
examples.cn: 她向老板报告了项目的进展。

examples.en: Students often revise for exams by reviewing their notes and textbooks.
examples.cn: 学生通常通过复习笔记和课本来为考试做准备。

examples.en: He spent the weekend revising for his upcoming math exam.
examples.cn: 他花了整个周末为他即将到来的数学考试复习。

definitions.meaning_cn: 把某人误认为另一个人

examples.en: I often mistake my twin brother for me in old photos.
examples.cn: 我经常在旧照片中把我的双胞胎兄弟误认为是我。

examples.en: She mistook the new employee for a customer and greeted him warmly.
examples.cn: 她把新员工误认为是顾客，并热情地打招呼。

examples.en: He managed to catch hold of the rope before falling.
examples.cn: 他在摔倒前设法抓住了绳子。

examples.en: The child caught hold of her mother's hand in the crowded market.
examples.cn: 孩子在拥挤的市场里抓住了妈妈的手。

examples.en: It took me a while to catch hold of the complex concept.
examples.cn: 我花了一段时间才理解这个复杂的概念。

examples.en: She quickly caught hold of the new software's features.
examples.cn: 她很快掌握了新软件的功能。

examples.en: She is enthusiastic about learning new languages.
examples.cn: 她对学习新语言充满热情。

examples.en: The team is enthusiastic about the upcoming project.
examples.cn: 团队对即将到来的项目充满热情。

examples.en: After his near-death experience, he got religion and started attending church regularly.
examples.cn: 在经历了一次濒死体验后，他变得虔诚，并开始定期去教堂。

examples.en: She got religion later in life and found comfort in her faith.
examples.cn: 她在晚年变得信教，并在信仰中找到了安慰。

definitions.meaning_cn: 突然对某事变得认真或热衷

examples.en: After failing the first test, he got religion about studying.
examples.cn: 在第一次考试失败后，他突然对学习变得认真起来。

examples.en: The company got religion about environmental issues after the public backlash.
examples.cn: 在公众反弹后，公司突然对环境问题变得热衷。

examples.en: The protest was a reaction against the government's new policies.
examples.cn: 这次抗议是对政府新政策的反抗。

examples.en: Her art is a reaction against traditional styles.
examples.cn: 她的艺术是对传统风格的反抗。

examples.en: I need to speak to my manager about the schedule change.
examples.cn: 我需要和我的经理谈谈日程变更的事。

examples.en: She spoke to the audience about her experiences.
examples.cn: 她向听众讲述了她的经历。

examples.en: This report speaks to the need for better safety measures.
examples.cn: 这份报告涉及了对更好安全措施的需求。

examples.en: His actions speak to his commitment to the cause.
examples.cn: 他的行动表明了他对这项事业的承诺。

examples.en: The city is known for its rich cultural diversity.
examples.cn: 这座城市以其丰富的文化多样性而闻名。

examples.en: Promoting cultural diversity in the workplace is important for innovation.
examples.cn: 在工作场所促进文化多样性对创新很重要。

examples.en: It's important to stay active as you age to maintain good health.
examples.cn: 随着年龄增长，保持活跃对维持健康很重要。

examples.en: She stays active by jogging every morning.
examples.cn: 她通过每天早上去慢跑来保持活跃。

examples.en: I'll look in at the store on my way home to buy some milk.
examples.cn: 我会在回家的路上顺便去商店买些牛奶。

examples.en: He looked in at the meeting to see how things were going.
examples.cn: 他短暂查看了会议，看看情况如何。

examples.en: The tradition is rooted in ancient customs.
examples.cn: 这个传统起源于古老的习俗。

examples.en: Her fear of heights is rooted in a childhood accident.
examples.cn: 她对高度的恐惧源于童年的一次事故。

examples.en: The manager is responsible to the board of directors.
examples.cn: 经理对董事会负责。

examples.en: Employees are responsible to their supervisors for completing tasks.
examples.cn: 员工对完成任务向他们的主管负责。

examples.en: He told his enemy to go to hell during the argument.
examples.cn: 在争论中，他告诉他的敌人下地狱去。

examples.en: She muttered 'go to hell' under her breath after the insult.
examples.cn: 在被侮辱后，她低声嘟囔着'下地狱去'。

examples.en: If we don't fix the issue, the whole project could go to hell.
examples.cn: 如果我们不解决这个问题，整个项目可能会失败。

examples.en: After the scandal, his reputation went to hell.
examples.cn: 在丑闻之后，他的声誉一落千丈。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在某个阶段；在某个时候

examples.en: We'll need to review the project at some stage next week.
examples.cn: 我们下周需要在某个阶段审查这个项目。

examples.en: At some stage, everyone faces challenges in their career.
examples.cn: 在某个时候，每个人都会在职业生涯中面临挑战。

examples.en: In the wake of the storm, many homes were damaged.
examples.cn: 风暴过后，许多房屋受损。

examples.en: New policies were introduced in the wake of the economic crisis.
examples.cn: 经济危机之后，出台了新政策。

examples.en: Car exhaust fumes contribute significantly to air pollution in cities.
examples.cn: 汽车尾气是城市空气污染的主要来源之一。

examples.en: The smell of car exhaust fumes is strong near busy highways.
examples.cn: 在繁忙的高速公路附近，汽车尾气的味道很浓。

examples.en: I usually go to bed at 10 PM to get enough rest.
examples.cn: 我通常晚上10点上床睡觉，以确保有足够的休息。

examples.en: Children should go to bed early to support their growth.
examples.cn: 孩子们应该早睡以促进生长发育。

examples.en: At present, the company is focusing on expanding its market share.
examples.cn: 目前，公司正专注于扩大市场份额。

examples.en: The situation is stable at present, but we must remain cautious.
examples.cn: 目前情况稳定，但我们必须保持谨慎。

examples.en: The noise was so loud as to wake up the entire neighborhood.
examples.cn: 噪音如此之大，以至于吵醒了整个社区。

examples.en: She worked so hard as to complete the project ahead of schedule.
examples.cn: 她工作如此努力，以至于提前完成了项目。

examples.en: The advertisement plays up the benefits of the new product.
examples.cn: 这则广告夸大了新产品的优点。

examples.en: He tends to play up his achievements in job interviews.
examples.cn: 在求职面试中，他倾向于强调自己的成就。

examples.en: My back pain plays up whenever the weather changes.
examples.cn: 每当天气变化时，我的背痛就会加剧。

examples.en: The old injury plays up after long periods of standing.
examples.cn: 长时间站立后，旧伤会加剧。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对...有很大帮助；大大促进

examples.en: Regular exercise goes a long way toward improving overall health.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼对改善整体健康有很大帮助。

examples.en: This donation will go a long way toward funding the research project.
examples.cn: 这笔捐款将大大促进研究项目的资金筹集。

examples.en: The company decided to split off its technology division into a separate entity.
examples.cn: 公司决定将其技术部门分离出来，成立一个独立的实体。

examples.en: A group of members split off from the main party to form a new one.
examples.cn: 一群成员从主要政党中分裂出来，组建了一个新政党。

definitions.meaning_cn: 哽咽；因情绪激动而喉咙发紧

examples.en: She got a lump in her throat when she heard the touching story.
examples.cn: 听到这个感人的故事时，她哽咽了。

examples.en: Watching the graduation ceremony, many parents got a lump in their throat.
examples.cn: 观看毕业典礼时，许多父母因情绪激动而喉咙发紧。

examples.en: After the breakup, it took her time to move on and start dating again.
examples.cn: 分手后，她花了一段时间才继续前进并开始新的约会。

examples.en: We need to move on from this issue and focus on the next project.
examples.cn: 我们需要放下这个问题，专注于下一个项目。

examples.en: The police are determined to hunt down the escaped criminal.
examples.cn: 警方决心追捕逃犯。

examples.en: I had to hunt down that rare book in several libraries.
examples.cn: 我不得不在几个图书馆里搜寻那本稀有书籍。

examples.en: It's important to keep track of your expenses to manage your budget.
examples.cn: 跟踪你的支出对管理预算很重要。

examples.en: The software helps you keep track of all your appointments.
examples.cn: 这个软件帮助你记录所有的约会。

examples.en: The school puts emphasis on developing students' critical thinking skills.
examples.cn: 学校重视培养学生的批判性思维能力。

examples.en: In his speech, the CEO put emphasis on innovation and teamwork.
examples.cn: 在演讲中，CEO强调了创新和团队合作。

examples.en: Can you put in a good word for me with the hiring manager?
examples.cn: 你能在招聘经理面前为我说句好话吗？

examples.en: She put in a good word for her colleague, helping him get the promotion.
examples.cn: 她为同事说好话，帮助他获得了晋升。

examples.en: The teacher called down the student for being late again.
examples.cn: 老师严厉批评了再次迟到的学生。

examples.en: He was called down by his boss for missing the deadline.
examples.cn: 他因错过截止日期而被老板斥责。

examples.en: After getting the new job, she is much better off financially.
examples.cn: 得到新工作后，她的经济状况好多了。

examples.en: We'd be better off investing in stocks rather than keeping cash.
examples.cn: 投资股票比持有现金会使我们的境况更好。

examples.en: It's essential to get along well with others in a team environment.
examples.cn: 在团队环境中，与他人相处融洽至关重要。

examples.en: She gets along well with others because she is friendly and respectful.
examples.cn: 她与他人相处融洽，因为她友好且尊重他人。

examples.en: Strict financial regulation is necessary to prevent economic crises.
examples.cn: 严格的金融监管对于防止经济危机是必要的。

examples.en: The government introduced new financial regulations to protect consumers.
examples.cn: 政府出台了新的金融监管规定以保护消费者。

examples.en: They worked together to develop a strong relationship based on trust.
examples.cn: 他们共同努力，建立了基于信任的牢固关系。

examples.en: It takes time to develop a strong relationship with new colleagues.
examples.cn: 与新同事建立牢固的关系需要时间。

examples.en: Parents should help their children develop a strong relationship with nature.
examples.cn: 父母应帮助孩子培养与自然的深厚感情。

examples.en: She managed to develop a strong relationship with her in-laws over the years.
examples.cn: 多年来，她成功地与姻亲培养了深厚的感情。

examples.en: She is a lawyer by profession, but she also writes novels in her spare time.
examples.cn: 她职业上是律师，但业余时间也写小说。

examples.en: By profession, he is an engineer, but his passion lies in music.
examples.cn: 以职业而论，他是工程师，但他的热情在于音乐。

valid_entries.original_phrase: go to hell in a handbasket

examples.en: Without proper management, the project will go to hell in a handbasket.
examples.cn: 没有适当的管理，这个项目会迅速恶化。

examples.en: After the scandal, his reputation went to hell in a handbasket.
examples.cn: 丑闻之后，他的声誉一败涂地。

examples.en: Education helps children develop qualities like patience and resilience.
examples.cn: 教育帮助孩子培养耐心和韧性等品质。

examples.en: He worked hard to develop qualities of leadership in his team.
examples.cn: 他努力在团队中培养领导力品质。

examples.en: The new policy aims to develop qualities of innovation in the workforce.
examples.cn: 新政策旨在培养劳动力的创新特性。

examples.en: Over time, the software will develop qualities that make it more user-friendly.
examples.cn: 随着时间的推移，该软件将发展出更用户友好的特性。

examples.en: He received a prison sentence of five years for the crime.
examples.cn: 他因犯罪被判处五年监禁。

examples.en: The judge imposed a harsh prison sentence on the offender.
examples.cn: 法官对罪犯判处了严厉的刑期。

examples.en: Please make a note of the meeting time in your calendar.
examples.cn: 请在日历中记录会议时间。

examples.en: I'll make a note of your suggestions for future reference.
examples.cn: 我会记录你的建议以供将来参考。

examples.en: Make a note of the address so you don't forget it.
examples.cn: 留意这个地址，以免忘记。

examples.en: She made a note of the strange noise coming from the engine.
examples.cn: 她留意到了发动机传来的奇怪噪音。

examples.en: They currently reside in a small town in the countryside.
examples.cn: 他们目前居住在一个乡村小镇。

examples.en: Many artists reside in this vibrant neighborhood.
examples.cn: 许多艺术家居住在这个充满活力的社区。

examples.en: The power to make decisions resides in the board of directors.
examples.cn: 决策权存在于董事会中。

examples.en: The true beauty of the poem resides in its simplicity.
examples.cn: 这首诗的真正美存在于其简洁性中。

examples.en: In contrast with last year, sales have increased significantly.
examples.cn: 与去年相比，销售额显著增长。

examples.en: Her optimistic attitude is in stark contrast with his pessimism.
examples.cn: 她乐观的态度与他的悲观形成鲜明对比。

examples.en: After the long hike, we were ready to put on the feedbag.
examples.cn: 长途徒步后，我们准备大吃一顿。

examples.en: It's time to put on the feedbag and enjoy this delicious meal.
examples.cn: 是时候开始吃饭，享受这顿美餐了。

examples.en: Please summarize the report in bullet points for the presentation.
examples.cn: 请用要点总结报告以供演示。

examples.en: Each bullet point in the list highlights a key feature of the product.
examples.cn: 列表中的每个项目符号都突出了产品的一个关键特性。

examples.en: As if on cue, the rain started just as we left the house.
examples.cn: 恰好在此时，我们一离开房子就开始下雨了。

examples.en: He arrived on cue for the meeting, not a minute late.
examples.cn: 他准时到达会议，一分钟都没迟到。

examples.en: The actor entered the stage right on cue from the director.
examples.cn: 演员按照导演的提示准时上台。

examples.en: She delivered her line on cue during the play.
examples.cn: 她在剧中按照提示说出了台词。

examples.en: The city has a population of over two million people.
examples.cn: 这个城市拥有超过两百万人口。

examples.en: This small island has a population of only a few hundred.
examples.cn: 这个小岛只有几百人口。

examples.en: She burst out laughing at the funny joke.
examples.cn: 听到这个有趣的笑话，她突然大笑起来。

examples.en: He burst out crying when he heard the sad news.
examples.cn: 听到这个悲伤的消息，他突然哭了起来。

examples.en: In frustration, he burst out, "I can't take this anymore!"
examples.cn: 在沮丧中，他突然说道：“我受不了了！”

examples.en: She burst out with an unexpected confession during the argument.
examples.cn: 在争论中，她突然说出了意想不到的坦白。

examples.en: Her dedication to work is second to none in the company.
examples.cn: 她对工作的奉献精神在公司里是首屈一指的。

examples.en: The quality of their customer service is second to none.
examples.cn: 他们的客户服务质量是无与伦比的。

examples.en: My grandmother swears by this herbal remedy for colds.
examples.cn: 我祖母极其信赖这种治疗感冒的草药疗法。

examples.en: He swears by this brand of tools for all his DIY projects.
examples.cn: 他发誓这个品牌的工具对他所有的DIY项目都有效。

examples.en: I swear by my honor that I will tell the truth.
examples.cn: 我以我的荣誉发誓，我会说实话。

examples.en: They swore by the Bible during the court testimony.
examples.cn: 在法庭作证时，他们以圣经发誓。

examples.en: The tutor works with students on a one-to-one basis to address their specific needs.
examples.cn: 导师一对一地与学生合作，解决他们的特定需求。

examples.en: Managers often provide feedback on a one-to-one basis during performance reviews.
examples.cn: 经理通常在绩效评估中一对一地提供反馈。

examples.en: Shakespeare often compares life to a stage in his plays.
examples.cn: 莎士比亚经常在他的戏剧中将人生比作舞台。

examples.en: She compared his smile to a ray of sunshine.
examples.cn: 她将他的微笑比作一缕阳光。

examples.en: Compare this model to the previous one to see the improvements.
examples.cn: 将这个型号与之前的比较，看看改进之处。

examples.en: It's unfair to compare her performance to that of a professional athlete.
examples.cn: 将她的表现与职业运动员比较是不公平的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人摆脱困境或责任

examples.en: His lawyer managed to get him off the hook with a clever defense.
examples.cn: 他的律师通过巧妙的辩护使他摆脱了困境。

examples.en: She offered to take the blame to get her friend off the hook.
examples.cn: 她主动承担责备，以使她的朋友摆脱责任。

examples.en: The club had to turn away many people because it was full.
examples.cn: 俱乐部不得不拒绝许多人进入，因为已经满了。

examples.en: They turned away latecomers at the door of the theater.
examples.cn: 他们在剧院门口拒绝了迟到者进入。

examples.en: He turned away in disgust at the sight of the mess.
examples.cn: 看到混乱的景象，他厌恶地转身离开。

examples.en: She turned away from the argument to avoid further conflict.
examples.cn: 她避开争论，以避免进一步的冲突。

examples.en: New cafes seem to spring up every week in this neighborhood.
examples.cn: 这个街区每周似乎都有新咖啡馆涌现。

examples.en: Wildflowers spring up in the meadow after the rain.
examples.cn: 雨后，野花在草地上突然出现。

examples.en: Tech startups can spring up overnight in Silicon Valley.
examples.cn: 在硅谷，科技初创公司可以一夜之间迅速成长。

examples.en: The idea for the charity sprang up during a casual conversation.
examples.cn: 这个慈善机构的想法在一次随意交谈中迅速产生。

examples.en: He's frugal; in other words, he doesn't spend much money.
examples.cn: 他很节俭；换句话说，他不怎么花钱。

examples.en: The project is delayed, in other words, we need more time.
examples.cn: 项目延期了，也就是说，我们需要更多时间。

examples.en: No matter which book you choose, I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
examples.cn: 无论你选哪本书，我相信你都会喜欢的。

examples.en: No matter which path we take, we'll reach the destination.
examples.cn: 无论我们走哪条路，都会到达目的地。

examples.en: She summoned up the courage to speak in front of the crowd.
examples.cn: 她鼓起勇气在人群面前发言。

examples.en: He had to summon up all his energy to finish the marathon.
examples.cn: 他必须鼓起所有力气来完成马拉松。

examples.en: The old photo summoned up memories of her childhood.
examples.cn: 这张旧照片唤起了她童年的回忆。

examples.en: The music summoned up feelings of nostalgia.
examples.cn: 这音乐唤起了怀旧之情。

examples.en: Members of the community volunteered to clean the park.
examples.cn: 社区成员自愿清理公园。

examples.en: The event is open to all members of the community.
examples.cn: 这个活动对所有社区成员开放。

examples.en: Math and science are considered core subjects in many schools.
examples.cn: 在许多学校，数学和科学被视为核心科目。

examples.en: Students must pass all core subjects to graduate.
examples.cn: 学生必须通过所有核心科目才能毕业。

examples.en: He cried out in pain when he stubbed his toe.
examples.cn: 他踢到脚趾时痛得大声喊叫。

examples.en: The child cried out for help when lost in the mall.
examples.cn: 孩子在商场迷路时大声呼救。

examples.en: The situation cries out for immediate action.
examples.cn: 这种情况迫切需要立即行动。

examples.en: Her artwork cries out for more attention from critics.
examples.cn: 她的艺术作品迫切需要评论家更多关注。

examples.en: The store will give a discount to loyal customers.
examples.cn: 这家店会给忠实顾客折扣。

examples.en: Can you give a discount if I buy in bulk?
examples.cn: 如果我批量购买，你能给个折扣吗？

examples.en: We passed through several small towns on our road trip.
examples.cn: 我们在公路旅行中穿过了几个小镇。

examples.en: The train passes through a tunnel before reaching the station.
examples.cn: 火车在到达车站前穿过一条隧道。

examples.en: The company is passing through a difficult financial period.
examples.cn: 公司正在经历一个困难的财务阶段。

examples.en: She passed through many emotions after hearing the news.
examples.cn: 听到消息后，她经历了许多情绪。

examples.en: The two countries have been at war for years.
examples.cn: 这两个国家已经处于战争状态多年。

examples.en: During the time they were at war, trade between them ceased.
examples.cn: 在他们处于战争状态期间，贸易停止了。

examples.en: The siblings are constantly at war over trivial matters.
examples.cn: 兄弟姐妹们经常为琐事激烈冲突。

examples.en: The company is at war with its competitors in the market.
examples.cn: 这家公司在市场上与竞争对手激烈对抗。

examples.en: The acronym NASA stands for National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
examples.cn: 缩写NASA代表国家航空航天局。

examples.en: This flag stands for freedom and democracy.
examples.cn: 这面旗帜象征自由和民主。

examples.en: She stands for environmental protection in her campaign.
examples.cn: 她在竞选中主张环境保护。

examples.en: Our organization stands for equal rights for all.
examples.cn: 我们的组织支持所有人的平等权利。

examples.en: I won't stand for such rude behavior in my house.
examples.cn: 我不会容忍在我家里如此粗鲁的行为。

examples.en: He doesn't stand for any nonsense from his employees.
examples.cn: 他不容忍员工有任何胡闹行为。

definitions.meaning_cn: 直视某人（表示诚实或自信）

examples.en: He looked me in the eye and told me the truth.
examples.cn: 他直视着我，告诉我真相。

examples.en: If you can look someone in the eye, it shows you're confident.
examples.cn: 如果你能直视某人，这表明你很自信。

examples.en: She is unwilling to compromise on her principles.
examples.cn: 她不愿意在原则问题上妥协。

examples.en: He was unwilling to admit his mistake.
examples.cn: 他不愿意承认自己的错误。

examples.en: The police held back the crowd from entering the building.
examples.cn: 警察阻止人群进入大楼。

examples.en: She tried to hold back her tears during the sad movie.
examples.cn: 在看悲伤电影时，她试图抑制眼泪。

examples.en: He held back some important details during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议中保留了一些重要细节。

examples.en: Don't hold back your opinion; we want to hear it.
examples.cn: 不要保留你的意见；我们想听听。

examples.en: Trying to convince him is a waste of your breath; he never listens.
examples.cn: 试图说服他是白费口舌；他从不听。

examples.en: Don't waste your breath arguing with someone so stubborn.
examples.cn: 不要白费口舌和这么固执的人争论。

valid_entries.original_phrase: hold up one's end of the bargain

definitions.meaning_cn: 履行自己的承诺或责任

examples.en: If you hold up your end of the bargain, I'll pay you as agreed.
examples.cn: 如果你履行自己的承诺，我会按约定付钱给你。

examples.en: She always holds up her end of the bargain in team projects.
examples.cn: 在团队项目中，她总是履行自己的责任。

examples.en: They took out a mortgage to buy their first home.
examples.cn: 他们申请了抵押贷款来购买第一套房子。

examples.en: Paying off the mortgage early can save a lot in interest.
examples.cn: 提前还清抵押贷款可以节省很多利息。

examples.en: She decided to go in for the marathon this year.
examples.cn: 她决定今年参加马拉松比赛。

examples.en: Many students go in for the scholarship exam.
examples.cn: 许多学生参加奖学金考试。

examples.en: He really goes in for classical music.
examples.cn: 他真的很喜欢古典音乐。

examples.en: I don't go in for extreme sports; they're too risky.
examples.cn: 我不热衷于极限运动；它们太危险了。

examples.en: We need to finish the report by the end of the week.
examples.cn: 我们需要在本周末之前完成报告。

examples.en: By the end of the year, she hopes to have saved enough money.
examples.cn: 到年底之前，她希望存够钱。

examples.en: Employees must travel to the central office for the quarterly meeting.
examples.cn: 员工必须前往中心办公室参加季度会议。

examples.en: She travels to the central office every Monday to submit reports.
examples.cn: 她每周一前往中心办公室提交报告。

examples.en: He wrote a poem in the same vein as his earlier works.
examples.cn: 他以与早期作品类似的方式写了一首诗。

examples.en: In the same vein, we should consider alternative solutions.
examples.cn: 类似地，我们应该考虑替代解决方案。

examples.en: It took hours to put together the furniture from the flat-pack.
examples.cn: 花了几个小时才把平板包装的家具组装起来。

examples.en: She put together a presentation for the client meeting.
examples.cn: 她为客户会议组合了一份演示文稿。

examples.en: The team put together a comprehensive report on market trends.
examples.cn: 团队整理了一份关于市场趋势的全面报告。

examples.en: He put together all the evidence for the case.
examples.cn: 他汇集了案件的所有证据。

examples.en: Can you keep an eye on the baby while I make dinner?
examples.cn: 我做晚饭时，你能留意一下宝宝吗？

examples.en: Keep an eye on the stock prices for any sudden changes.
examples.cn: 留意股价的任何突然变化。

examples.en: Many residents are opposed to the new construction project.
examples.cn: 许多居民反对新的建设项目。

examples.en: She is opposed to any changes in the company policy.
examples.cn: 她反对公司政策的任何改变。

examples.en: Proper waste disposal is essential for environmental protection.
examples.cn: 适当的废物处理对环境保护至关重要。

examples.en: The city improved its waste disposal systems last year.
examples.cn: 该市去年改进了其废物处理系统。

definitions.meaning_cn: 各种各样的；各种类型的

examples.en: The store sells all manner of electronic gadgets.
examples.cn: 这家商店出售各种各样的电子小玩意。

examples.en: All manner of people attended the festival, from children to seniors.
examples.cn: 从儿童到老年人，各种各样的人都参加了这个节日。

examples.en: The milk will go bad if left out of the fridge too long.
examples.cn: 如果牛奶放在冰箱外太久，它会变质。

examples.en: Fruits can go bad quickly in hot weather.
examples.cn: 在炎热的天气里，水果可能很快腐烂。

examples.en: Their relationship started to go bad after the argument.
examples.cn: 争吵后，他们的关系开始恶化。

examples.en: The weather is going bad, so we should cancel the picnic.
examples.cn: 天气正在变坏，所以我们应该取消野餐。

examples.en: It is important to maintain historic buildings to preserve cultural heritage.
examples.cn: 维护历史建筑以保护文化遗产很重要。

examples.en: The government funds projects to maintain historic buildings in the city.
examples.cn: 政府资助项目来维护城市中的历史建筑。

examples.en: Don't bargain on him arriving on time; he's often late.
examples.cn: 别指望他准时到达；他经常迟到。

examples.en: We bargained on good weather for the outdoor event.
examples.cn: 我们指望户外活动有好天气。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将某人或某物困在有限空间内

examples.en: The other cars boxed in our vehicle, so we couldn't move.
examples.cn: 其他汽车把我们的车困住了，所以我们无法移动。

examples.en: She felt boxed in by the strict rules at work.
examples.cn: 她感到被工作中的严格规则所困。

examples.en: They decided to move out of the apartment and buy a house.
examples.cn: 他们决定搬出公寓，买一栋房子。

examples.en: She will move out next month when her lease ends.
examples.cn: 下个月租约到期时，她会搬出去。

examples.en: After lunch, he likes to take forty winks to recharge.
examples.cn: 午饭后，他喜欢小睡一会儿来恢复精力。

examples.en: I took forty winks on the couch and felt much better.
examples.cn: 我在沙发上小睡了一会儿，感觉好多了。

examples.en: Take your time with the exam; there's no rush.
examples.cn: 考试慢慢来，不用着急。

examples.en: She took her time to carefully choose the perfect gift.
examples.cn: 她慢慢来，仔细挑选完美的礼物。

examples.en: When planning the budget, we must take into account inflation rates.
examples.cn: 规划预算时，我们必须考虑通货膨胀率。

examples.en: The judge took into account the defendant's clean record.
examples.cn: 法官考虑了被告的清白记录。

examples.en: Hard work is part and parcel of achieving success.
examples.cn: 努力工作是取得成功不可或缺的一部分。

examples.en: Dealing with customer complaints is part and parcel of the job.
examples.cn: 处理客户投诉是这项工作不可或缺的一部分。

examples.en: Every defendant has the right to a fair trial.
examples.cn: 每个被告都有权获得公正审判。

examples.en: The judge ensured a fair trial by allowing both sides to present evidence.
examples.cn: 法官通过允许双方出示证据来确保公正审判。

examples.en: Before selling the computer, make sure to erase all personal data.
examples.cn: 在出售电脑前，确保删除所有个人数据。

examples.en: The software can erase data permanently to prevent recovery.
examples.cn: 该软件可以永久删除数据以防止恢复。

examples.en: She plans to study at university to become a doctor.
examples.cn: 她计划在大学学习以成为一名医生。

examples.en: Many students study at university to gain specialized knowledge.
examples.cn: 许多学生在大学学习以获得专业知识。

examples.en: If you have any questions, fire away.
examples.cn: 如果你有任何问题，尽管问吧。

examples.en: The commander ordered the troops to fire away at the enemy.
examples.cn: 指挥官命令部队向敌人开火。

examples.en: Don't be too hard on yourself for making a mistake.
examples.cn: 不要因为犯了一个错误就对自己太苛刻。

examples.en: The new policy is hard on small businesses.
examples.cn: 新政策对小企业很严厉。

examples.en: The car sped away and was soon out of sight.
examples.cn: 汽车疾驰而去，很快就看不见了。

examples.en: That concert was out of sight!
examples.cn: 那场音乐会太棒了！

examples.en: The access to Internet services is essential for modern education.
examples.cn: 互联网服务的接入对现代教育至关重要。

examples.en: They improved the access to Internet services in rural areas.
examples.cn: 他们改善了农村地区的互联网服务接入。

examples.en: We must take all factors into consideration before deciding.
examples.cn: 在决定之前，我们必须考虑所有因素。

examples.en: The design takes user feedback into consideration.
examples.cn: 设计考虑了用户反馈。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在...前停止；几乎要做某事但没做

examples.en: He stopped short of accusing her directly.
examples.cn: 他差点直接指责她，但没这么做。

examples.en: The car stopped short of hitting the pedestrian.
examples.cn: 汽车在撞到行人前停了下来。

examples.en: As you get along in years, health becomes more important.
examples.cn: 随着年纪渐长，健康变得更加重要。

examples.en: My grandparents are getting along in years but still active.
examples.cn: 我的祖父母年纪渐长，但仍然活跃。

examples.en: The average life span of a cat is around 15 years.
examples.cn: 猫的平均寿命大约是15年。

examples.en: Advances in medicine have increased the human life span.
examples.cn: 医学进步延长了人类的寿命。

examples.en: They often poke fun at each other's quirks.
examples.cn: 他们经常取笑彼此的怪癖。

examples.en: It's not nice to poke fun at someone's mistakes.
examples.cn: 取笑别人的错误是不好的。

examples.en: Airports use metal detectors for security checks.
examples.cn: 机场使用金属探测器进行安全检查。

examples.en: He found an old coin with his metal detector.
examples.cn: 他用金属探测器找到了一枚旧硬币。

examples.en: New employees need time to adapt to the workplace.
examples.cn: 新员工需要时间来适应工作环境。

examples.en: She quickly adapted to the workplace culture.
examples.cn: 她很快适应了工作场所的文化。

examples.en: The fog began to roll in from the sea.
examples.cn: 雾开始从海上滚滚而来。

examples.en: The guests started to roll in for the party.
examples.cn: 客人们开始陆续到达参加派对。

examples.en: You should think twice before making such a big decision.
examples.cn: 在做如此重大的决定之前，你应该三思。

examples.en: I thought twice about accepting the job offer.
examples.cn: 我三思后才接受了那份工作邀请。

examples.en: She moved out and is living on her own now.
examples.cn: 她搬出去了，现在独自生活。

examples.en: He solved the problem on his own.
examples.cn: 他独立解决了这个问题。

examples.en: The new manager turned around the failing company.
examples.cn: 新经理扭转了这家濒临倒闭的公司。

examples.en: We need to turn around this project quickly.
examples.cn: 我们需要迅速扭转这个项目的局面。

examples.en: The boss put the heat on us to finish the report by Friday.
examples.cn: 老板给我们施加压力，要求我们在周五前完成报告。

examples.en: The media put the heat on the politician to resign.
examples.cn: 媒体对那位政治家施加压力，要求他辞职。

examples.en: It's important to get your message across clearly.
examples.cn: 清晰地传达你的信息很重要。

examples.en: He struggled to get his ideas across to the audience.
examples.cn: 他努力让观众理解他的想法。

examples.en: She always acts according to her moral principles.
examples.cn: 她总是按照自己的道德原则行事。

examples.en: The company's policies are based on strong moral principles.
examples.cn: 公司的政策基于坚实的道德原则。

examples.en: Prices range from $10 to $100.
examples.cn: 价格从10美元到100美元不等。

examples.en: The topics range from science to art.
examples.cn: 主题范围从科学到艺术。

examples.en: The facility incinerates waste to generate energy.
examples.cn: 该设施焚烧废物以产生能源。

examples.en: It's better to recycle than to incinerate waste.
examples.cn: 回收比焚烧废物更好。

examples.en: After recovering from the flu, she is now in good health.
examples.cn: 流感康复后，她现在身体健康。

examples.en: Regular exercise helps you to be in good health.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼有助于保持身体健康。

examples.en: In addition to the main course, we also serve dessert.
examples.cn: 除了主菜，我们还提供甜点。

examples.en: She speaks French and, in addition, she knows some German.
examples.cn: 她会说法语，此外，她还懂一些德语。

examples.en: This book is not so interesting as the one I read last week.
examples.cn: 这本书不如我上周读的那本有趣。

examples.en: He is not so tall as his brother.
examples.cn: 他不如他哥哥高。

examples.en: I racked my brains trying to remember her name.
examples.cn: 我绞尽脑汁想记起她的名字。

examples.en: He racked his brains for a solution to the problem.
examples.cn: 他苦思冥想寻找问题的解决方案。

examples.en: The museum displays a variety of artistic works from different periods.
examples.cn: 博物馆展示了不同时期的多种艺术作品。

examples.en: She creates artistic works using recycled materials.
examples.cn: 她用回收材料创作艺术作品。

examples.en: We should get together for coffee sometime.
examples.cn: 我们应该找个时间聚聚喝咖啡。

examples.en: The family gets together every Christmas.
examples.cn: 这家人每年圣诞节都会聚在一起。

examples.en: Can you get together all the documents we need?
examples.cn: 你能把我们需要的所有文件收集起来吗？

examples.en: She got her thoughts together before the presentation.
examples.cn: 她在演讲前整理了一下思绪。

examples.en: To her delight, she passed the exam with flying colors.
examples.cn: 令她高兴的是，她以优异成绩通过了考试。

examples.en: To everyone's delight, the sun came out after days of rain.
examples.cn: 令大家高兴的是，下了几天雨后太阳出来了。

examples.en: The company has a strict code of practice for ethical behavior.
examples.cn: 公司有严格的行为准则来规范道德行为。

examples.en: Doctors must adhere to the medical code of practice.
examples.cn: 医生必须遵守医疗实践规范。

examples.en: Children in that orphanage were exposed to abuse.
examples.cn: 那家孤儿院的孩子们遭受了虐待。

examples.en: Workers in some industries are exposed to verbal abuse from customers.
examples.cn: 某些行业的工人会遭受顾客的言语虐待。

examples.en: Teachers use interactive activities to keep students interested.
examples.cn: 老师使用互动活动来保持学生的兴趣。

examples.en: It's important to vary the lessons to keep students interested.
examples.cn: 多样化课程以保持学生的兴趣很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 尽自己的一份力，做分内事

examples.en: Everyone should do their bit to protect the environment.
examples.cn: 每个人都应该尽自己的一份力来保护环境。

examples.en: He did his bit by volunteering at the local shelter.
examples.cn: 他在当地收容所做志愿者，尽了自己的一份力。

examples.en: After his explanation, I finally got the picture.
examples.cn: 经过他的解释，我终于明白了。

examples.en: She nodded to show she got the picture.
examples.cn: 她点头表示她理解了情况。

examples.en: She derives pleasure from reading classic novels.
examples.cn: 她从阅读经典小说中获得乐趣。

examples.en: Many people derive pleasure from helping others.
examples.cn: 许多人从帮助他人中获得乐趣。

examples.en: This area is liable to flooding during heavy rains.
examples.cn: 这个地区在大雨期间容易发生洪水。

examples.en: He is liable to forget appointments if not reminded.
examples.cn: 如果不提醒，他容易忘记约会。

examples.en: Companies are liable to fines for violating regulations.
examples.cn: 公司违反规定可能会受到罚款。

examples.en: Drivers are liable to prosecution if caught speeding.
examples.cn: 司机如果超速被抓，可能会被起诉。

examples.en: Let's put aside our differences and work together.
examples.cn: 让我们搁置分歧，一起工作。

examples.en: She put aside her book to answer the phone.
examples.cn: 她把书放在一边去接电话。

examples.en: He puts aside money every month for his retirement.
examples.cn: 他每月存钱以备退休之用。

examples.en: We should put aside some time for relaxation.
examples.cn: 我们应该留出一些时间放松。

examples.en: Winning the award was a big deal for her.
examples.cn: 赢得这个奖项对她来说是件大事。

examples.en: Don't make a big deal out of it; it's just a small mistake.
examples.cn: 别小题大做，这只是个小错误。

examples.en: So you got a new car? Big deal!
examples.cn: 所以你买了辆新车？没什么大不了的！

examples.en: He thinks he's a big deal because he's the manager.
examples.cn: 他因为自己是经理就觉得自己很了不起。

examples.en: The family was at table when the guests arrived.
examples.cn: 客人到达时，这家人正在用餐。

examples.en: Please wait until everyone is at table before starting to eat.
examples.cn: 请等到所有人都就座后再开始用餐。

examples.en: It is not the cost but the quality that matters.
examples.cn: 重要的不是成本，而是质量。

examples.en: She is not angry but disappointed.
examples.cn: 她不是生气，而是失望。

examples.en: The final decision rests with the committee.
examples.cn: 最终决定权在委员会。

examples.en: The responsibility for this project rests with the manager.
examples.cn: 这个项目的责任在于经理。

examples.en: His remains rest with his ancestors in the family cemetery.
examples.cn: 他的遗骨与祖先一起安息在家族墓地。

examples.en: May her soul rest with peace.
examples.cn: 愿她的灵魂安息。

examples.en: The company prefers to do a face-to-face interview before hiring.
examples.cn: 公司在雇佣前倾向于进行面对面面试。

examples.en: She will do a face-to-face interview with the candidate tomorrow.
examples.cn: 她明天将与候选人进行面对面面试。

definitions.meaning_cn: 柔和的颜色，低调的颜色

examples.en: The room was painted in subdued colors to create a calm atmosphere.
examples.cn: 房间涂上了柔和的颜色以营造平静的氛围。

examples.en: She prefers subdued colors like beige and gray for her wardrobe.
examples.cn: 她喜欢米色和灰色等柔和的颜色作为衣橱色调。

definitions.meaning_cn: 管理交通，调节交通流量

examples.en: The police officer helped regulate the traffic during the parade.
examples.cn: 警察在游行期间帮助管理交通。

examples.en: New signals were installed to better regulate the traffic at the intersection.
examples.cn: 安装了新信号灯以更好地调节十字路口的交通。

examples.en: Some employees are resistant to change when new technology is introduced.
examples.cn: 引入新技术时，一些员工抗拒改变。

examples.en: The community was resistant to change in the local zoning laws.
examples.cn: 社区抵制当地分区法的改变。

examples.en: The old documents will be scanned into digital files for archiving.
examples.cn: 旧文件将被扫描成数字文件以便存档。

examples.en: Photos from the album were scanned into digital files to preserve them.
examples.cn: 相册中的照片被扫描成数字文件以保存。

examples.en: Astronauts travel in outer space to conduct experiments.
examples.cn: 宇航员在外太空旅行以进行实验。

examples.en: Someday, tourists might travel in outer space for leisure.
examples.cn: 有一天，游客可能为了休闲而在外太空旅行。

examples.en: He's new around here, so please show him the way.
examples.cn: 他是新来的，请给他指路。

examples.en: Are you new around here? I haven't seen you before.
examples.cn: 你是新来的吗？我以前没见过你。

examples.en: Students who break rules may face disciplinary action.
examples.cn: 违反规则的学生可能面临纪律处分。

examples.en: He tends to break rules to achieve his goals.
examples.cn: 他倾向于打破规矩以实现目标。

examples.en: In ancient times, people used simple tools for farming.
examples.cn: 在古代，人们使用简单的工具进行农耕。

examples.en: Many myths originate from ancient times.
examples.cn: 许多神话起源于远古时期。

examples.en: Parents should set an example for their children by being honest.
examples.cn: 父母应通过诚实为孩子树立榜样。

examples.en: The manager set an example by arriving early every day.
examples.cn: 经理通过每天早到树立了榜样。

examples.en: In light of recent events, the meeting has been postponed.
examples.cn: 鉴于最近的事件，会议已被推迟。

examples.en: The policy was revised in light of public feedback.
examples.cn: 考虑到公众反馈，政策被修订了。

examples.en: The class formed a discussion group to debate the topic.
examples.cn: 班级成立了一个讨论小组来辩论这个话题。

examples.en: She joined a discussion group to improve her communication skills.
examples.cn: 她加入了一个讨论小组以提高沟通技巧。

examples.en: He acted as if he knew everything.
examples.cn: 他表现得好像什么都知道。

examples.en: It looks as if it might rain soon.
examples.cn: 看起来好像很快要下雨了。

examples.en: It took me a while to get used to waking up early.
examples.cn: 我花了一段时间才习惯早起。

examples.en: She quickly got used to doing her homework after school.
examples.cn: 她很快习惯了放学后做作业。

examples.en: He seems distracted because he has something on his mind.
examples.cn: 他看起来心不在焉，因为他心里有事。

examples.en: She always has her family on her mind when she's away.
examples.cn: 她在外时总是惦记着家人。

examples.en: The bright colors attracted the child's attention.
examples.cn: 鲜艳的颜色吸引了孩子的注意力。

examples.en: He raised his voice to attract the audience's attention.
examples.cn: 他提高声音以吸引观众的注意力。

examples.en: The school's course arrangement allows for flexible scheduling.
examples.cn: 学校的课程安排允许灵活的时间安排。

examples.en: Students should check the course arrangement before registering.
examples.cn: 学生在注册前应检查课程安排。

examples.en: He told the joke with a straight face, making it funnier.
examples.cn: 他板着脸讲笑话，让它更有趣。

examples.en: She managed to have a straight face during the serious discussion.
examples.cn: 在严肃的讨论中，她设法保持表情严肃。

examples.en: The moment that she arrived, the party started.
examples.cn: 她一到，派对就开始了。

examples.en: I knew the truth the moment that I saw his face.
examples.cn: 我一看到他的脸就知道了真相。

examples.en: I can't quite put my finger on what's wrong with this plan.
examples.cn: 我无法准确指出这个计划有什么问题。

examples.en: She put her finger on the exact reason for the delay.
examples.cn: 她准确指出了延误的确切原因。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get a clean bill of health

definitions.meaning_cn: 获得健康证明，表示身体健康

examples.en: After the check-up, the doctor gave him a clean bill of health.
examples.cn: 检查后，医生给了他一份健康证明。

examples.en: The company got a clean bill of health from the auditors.
examples.cn: 公司从审计师那里获得了无问题的报告。

definitions.meaning_cn: 消费品，供个人使用的商品

examples.en: Supermarkets sell a wide range of consumer goods.
examples.cn: 超市销售各种各样的消费品。

examples.en: The demand for consumer goods has increased this year.
examples.cn: 今年对消费品的需求增加了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 学分，用于教育系统中的评分单位

examples.en: Students need to earn 120 credit points to graduate.
examples.cn: 学生需要获得120个学分才能毕业。

examples.en: This course is worth three credit points.
examples.cn: 这门课程值三个学分。

definitions.meaning_cn: 信用积分，用于金融或奖励系统

examples.en: You can redeem your credit points for discounts.
examples.cn: 你可以用信用积分兑换折扣。

examples.en: The bank offers credit points for timely payments.
examples.cn: 银行对按时还款提供信用积分。

examples.en: The actor brought the character to life on stage.
examples.cn: 演员在舞台上使角色栩栩如生。

examples.en: The new technology brings old photos to life.
examples.cn: 新技术让旧照片活了起来。

examples.en: Winning the competition boosted her confidence.
examples.cn: 赢得比赛增强了她的信心。

examples.en: Positive feedback can boost a student's confidence.
examples.cn: 积极的反馈可以增强学生的信心。

examples.en: Setting clear goals can improve motivation.
examples.cn: 设定明确的目标可以提高动力。

examples.en: The manager tried to improve motivation among the team.
examples.cn: 经理试图提高团队的积极性。

definitions.meaning_cn: 轮班工作，在不同时间段工作

examples.en: Many factories require employees to do shift work.
examples.cn: 许多工厂要求员工进行轮班工作。

examples.en: Shift work can disrupt sleep patterns.
examples.cn: 轮班工作可能会打乱睡眠模式。

definitions.meaning_cn: 银行转账，通过银行转移资金

examples.en: I made a bank transfer to pay the bill.
examples.cn: 我通过银行转账支付了账单。

examples.en: Bank transfers are a secure way to send money.
examples.cn: 银行转账是一种安全的汇款方式。

definitions.meaning_cn: 新鲜农产品，如水果和蔬菜

examples.en: The market sells fresh produce from local farms.
examples.cn: 市场销售来自当地农场的新鲜农产品。

examples.en: Eating fresh produce is good for your health.
examples.cn: 食用新鲜农产品对健康有益。

examples.en: Please quote this line in your report.
examples.cn: 请在报告中引用这句话。

examples.en: He quoted this line from the poem during his speech.
examples.cn: 他在演讲中引用了这首诗的这句话。

examples.en: She set ambitious goals for her career.
examples.cn: 她为职业生涯设定了雄心勃勃的目标。

examples.en: The company has ambitious goals for expansion.
examples.cn: 公司有雄心勃勃的扩张目标。

examples.en: We need to improve on last year's sales figures.
examples.cn: 我们需要改进去年的销售数据。

examples.en: The new model improves on the previous version.
examples.cn: 新模型改进了之前的版本。

examples.en: Children grow up so fast these days.
examples.cn: 如今孩子们长得真快。

examples.en: He grew up in a small town.
examples.cn: 他在一个小镇长大。

examples.en: It's time for you to grow up and take responsibility.
examples.cn: 是时候成熟起来承担责任了。

examples.en: She has grown up a lot since college.
examples.cn: 自从大学以来，她成熟了很多。

examples.en: Technology plays a significant role in modern education.
examples.cn: 技术在现代教育中扮演重要角色。

examples.en: She played a significant role in the project's success.
examples.cn: 她在项目的成功中扮演了重要角色。

examples.en: It took me a while to get used to the new job.
examples.cn: 我花了一段时间才习惯新工作。

examples.en: You'll get used to the cold weather soon.
examples.cn: 你很快就会习惯寒冷的天气。

examples.en: He takes a positive view of the changes.
examples.cn: 他对这些变化持积极观点。

examples.en: They take a cautious view of the economic outlook.
examples.cn: 他们对经济前景持谨慎观点。

examples.en: Could you put me through to the manager?
examples.cn: 你能帮我接通经理的电话吗？

examples.en: The training program put him through rigorous exercises.
examples.cn: 培训计划让他经历了严格的训练。

examples.en: We need to put through the new policy by next month.
examples.cn: 我们需要在下个月前实施新政策。

examples.en: She put through the transaction quickly and efficiently.
examples.cn: 她快速高效地完成了这笔交易。

examples.en: Her life experience taught her to be resilient.
examples.cn: 她的人生经历教会了她坚韧不拔。

examples.en: Traveling abroad adds valuable life experience.
examples.cn: 出国旅行增加了宝贵的生活经验。

definitions.meaning_cn: 实际体验（相对于理论知识）

examples.en: In this job, life experience is more important than academic degrees.
examples.cn: 在这份工作中，实际体验比学历更重要。

examples.en: He gained life experience by volunteering in the community.
examples.cn: 他通过在社区志愿服务获得了实际体验。

examples.en: I congratulated her upon her promotion.
examples.cn: 我为她的晋升祝贺了她。

examples.en: They congratulated him upon winning the award.
examples.cn: 他们为他获奖表示祝贺。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...和解；接受（不愉快的事实）

examples.en: He finally made his peace with his past mistakes.
examples.cn: 他终于与过去的错误和解了。

examples.en: She made her peace with the decision to move away.
examples.cn: 她接受了搬离的决定。

examples.en: The hi-tech industry is booming in Silicon Valley.
examples.cn: 硅谷的高科技产业正在蓬勃发展。

examples.en: Investing in the hi-tech industry can be very profitable.
examples.cn: 投资高科技产业可能非常有利可图。

examples.en: Whether you come early or late makes no difference to me.
examples.cn: 你早来晚来对我来说没有影响。

examples.en: The color of the car makes no difference in its performance.
examples.cn: 汽车的颜色对其性能无关紧要。

examples.en: He took the engine apart to fix the problem.
examples.cn: 他拆开发动机来修理问题。

examples.en: The kids took the toy apart to see how it works.
examples.cn: 孩子们拆开玩具看它是如何工作的。

examples.en: The critic took the movie apart in his review.
examples.cn: 评论家在他的评论中严厉批评了这部电影。

examples.en: She took his argument apart point by point.
examples.cn: 她逐点剖析了他的论点。

examples.en: In principle, I agree with your proposal.
examples.cn: 原则上，我同意你的提议。

examples.en: The plan is sound in principle, but needs more details.
examples.cn: 这个计划大体上是合理的，但需要更多细节。

examples.en: Please set the table for dinner.
examples.cn: 请摆好餐具准备晚餐。

examples.en: She set the table with plates and silverware.
examples.cn: 她用盘子和银器摆好了餐桌。

examples.en: She will star in the new movie.
examples.cn: 她将主演这部新电影。

examples.en: He starred in a popular TV series last year.
examples.cn: 他去年主演了一部受欢迎的电视剧。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为了...的利益；出于...的考虑

examples.en: In the interest of safety, please wear a helmet.
examples.cn: 为了安全起见，请戴上头盔。

examples.en: We made this decision in the interest of the company.
examples.cn: 我们出于公司利益的考虑做出了这个决定。

examples.en: He needs to come to grips with his financial problems.
examples.cn: 他需要认真处理他的财务问题。

examples.en: She came to grips with the new software quickly.
examples.cn: 她快速理解并应对了新软件。

examples.en: The report made mention of several key issues.
examples.cn: 报告提到了几个关键问题。

examples.en: He made mention of her contribution during the speech.
examples.cn: 他在演讲中提到了她的贡献。

examples.en: "Can you help me?" "No problem!"
examples.cn: "你能帮我吗？" "没问题！"

examples.en: "Thanks for your help." "No problem."
examples.cn: "谢谢你的帮助。" "不客气。"

examples.en: They plan to move to a bigger house next year.
examples.cn: 他们计划明年搬到更大的房子。

examples.en: She moved to New York for her job.
examples.cn: 她为了工作搬到了纽约。

examples.en: Let's move to the next item on the agenda.
examples.cn: 让我们转向议程上的下一个项目。

examples.en: The discussion moved to more serious topics.
examples.cn: 讨论转向了更严肃的话题。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's heart skip a beat

definitions.meaning_cn: 心跳加速；感到惊喜或紧张

examples.en: When she saw him, her heart skipped a beat.
examples.cn: 当她看到他时，她的心跳加速了。

examples.en: The sudden noise made my heart skip a beat.
examples.cn: 突然的噪音让我心跳加速。

examples.en: We had fun with the new video game.
examples.cn: 我们玩新电子游戏玩得很开心。

examples.en: She has fun with her friends on weekends.
examples.cn: 她在周末和朋友们享受乐趣。

examples.en: They encountered difficulties during the project.
examples.cn: 他们在项目期间遇到了困难。

examples.en: She encountered difficulties learning the new language.
examples.cn: 她在学习新语言时遇到了困难。

examples.en: It's necessary to study hard for the exam.
examples.cn: 有必要为考试努力学习。

examples.en: It's necessary to follow the rules in this company.
examples.cn: 在这家公司有必要遵守规则。

examples.en: We plan to go sightseeing in Paris next week.
examples.cn: 我们计划下周去巴黎观光。

examples.en: Tourists often go sightseeing to see famous landmarks.
examples.cn: 游客经常去观光看著名地标。

examples.en: The teacher gave us a reading assignment for the weekend.
examples.cn: 老师给我们布置了周末的阅读作业。

examples.en: Completing the reading assignment is essential for the discussion.
examples.cn: 完成阅读作业对讨论至关重要。

examples.en: I caught a glimpse at the celebrity as she passed by.
examples.cn: 当那位名人经过时，我瞥了她一眼。

examples.en: He took a glimpse at the document before the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议前匆匆看了一眼文件。

examples.en: For an instant, I thought I saw a ghost.
examples.cn: 一瞬间，我以为我看到了鬼。

examples.en: The light flashed for an instant and then disappeared.
examples.cn: 灯光闪烁了片刻，然后消失了。

examples.en: I think of her as a close friend.
examples.cn: 我把她看作亲密的朋友。

examples.en: Many people think of this city as a cultural hub.
examples.cn: 许多人把这个城市看作文化中心。

examples.en: Knowing first aid can save lives in emergencies.
examples.cn: 了解急救可以在紧急情况下挽救生命。

examples.en: The company provides first aid training for all employees.
examples.cn: 公司为所有员工提供急救培训。

examples.en: The artist became world famous after his exhibition.
examples.cn: 这位艺术家在展览后变得世界闻名。

examples.en: Some inventions become world famous overnight.
examples.cn: 一些发明一夜之间变得世界闻名。

examples.en: She is a postgraduate student studying biology.
examples.cn: 她是一名研究生物学的研究生。

examples.en: Postgraduate students often conduct independent research.
examples.cn: 研究生经常进行独立研究。

examples.en: Effective personnel management is key to a successful company.
examples.cn: 有效的人事管理是公司成功的关键。

examples.en: She works in personnel management at a large corporation.
examples.cn: 她在一家大公司从事人事管理工作。

examples.en: The new evidence cast doubt on the original theory.
examples.cn: 新证据对原始理论产生了怀疑。

examples.en: His inconsistent statements cast doubt on his credibility.
examples.cn: 他前后矛盾的陈述让人对他的可信度产生怀疑。

examples.en: We can divide the cake into eight equal pieces.
examples.cn: 我们可以把蛋糕分成八等份。

examples.en: The teacher divided the class into groups for the project.
examples.cn: 老师把班级分成小组进行项目。

examples.en: He cried in despair after losing his job.
examples.cn: 失业后，他绝望地哭了。

examples.en: She looked in despair at the ruined painting.
examples.cn: 她绝望地看着被毁的画作。

examples.en: I need to calculate the number of calories in this meal.
examples.cn: 我需要计算这顿饭的卡路里数量。

examples.en: Apps can help you calculate the number of calories you burn.
examples.cn: 应用程序可以帮助你计算燃烧的卡路里数量。

examples.en: He is a well-known author in the literary world.
examples.cn: 他是文学界著名的作家。

examples.en: This is a well-known fact among scientists.
examples.cn: 这是科学家中众所周知的事实。

examples.en: They decided to pass over his application for promotion.
examples.cn: 他们决定忽略他的晋升申请。

examples.en: Let's pass over the minor details and focus on the main issue.
examples.cn: 让我们跳过次要细节，专注于主要问题。

examples.en: The plane will pass over the mountains soon.
examples.cn: 飞机很快将飞过山脉。

examples.en: Clouds passed over the sun, casting shadows.
examples.cn: 云朵经过太阳，投下阴影。

examples.en: After the surgery, it took hours for him to come round.
examples.cn: 手术后，他花了几个小时才苏醒。

examples.en: She fainted but came round quickly with some water.
examples.cn: 她晕倒了，但喝了些水后很快恢复了知觉。

examples.en: He initially refused, but he came round to the idea later.
examples.cn: 他最初拒绝了，但后来改变了主意同意了这个想法。

examples.en: After much discussion, they came round to our proposal.
examples.cn: 经过多次讨论，他们同意了我们的提议。

examples.en: How long will the meeting last?
examples.cn: 会议将持续多久？

examples.en: Can you tell me how long it takes to get there?
examples.cn: 你能告诉我到那里需要多长时间吗？

examples.en: I owe my success to my parents' support.
examples.cn: 我把我的成功归功于父母的支持。

examples.en: She owes her fluency in English to years of practice.
examples.cn: 她把英语流利归功于多年的练习。

examples.en: Solar energy is a renewable source of power.
examples.cn: 太阳能是一种可再生的能源。

examples.en: Many homes now use solar energy to reduce electricity bills.
examples.cn: 现在许多家庭使用太阳能来减少电费。

examples.en: After trying every solution, she was at her wit's end with the technical problem.
examples.cn: 尝试了所有解决方案后，她对技术问题感到智穷计尽。

examples.en: The parents were at their wit's end trying to calm their crying baby.
examples.cn: 父母试图安抚哭泣的婴儿，感到不知所措。

examples.en: He took liberties with the original script, adding his own dialogue.
examples.cn: 他擅自改动原剧本，加入了自己的对话。

examples.en: Don't take liberties with company property; always ask for permission.
examples.cn: 不要对公司财产过于随意，务必先征得同意。

examples.en: She decided to take on the new project despite her busy schedule.
examples.cn: 尽管日程繁忙，她还是决定承担这个新项目。

examples.en: The company is taking on more employees to handle the increased workload.
examples.cn: 公司正在招聘更多员工来处理增加的工作量。
