examples.en: The old house takes on a spooky appearance at night.
examples.cn: 这栋老房子在夜晚呈现出一种阴森的外观。

examples.en: His voice took on a serious tone when discussing the issue.
examples.cn: 讨论这个问题时，他的声音变得严肃起来。

examples.en: We need to take on a consultant to improve our marketing strategy.
examples.cn: 我们需要聘用一位顾问来改进营销策略。

examples.en: The firm took on several interns for the summer.
examples.cn: 这家公司夏季雇用了几名实习生。

examples.en: Watch out for slippery floors after they've been mopped.
examples.cn: 拖地后要留意湿滑的地板。

examples.en: You should watch out for scams when shopping online.
examples.cn: 网上购物时，你应该提防诈骗。

examples.en: Don't take your health for granted; it's important to exercise regularly.
examples.cn: 不要认为健康是理所当然的，定期锻炼很重要。

examples.en: She took her friend's support for granted until they had a disagreement.
examples.cn: 直到发生分歧，她才意识到自己把朋友的支持视为理所当然。

examples.en: We didn't have enough chairs, so we had to make do with sitting on the floor.
examples.cn: 椅子不够，我们只好凑合坐在地板上。

examples.en: With limited ingredients, she made do to prepare a simple meal.
examples.cn: 食材有限，她将就着做了一顿简单的饭。

examples.en: I draw the line at lending money to friends; it often causes problems.
examples.cn: 我设定底线，不借钱给朋友，因为这常引发问题。

examples.en: The company draws the line at unethical business practices.
examples.cn: 公司对不道德的商业行为划定界限。

definitions.meaning_cn: 处于不利地位，面临双重困难

examples.en: As a newcomer with no experience, he had two strikes against him in the job interview.
examples.cn: 作为没有经验的新人，他在工作面试中处于不利地位。

examples.en: She had two strikes against her when applying for the loan due to her low credit score.
examples.cn: 由于信用评分低，她申请贷款时面临双重困难。

examples.en: Additional information is available on request from the office.
examples.cn: 如需更多信息，可向办公室索取。

examples.en: The hotel provides extra towels on request.
examples.cn: 酒店应请求提供额外毛巾。

examples.en: The program gives opportunity for students to study abroad.
examples.cn: 这个项目给学生提供出国留学的机会。

examples.en: We should give opportunity for young artists to showcase their work.
examples.cn: 我们应该给年轻艺术家展示作品的机会。

examples.en: By then, the construction should be completed.
examples.cn: 到那时，建筑工程应该已经完成。

examples.en: We'll have more data by then to make a decision.
examples.cn: 届时我们将有更多数据来做决定。

examples.en: He was absent from the meeting due to illness.
examples.cn: 他因病缺席了会议。

examples.en: Students who are absent from class must provide a valid reason.
examples.cn: 缺课的学生必须提供正当理由。

examples.en: She is traveling to New York on business next week.
examples.cn: 她下周将因公前往纽约。

examples.en: He's on business in Tokyo, attending a conference.
examples.cn: 他正在东京出差，参加一个会议。

examples.en: The critic pulled the new film to pieces in his review.
examples.cn: 评论家在他的评论中严厉批评了这部新电影。

examples.en: During the meeting, they pulled the proposal to pieces to find flaws.
examples.cn: 会议期间，他们拆解分析了提案以找出缺陷。

examples.en: By networking with industry insiders, she got the inside track on the job opening.
examples.cn: 通过与业内人员建立联系，她获得了职位空缺的内幕消息。

examples.en: Investors who get the inside track can make better decisions in the stock market.
examples.cn: 获得内幕消息的投资者能在股市中做出更好的决策。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get one's feet on the ground

examples.en: After moving to a new city, it took him a few months to get his feet on the ground.
examples.cn: 搬到新城市后，他花了几个月才站稳脚跟。

examples.en: Once you get your feet on the ground at the new job, you'll feel more confident.
examples.cn: 一旦你在新工作中适应了环境，就会更有信心。

examples.en: If you think that plan will work, you must have rocks in your head.
examples.cn: 如果你认为那个计划可行，你一定是头脑不清醒。

examples.en: He has rocks in his head for investing all his money in such a risky venture.
examples.cn: 他把所有钱投资在如此冒险的项目上，真是愚蠢。

examples.en: Good language skills are essential for working in international business.
examples.cn: 良好的语言能力对于从事国际商务至关重要。

examples.en: She improved her language skills by practicing with native speakers.
examples.cn: 她通过与母语者练习提高了语言能力。

examples.en: Farmers often use chemical fertilisers to increase crop yields.
examples.cn: 农民经常使用化学肥料来提高作物产量。

examples.en: Excessive application of chemical fertilisers can harm soil health.
examples.cn: 过量施用化学肥料会损害土壤健康。

examples.en: Pharmaceutical companies invest billions to invent new drugs for rare diseases.
examples.cn: 制药公司投资数十亿美元为罕见疾病发明新药。

examples.en: Researchers aim to invent new drugs that have fewer side effects.
examples.cn: 研究人员旨在发明副作用更少的新药。

definitions.meaning_cn: 专注于或深深卷入某事

examples.en: She is bound up in her research and rarely takes breaks.
examples.cn: 她专注于研究，很少休息。

examples.en: He was bound up in the legal dispute for months.
examples.cn: 他深深卷入这场法律纠纷长达数月。

examples.en: The company's success is bound up in its innovative culture.
examples.cn: 公司的成功与其创新文化紧密相关。

examples.en: Her happiness is bound up in her family's well-being.
examples.cn: 她的幸福与家人的福祉紧密相连。

examples.en: It's wrong to lie to your friends about important matters.
examples.cn: 在重要事情上对朋友撒谎是错误的。

examples.en: He decided to lie to his boss to avoid trouble.
examples.cn: 他决定对老板撒谎以避免麻烦。

examples.en: The dancers moved in step with the music.
examples.cn: 舞者们随着音乐同步移动。

examples.en: Our team needs to work in step to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 我们团队需要协调一致工作以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: She keeps in step with the latest fashion trends.
examples.cn: 她紧跟最新的时尚潮流。

examples.en: The company's policies are in step with modern environmental standards.
examples.cn: 公司的政策符合现代环境标准。

examples.en: Press the computer power button to turn on the device.
examples.cn: 按下电脑电源按钮以开启设备。

examples.en: The computer power button is usually located on the front panel.
examples.cn: 电脑电源按钮通常位于前面板上。

examples.en: Please bring along your ID card to the meeting.
examples.cn: 请携带你的身份证参加会议。

examples.en: She brought along a friend to the party.
examples.cn: 她带了一个朋友来参加派对。

examples.en: The new policy will bring along significant changes.
examples.cn: 新政策将带来重大变化。

examples.en: His leadership brought along a period of growth for the company.
examples.cn: 他的领导为公司带来了一段增长期。

examples.en: It's hard to keep up with the rapid pace of technological change.
examples.cn: 很难跟上技术变化的快速步伐。

examples.en: She exercises regularly to keep up with her fitness goals.
examples.cn: 她定期锻炼以跟上她的健身目标。

examples.en: I try to keep up with old friends through social media.
examples.cn: 我试图通过社交媒体与老朋友保持联系。

examples.en: He reads the news daily to keep up with current events.
examples.cn: 他每天读新闻以了解时事。

examples.en: The manager will inform the team about the new project details.
examples.cn: 经理将通知团队关于新项目的细节。

examples.en: Please inform me about any changes to the schedule.
examples.cn: 请通知我关于日程的任何变化。

examples.en: It's no use crying over spilled milk.
examples.cn: 为打翻的牛奶哭泣是无用的。

examples.en: There's no use arguing with him; he won't change his mind.
examples.cn: 与他争论无用；他不会改变主意。

examples.en: The students presented their projects in turn.
examples.cn: 学生们依次展示了他们的项目。

examples.en: Each team member spoke in turn during the meeting.
examples.cn: 会议期间每个团队成员轮流发言。

examples.en: The new law will affect businesses, and in turn, the economy.
examples.cn: 新法律将影响企业，相应地影响经济。

examples.en: She helped her colleague, and in turn, received support later.
examples.cn: 她帮助了同事，作为结果，后来得到了支持。

examples.en: I met the author in the flesh at the book signing.
examples.cn: 我在签书会上亲自见到了作者本人。

examples.en: Seeing the celebrity in the flesh was an exciting experience.
examples.cn: 亲眼见到那位名人是一次激动人心的经历。

examples.en: She dared to speak up against the unfair policy.
examples.cn: 她敢于发声反对不公平的政策。

examples.en: Few people dare to challenge the traditional methods.
examples.cn: 很少有人敢于挑战传统方法。

examples.en: The school lays great emphasis on academic excellence.
examples.cn: 学校高度重视学术卓越。

examples.en: Our company lays great emphasis on customer satisfaction.
examples.cn: 我们公司高度重视客户满意度。

examples.en: Employees are requesting a pay rise due to increased living costs.
examples.cn: 由于生活成本增加，员工们要求加薪。

examples.en: She received a pay rise after her annual performance review.
examples.cn: 她在年度绩效评估后获得了加薪。

examples.en: The project deadline is next Friday, that is, the 15th.
examples.cn: 项目截止日期是下周五，即15号。

examples.en: He prefers outdoor activities, that is, hiking and cycling.
examples.cn: 他更喜欢户外活动，也就是说，徒步和骑行。

examples.en: Volunteers help to clean up the park every weekend.
examples.cn: 志愿者们每个周末帮助清理公园。

examples.en: This tool will help to simplify the complex process.
examples.cn: 这个工具将帮助简化复杂的过程。

examples.en: The region is experiencing unusually warm conditions for this time of year.
examples.cn: 该地区正经历一年中这个时候异常温暖的条件。

examples.en: Unusually warm conditions have led to early blooming of flowers.
examples.cn: 异常温暖的条件导致花朵提前开放。

examples.en: Many senior citizens enjoy discounts at public facilities.
examples.cn: 许多老年人在公共设施享受折扣。

examples.en: The community center offers programs specifically for senior citizens.
examples.cn: 社区中心为老年人提供专门的项目。

examples.en: The documentary throws the spotlight on environmental issues.
examples.cn: 这部纪录片聚焦于环境问题。

examples.en: Her speech threw the spotlight on the need for educational reform.
examples.cn: 她的演讲引起了人们对教育改革需求的关注。

examples.en: When the alarm sounded, the thief took to his heels and disappeared into the night.
examples.cn: 警报响起时，小偷拔腿就跑，消失在夜色中。

examples.en: The children took to their heels as soon as they saw the teacher approaching.
examples.cn: 孩子们一看到老师走过来，就立刻溜走了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 宁愿做某事，更愿意做某事

examples.en: I would sooner stay home and read a book than go to that noisy party.
examples.cn: 我宁愿待在家里看书，也不愿去那个吵闹的派对。

examples.en: She would sooner resign than compromise her principles.
examples.cn: 她宁愿辞职，也不愿妥协自己的原则。

examples.en: After five years together, they decided to split up amicably.
examples.cn: 在一起五年后，他们决定友好地分手。

examples.en: Many couples split up due to long-distance challenges.
examples.cn: 许多情侣因异地挑战而分手。

examples.en: We split up the large project into smaller tasks for efficiency.
examples.cn: 为了提高效率，我们将这个大项目分割成更小的任务。

examples.en: The group split up to search different areas of the forest.
examples.cn: 小组分开搜索森林的不同区域。

examples.en: With the help of modern technology, we can communicate instantly across the globe.
examples.cn: 在现代技术的帮助下，我们可以即时全球沟通。

examples.en: She completed the difficult task with the help of her supportive colleagues.
examples.cn: 在支持她的同事的帮助下，她完成了这项困难的任务。

examples.en: I need to edit photos from the wedding to enhance the colors and remove blemishes.
examples.cn: 我需要编辑婚礼照片，以增强色彩并去除瑕疵。

examples.en: Many influencers use software to edit photos before posting them on social media.
examples.cn: 许多网红在将照片发布到社交媒体前使用软件进行编辑。

examples.en: He bought a lottery ticket every week, hoping to win the jackpot someday.
examples.cn: 他每周都买一张彩票，希望有一天能中头奖。

examples.en: Losing lottery tickets are often discarded without a second thought.
examples.cn: 未中奖的彩票通常被随手丢弃。

examples.en: The national park covers an area of over 1,000 square kilometers.
examples.cn: 这个国家公园占地超过1000平方公里。

examples.en: The new shopping mall will cover an area of 50 acres once completed.
examples.cn: 新购物中心建成后将占地50英亩。

examples.en: Hikers should be prepared to encounter danger in remote wilderness areas.
examples.cn: 徒步旅行者应准备好应对偏远荒野地区的危险。

examples.en: During the storm, sailors encountered danger from high waves and strong winds.
examples.cn: 暴风雨期间，水手们遇到了巨浪和强风的危险。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take the bitter with the sweet

definitions.meaning_cn: 接受生活中的苦与乐，好坏都接受

examples.en: In life, you must learn to take the bitter with the sweet to maintain balance.
examples.cn: 在生活中，你必须学会接受苦与乐，以保持平衡。

examples.en: As an entrepreneur, she takes the bitter with the sweet, celebrating successes and learning from failures.
examples.cn: 作为一名企业家，她接受苦与乐，庆祝成功并从失败中学习。

examples.en: I prefer to relax at home on weekends rather than going out.
examples.cn: 周末我更喜欢在家放松，而不是外出。

examples.en: She felt most comfortable at home, surrounded by familiar things.
examples.cn: 在家时她感到最舒适，周围都是熟悉的东西。

examples.en: After years of practice, he is at home with public speaking.
examples.cn: 经过多年练习，他对公开演讲很自在。

examples.en: She is at home in the kitchen, whipping up delicious meals effortlessly.
examples.cn: 她在厨房很熟练，能轻松做出美味的饭菜。

examples.en: Some people are born with a natural talent for music.
examples.cn: 有些人天生具有音乐天赋。

examples.en: He was born with a strong sense of curiosity that drove his scientific discoveries.
examples.cn: 他天生具有强烈的好奇心，这推动了他的科学发现。

examples.en: We need to get to the airport by 6 PM to catch our flight.
examples.cn: 我们需要在下午6点前到达机场以赶上航班。

examples.en: How do you get to the city center from here?
examples.cn: 从这里怎么去市中心？

examples.en: I finally got to read that book I've been wanting to for months.
examples.cn: 我终于有机会读那本我几个月来一直想读的书了。

examples.en: Let's get to work on this project right away.
examples.cn: 让我们立即开始做这个项目吧。

examples.en: The dictionary defines 'altruism' as the selfless concern for the well-being of others.
examples.cn: 词典将'利他主义'定义为对他人福祉的无私关心。

examples.en: In this study, we define success as achieving both personal and professional goals.
examples.cn: 在本研究中，我们将成功定义为实现个人和职业目标。

examples.en: He ran up a huge credit card bill during his vacation.
examples.cn: 他在度假期间积欠了一大笔信用卡账单。

examples.en: Be careful not to run up debts you can't afford to repay.
examples.cn: 小心不要积欠你无法偿还的债务。

examples.en: She ran up a simple dress for the party in just a few hours.
examples.cn: 她在短短几小时内为派对快速制作了一件简单的连衣裙。

examples.en: The soldiers ran up the flag at dawn.
examples.cn: 士兵们在黎明时升起了旗帜。

examples.en: The kids had ants in their pants waiting for the movie to start.
examples.cn: 孩子们在等待电影开始时坐立不安。

examples.en: He always has ants in his pants before a big presentation.
examples.cn: 他在大型演讲前总是焦躁不安。

examples.en: The mail carrier delivers letters and packages to our house every day.
examples.cn: 邮递员每天将信件和包裹送到我们家。

examples.en: She has worked as a mail carrier for over twenty years, rain or shine.
examples.cn: 她担任邮递员已超过二十年，风雨无阻。

examples.en: Climate change poses a serious threat to global ecosystems.
examples.cn: 气候变化对全球生态系统构成严重威胁。

examples.en: The new competitor poses a threat to our market share.
examples.cn: 新竞争对手对我们的市场份额构成威胁。

examples.en: Please take away these empty plates from the table.
examples.cn: 请把这些空盘子从桌子上拿走。

examples.en: The police took the suspect away for questioning.
examples.cn: 警察将嫌疑人带走审问。

examples.en: The accident took away his ability to walk.
examples.cn: 事故剥夺了他行走的能力。

examples.en: A good vacation can take away the stress of daily life.
examples.cn: 一个好的假期可以消除日常生活的压力。

examples.en: She puts by a little money each month for emergencies.
examples.cn: 她每月存一点钱以备不时之需。

examples.en: It's wise to put by some savings for retirement.
examples.cn: 为退休积蓄一些储蓄是明智的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 受过良好教育的劳动力

examples.en: A well-educated workforce is essential for driving innovation in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 受过良好教育的劳动力对于推动科技行业的创新至关重要。

examples.en: Countries with a well-educated workforce tend to have higher economic growth.
examples.cn: 拥有受过良好教育的劳动力的国家往往有更高的经济增长。

examples.en: I'll see that the report is submitted by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我会确保报告在明天前提交。

examples.en: Please see that the guests are comfortable during their stay.
examples.cn: 请确保客人在入住期间感到舒适。

examples.en: Did you see that beautiful sunset last night?
examples.cn: 你昨晚看到那美丽的日落了吗？

examples.en: I can see that you're upset about the news.
examples.cn: 我能看出你对这个消息感到不安。

definitions.meaning_cn: 微积分课程，数学中涉及极限、导数和积分的学科

examples.en: She struggled with the calculus course but passed with extra tutoring.
examples.cn: 她在微积分课程上很吃力，但通过额外辅导通过了。

examples.en: The calculus course is a prerequisite for many engineering degrees.
examples.cn: 微积分课程是许多工程学位的先修课。

definitions.meaning_cn: 危害健康，使健康处于危险之中

examples.en: Smoking can endanger health by increasing the risk of lung cancer.
examples.cn: 吸烟会增加肺癌风险，从而危害健康。

examples.en: Pollution in the city endangers the health of its residents.
examples.cn: 城市污染危害居民的健康。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在航空业中，指涉及航空运输和服务的行业

examples.en: He has worked in the airline industry for over 20 years.
examples.cn: 他在航空业工作了20多年。

examples.en: Innovations in the airline industry have made travel more efficient.
examples.cn: 航空业的创新使旅行更高效。

definitions.meaning_cn: 财务困难，指资金短缺或经济问题

examples.en: Many families face financial difficulties during economic recessions.
examples.cn: 许多家庭在经济衰退期间面临财务困难。

examples.en: The company is experiencing financial difficulties due to declining sales.
examples.cn: 由于销售额下降，公司正经历财务困难。

valid_entries.original_phrase: meet the growing demand for housing

definitions.meaning_cn: 满足对住房日益增长的需求

examples.en: The government is building new apartments to meet the growing demand for housing.
examples.cn: 政府正在建造新公寓以满足对住房日益增长的需求。

examples.en: Developers must innovate to meet the growing demand for housing in urban areas.
examples.cn: 开发商必须创新以满足城市地区对住房日益增长的需求。

definitions.meaning_cn: 测量体温，通常用体温计

examples.en: The nurse will take your temperature before the appointment.
examples.cn: 护士会在预约前测量你的体温。

examples.en: If you feel feverish, you should take your temperature immediately.
examples.cn: 如果你感觉发烧，应立即测量体温。

definitions.meaning_cn: 一长串清单，通常指冗长或繁琐的项目列表

examples.en: He gave me a laundry list of chores to complete over the weekend.
examples.cn: 他给了我一份周末要完成的一长串家务清单。

examples.en: The report included a laundry list of recommendations for improvement.
examples.cn: 报告包含了一长串改进建议。

definitions.meaning_cn: 领先于，在竞争中取得优势

examples.en: To get ahead of the competition, we need to innovate faster.
examples.cn: 为了领先于竞争对手，我们需要更快地创新。

examples.en: She studied hard to get ahead of her classmates in the exams.
examples.cn: 她努力学习以在考试中领先于同学。

examples.en: We should get ahead of potential problems by planning carefully.
examples.cn: 我们应该通过仔细规划来提前处理潜在问题。

examples.en: Getting ahead of the weather forecast, they canceled the outdoor event.
examples.cn: 他们根据天气预报提前取消了户外活动。

definitions.meaning_cn: 收拾或储存起来，通常指物品

examples.en: After the party, we need to pack away the decorations.
examples.cn: 派对结束后，我们需要把装饰品收拾起来。

examples.en: She packed away her winter clothes as the weather warmed up.
examples.cn: 天气变暖时，她把冬装收起来了。

examples.en: He can pack away a whole pizza by himself.
examples.cn: 他能独自吃掉一整张披萨。

examples.en: The kids packed away all the cookies in minutes.
examples.cn: 孩子们几分钟内就把所有饼干吃光了。

examples.en: He took his leave of the host after the dinner party.
examples.cn: 晚宴后，他向主人告别。

examples.en: It's time to take my leave of you and head home.
examples.cn: 是时候向你告别回家了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 遵从或听从，通常指尊重他人的意见或权威

examples.en: In matters of law, I defer to the experts.
examples.cn: 在法律事务上，我听从专家的意见。

examples.en: The junior staff defer to the manager's decisions.
examples.cn: 初级员工遵从经理的决定。

examples.en: The crowd looked on as the firefighters rescued the cat.
examples.cn: 人群旁观消防员救猫。

examples.en: She preferred to look on rather than join the debate.
examples.cn: 她宁愿旁观而不加入辩论。

examples.en: How do you look on this new policy?
examples.cn: 你怎么看待这项新政策？

examples.en: He looks on his colleagues as friends.
examples.cn: 他把同事视为朋友。

examples.en: The project is far from complete; we have a lot more work to do.
examples.cn: 这个项目远未完成；我们还有很多工作要做。

examples.en: Her attitude is far from helpful in this situation.
examples.cn: 在这种情况下，她的态度远非有帮助。

definitions.meaning_cn: 无限或无止境，通常指情感或品质

examples.en: Her generosity knows no bounds; she helps everyone in need.
examples.cn: 她的慷慨无限；她帮助每一个需要帮助的人。

examples.en: The artist's creativity knows no bounds in his latest work.
examples.cn: 这位艺术家在他最新的作品中创造力无限。

definitions.meaning_cn: 家庭晚餐，家人共进的晚餐

examples.en: We have family dinners every Sunday to catch up with each other.
examples.cn: 我们每周日都有家庭晚餐来互相了解近况。

examples.en: Family dinners are an important tradition in our household.
examples.cn: 家庭晚餐是我们家庭的重要传统。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在会议或活动中进行中

examples.en: The court is in session, so please remain quiet.
examples.cn: 法庭正在开庭，请保持安静。

examples.en: Parliament is in session to discuss the new bill.
examples.cn: 议会正在开会讨论新法案。

examples.en: In reference to your email, we have updated the document.
examples.cn: 关于你的电子邮件，我们已经更新了文件。

examples.en: He made a comment in reference to the recent news article.
examples.cn: 他就最近的新闻文章发表了评论。

examples.en: Be on guard for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
examples.cn: 对社区内的任何可疑活动保持警惕。

examples.en: The soldiers were on guard throughout the night.
examples.cn: 士兵们整夜保持戒备。

definitions.meaning_cn: 跟上需求，保持与需求同步

examples.en: The factory must increase production to keep pace with the demand.
examples.cn: 工厂必须增加产量以跟上需求。

examples.en: It's challenging to keep pace with the demand during peak seasons.
examples.cn: 在旺季跟上需求是具有挑战性的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 特别令人恼火的小事或个人习惯

examples.en: My pet peeve is when people chew loudly in quiet places.
examples.cn: 我特别讨厌有人在安静的地方大声咀嚼。

examples.en: Leaving dirty dishes in the sink is her biggest pet peeve.
examples.cn: 把脏盘子留在水槽里是她最讨厌的事情。

definitions.meaning_cn: 比预期更快地完成旅程

examples.en: We made good time on the highway and arrived an hour early.
examples.cn: 我们在高速公路上开得很快，提前一小时到达。

examples.en: Despite the rain, the train made good time to the city.
examples.cn: 尽管下雨，火车还是很快到达了城市。

examples.en: He failed to submit the report by the deadline.
examples.cn: 他未能在截止日期前提交报告。

examples.en: The company failed to meet its quarterly targets.
examples.cn: 公司未能达到季度目标。

examples.en: She decided to get involved in the community charity event.
examples.cn: 她决定参与社区的慈善活动。

examples.en: It's best not to get involved in their personal disputes.
examples.cn: 最好不要卷入他们的个人纠纷。

examples.en: The new curriculum places an emphasis on practical skills.
examples.cn: 新课程强调实践技能。

examples.en: Our company places an emphasis on customer satisfaction.
examples.cn: 我们公司重视客户满意度。

examples.en: His honesty is beyond all question in this matter.
examples.cn: 在这件事上，他的诚实是毫无疑问的。

examples.en: The evidence proves his innocence beyond all question.
examples.cn: 证据毫无疑问地证明了他的清白。

examples.en: I'll take a shot at solving this difficult puzzle.
examples.cn: 我会尝试解决这个难题。

examples.en: He decided to take a shot at starting his own business.
examples.cn: 他决定尝试自己创业。

examples.en: Looking at old photos helps her relive happy childhood experiences.
examples.cn: 看旧照片帮助她重温快乐的童年经历。

examples.en: He relived his travel experiences by writing a memoir.
examples.cn: 他通过写回忆录来重温旅行经历。

examples.en: I'll take you at your word that the project will be finished on time.
examples.cn: 我相信你的话，项目会按时完成。

examples.en: She took him at his word when he promised to help.
examples.cn: 当他承诺帮忙时，她相信了他的话。

examples.en: She struggled to keep pace with the fast-moving discussion.
examples.cn: 她努力跟上快速进行的讨论。

examples.en: Technology must keep pace with changing consumer demands.
examples.cn: 技术必须跟上不断变化的消费者需求。

examples.en: He remains calm in difficult situations at work.
examples.cn: 他在工作中的困难情况下保持冷静。

examples.en: In difficult situations, it's important to seek support from friends.
examples.cn: 在困难的情况下，寻求朋友的支持很重要。

examples.en: He dreams of becoming a professional football player in Europe.
examples.cn: 他梦想成为欧洲的职业足球运动员。

examples.en: The professional football player signed a lucrative contract with the team.
examples.cn: 这位职业足球运动员与球队签订了一份利润丰厚的合同。

examples.en: She made a significant contribution to the charity fundraiser.
examples.cn: 她为慈善筹款活动做出了重要贡献。

examples.en: Volunteers make a valuable contribution to community projects.
examples.cn: 志愿者为社区项目做出了宝贵的贡献。

examples.en: I was impressed with her presentation skills during the meeting.
examples.cn: 我对她在会议中的演示技巧印象深刻。

examples.en: The judges were impressed with the innovative design of the product.
examples.cn: 评委们对产品的创新设计印象深刻。

examples.en: My mom had a conniption when she saw the messy room.
examples.cn: 我妈妈看到凌乱的房间时大发雷霆。

examples.en: He'll have a conniption if he finds out about the mistake.
examples.cn: 如果他发现这个错误，他会大发雷霆的。

examples.en: The company will change over to a new software system next month.
examples.cn: 公司下个月将更换新的软件系统。

examples.en: We need to change over the old equipment for more efficient models.
examples.cn: 我们需要将旧设备更换为更高效的型号。

examples.en: She would go to any length to protect her family.
examples.cn: 她会不遗余力地保护她的家人。

examples.en: The team went to any length to win the championship.
examples.cn: 团队竭尽全力赢得冠军。

examples.en: The engineer put the new engine through its paces in various conditions.
examples.cn: 工程师在各种条件下全面测试了新发动机的性能。

examples.en: Before buying, put the car through its paces on the test drive.
examples.cn: 购买前，在试驾中全面测试这辆车的性能。

examples.en: Museums and theaters help enrich cultural lives in the city.
examples.cn: 博物馆和剧院有助于丰富城市的文化生活。

examples.en: Traveling abroad can greatly enrich one's cultural life.
examples.cn: 出国旅行可以极大地丰富一个人的文化生活。

examples.en: He made an effort to arrive on time for the appointment.
examples.cn: 他努力准时赴约。

examples.en: Please make an effort to complete the assignment by Friday.
examples.cn: 请尽力在周五前完成作业。

definitions.meaning_cn: 理解或掌握（概念、技能等）

examples.en: It took me a while to get a grasp on the new software.
examples.cn: 我花了一段时间才掌握这个新软件。

examples.en: She quickly got a grasp on the basics of calculus.
examples.cn: 她很快就掌握了微积分的基础知识。

examples.en: The manager needs to get a grasp on the project timeline.
examples.cn: 经理需要控制好项目的时间表。

examples.en: He struggled to get a grasp on his emotions during the crisis.
examples.cn: 在危机期间，他努力控制自己的情绪。

examples.en: We don't always see eye to eye on political issues.
examples.cn: 我们在政治问题上并不总是一致。

examples.en: The team saw eye to eye on the new marketing strategy.
examples.cn: 团队对新营销策略的看法一致。

definitions.meaning_cn: 外层大气（如地球的外逸层）

examples.en: Satellites orbit in the outer atmosphere of Earth.
examples.cn: 卫星在地球的外层大气中运行。

examples.en: The outer atmosphere is where atmospheric gases escape into space.
examples.cn: 外层大气是大气气体逃逸到太空的地方。

examples.en: The outer atmosphere of the meeting was tense and formal.
examples.cn: 会议的外部氛围紧张而正式。

examples.en: She felt the outer atmosphere of the city was unwelcoming.
examples.cn: 她觉得这座城市的外部氛围不友好。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have sth. hanging over one's head

definitions.meaning_cn: 有未解决的事情或威胁悬在心头

examples.en: He has a deadline hanging over his head, so he's working late.
examples.cn: 他有一个截止日期悬在心头，所以工作到很晚。

examples.en: The lawsuit has been hanging over her head for months.
examples.cn: 这场诉讼已经悬在她心头好几个月了。

examples.en: The problem is political in nature, not technical.
examples.cn: 这个问题本质上是政治性的，不是技术性的。

examples.en: Her comments were critical in nature, but constructive.
examples.cn: 她的评论本质上是批评性的，但具有建设性。

examples.en: Many chemicals found in nature are used in medicine.
examples.cn: 自然界中发现的许多化学物质被用于医药。

examples.en: Observing animals in nature can be a rewarding experience.
examples.cn: 在自然界中观察动物可能是一种有益的体验。

examples.en: She has a gift for languages and speaks five fluently.
examples.cn: 她有语言天赋，能流利地说五种语言。

examples.en: He has a gift for making people feel at ease.
examples.cn: 他有让人感到自在的天赋。

examples.en: She tends to brood over past mistakes.
examples.cn: 她倾向于忧思过去的错误。

examples.en: Don't brood over the problem; let's find a solution.
examples.cn: 不要忧思这个问题；让我们找个解决方案。

examples.en: The grocery store is within walking distance from my house.
examples.cn: 杂货店离我家步行可达。

examples.en: We chose a hotel within walking distance of the beach.
examples.cn: 我们选择了一家步行可达海滩的酒店。

definitions.meaning_cn: 火成岩（由岩浆冷却形成的岩石）

examples.en: Granite is a common type of igneous rock.
examples.cn: 花岗岩是一种常见的火成岩。

examples.en: Igneous rocks form from the solidification of molten material.
examples.cn: 火成岩由熔融物质凝固形成。

examples.en: His comments were out of line and offended many people.
examples.cn: 他的评论不当，冒犯了许多人。

examples.en: You're out of line to speak to your boss like that.
examples.cn: 你那样对老板说话是越界的。

examples.en: The books on the shelf are out of line; please straighten them.
examples.cn: 书架上的书不在一条线上；请整理一下。

examples.en: The soldiers were out of line during the inspection.
examples.cn: 士兵们在检查时队列不齐。

definitions.meaning_cn: 捕捉特殊时刻（如通过摄影）

examples.en: Photographers aim to capture special moments at weddings.
examples.cn: 摄影师旨在捕捉婚礼上的特殊时刻。

examples.en: She loves to capture special moments with her family on camera.
examples.cn: 她喜欢用相机捕捉与家人的特殊时刻。

examples.en: The museum is open to the public from 9 AM to 5 PM.
examples.cn: 博物馆从上午9点到下午5点向公众开放。

examples.en: The park will be open to the public after the renovation.
examples.cn: 公园在翻新后将向公众开放。

examples.en: He takes no interest in sports and prefers reading.
examples.cn: 他对体育不感兴趣，更喜欢阅读。

examples.en: She takes no interest in politics and avoids discussions about it.
examples.cn: 她对政治不感兴趣，避免讨论相关话题。

examples.en: Please straighten up your room before guests arrive.
examples.cn: 请在客人到来前整理好你的房间。

examples.en: He straightened up the office after the meeting.
examples.cn: 会议后他整理了办公室。

examples.en: The teacher told the students to straighten up and pay attention.
examples.cn: 老师告诉学生们端正姿势并注意听讲。

examples.en: After the warning, he straightened up and started working harder.
examples.cn: 警告后，他端正行为并开始更努力地工作。

examples.en: The company will tender for the construction project next week.
examples.cn: 这家公司下周将投标这个建设项目。

examples.en: Several firms are tendering for the government contract.
examples.cn: 几家公司正在投标政府合同。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因...而丧失能力或无法行动

examples.en: He was incapacitated with a severe flu and couldn't go to work.
examples.cn: 他因严重流感而丧失能力，无法去工作。

examples.en: The athlete was incapacitated with a knee injury during the game.
examples.cn: 运动员在比赛中因膝盖受伤而无法行动。

examples.en: This model's performance is comparable with that of higher-end versions.
examples.cn: 这个型号的性能与高端版本可比。

examples.en: Her skills are comparable with those of a professional in the field.
examples.cn: 她的技能与该领域的专业人士相似。

examples.en: Scientists are working to develop a new drug for cancer treatment.
examples.cn: 科学家们正在努力研发一种治疗癌症的新药。

examples.en: It takes years to develop a new drug and get it approved.
examples.cn: 研发一种新药并获得批准需要多年时间。

examples.en: The village is on the margin of the forest, isolated from the city.
examples.cn: 这个村庄在森林的边缘，与城市隔绝。

examples.en: His behavior is on the margin of acceptability in this community.
examples.cn: 他的行为在这个社区处于可接受的临界点。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在经济学中，指边际（如边际成本）

examples.en: The company analyzes costs on the margin of production.
examples.cn: 公司分析生产边际的成本。

examples.en: Decisions are often made on the margin of profit and loss.
examples.cn: 决策通常基于利润和损失的边际做出。

definitions.meaning_cn: 银行对账单（记录账户交易）

examples.en: I check my bank statement every month to track expenses.
examples.cn: 我每月检查银行对账单以跟踪支出。

examples.en: The bank statement showed an unauthorized transaction.
examples.cn: 银行对账单显示了一笔未经授权的交易。

examples.en: When asked about the complex theory, she was at a loss for words.
examples.cn: 当被问及这个复杂理论时，她不知如何回答。

examples.en: After the sudden resignation, the team was at a loss about how to proceed.
examples.cn: 突然辞职后，团队对如何继续感到困惑。

examples.en: The company sold the product at a loss to clear inventory.
examples.cn: 公司亏本销售该产品以清理库存。

examples.en: Due to poor sales, the store operated at a loss this quarter.
examples.cn: 由于销售不佳，这家店本季度亏损运营。

examples.en: She always complains about the noisy neighbors.
examples.cn: 她总是抱怨邻居吵闹。

examples.en: Customers complained about the slow service at the restaurant.
examples.cn: 顾客投诉餐厅服务缓慢。

examples.en: Her fashion sense is always up to the minute.
examples.cn: 她的时尚感总是最时兴的。

examples.en: The news app provides up-to-the-minute updates on global events.
examples.cn: 这个新闻应用提供全球事件的最新更新。

definitions.meaning_cn: 把...留给某人处理或负责

examples.en: The manager left the difficult project on my hands while he was away.
examples.cn: 经理离开时把这个困难项目留给我处理。

examples.en: After the party, they left all the cleaning on her hands.
examples.cn: 派对后，他们把所有的清洁工作留给她负责。

examples.en: Her success in business is due to hard work and innovation.
examples.cn: 她在商业上的成功归功于努力工作和创新。

examples.en: He achieved great success in his academic career.
examples.cn: 他在学术生涯中取得了巨大成功。

examples.en: She takes care over every detail in her artwork.
examples.cn: 她认真对待艺术作品的每一个细节。

examples.en: You should take care over the wording of the contract.
examples.cn: 你应该仔细处理合同的措辞。

examples.en: He spent a year knocking around Europe after graduation.
examples.cn: 毕业后他花了一年时间在欧洲漫游。

examples.en: We used to knock around the city on weekends.
examples.cn: 我们过去常在周末在城市里闲逛。

examples.en: The bully was known to knock around smaller kids.
examples.cn: 那个恶霸以殴打较小的孩子而闻名。

examples.en: The old furniture has been knocked around over the years.
examples.cn: 这件旧家具多年来被粗暴对待。

examples.en: Quite a number of people attended the community event.
examples.cn: 相当多的人参加了社区活动。

examples.en: She has read quite a number of books on the subject.
examples.cn: 她读了相当多关于这个主题的书。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在某人方面，由某人做出

examples.en: There was no negligence on his part in the accident.
examples.cn: 在事故中，他方面没有疏忽。

examples.en: An apology on your part would help resolve the conflict.
examples.cn: 由你做出道歉将有助于解决冲突。

examples.en: That classic novel has been out of print for decades.
examples.cn: 那部经典小说已经绝版几十年了。

examples.en: Finding a copy of the out-of-print book was a challenge.
examples.cn: 找到这本绝版书的副本是一个挑战。

examples.en: Much as I admire his work, I disagree with his methods.
examples.cn: 尽管我钦佩他的工作，但我不同意他的方法。

examples.en: Much as she wanted to go, she had to stay home.
examples.cn: 虽然她想去，但她不得不待在家里。

examples.en: What are you getting at with all these questions?
examples.cn: 你问这些问题是想暗示什么？

examples.en: I couldn't understand what he was getting at in his speech.
examples.cn: 我不明白他在演讲中意指什么。

examples.en: The cookies are on the top shelf; I can't get at them.
examples.cn: 饼干在顶层架子上，我拿不到。

examples.en: He tried to get at the truth by interviewing witnesses.
examples.cn: 他试图通过采访证人来触及真相。

examples.en: She has a good grasp on the fundamentals of physics.
examples.cn: 她很好地掌握了物理学的基础知识。

examples.en: After the training, he had a better grasp on the new software.
examples.cn: 培训后，他更好地理解了新软件。

examples.en: Please make out a check to the company for the invoice amount.
examples.cn: 请开具一张支票给公司，金额为发票数额。

examples.en: He made out a check for $100 as a donation.
examples.cn: 他开具了一张100美元的支票作为捐款。

examples.en: The plans for the event are all set and ready to go.
examples.cn: 活动的计划已全部确定，准备就绪。

examples.en: After the meeting, the date was set for the next conference.
examples.cn: 会议后，下次会议的日期已确定。

examples.en: He is set in his ways and refuses to change.
examples.cn: 他固执己见，拒绝改变。

examples.en: Her opinions are set, so it's hard to persuade her.
examples.cn: 她的观点很顽固，所以很难说服她。

examples.en: Her college career was marked by academic excellence and leadership.
examples.cn: 她的大学生涯以学术卓越和领导力为标志。

examples.en: He reflected on his college career with fond memories.
examples.cn: 他带着美好的回忆反思自己的大学生涯。

examples.en: I am going to study abroad next year.
examples.cn: 我打算明年出国留学。

examples.en: It looks like it is going to rain soon.
examples.cn: 看起来很快就要下雨了。

examples.en: The statistical calculation revealed a significant correlation between the variables.
examples.cn: 统计计算揭示了变量之间的显著相关性。

examples.en: Accurate statistical calculation is essential for valid research conclusions.
examples.cn: 准确的统计计算对于有效的研究结论至关重要。

examples.en: The test was dead easy; I finished it in ten minutes.
examples.cn: 这次测试极其容易，我十分钟就完成了。

examples.en: Fixing that issue is dead easy with the right tools.
examples.cn: 用合适的工具解决那个问题极其容易。

examples.en: Countries are shifting towards a knowledge-based economy to boost innovation.
examples.cn: 各国正在转向知识经济以促进创新。

examples.en: In a knowledge-based economy, intellectual capital is more valuable than physical assets.
examples.cn: 在知识经济中，智力资本比实物资产更有价值。

examples.en: The store is close to my house, so I walk there often.
examples.cn: 这家商店离我家很近，所以我经常步行去那里。

examples.en: She is close to her sister and shares everything with her.
examples.cn: 她和姐姐关系亲密，什么都分享。

examples.en: The project is close to completion after months of hard work.
examples.cn: 经过数月的努力，这个项目已接近完成。

examples.en: He was close to tears when he heard the sad news.
examples.cn: 听到这个悲伤的消息时，他几乎要哭了。

examples.en: Here you are, your coffee as requested.
examples.cn: 给你，你要的咖啡。

examples.en: Here you are, the documents you needed for the meeting.
examples.cn: 给你，会议所需的文件。

examples.en: Here you are! I've been looking for you everywhere.
examples.cn: 你在这里！我到处找你。

examples.en: Here you are, hiding in the library as usual.
examples.cn: 你在这里，像往常一样躲在图书馆里。

examples.en: I feel at ease when I'm surrounded by my family.
examples.cn: 和家人在一起时，我感到很自在。

examples.en: The cozy atmosphere made everyone feel at ease during the party.
examples.cn: 温馨的氛围让每个人在派对上感到放松。

examples.en: Meteorologists use advanced models to predict weather accurately.
examples.cn: 气象学家使用先进模型来准确预测天气。

examples.en: It's challenging to predict weather in mountainous regions due to rapid changes.
examples.cn: 由于变化迅速，预测山区的天气具有挑战性。

examples.en: The tragic event led him to commit suicide out of despair.
examples.cn: 这场悲剧事件使他因绝望而自杀。

examples.en: It's important to seek help if someone is considering to commit suicide.
examples.cn: 如果有人考虑自杀，寻求帮助很重要。

examples.en: She saves a portion of her salary for a rainy day.
examples.cn: 她把一部分工资存起来以备不时之需。

examples.en: Having an emergency fund is like saving for a rainy day.
examples.cn: 拥有应急基金就像为不时之需存钱。

examples.en: The university offers a specialized course in artificial intelligence.
examples.cn: 这所大学提供人工智能的专业课程。

examples.en: Taking a specialized course can enhance your career prospects.
examples.cn: 参加专业课程可以提升你的职业前景。

examples.en: The plan is cost-effective; on the other hand, it might be time-consuming.
examples.cn: 这个计划成本效益高；另一方面，它可能耗时。

examples.en: He loves the city life, but on the other hand, he misses the countryside.
examples.cn: 他喜欢城市生活，但另一方面，他怀念乡村。

examples.en: His rude comments really got my hackles up during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他粗鲁的评论在会议上真的激怒了我。

examples.en: Criticism from strangers tends to get her hackles up quickly.
examples.cn: 陌生人的批评往往会迅速激怒她。

examples.en: She received an award in recognition of her charitable work.
examples.cn: 她因慈善工作获得表彰。

examples.en: The ceremony was held in recognition of the team's outstanding achievements.
examples.cn: 举行仪式是为了表彰团队的杰出成就。

examples.en: Managing this project is going to give me gray hairs with all its problems.
examples.cn: 管理这个项目会因所有问题让我烦恼变老。

examples.en: Parents often get gray hairs worrying about their children's safety.
examples.cn: 父母常因担心孩子的安全而烦恼。

examples.en: This fruit is rich in vitamins and antioxidants.
examples.cn: 这种水果富含维生素和抗氧化剂。

examples.en: The region is rich in natural resources like oil and minerals.
examples.cn: 该地区富含石油和矿产等自然资源。

examples.en: After the betrayal, she hated his guts and never spoke to him again.
examples.cn: 背叛之后，她极度憎恨他，再也不和他说话。

examples.en: The two rivals hate each other's guts and constantly argue.
examples.cn: 这两个对手极度憎恨对方，经常争吵。

examples.en: I got a Charley horse in my calf while running this morning.
examples.cn: 今天早上跑步时，我的小腿抽筋了。

examples.en: Dehydration can cause you to get a Charley horse during exercise.
examples.cn: 脱水可能导致你在运动时腿部抽筋。

examples.en: Be careful not to slip up on the details during the presentation.
examples.cn: 小心不要在演示中细节上犯错误。

examples.en: Everyone slips up sometimes; it's important to learn from it.
examples.cn: 每个人有时都会失误；重要的是从中学习。

examples.en: She gasped in surprise when she saw the unexpected gift.
examples.cn: 看到意外的礼物时，她惊讶地倒吸一口气。

examples.en: He looked at me in surprise after hearing the shocking news.
examples.cn: 听到这个令人震惊的消息后，他惊讶地看着我。

examples.en: Hang on a moment, I'll be right back with your order.
examples.cn: 稍等片刻，我马上把你的订单拿来。

examples.en: Can you hang on while I check the schedule?
examples.cn: 我查看日程时，你能稍等一下吗？

examples.en: Hang on tight during the roller coaster ride!
examples.cn: 坐过山车时要抓紧！

examples.en: She had to hang on to her job despite the difficulties.
examples.cn: 尽管困难重重，她必须坚持工作。

examples.en: The marketing team must work closely with the sales department to launch the new product.
examples.cn: 营销团队必须与销售部门密切合作以推出新产品。

examples.en: As a project manager, I work closely with stakeholders to ensure alignment.
examples.cn: 作为项目经理，我与利益相关者密切合作以确保一致性。

definitions.meaning_cn: 突然爆发成（如皮疹、笑声等）

examples.en: After eating shellfish, she broke out into hives all over her arms.
examples.cn: 吃了贝类后，她手臂上突然起了荨麻疹。

examples.en: The comedian's joke made the audience break out into uncontrollable laughter.
examples.cn: 喜剧演员的笑话让观众爆发出无法控制的笑声。

examples.en: The large meeting broke out into smaller discussion groups.
examples.cn: 大型会议分裂成几个小型讨论组。

examples.en: The protest broke out into chaos as tensions escalated.
examples.cn: 随着紧张局势升级，抗议活动分裂成混乱状态。

examples.en: Safety concerns must take precedence over production deadlines in the factory.
examples.cn: 工厂中安全问题必须优先于生产截止日期。

examples.en: In emergency situations, patient care takes precedence over administrative paperwork.
examples.cn: 在紧急情况下，患者护理优先于行政文书工作。

examples.en: The retailer marks up the wholesale price by 50% to cover overhead costs.
examples.cn: 零售商将批发价加价50%以覆盖间接成本。

examples.en: Luxury brands often mark up their products significantly compared to production costs.
examples.cn: 奢侈品牌通常相比生产成本大幅加价其产品。

examples.en: Please mark up the document with your corrections before sending it back.
examples.cn: 请在发回前用你的修正标记文档。

examples.en: The editor marked up the manuscript with suggestions for improvement.
examples.cn: 编辑用改进建议标记了手稿。

examples.en: The siblings often argue over who gets to use the car on weekends.
examples.cn: 兄弟姐妹经常为谁在周末用车而争吵。

examples.en: Politicians argue over budget allocations during the legislative session.
examples.cn: 政客们在立法会议期间为预算分配争论。

examples.en: The cherry trees are in blossom, attracting many tourists to the park.
examples.cn: 樱花树正在盛开，吸引了许多游客到公园。

examples.en: In spring, the garden is in blossom with colorful flowers everywhere.
examples.cn: 春天，花园里到处盛开着五颜六色的花朵。

examples.en: Her artistic career is in blossom, with several exhibitions planned this year.
examples.cn: 她的艺术事业正处于鼎盛时期，今年计划举办多场展览。

examples.en: The tech startup is in blossom, rapidly expanding its market share.
examples.cn: 这家科技初创公司正处于繁荣期，迅速扩大市场份额。

examples.en: The New York metropolitan area includes parts of New Jersey and Connecticut.
examples.cn: 纽约大都市区包括新泽西州和康涅狄格州的部分地区。

examples.en: Living in a metropolitan area often means higher costs but more job opportunities.
examples.cn: 生活在大都市区通常意味着更高的成本但更多的工作机会。

examples.en: Please take down the main points from the meeting in the minutes.
examples.cn: 请在会议记录中记下会议要点。

examples.en: She quickly took down the phone number before forgetting it.
examples.cn: 她迅速记下电话号码以免忘记。

examples.en: After the party, we need to take down the decorations from the walls.
examples.cn: 派对后，我们需要从墙上取下装饰品。

examples.en: The old billboard was taken down to make way for new construction.
examples.cn: 旧广告牌被拆除以为新建筑让路。

examples.en: The police worked together to take down the criminal organization.
examples.cn: 警方合作击败了犯罪组织。

examples.en: In the debate, she took down her opponent with strong arguments.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她用强有力的论点击败了对手。

examples.en: The corrupt official was found to be in league with local gangsters.
examples.cn: 发现这名腐败官员与当地黑帮勾结。

examples.en: Rumors suggest the company is in league with competitors to fix prices.
examples.cn: 有传言称该公司与竞争对手勾结以固定价格。

examples.en: Up to now, we have received over 100 applications for the position.
examples.cn: 到目前为止，我们已经收到100多份该职位的申请。

examples.en: The project is on schedule up to now, but delays may occur later.
examples.cn: 迄今项目按计划进行，但后期可能出现延误。

examples.en: In the play, she will take the role of the queen, requiring extensive rehearsal.
examples.cn: 在剧中，她将担任女王的角色，需要大量排练。

examples.en: He agreed to take the role of team leader for the new project.
examples.cn: 他同意为新项目担任团队领导的角色。

examples.en: She decided to join the choir at her church to improve her singing skills.
examples.cn: 她决定加入教堂的合唱团以提高歌唱技巧。

examples.en: After auditioning, he was excited to join the choir for the holiday concert.
examples.cn: 试听后，他兴奋地加入合唱团参加假日音乐会。

definitions.meaning_cn: 加入（支持某观点的）群体

examples.en: Many environmentalists have joined the choir advocating for renewable energy.
examples.cn: 许多环保主义者加入了倡导可再生能源的群体。

examples.en: Politicians often join the choir of critics during public debates.
examples.cn: 政客们在公开辩论中经常加入批评者的群体。

examples.en: She took her mentor's advice to heart and made significant changes in her career.
examples.cn: 她认真对待导师的建议，并在职业生涯中做出了重大改变。

examples.en: He took the criticism to heart, using it as motivation to improve.
examples.cn: 他把批评放在心上，将其作为改进的动力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 出现新转折，发生新变化

examples.en: The negotiations took a new turn when a third party intervened.
examples.cn: 当第三方介入时，谈判出现了新转折。

examples.en: Her life took a new turn after she moved to a different country.
examples.cn: 移居不同国家后，她的生活发生了新变化。

examples.en: The dove is often considered the symbol of peace in many cultures.
examples.cn: 在许多文化中，鸽子常被视为和平的象征。

examples.en: The Eiffel Tower has become the symbol of Paris and French elegance.
examples.cn: 埃菲尔铁塔已成为巴黎和法国优雅的象征。

examples.en: Meteorologists warn of severe thunderstorms approaching the coastal area.
examples.cn: 气象学家警告沿海地区将有严重雷暴。

examples.en: The label warns of potential side effects if the medication is misused.
examples.cn: 标签警告如果药物误用可能产生副作用。

definitions.meaning_cn: 要么接受要么放弃，不容讨价还价

examples.en: This is my final offer—take it or leave it, no further discussions.
examples.cn: 这是我的最终报价——要么接受要么放弃，没有进一步讨论。

examples.en: When buying the car, the seller said the price is fixed, take it or leave it.
examples.cn: 买车时，卖家说价格固定，不容讨价还价。

examples.en: She wrote helpful notes in the margin of her textbook during lectures.
examples.cn: 她在讲座期间在教科书页边空白处写了有用的笔记。

examples.en: The editor's comments were scribbled in the margin of the manuscript.
examples.cn: 编辑的评论潦草地写在手稿的页边空白处。

examples.en: The candidate won the election in the margin, by just a few hundred votes.
examples.cn: 候选人以微弱优势赢得选举，仅多几百票。

examples.en: The team lost the game in the margin, with a final score of 98-100.
examples.cn: 球队以微弱劣势输掉比赛，最终比分98-100。

examples.en: As a journalist, she must keep abreast of current events to report accurately.
examples.cn: 作为记者，她必须了解时事最新情况以准确报道。

examples.en: Professionals in tech need to keep abreast of new software developments.
examples.cn: 科技行业的专业人士需要跟上新软件发展的最新情况。

examples.en: Engineering and construction are often considered male-dominated industries.
examples.cn: 工程和建筑通常被认为是男性主导的行业。

examples.en: She broke barriers by succeeding in a male-dominated industry like finance.
examples.cn: 她在金融这样的男性主导行业中取得成功，打破了障碍。

examples.en: If you break the rules, you'll get what for from the teacher.
examples.cn: 如果你违反规则，老师会惩罚你的。

examples.en: He got what for when his boss found out about the mistake.
examples.cn: 当老板发现错误时，他受到了责备。

examples.en: The journalist was tipped off about the scandal by an anonymous source.
examples.cn: 记者从一个匿名消息来源那里得到了关于丑闻的提示。

examples.en: Police were tipped off about the planned robbery.
examples.cn: 警方提前得到了关于计划抢劫的警告。

examples.en: She gave me a tip-off about the upcoming sale.
examples.cn: 她给了我一个关于即将到来的促销的提示。

examples.en: The tip-off led to the arrest of the suspect.
examples.cn: 这个线索导致了嫌疑人的逮捕。

valid_entries.original_phrase: remind sb. not to do sth.

examples.en: I reminded him not to forget his keys.
examples.cn: 我提醒他不要忘记带钥匙。

examples.en: She reminded the children not to run in the hallway.
examples.cn: 她提醒孩子们不要在走廊里跑。

examples.en: Have an eye out for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
examples.cn: 留意社区里任何可疑的活动。

examples.en: I'll have an eye out for a good deal on a new car.
examples.cn: 我会留意新车的好交易。

examples.en: To date, no one has solved this complex puzzle.
examples.cn: 迄今为止，没有人解决这个复杂的谜题。

examples.en: The project has been successful to date.
examples.cn: 这个项目迄今为止是成功的。

examples.en: They have been dating for three months.
examples.cn: 他们已经约会三个月了。

examples.en: She doesn't want to date anyone right now.
examples.cn: 她现在不想和任何人约会。

examples.en: He got the boot after missing too many deadlines.
examples.cn: 他在错过太多截止日期后被解雇了。

examples.en: If you're late again, you might get the boot.
examples.cn: 如果你再迟到，可能会被开除。

examples.en: I couldn't get to sleep because of the noise outside.
examples.cn: 因为外面的噪音，我无法入睡。

examples.en: She finally got to sleep after reading a book.
examples.cn: 在读书后，她终于入睡了。

examples.en: We discussed the pros and cons of moving to a new city.
examples.cn: 我们讨论了搬到新城市的优点和缺点。

examples.en: Before making a decision, list all the pros and cons.
examples.cn: 在做决定之前，列出所有的优点和缺点。

examples.en: The school's cross-country race is held every autumn.
examples.cn: 学校的越野赛跑每年秋天举行。

examples.en: She trained hard for the cross-country race.
examples.cn: 她为越野赛跑努力训练。

examples.en: Scarcely had I left the house when it started to rain.
examples.cn: 我一离开房子，天就开始下雨了。

examples.en: Scarcely had she finished speaking when the phone rang.
examples.cn: 她一说完话，电话就响了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 维持家庭正常运转（尤指在家人离开时）

examples.en: While he was away on business, she kept the home fires burning.
examples.cn: 当他出差时，她维持着家庭的正常运转。

examples.en: They kept the home fires burning during the difficult times.
examples.cn: 在困难时期，他们维持着家庭的稳定。

examples.en: He offered a drink to the guest.
examples.cn: 他向客人提供了一杯饮料。

examples.en: The company offered a promotion to the employee.
examples.cn: 公司向员工提供了一个晋升机会。

examples.en: I made the acquaintance of several interesting people at the conference.
examples.cn: 我在会议上结识了几位有趣的人。

examples.en: She was delighted to make the acquaintance of the famous author.
examples.cn: 她很高兴能结识这位著名作家。

examples.en: He moved up to a managerial position after years of hard work.
examples.cn: 经过多年的努力工作，他晋升到了管理职位。

examples.en: Please move up so others can sit down.
examples.cn: 请向上移动，以便其他人可以坐下。

examples.en: The meeting was moved up to an earlier time.
examples.cn: 会议被提前到了更早的时间。

examples.en: She moved up to a higher level in her studies.
examples.cn: 她在学习中升级到了更高的水平。

examples.en: She enjoys keeping company with her friends on weekends.
examples.cn: 她喜欢在周末与朋友们交往。

examples.en: He kept company with some influential people.
examples.cn: 他与一些有影响力的人交往。

examples.en: She showed sympathy for the victims of the disaster.
examples.cn: 她对灾难的受害者表示同情。

examples.en: He showed sympathy for her difficult situation.
examples.cn: 他对她的困难处境表示同情。

examples.en: This dress is suitable for a formal occasion.
examples.cn: 这件连衣裙适合正式场合。

examples.en: The candidate is suitable for the job.
examples.cn: 这位候选人适合这份工作。

examples.en: The teacher read out the instructions to the class.
examples.cn: 老师向全班大声读出了指示。

examples.en: He read out the list of winners.
examples.cn: 他大声读出了获奖者名单。

examples.en: Companies that violate environmental laws face heavy fines.
examples.cn: 违反环境法的公司面临巨额罚款。

examples.en: He was arrested for violating traffic laws while driving under the influence.
examples.cn: 他因酒驾违反交通法规而被捕。

examples.en: The government raised interest rates in reaction to rising inflation.
examples.cn: 政府为应对通胀上升而提高了利率。

examples.en: She started exercising daily in reaction to her doctor's advice.
examples.cn: 她听从医生的建议，开始每天锻炼。

examples.en: Patients must consent to the surgery before the procedure can begin.
examples.cn: 患者必须在手术开始前同意接受手术。

examples.en: The landlord consented to the tenant's request for a pet.
examples.cn: 房东同意了租客养宠物的请求。

examples.en: Online courses allow students to learn at their own pace.
examples.cn: 在线课程允许学生按照自己的节奏学习。

examples.en: After the injury, he recovered at his own pace without rushing.
examples.cn: 受伤后，他按照自己的节奏恢复，没有急于求成。

examples.en: He worked extra hours to get out from under his debt.
examples.cn: 他加班工作以摆脱债务负担。

examples.en: She moved to a new city to get out from under her overbearing family.
examples.cn: 她搬到了一个新城市，以摆脱专横的家庭控制。

examples.en: The elevator's upward motion was smooth and fast.
examples.cn: 电梯的向上运动平稳而快速。

examples.en: In physics class, we studied the upward motion of a projectile.
examples.cn: 在物理课上，我们研究了抛射体的向上运动。

examples.en: Through rigorous training, she got the edge on her competitors in the race.
examples.cn: 通过严格训练，她在比赛中获得了对竞争对手的优势。

examples.en: His innovative strategy helped the company get the edge on its rivals.
examples.cn: 他的创新策略帮助公司获得了对竞争对手的优势。

examples.en: In the debate, her logical arguments got the best of her opponent.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她逻辑严密的论点战胜了对手。

examples.en: Despite the challenges, his determination got the best of the obstacles.
examples.cn: 尽管面临挑战，他的决心战胜了障碍。

examples.en: His anger got the best of him, and he shouted at his friend.
examples.cn: 愤怒使他失控，他对朋友大喊大叫。

examples.en: Fear got the best of her, and she couldn't complete the task.
examples.cn: 恐惧使她失控，她无法完成任务。

examples.en: After several failures, he began to lose heart and considered giving up.
examples.cn: 几次失败后，他开始失去信心，考虑放弃。

examples.en: Don't lose heart; keep trying and you'll eventually succeed.
examples.cn: 不要灰心，继续努力，你最终会成功的。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get the upper hand on sb.

definitions.meaning_cn: 获得对某人的优势或控制

examples.en: In the negotiation, our team got the upper hand on the other party by being well-prepared.
examples.cn: 在谈判中，我们团队通过充分准备获得了对另一方的优势。

examples.en: The detective got the upper hand on the suspect by uncovering new evidence.
examples.cn: 侦探通过发现新证据获得了对嫌疑人的优势。

examples.en: Pollution has caused irreversible damage to the coral reefs.
examples.cn: 污染对珊瑚礁造成了不可逆转的损害。

examples.en: The stroke resulted in irreversible damage to his brain functions.
examples.cn: 中风导致他的大脑功能受到不可逆转的损害。

examples.en: She decided to pursue a hobby in painting to relax after work.
examples.cn: 她决定从事绘画爱好，以便下班后放松。

examples.en: Many people pursue hobbies like gardening or cooking in their free time.
examples.cn: 许多人在空闲时间从事园艺或烹饪等爱好。

examples.en: He got his start in the film industry as a production assistant.
examples.cn: 他作为制片助理开始了在电影行业的职业生涯。

examples.en: Many entrepreneurs get their start by launching small businesses.
examples.cn: 许多企业家通过创办小企业开始他们的职业生涯。

definitions.meaning_cn: 得到应得的报应（通常指惩罚）

examples.en: After cheating for years, he finally got what was coming to him when he was caught.
examples.cn: 多年作弊后，他被抓住时终于得到了应得的报应。

examples.en: If you treat people poorly, you'll eventually get what's coming to you.
examples.cn: 如果你对待别人不好，你最终会得到应得的报应。

examples.en: We baked a chocolate birthday cake for her party.
examples.cn: 我们为她的派对烤了一个巧克力生日蛋糕。

examples.en: It's tradition to blow out candles on a birthday cake and make a wish.
examples.cn: 吹灭生日蛋糕上的蜡烛并许愿是传统。

definitions.meaning_cn: 通过正式渠道工作或沟通

examples.en: To get approval, you need to work through channels by submitting a formal request.
examples.cn: 要获得批准，你需要通过提交正式请求来通过正式渠道工作。

examples.en: In large organizations, it's important to work through channels to avoid confusion.
examples.cn: 在大型组织中，通过正式渠道工作以避免混乱很重要。

examples.en: He attended a vocational school to learn automotive repair skills.
examples.cn: 他上了一所职业学校学习汽车维修技能。

examples.en: Vocational schools offer practical training for careers like nursing or plumbing.
examples.cn: 职业学校为护理或管道工等职业提供实践培训。

examples.en: The two boxers had at each other in the ring.
examples.cn: 两名拳击手在拳击台上互相攻击。

examples.en: She had at the project with enthusiasm, finishing it quickly.
examples.cn: 她热情地开始做这个项目，很快就完成了。

examples.en: After her father retired, she took over his business and expanded it.
examples.cn: 父亲退休后，她接管了他的生意并扩大了规模。

examples.en: The larger company offered to take over his business through a merger.
examples.cn: 那家更大的公司提出通过合并接管他的生意。

examples.en: I can see through his lies easily.
examples.cn: 我能轻易看穿他的谎言。

examples.en: She saw through the scam immediately.
examples.cn: 她立刻识破了这个骗局。

examples.en: We must see through this project despite the challenges.
examples.cn: 尽管有挑战，我们必须坚持完成这个项目。

examples.en: He saw through his promise to help her.
examples.cn: 他贯彻到底，兑现了帮助她的承诺。

examples.en: Rigid rules can stifle creativity in the workplace.
examples.cn: 僵化的规则可能会抑制工作场所的创造力。

examples.en: The teacher avoided stifling creativity by encouraging free expression.
examples.cn: 老师通过鼓励自由表达来避免抑制创造力。

examples.en: She finds it easy to make friends at new schools.
examples.cn: 她发现在新学校很容易交朋友。

examples.en: He made friends with his neighbors after moving in.
examples.cn: 搬进来后，他和邻居们交了朋友。

definitions.meaning_cn: 祝你好运（常用于表演前）

examples.en: Break a leg! I know you'll do great in the play.
examples.cn: 祝你好运！我知道你在剧中会表现得很棒。

examples.en: Before the concert, they told her, "Break a leg!"
examples.cn: 音乐会前，他们对她说：“祝你好运！”

examples.en: He fell head over heels in love with her at first sight.
examples.cn: 他对她一见钟情，神魂颠倒。

examples.en: They've been head over heels for each other since college.
examples.cn: 他们从大学起就深陷爱河。

examples.en: She's head over heels committed to her new job.
examples.cn: 她完全投入到新工作中。

examples.en: The company went head over heels into the new market.
examples.cn: 公司彻底进入了新市场。

examples.en: She exercises regularly to keep a good body shape.
examples.cn: 她定期锻炼以保持良好体型。

examples.en: Eating balanced meals helps him keep a good body shape.
examples.cn: 均衡饮食帮助他保持良好体型。

examples.en: Rumors go round quickly in small towns.
examples.cn: 谣言在小镇上流传得很快。

examples.en: He likes to go round and visit friends on weekends.
examples.cn: 他喜欢在周末四处走动拜访朋友。

examples.en: There's enough cake to go round for everyone.
examples.cn: 蛋糕足够分配给每个人。

examples.en: The supplies didn't go round, so some people went without.
examples.cn: 物资不够分配，所以有些人没有分到。

examples.en: We save on electricity by using LED bulbs.
examples.cn: 我们使用LED灯泡来节省电费。

examples.en: Buying in bulk helps save on grocery costs.
examples.cn: 批量购买有助于节省杂货费用。

examples.en: The child has a temperature and needs to rest.
examples.cn: 这孩子发烧了，需要休息。

examples.en: If you have a temperature, you should see a doctor.
examples.cn: 如果你发烧了，应该去看医生。

examples.en: We're in no hurry to finish the project; quality matters more.
examples.cn: 我们不着急完成项目；质量更重要。

examples.en: She was in no hurry, so she took a leisurely walk.
examples.cn: 她不着急，所以悠闲地散步。

examples.en: Many employees now work from home due to the pandemic.
examples.cn: 由于疫情，许多员工现在在家工作。

examples.en: She prefers to work from home to avoid commuting.
examples.cn: 她更喜欢在家工作以避免通勤。

examples.en: His statement, by implication, criticized the policy.
examples.cn: 他的声明含蓄地批评了这项政策。

examples.en: The contract's terms are understood by implication.
examples.cn: 合同的条款是通过暗示来理解的。

examples.en: After dinner, it's your turn to wash up.
examples.cn: 晚餐后，轮到你洗餐具了。

examples.en: She washed up the plates and put them away.
examples.cn: 她洗了盘子并把它们收好。

examples.en: The debris washed up on the beach after the storm.
examples.cn: 风暴后，残骸被冲上了海滩。

examples.en: A whale carcass washed up near the shore.
examples.cn: 一具鲸鱼尸体被冲到了岸边附近。

examples.en: The boxer knocked out his opponent in the third round.
examples.cn: 拳击手在第三回合击倒了对手。

examples.en: The blow knocked him out cold.
examples.cn: 这一击使他昏迷不醒。

examples.en: She knocked out the report in just an hour.
examples.cn: 她仅用一小时就快速完成了报告。

examples.en: He knocked out a beautiful painting for the exhibition.
examples.cn: 他为展览出色地制作了一幅美丽的画作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 接受或顺从于某种不愉快的情况

examples.en: After losing the election, he had to resign himself to being in the opposition.
examples.cn: 选举失败后，他不得不接受成为反对派的事实。

examples.en: She resigned herself to the fact that her flight was cancelled due to bad weather.
examples.cn: 她接受了航班因恶劣天气被取消的事实。

examples.en: The old CEO is on the way out, and a new one will take over next month.
examples.cn: 老CEO即将离职，新CEO下个月将接任。

examples.en: This fashion trend is on the way out; people are starting to prefer more classic styles.
examples.cn: 这种时尚潮流即将过时，人们开始更喜欢经典风格。

examples.en: Many traditional crafts are on the way out due to modernization.
examples.cn: 由于现代化，许多传统手工艺正濒临消失。

examples.en: That species of bird is on the way out because of habitat loss.
examples.cn: 由于栖息地丧失，那种鸟类正濒临灭绝。

examples.en: Can you take a look at my report and give me some feedback?
examples.cn: 你能看一下我的报告并给我一些反馈吗？

examples.en: The mechanic will take a look at the engine to diagnose the problem.
examples.cn: 机械师将检查发动机以诊断问题。

examples.en: He has a tendency towards procrastination when faced with difficult tasks.
examples.cn: 面对困难任务时，他有拖延的倾向。

examples.en: There is a growing tendency towards remote work in many industries.
examples.cn: 许多行业越来越倾向于远程工作。

examples.en: Employees who obtain job satisfaction are more likely to stay with the company long-term.
examples.cn: 获得工作满足感的员工更有可能长期留在公司。

examples.en: She obtained job satisfaction by working on projects that aligned with her values.
examples.cn: 她通过从事符合自己价值观的项目获得了工作满足感。

examples.en: I enjoy working with my colleagues because they are supportive and creative.
examples.cn: 我喜欢与同事合作，因为他们支持性强且富有创造力。

examples.en: She works with a team of experts to develop new software.
examples.cn: 她与专家团队合作开发新软件。

examples.en: He works with various tools to repair cars in his garage.
examples.cn: 他在车库里使用各种工具修理汽车。

examples.en: The artist works with clay to create beautiful sculptures.
examples.cn: 这位艺术家用粘土创作美丽的雕塑。

definitions.meaning_cn: 适合或易于用于某种目的

examples.en: This quiet room lends itself to focused study sessions.
examples.cn: 这个安静的房间适合专注的学习会议。

examples.en: The flexible material lends itself to a variety of creative uses.
examples.cn: 这种柔性材料易于用于各种创意用途。

examples.en: Decisions are made on the basis of thorough research and analysis.
examples.cn: 决策基于彻底的研究和分析。

examples.en: She was hired on the basis of her impressive qualifications and experience.
examples.cn: 她基于其令人印象深刻的资格和经验被聘用。

examples.en: Her eyes brimmed over with tears when she heard the good news.
examples.cn: 当她听到好消息时，她的眼睛充满了泪水。

examples.en: The cup was so full that it brimmed over when he tried to carry it.
examples.cn: 杯子太满了，他试图端起来时溢了出来。

examples.en: After a few tries, she got the hang of riding a bicycle.
examples.cn: 几次尝试后，她掌握了骑自行车的技巧。

examples.en: It took him a while to get the hang of using the new software.
examples.cn: 他花了一段时间才熟悉使用新软件。

examples.en: He has a habit of checking his phone first thing in the morning.
examples.cn: 他有早上第一件事就是查看手机的习惯。

examples.en: She has a habit of biting her nails when she's nervous.
examples.cn: 她紧张时有咬指甲的习惯。

examples.en: Keep your eye out for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
examples.cn: 留意社区里任何可疑的活动。

examples.en: I'll keep my eye out for a good deal on flights to Europe.
examples.cn: 我会留意飞往欧洲的航班优惠。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为某事腾出空间或时间

examples.en: We need to make room for the new furniture in the living room.
examples.cn: 我们需要在客厅为新家具腾出空间。

examples.en: She made room in her schedule to attend the important meeting.
examples.cn: 她在日程中腾出时间参加重要会议。

examples.en: He took a course to improve his job skills in data analysis.
examples.cn: 他参加了一门课程来提高数据分析的工作技能。

examples.en: Regular training helps employees improve their job skills and stay competitive.
examples.cn: 定期培训帮助员工提高工作技能并保持竞争力。

examples.en: We need to make arrangements to meet with the client next week.
examples.cn: 我们需要安排下周与客户会面。

examples.en: She made arrangements to travel abroad for her vacation.
examples.cn: 她安排了出国旅行度假。

valid_entries.original_phrase: turn a blind eye to sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事视而不见或故意忽略

examples.en: The manager turned a blind eye to the minor safety violations.
examples.cn: 经理对轻微的安全违规行为视而不见。

examples.en: Parents should not turn a blind eye to their children's bad behavior.
examples.cn: 父母不应对孩子的不良行为视而不见。

examples.en: The bright lighting brings out the colors in the painting.
examples.cn: 明亮的灯光使画中的颜色显现出来。

examples.en: This exercise brings out the best in team collaboration.
examples.cn: 这个练习突出了团队协作的最佳状态。

examples.en: The company plans to bring out a new product line next year.
examples.cn: 公司计划明年推出新的产品线。

examples.en: She brought out her first book last month to critical acclaim.
examples.cn: 她上个月出版了第一本书，获得了评论界的好评。

examples.en: By contrast to last year's profits, this year's results are disappointing.
examples.cn: 与去年的利润相比，今年的结果令人失望。

examples.en: Her calm demeanor is by contrast to his nervous energy.
examples.cn: 她冷静的举止与他紧张的能量形成对比。

examples.en: Rumors about the merger are going around the office.
examples.cn: 关于合并的谣言在办公室里传播。

examples.en: He likes to go around the city exploring new neighborhoods.
examples.cn: 他喜欢在城市里四处走动探索新社区。

examples.en: There aren't enough chairs to go around for all the guests.
examples.cn: 椅子不够分配给所有客人。

examples.en: Make sure the food goes around so everyone gets a share.
examples.cn: 确保食物足够分配，让每个人都能分到一份。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在不损害某事的情况下

examples.en: The agreement was made without prejudice to future negotiations.
examples.cn: 达成协议时未损害未来的谈判。

examples.en: She accepted the offer without prejudice to her legal rights.
examples.cn: 她接受了提议，但未损害其法律权利。

examples.en: She is in charge of the marketing department.
examples.cn: 她负责市场营销部门。

examples.en: Who will be in charge of the project while you're away?
examples.cn: 你不在时谁将负责这个项目？

examples.en: He attended a prestigious boarding school in England.
examples.cn: 他在英国上了一所著名的寄宿学校。

examples.en: Boarding schools often provide a structured environment for students.
examples.cn: 寄宿学校通常为学生提供结构化的环境。

examples.en: Social norms vary greatly between different cultures.
examples.cn: 不同文化之间的社会规范差异很大。

examples.en: It's important to understand the social norms when visiting a foreign country.
examples.cn: 访问外国时，了解社会规范很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为纪念某人，向某人致敬

examples.en: A ceremony was held in his honor for his lifetime achievements.
examples.cn: 为纪念他一生的成就，举行了一场仪式。

examples.en: They named the building in her honor.
examples.cn: 他们以她的名字命名了这座建筑。

examples.en: The building's internal metal skeleton provides structural support.
examples.cn: 建筑物的内部金属骨架提供结构支撑。

examples.en: Some animals have an internal metal skeleton made of bone.
examples.cn: 一些动物有由骨头构成的内部金属骨架。

examples.en: The factory had to close down due to financial difficulties.
examples.cn: 由于财务困难，工厂不得不关闭。

examples.en: They decided to close down the store after 50 years in business.
examples.cn: 在经营50年后，他们决定关闭这家商店。

examples.en: There were loads of people at the concert.
examples.cn: 音乐会上有很多人。

examples.en: She has loads of experience in this field.
examples.cn: 她在这个领域有很多经验。

examples.en: The new policy is expected to bring about significant changes.
examples.cn: 新政策预计将带来重大变化。

examples.en: His actions brought about the company's downfall.
examples.cn: 他的行为导致了公司的垮台。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get sth. out of one's system

definitions.meaning_cn: 发泄，摆脱某种情绪或冲动

examples.en: He went for a run to get his anger out of his system.
examples.cn: 他去跑步以发泄愤怒。

examples.en: Sometimes you need to cry to get it out of your system.
examples.cn: 有时你需要哭出来以摆脱这种情绪。

examples.en: The firefighters have the blaze under control.
examples.cn: 消防员已经控制住了火势。

examples.en: She has her emotions under control during the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议期间控制住了自己的情绪。

examples.en: I am proud to be part of this team.
examples.cn: 我为成为这个团队的一员感到自豪。

examples.en: She is proud to have graduated from that university.
examples.cn: 她为从那所大学毕业感到自豪。

examples.en: The ownership of the land is still in dispute.
examples.cn: 这块土地的所有权仍有争议。

examples.en: The two companies are in dispute over the patent.
examples.cn: 这两家公司就专利问题存在争议。

examples.en: Thank goodness for the rain, it cooled everything down.
examples.cn: 幸亏下雨了，它让一切都凉快下来。

examples.en: Thank goodness for modern medicine, it saved his life.
examples.cn: 感谢现代医学，它救了他的命。

examples.en: The store was fined for selling shoddy goods.
examples.cn: 这家商店因销售劣质商品被罚款。

examples.en: Be careful not to buy shoddy goods online.
examples.cn: 小心不要在网上购买劣质商品。

examples.en: We have enough resources in hand to complete the project.
examples.cn: 我们手头有足够的资源来完成这个项目。

examples.en: The situation is in hand, so don't worry.
examples.cn: 情况在控制中，所以不用担心。

examples.en: The floodwaters carried away several cars.
examples.cn: 洪水冲走了几辆车。

examples.en: Don't get carried away by your success.
examples.cn: 不要被成功冲昏头脑。

examples.en: The government plans to impose a tobacco tax to reduce smoking.
examples.cn: 政府计划征收烟草税以减少吸烟。

examples.en: Many countries impose a tobacco tax as a public health measure.
examples.cn: 许多国家征收烟草税作为公共卫生措施。

examples.en: She brought a new perspective into the discussion.
examples.cn: 她为讨论带来了新的视角。

examples.en: The company brought new technology into the market.
examples.cn: 公司将新技术引入市场。

examples.en: I need to catch up with my studies after being sick.
examples.cn: 生病后我需要赶上我的学习进度。

examples.en: He ran faster to catch up with his friends.
examples.cn: 他跑得更快以赶上他的朋友们。

examples.en: He staked his reputation on the success of the project.
examples.cn: 他把自己的声誉押在了项目的成功上。

examples.en: Don't stake everything on one risky investment.
examples.cn: 不要把所有东西都押在一次风险投资上。

examples.en: The company implemented new software to increase productivity by 20%.
examples.cn: 公司实施了新软件，将生产力提高了20%。

examples.en: Regular training sessions can help increase productivity in the workplace.
examples.cn: 定期培训课程有助于提高工作场所的生产力。

examples.en: He manipulated his friend into lending him money by pretending to be in desperate need.
examples.cn: 他假装急需用钱，操纵朋友借给他钱。

examples.en: Politicians sometimes manipulate voters into supporting policies through emotional appeals.
examples.cn: 政客有时通过情感诉求操纵选民支持政策。

examples.en: The suspect claimed the police had fitted him up with false evidence.
examples.cn: 嫌疑人声称警方用虚假证据诬陷了他。

examples.en: She was fitted up for the crime by her jealous colleague.
examples.cn: 她被嫉妒的同事陷害，背上了罪名。

examples.en: We need to fit up the new office with desks and computers before Monday.
examples.cn: 我们需要在周一前为新办公室安装好桌子和电脑。

examples.en: The team fitted up the stage with lights and sound equipment for the concert.
examples.cn: 团队为音乐会装配了舞台的灯光和音响设备。

examples.en: If you think you can do better, put up or shut up and show us your plan.
examples.cn: 如果你认为你能做得更好，要么行动要么闭嘴，给我们看看你的计划。

examples.en: He kept complaining about the rules, so I told him to put up or shut up and propose a change.
examples.cn: 他一直在抱怨规则，所以我告诉他要么行动要么闭嘴，提出修改建议。

examples.en: The company focuses on the domestic market before expanding internationally.
examples.cn: 公司在国际扩张前专注于国内市场。

examples.en: Fluctuations in the domestic market can affect local employment rates.
examples.cn: 国内市场的波动可能影响当地的就业率。

examples.en: She spent hours searching for her lost keys in the house.
examples.cn: 她花了几个小时在房子里寻找丢失的钥匙。

examples.en: Researchers are searching for a cure to the disease.
examples.cn: 研究人员正在寻找这种疾病的治疗方法。

examples.en: He was none too pleased when he heard the news.
examples.cn: 他听到这个消息时一点也不高兴。

examples.en: The food was none too tasty, so we decided to eat elsewhere.
examples.cn: 食物一点也不好吃，所以我们决定去别处吃。

examples.en: Her exam grades improved significantly after she started studying regularly.
examples.cn: 她开始定期学习后，考试成绩显著提高。

examples.en: The school uses exam grades to determine student placements.
examples.cn: 学校用考试成绩来决定学生的分班。

examples.en: Before the test, make sure to review the material covered in class.
examples.cn: 考试前，一定要复习课堂上讲过的材料。

examples.en: The teacher asked the students to review the material for the upcoming quiz.
examples.cn: 老师让学生为即将到来的小测验复习材料。

examples.en: Studies often explore gender differences in communication styles.
examples.cn: 研究经常探讨沟通风格中的性别差异。

examples.en: Gender differences in career choices can be influenced by social norms.
examples.cn: 职业选择中的性别差异可能受社会规范影响。

examples.en: The inspection of the building revealed several safety violations.
examples.cn: 对建筑物的检查发现了几处安全违规。

examples.en: Regular inspection of equipment is essential to prevent accidents.
examples.cn: 定期检查设备对于预防事故至关重要。

examples.en: We hiked to the top of the mountain to enjoy the stunning scenery.
examples.cn: 我们徒步到山顶欣赏令人惊叹的风景。

examples.en: The coastal drive offers stunning scenery with ocean views.
examples.cn: 沿海公路提供了带有海景的令人惊叹的风景。

examples.en: If you put your back into the project, you'll finish it on time.
examples.cn: 如果你全力以赴做这个项目，就能按时完成。

examples.en: She put her back into training and won the competition.
examples.cn: 她全力以赴训练，赢得了比赛。

examples.en: The government must take measures to reduce pollution in the city.
examples.cn: 政府必须采取措施减少城市污染。

examples.en: Companies should take measures to protect customer data from breaches.
examples.cn: 公司应采取措施保护客户数据免受泄露。

examples.en: In this sense, art can be seen as a form of communication.
examples.cn: 在这个意义上，艺术可以被视为一种沟通形式。

examples.en: The theory is useful in this sense, but it has limitations in others.
examples.cn: 在这个意义上，这个理论很有用，但在其他方面有局限性。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为某人报名或登记某事

examples.en: Can you put me down for the charity run next weekend?
examples.cn: 你能为我报名参加下周末的慈善跑步吗？

examples.en: I'll put you down for two tickets to the concert.
examples.cn: 我会为你登记两张音乐会的票。

examples.en: He always puts his colleagues down in meetings to make himself look better.
examples.cn: 他总是在会议上贬低同事，让自己看起来更好。

examples.en: Don't put people down for their mistakes; instead, offer constructive feedback.
examples.cn: 不要因为别人的错误而贬低他们，而应提供建设性反馈。

examples.en: Is the new movie anything like the book it's based on?
examples.cn: 新电影有点像它基于的那本书吗？

examples.en: This dessert isn't anything like the one I had in Italy.
examples.cn: 这个甜点一点也不像我在意大利吃过的那个。

examples.en: A sedentary lifestyle can lead to health problems like obesity and heart disease.
examples.cn: 久坐的生活方式可能导致肥胖和心脏病等健康问题。

examples.en: To combat a sedentary lifestyle, try to incorporate more physical activity into your day.
examples.cn: 为了对抗久坐的生活方式，尝试在日常生活中加入更多体育活动。

examples.en: We plan family activities every weekend to spend quality time together.
examples.cn: 我们每个周末都计划家庭活动，共度美好时光。

examples.en: Board games and picnics are popular family activities during holidays.
examples.cn: 棋盘游戏和野餐是假期中受欢迎的家庭活动。

examples.en: People often label him as a genius because of his early achievements.
examples.cn: 由于他早期的成就，人们经常将他标记为天才。

examples.en: The product was labeled as organic to attract health-conscious consumers.
examples.cn: 该产品被标记为有机，以吸引注重健康的消费者。

examples.en: The sailors were at the mercy of the storm.
examples.cn: 水手们任由暴风雨摆布。

examples.en: Small businesses are often at the mercy of market fluctuations.
examples.cn: 小企业常常受市场波动支配。

examples.en: They exchanged traditional wedding vows in the ceremony.
examples.cn: 他们在仪式上交换了传统的婚礼誓言。

examples.en: Writing personalized wedding vows made the day more meaningful.
examples.cn: 撰写个性化的结婚誓词让这一天更有意义。

examples.en: I like to take a walk in the park after dinner.
examples.cn: 我喜欢晚饭后在公园散步。

examples.en: She decided to take a walk to clear her mind.
examples.cn: 她决定走一走以理清思绪。

examples.en: You need to make an effort to improve your grades.
examples.cn: 你需要努力提高你的成绩。

examples.en: They made a concerted effort to finish the project on time.
examples.cn: 他们齐心协力按时完成了项目。

examples.en: The company has been in the red for three consecutive quarters.
examples.cn: 该公司已连续三个季度亏损。

examples.en: After the unexpected expenses, their account went into the red.
examples.cn: 意外开支后，他们的账户出现了负债。

examples.en: Parents often concern themselves about their children's safety.
examples.cn: 父母常常担心孩子的安全。

examples.en: There is growing concern about climate change worldwide.
examples.cn: 全球对气候变化的担忧日益增长。

examples.en: After retiring, they hope to lead a happy life in the countryside.
examples.cn: 退休后，他们希望在乡村过着幸福的生活。

examples.en: Simple pleasures can help you lead a happy life.
examples.cn: 简单的快乐能帮助你过着幸福的生活。

examples.en: The baby weighed 3.5 kilograms at birth.
examples.cn: 这个婴儿出生时重3.5公斤。

examples.en: Some genetic conditions are detectable at birth.
examples.cn: 一些遗传病在出生时就能检测出来。

examples.en: This table is made of solid oak.
examples.cn: 这张桌子由实心橡木制成。

examples.en: The team is made of experienced professionals.
examples.cn: 这个团队由经验丰富的专业人士构成。

examples.en: Don't worry about the details; it will all come out in the wash.
examples.cn: 别担心细节，最终都会真相大白的。

examples.en: The misunderstandings will come out in the wash after we talk.
examples.cn: 我们谈过后，误解最终会解决的。

examples.en: Hold on tight to the railing when climbing the stairs.
examples.cn: 爬楼梯时紧紧抓住栏杆。

examples.en: Hold on, I'll be right back with your order.
examples.cn: 等一下，我马上把你的订单拿来。

examples.en: Please take out the trash before you leave.
examples.cn: 离开前请把垃圾带出去。

examples.en: He decided to take out a loan to buy a car.
examples.cn: 他决定贷款买车。

examples.en: She was unaware of the changes in the schedule.
examples.cn: 她不知道日程表的变化。

examples.en: Many people are unaware of the risks involved.
examples.cn: 许多人未意识到涉及的风险。

examples.en: The archer aimed at the target and released the arrow.
examples.cn: 弓箭手瞄准目标并射出了箭。

examples.en: This policy aims at reducing pollution levels.
examples.cn: 这项政策旨在降低污染水平。

examples.en: The army advanced in strength to secure the area.
examples.cn: 军队大量推进以保卫该地区。

examples.en: Support for the candidate grew in strength over time.
examples.cn: 对候选人的支持在力量上随时间增长。

examples.en: Chinese New Year is based on the lunar calendar.
examples.cn: 春节是基于农历的。

examples.en: Many traditional festivals follow the lunar calendar.
examples.cn: 许多传统节日遵循农历。

examples.en: The young athlete has a lot of promise in her career.
examples.cn: 这位年轻运动员在她的职业生涯中很有前途。

examples.en: This new technology has a lot of promise for future applications.
examples.cn: 这项新技术对未来应用大有希望。

examples.en: After the investigation, he was found to have clean hands.
examples.cn: 调查后，他被发现是清白的。

examples.en: In this scandal, few politicians have clean hands.
examples.cn: 在这起丑闻中，很少有政客没有过错。

examples.en: I need to have a word with my boss about the project.
examples.cn: 我需要和我的老板谈一谈这个项目。

examples.en: Can I have a word with you in private?
examples.cn: 我能和你私下简短交谈一下吗？

examples.en: At the risk of sounding rude, I must disagree with your proposal.
examples.cn: 冒着听起来粗鲁的风险，我必须不同意你的提议。

examples.en: She spoke up at the risk of losing her job.
examples.cn: 她冒着失去工作的风险发表了意见。

examples.en: Good urban planning can reduce traffic congestion in cities.
examples.cn: 良好的城市规划可以减少城市交通拥堵。

examples.en: She studied urban planning to help design sustainable communities.
examples.cn: 她学习城市规划以帮助设计可持续社区。

examples.en: Adult education programs help people learn new skills later in life.
examples.cn: 成人教育项目帮助人们在晚年学习新技能。

examples.en: Many universities offer adult education courses in the evenings.
examples.cn: 许多大学在晚上提供成人教育课程。

examples.en: The company has a bad reputation for poor customer service.
examples.cn: 这家公司因客户服务差而名声不好。

examples.en: He earned a bad reputation after the scandal.
examples.cn: 丑闻后他获得了坏名声。

valid_entries.original_phrase: make a silk purse out of a sow's ear

definitions.meaning_cn: 化腐朽为神奇；用劣质材料做出好东西

examples.en: Trying to fix that old car is like making a silk purse out of a sow's ear.
examples.cn: 试图修理那辆旧车就像用猪耳朵做丝绸钱包一样。

examples.en: With creativity, she made a silk purse out of a sow's ear by turning junk into art.
examples.cn: 凭借创造力，她化腐朽为神奇，将垃圾变成了艺术品。

examples.en: Are you all set for the trip tomorrow?
examples.cn: 你为明天的旅行准备就绪了吗？

examples.en: The documents are all set for the meeting.
examples.cn: 会议文件已全部准备就绪。

examples.en: We need to budget for unexpected expenses this year.
examples.cn: 我们需要为今年的意外开支做预算。

examples.en: Did you budget for the new equipment in the project?
examples.cn: 你在项目中为新设备做预算了吗？

examples.en: The decision was cut and dried after the committee voted.
examples.cn: 委员会投票后，决定已成定局。

examples.en: There's no cut and dried answer to this complex problem.
examples.cn: 这个复杂问题没有明确的答案。

examples.en: If you want the promotion, go for it!
examples.cn: 如果你想升职，就努力争取吧！

examples.en: He decided to go for it and start his own business.
examples.cn: 他决定大胆尝试，创办自己的企业。

examples.en: The departments worked in concert to complete the project on time.
examples.cn: 各部门协同工作，按时完成了项目。

examples.en: They acted in concert to address the environmental issue.
examples.cn: 他们一致行动以解决环境问题。

examples.en: I heard someone knock at the door late at night.
examples.cn: 我深夜听到有人敲门。

examples.en: Please knock at the office before entering.
examples.cn: 进入前请先敲办公室的门。

examples.en: Can you keep an eye on my bag while I go to the restroom?
examples.cn: 我去洗手间时，你能照看一下我的包吗？

examples.en: We need to keep an eye on the stock market trends.
examples.cn: 我们需要留意股市趋势。

examples.en: The company poured millions into research and development.
examples.cn: 公司投入数百万用于研发。

examples.en: She poured her heart into writing the novel.
examples.cn: 她倾注心血写作这部小说。

examples.en: Many innovations in technology are adopted quickly in the developing world.
examples.cn: 许多技术创新在发展中世界被迅速采用。

examples.en: Aid organizations focus on improving healthcare in the developing world.
examples.cn: 援助组织专注于改善发展中世界的医疗保健。

examples.en: It's time to throw out these old magazines.
examples.cn: 是时候扔掉这些旧杂志了。

examples.en: The bouncer threw out the unruly patron from the bar.
examples.cn: 保镖将不守规矩的顾客赶出了酒吧。

examples.en: She took exception to the unfair criticism of her work.
examples.cn: 她对自己作品受到的不公正批评表示异议。

examples.en: I must take exception to that misleading statement.
