examples.cn: 在她看来，他是她认识的最诚实的人。

examples.en: In the eyes of the law, everyone is equal.
examples.cn: 在法律看来，人人平等。

examples.en: Paris is known as the City of Light.
examples.cn: 巴黎被称为光之城。

examples.en: He is known as a reliable expert in his field.
examples.cn: 他在他的领域以可靠的专家闻名。

examples.en: The congressional representative from our district will attend the town hall meeting.
examples.cn: 我们选区的国会代表将参加市政厅会议。

examples.en: She was elected as a congressional representative to advocate for environmental issues.
examples.cn: 她被选为国会代表，倡导环境问题。

examples.en: They spend a lot of money on travel each year.
examples.cn: 他们每年在旅行上花费很多钱。

examples.en: He spends hours on his homework every evening.
examples.cn: 他每晚在作业上花费数小时。

examples.en: She put her old computer to good use by donating it to a school.
examples.cn: 她善用旧电脑，把它捐给了一所学校。

examples.en: He put his free time to good use by learning a new language.
examples.cn: 他善用空闲时间学习一门新语言。

examples.en: The instructions were clear-cut and easy to follow.
examples.cn: 指示明确，易于遵循。

examples.en: There is no clear-cut answer to this complex problem.
examples.cn: 这个复杂问题没有明确的答案。

examples.en: The company plans to clear-cut the forest for timber.
examples.cn: 公司计划砍伐森林以获取木材。

examples.en: Clear-cutting can lead to soil erosion and loss of biodiversity.
examples.cn: 砍伐可能导致土壤侵蚀和生物多样性丧失。

examples.en: The store sells its products at competitive prices.
examples.cn: 这家商店以有竞争力的价格出售产品。

examples.en: They decided to sell the car at a discount to attract buyers.
examples.cn: 他们决定以折扣价出售汽车以吸引买家。

examples.en: There were dozens of people waiting in line for the concert.
examples.cn: 有几十个人在排队等候音乐会。

examples.en: She has dozens of books on her shelf.
examples.cn: 她的书架上有几十本书。

examples.en: NASA plans several space missions to Mars in the next decade.
examples.cn: NASA计划在未来十年内进行多次火星太空任务。

examples.en: The success of space missions depends on advanced technology.
examples.cn: 太空任务的成功依赖于先进技术。

examples.en: He decided to get involved with the community project.
examples.cn: 他决定参与社区项目。

examples.en: She got involved with a new business venture.
examples.cn: 她卷入了一项新的商业冒险。

examples.en: He got involved with the wrong crowd in college.
examples.cn: 他在大学里与不良人群有牵连。

examples.en: She warned him not to get involved with that company.
examples.cn: 她警告他不要与那家公司有牵连。

examples.en: To her credit, she finished the project ahead of schedule.
examples.cn: 值得赞扬的是，她提前完成了项目。

examples.en: To his credit, he admitted his mistake immediately.
examples.cn: 值得赞扬的是，他立即承认了错误。

examples.en: She smiled at the thought of her upcoming vacation.
examples.cn: 一想到即将到来的假期，她就笑了。

examples.en: He felt nervous at the thought of the exam.
examples.cn: 一想到考试，他就感到紧张。

examples.en: The teacher keeps the students in line during class.
examples.cn: 老师在课堂上让学生们守规矩。

examples.en: Parents need to keep their children in line at home.
examples.cn: 父母需要在家让孩子守规矩。

examples.en: The government implemented effective measures to reduce pollution.
examples.cn: 政府实施了有效措施来减少污染。

examples.en: Companies should take effective measures to ensure data security.
examples.cn: 公司应采取有效措施确保数据安全。

examples.en: The war took a heavy toll on the country's economy.
examples.cn: 战争对该国经济造成了严重损失。

examples.en: Long working hours can take a heavy toll on your health.
examples.cn: 长时间工作会对你的健康造成严重伤害。

examples.en: This loan will tide me over until I get paid.
examples.cn: 这笔贷款将帮助我渡过难关，直到我拿到工资。

examples.en: She offered to tide him over with some food during the crisis.
examples.cn: 她提出在危机期间用一些食物帮助他渡过难关。

examples.en: Technological innovations have revolutionized the way we communicate.
examples.cn: 技术创新彻底改变了我们的交流方式。

examples.en: The company invests heavily in technological innovations.
examples.cn: 该公司在技术创新上投入巨资。

examples.en: In many respects, this new model is superior to the old one.
examples.cn: 在许多方面，这个新模型优于旧模型。

examples.en: She is talented in many respects, including music and sports.
examples.cn: 她在许多方面都有天赋，包括音乐和体育。

examples.en: The store offers a variety of products to choose from.
examples.cn: 这家商店提供各种各样的产品供选择。

examples.en: She enjoys a variety of hobbies, such as painting and hiking.
examples.cn: 她喜欢各种各样的爱好，比如绘画和徒步。

examples.en: The dog can sniff out drugs at the airport.
examples.cn: 这只狗能在机场嗅出毒品。

examples.en: She has a talent for sniffing out good investment opportunities.
examples.cn: 她有发现良好投资机会的天赋。

examples.en: He sniffed out the truth behind the rumor.
examples.cn: 他察觉到了谣言背后的真相。

examples.en: The inspector sniffed out the fraud in the company.
examples.cn: 检查员察觉到了公司的欺诈行为。

examples.en: Could you give me a bit of advice on this matter?
examples.cn: 你能就此事给我一点建议吗？

examples.en: She added a bit of sugar to her coffee.
examples.cn: 她在咖啡里加了一点糖。

examples.en: I think I'll go for the blue shirt instead of the red one.
examples.cn: 我想我会选择蓝衬衫而不是红衬衫。

examples.en: She decided to go for the promotion at work.
examples.cn: 她决定争取工作上的晋升。

examples.en: He really goes for action movies.
examples.cn: 他真的很喜欢动作片。

examples.en: She goes for guys with a good sense of humor.
examples.cn: 她被有幽默感的男人吸引。

examples.en: This rule goes for everyone in the company.
examples.cn: 这条规则适用于公司的每个人。

examples.en: The same advice goes for all new employees.
examples.cn: 同样的建议适用于所有新员工。

examples.en: The company uses a personality questionnaire during the hiring process.
examples.cn: 公司在招聘过程中使用人格问卷。

examples.en: She completed a personality questionnaire to understand her traits better.
examples.cn: 她完成了一份人格问卷以更好地了解自己的特质。

examples.en: She got all dolled up for the party last night.
examples.cn: 她昨晚为派对打扮得漂漂亮亮。

examples.en: He got all dolled up in a suit for the interview.
examples.cn: 他为面试穿上西装打扮得漂漂亮亮。

examples.en: The country has absolute advantages in producing certain agricultural goods.
examples.cn: 该国在生产某些农产品方面具有绝对优势。

examples.en: Absolute advantages can lead to increased trade between nations.
examples.cn: 绝对优势可以促进国家间的贸易增长。

examples.en: She still holds his mistake against him after all these years.
examples.cn: 这么多年后，她仍然因他的错误而怨恨他。

examples.en: Don't hold my past actions against me; I've changed.
examples.cn: 不要因我过去的行为怨恨我；我已经改变了。

examples.en: The flight was delayed owing to bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于天气恶劣，航班延误了。

examples.en: Owing to his hard work, he got promoted quickly.
examples.cn: 由于他努力工作，他很快得到了晋升。

examples.en: I looked high and low for my keys before finding them in the car.
examples.cn: 我到处找钥匙，最后在车里找到了。

examples.en: She looked high and low for a rare book in antique shops.
examples.cn: 她在古董店里到处寻找一本罕见的书。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为某事挺身而出或表明立场

examples.en: He took a stand for environmental protection at the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议上为环境保护表明了立场。

examples.en: It's important to take a stand for justice in difficult times.
examples.cn: 在困难时期为正义挺身而出很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 乱七八糟，处于混乱状态

examples.en: After the party, the living room was in a mess.
examples.cn: 派对过后，客厅里乱七八糟。

examples.en: Her finances are in a mess due to poor planning.
examples.cn: 由于计划不周，她的财务状况一团糟。

examples.en: This medication is only available on prescription from a doctor.
examples.cn: 这种药物只能凭医生处方购买。

examples.en: You need to be on prescription for antibiotics to treat the infection.
examples.cn: 你需要凭处方使用抗生素来治疗感染。

examples.en: She completed a correspondence course in business management.
examples.cn: 她完成了一门商业管理的函授课程。

examples.en: Correspondence courses allow students to study remotely.
examples.cn: 函授课程允许学生远程学习。

examples.en: The Environmental Protection Agency is a key government agency.
examples.cn: 环境保护局是一个重要的政府机构。

examples.en: She works for a government agency that handles public health issues.
examples.cn: 她在一个处理公共卫生问题的政府机构工作。

examples.en: I'll give you a ring tomorrow to discuss the plans.
examples.cn: 我明天会给你打电话讨论计划。

examples.en: Give me a ring when you arrive at the airport.
examples.cn: 你到机场时给我打个电话。

examples.en: Could you do me a favor and pick up some milk?
examples.cn: 你能帮我个忙，买些牛奶吗？

examples.en: He did her a favor by fixing her computer for free.
examples.cn: 他免费帮她修电脑，帮了她一个忙。

examples.en: If you want to avoid traffic, your best bet is to leave early.
examples.cn: 如果你想避开交通，最好的选择是早点出发。

examples.en: For affordable housing, your best bet is to look in the suburbs.
examples.cn: 要找经济实惠的住房，你最好去郊区看看。

examples.en: The hotel is located on Main Street, near the city center.
examples.cn: 这家酒店位于主街，靠近市中心。

examples.en: Their office is located on the 10th floor of the building.
examples.cn: 他们的办公室位于大楼的10层。

examples.en: We love to watch soccer games at the local stadium on weekends.
examples.cn: 我们喜欢周末在当地体育场观看足球比赛。

examples.en: He watches soccer games on TV to relax after work.
examples.cn: 他下班后看电视上的足球比赛来放松。

examples.en: In times of crisis, it's important to stand up and be counted.
examples.cn: 在危机时刻，挺身而出很重要。

examples.en: She stood up and was counted as a supporter of the new policy.
examples.cn: 她挺身而出，表明支持新政策。

valid_entries.original_phrase: search sth. with a fine-tooth comb

examples.en: The police searched the area with a fine-tooth comb for clues.
examples.cn: 警察仔细搜查了该区域寻找线索。

examples.en: Before buying a used car, search it with a fine-tooth comb for any issues.
examples.cn: 购买二手车前，要彻底检查是否有问题。

examples.en: Many people seek well-paid jobs in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 许多人寻求科技行业的高薪工作。

examples.en: Well-paid jobs often require advanced skills and education.
examples.cn: 高薪工作通常需要高级技能和教育。

examples.en: Could you look in on my cat while I'm away?
examples.cn: 我不在的时候，你能顺便看看我的猫吗？

examples.en: I'll look in on the meeting to see how it's progressing.
examples.cn: 我会顺便看看会议进展如何。

examples.en: She is nervous about her upcoming job interview.
examples.cn: 她对即将到来的工作面试感到紧张。

examples.en: He was nervous about flying for the first time.
examples.cn: 他第一次坐飞机时感到紧张。

examples.en: I sent the important documents by registered mail for security.
examples.cn: 为了安全，我用挂号信寄送了重要文件。

examples.en: Registered mail provides tracking and proof of delivery.
examples.cn: 挂号信提供追踪和投递证明。

examples.en: A lot of hard work happens behind the scenes in film production.
examples.cn: 电影制作中，很多辛苦工作在幕后进行。

examples.en: Behind the scenes, they negotiated the deal for months.
examples.cn: 私下里，他们为这笔交易谈判了数月。

examples.en: Please roll up the carpet before cleaning the floor.
examples.cn: 清洁地板前，请把地毯卷起来。

examples.en: He rolled up to the party fashionably late.
examples.cn: 他时髦地迟到，到达了派对。

examples.en: The manager gave free rein to the team to develop their own project ideas.
examples.cn: 经理放任团队自由发展他们自己的项目想法。

examples.en: Parents should not give free rein to their children's spending habits.
examples.cn: 父母不应放任孩子的消费习惯。

examples.en: She expressed her gratitude in words during the ceremony.
examples.cn: 她在仪式上用言语表达了感激之情。

examples.en: It's hard to describe the beauty of the scene in words.
examples.cn: 很难用言语描述这场景的美丽。

examples.en: Stop beating around the bush and tell me what you really think.
examples.cn: 别拐弯抹角了，告诉我你的真实想法。

examples.en: He always beats around the bush when discussing sensitive topics.
examples.cn: 讨论敏感话题时，他总是拐弯抹角。

examples.en: The prophecy finally came to pass after many years.
examples.cn: 多年后，预言终于实现了。

examples.en: It came to pass that they won the championship against all odds.
examples.cn: 他们最终克服万难赢得了冠军。

examples.en: So far as I know, the meeting has been postponed.
examples.cn: 就我所知，会议已经推迟了。

examples.en: He will help you so far as his abilities allow.
examples.cn: 他会在他能力范围内帮助你。

examples.en: I came across an old friend while shopping yesterday.
examples.cn: 昨天购物时，我偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

examples.en: She comes across as very confident in interviews.
examples.cn: 在面试中，她给人非常自信的印象。

examples.en: Communication and problem-solving are vital skills in the workplace.
examples.cn: 沟通和解决问题是职场中的关键技能。

examples.en: Learning to code has become a vital skill in the digital age.
examples.cn: 在数字时代，学习编程已成为一项必备能力。

examples.en: He got a hard time from his boss for missing the deadline.
examples.cn: 他因错过截止日期而受到老板的刁难。

examples.en: New employees often get a hard time adjusting to the company culture.
examples.cn: 新员工在适应公司文化时常常遭遇困难。

examples.en: Historians ascribe the fall of the empire to economic decline.
examples.cn: 历史学家将帝国的衰落归因于经济衰退。

examples.en: She ascribed her success to hard work and perseverance.
examples.cn: 她将自己的成功归因于努力和坚持。

examples.en: The new model's performance is comparable to that of high-end competitors.
examples.cn: 新模型的性能可与高端竞争对手相比。

examples.en: Her dedication to the project is comparable to that of a full-time employee.
examples.cn: 她对项目的投入程度可与全职员工相似。

examples.en: The live coverage of the Olympic Games attracted millions of viewers.
examples.cn: 奥运会的现场报道吸引了数百万观众。

examples.en: We watched the live coverage of the presidential debate on TV.
examples.cn: 我们在电视上观看了总统辩论的现场报道。

examples.en: Teenagers often rebel against their parents' rules.
examples.cn: 青少年常常反抗父母的规则。

examples.en: The citizens rebelled against the oppressive government.
examples.cn: 公民们反抗了压迫性的政府。

examples.en: They decided to break up after five years of dating.
examples.cn: 恋爱五年后，他们决定分手。

examples.en: The police had to break up the protest to maintain order.
examples.cn: 警察不得不解散抗议以维持秩序。

examples.en: Their opinions on the issue are poles apart.
examples.cn: 他们在这个问题上的意见截然不同。

examples.en: The two cultures are poles apart in their traditions.
examples.cn: 这两种文化在传统上天壤之别。

examples.en: At the party, guests began to pair off for dancing.
examples.cn: 在派对上，客人们开始配对跳舞。

examples.en: The teacher asked the students to pair off for the group project.
examples.cn: 老师让学生们为小组项目结成一对。

examples.en: The stage setting for the play was elaborate and colorful.
examples.cn: 这出戏的舞台布景精致而多彩。

examples.en: They spent weeks designing the stage setting for the concert.
examples.cn: 他们花了数周时间设计音乐会的舞台布景。

examples.en: I hope to have a chance to visit Japan next year.
examples.cn: 我希望明年有机会访问日本。

examples.en: She had a chance to meet her favorite author at the book signing.
examples.cn: 她在签售会上有机会见到了她最喜欢的作者。

examples.en: Listening to music helps me relax my mind after a long day.
examples.cn: 听音乐帮助我在漫长的一天后放松心情。

examples.en: He went for a walk in the park to relax his mind.
examples.cn: 他去公园散步以放松头脑。

examples.en: The manager gave his ear to the employees' suggestions.
examples.cn: 经理倾听了员工的建议。

examples.en: Please give your ear to this important announcement.
examples.cn: 请倾听这个重要公告。

examples.en: In the debate, she managed to get the better of her opponent.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她设法战胜了对手。

examples.en: His fear of failure often gets the better of him in competitions.
examples.cn: 他对失败的恐惧常常在比赛中占上风。

examples.en: After retiring, they took up their abode in a quiet coastal village.
examples.cn: 退休后，他们在一个宁静的海滨村庄定居下来。

examples.en: The artist took up his abode in a small studio to focus on his paintings.
examples.cn: 这位艺术家在一间小工作室里安顿下来，专注于他的绘画。

examples.en: She turned her nose up at the cheap wine, insisting on something more expensive.
examples.cn: 她对廉价葡萄酒嗤之以鼻，坚持要更贵的。

examples.en: Don't turn your nose up at local cuisine; it can be surprisingly delicious.
examples.cn: 不要瞧不起当地美食，它可能出奇地美味。

examples.en: The office staff worked overtime to meet the project deadline.
examples.cn: 办公室员工加班加点以赶上项目截止日期。

examples.en: All office staff are required to attend the annual meeting.
examples.cn: 所有办公室职员都必须参加年度会议。

examples.en: The new manager runs a taut ship, ensuring every task is completed on time.
examples.cn: 新经理管理严格，确保每项任务都按时完成。

examples.en: To succeed in this competitive industry, you need to run a taut ship.
examples.cn: 要在这个竞争激烈的行业中成功，你需要高效运营。

examples.en: The event was postponed on account of the bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于天气恶劣，活动被推迟了。

examples.en: He was excused from duty on account of his illness.
examples.cn: 他因病被免除了职责。

examples.en: She decided to take a chance and invest in the startup.
examples.cn: 她决定冒险投资这家初创公司。

examples.en: If you don't take a chance, you might miss out on great opportunities.
examples.cn: 如果你不冒险，可能会错过好机会。

examples.en: They often argue with each other about politics.
examples.cn: 他们经常就政治问题互相争论。

examples.en: I don't want to argue with you about the details; let's focus on the solution.
examples.cn: 我不想和你争论细节，让我们专注于解决方案。

examples.en: She's on the fast track to becoming a senior executive.
examples.cn: 她正在快速晋升为高级主管。

examples.en: The company is on the fast track to expansion in international markets.
examples.cn: 这家公司正在国际市场上高速扩张。

examples.en: The boss gave him an ultimatum: improve performance or face dismissal.
examples.cn: 老板向他发出最后通牒：提高绩效否则面临解雇。

examples.en: In negotiations, they gave the other party an ultimatum to agree by Friday.
examples.cn: 在谈判中，他们向对方发出最后通牒，要求周五前同意。

examples.en: Please turn the card face up so we can see the design.
examples.cn: 请把卡片正面朝上翻转，这样我们可以看到图案。

examples.en: He turned the coin face up to check if it was heads or tails.
examples.cn: 他把硬币翻转过来检查是正面还是反面。

definitions.meaning_cn: 引起轰动，取得巨大成功

examples.en: Her debut novel set the world on fire, becoming an instant bestseller.
examples.cn: 她的处女作小说引起了轰动，立即成为畅销书。

examples.en: The new tech startup aims to set the world on fire with its innovative product.
examples.cn: 这家新科技初创公司旨在用其创新产品取得巨大成功。

examples.en: This model is superior to the previous one in terms of performance.
examples.cn: 这个型号在性能上优于前一个型号。

examples.en: In many aspects, her skills are superior to those of her colleagues.
examples.cn: 在许多方面，她的技能比她的同事更优秀。

examples.en: He took apart the old clock to repair it.
examples.cn: 他拆开旧钟表进行修理。

examples.en: For maintenance, you need to take apart the machine carefully.
examples.cn: 为了维护，你需要小心地拆卸机器。

examples.en: The critic took apart the film for its poor plot.
examples.cn: 评论家严厉批评了这部电影的情节糟糕。

examples.en: In the debate, she took apart her opponent's arguments point by point.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她逐点剖析了对手的论点。

examples.en: After the break, everyone got down to work on the project.
examples.cn: 休息后，每个人都开始认真做项目。

examples.en: It's time to stop chatting and get down to work.
examples.cn: 是时候停止聊天，开始认真工作了。

examples.en: He is receiving medical treatments for his chronic condition.
examples.cn: 他正在接受慢性病的医疗治疗。

examples.en: Patients receive medical treatments at the hospital to recover from injuries.
examples.cn: 患者在医院接受医疗治疗以从伤病中恢复。

definitions.meaning_cn: 哽咽，因情绪激动而说不出话

examples.en: She choked up while giving the heartfelt speech.
examples.cn: 她在发表感人的演讲时哽咽了。

examples.en: He choked up with emotion when he saw his long-lost friend.
examples.cn: 当他见到失散已久的朋友时，激动得说不出话。

examples.en: The drain choked up with leaves after the storm.
examples.cn: 暴风雨后，排水管被树叶堵塞了。

examples.en: Traffic choked up the highway during rush hour.
examples.cn: 高峰时段交通堵塞了高速公路。

examples.en: They work hard year in year out to support their family.
examples.cn: 他们年复一年地努力工作以养家糊口。

examples.en: The tradition has been celebrated year in year out for centuries.
examples.cn: 这个传统已经持续庆祝了几个世纪。

examples.en: She remained calm all through the crisis.
examples.cn: 在整个危机过程中，她保持冷静。

examples.en: The music played all through the night at the festival.
examples.cn: 音乐在节日期间整夜播放。

examples.en: The store is offering a 10% discount on all items this weekend.
examples.cn: 本周末商店所有商品提供九折优惠。

examples.en: You can get a 10% discount if you use this promo code online.
examples.cn: 如果你在线使用这个促销代码，可以获得九折优惠。

examples.en: The long hike tired out the children completely.
examples.cn: 长途徒步让孩子们筋疲力尽。

examples.en: Working two jobs will tire you out quickly.
examples.cn: 打两份工会让你很快疲惫不堪。

examples.en: We got the jump on our competitors by launching the product early.
examples.cn: 我们通过提前发布产品抢占了竞争对手的先机。

examples.en: He got the jump on the project by starting research months in advance.
examples.cn: 他提前几个月开始研究，在这个项目上占了先机。

examples.en: In a pinch, you can use vinegar as a cleaning substitute.
examples.cn: 必要时，你可以用醋作为清洁替代品。

examples.en: This old car will do in a pinch if my main vehicle breaks down.
examples.cn: 如果我的主要车辆坏了，这辆旧车在紧要关头还能用。

examples.en: I ran across an old friend at the supermarket yesterday.
examples.cn: 昨天我在超市偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

examples.en: She ran across some interesting articles while browsing online.
examples.cn: 她在网上浏览时偶然发现了一些有趣的文章。

examples.en: The government is trying to keep down inflation rates.
examples.cn: 政府正试图控制通货膨胀率。

examples.en: Please keep down the noise so the baby can sleep.
examples.cn: 请降低噪音，让宝宝能睡觉。

examples.en: During the meeting, he kept down to avoid drawing attention.
examples.cn: 会议期间，他保持低调以避免引起注意。

examples.en: In that situation, it's best to keep down and observe.
examples.cn: 在那样的情境下，最好保持低调并观察。

valid_entries.original_phrase: there is no point in doing sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 做某事没有意义或没有必要

examples.en: There is no point in arguing about it now; the decision is final.
examples.cn: 现在争论这个没有意义；决定已经最终确定了。

examples.en: There is no point in worrying over things you cannot change.
examples.cn: 为无法改变的事情担心是没有意义的。

examples.en: It took me a while to get a grasp of the new software.
examples.cn: 我花了一些时间才掌握了这个新软件。

examples.en: She quickly got a grasp of the basic concepts in physics.
examples.cn: 她很快就理解了物理学的基本概念。

examples.en: You need to log in to access your email account.
examples.cn: 你需要登录才能访问你的电子邮件账户。

examples.en: I can't log in because I forgot my password.
examples.cn: 我无法登录，因为我忘记了密码。

examples.en: He acted in defiance of the company's policies.
examples.cn: 他的行为违抗了公司的政策。

examples.en: The protest was held in defiance of the government's warnings.
examples.cn: 这次抗议活动不顾政府的警告而举行。

examples.en: In brief, the project was a success due to teamwork.
examples.cn: 简而言之，由于团队合作，这个项目取得了成功。

examples.en: To put it in brief, we need to cut costs immediately.
examples.cn: 简而言之，我们需要立即削减成本。

examples.en: I stand behind my colleague's decision on this matter.
examples.cn: 我支持我的同事在这个问题上的决定。

examples.en: The company stands behind the quality of its products.
examples.cn: 公司为其产品的质量提供担保。

examples.en: The manager decided to raise my salary after the successful project.
examples.cn: 经理在项目成功后决定提高我的薪水。

examples.en: Employees often request to raise their salary during performance reviews.
examples.cn: 员工经常在绩效评估期间要求提高薪水。

examples.en: After his recovery, he felt fit as a fiddle and ready to work.
examples.cn: 康复后，他感觉非常健康，准备好工作了。

examples.en: My grandfather is 80 years old but still fit as a fiddle.
examples.cn: 我祖父80岁了，但仍然非常健康。

examples.en: Regular exercise can help increase blood circulation.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼有助于促进血液循环。

examples.en: This medication is designed to increase blood circulation in the limbs.
examples.cn: 这种药物旨在促进四肢的血液循环。

examples.en: She has expertise in the area of environmental science.
examples.cn: 她在环境科学领域有专业知识。

examples.en: We need more research in the area of renewable energy.
examples.cn: 我们需要在可再生能源领域进行更多研究。

examples.en: He felt a stab in the back when his friend revealed his secret.
examples.cn: 当他的朋友泄露他的秘密时，他感到被背叛了。

examples.en: In business, a stab in the back from a colleague can be devastating.
examples.cn: 在商业中，同事的背叛可能是毁灭性的。

examples.en: The unique design makes this product distinct from others on the market.
examples.cn: 独特的设计使这个产品与市场上的其他产品区分开来。

examples.en: Her leadership style makes her distinct from previous managers.
examples.cn: 她的领导风格使她与之前的经理们区分开来。

examples.en: Don't make a thing out of it; it was just a minor mistake.
examples.cn: 别小题大做；这只是个小错误。

examples.en: She tends to make a thing out of every small issue at work.
examples.cn: 她倾向于对工作中的每个小问题都小题大做。

examples.en: The salary increase should be in proportion to the employee's performance.
examples.cn: 薪水的增加应与员工的表现成比例。

examples.en: The amount of funding is in proportion to the project's scale.
examples.cn: 资金的数量与项目的规模成比例。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put that in one's pipe and smoke it

examples.en: I told him the truth, so he can put that in his pipe and smoke it.
examples.cn: 我告诉了他真相，所以他可以接受这个事实。

examples.en: The decision is final; put that in your pipe and smoke it.
examples.cn: 决定已经最终确定；好好想想吧。

examples.en: They decided to start a company together after graduating from business school.
examples.cn: 他们从商学院毕业后决定一起创办一家公司。

examples.en: It takes courage and capital to start a company in today's competitive market.
examples.cn: 在当今竞争激烈的市场中创办公司需要勇气和资本。

examples.en: Consumers are willing to pay more for genuine brands because of their quality assurance.
examples.cn: 消费者愿意为正品品牌支付更多费用，因为它们有质量保证。

examples.en: The market is flooded with counterfeits, making it hard to find genuine brands.
examples.cn: 市场上充斥着假冒产品，很难找到正品品牌。

examples.en: He managed to shake off his pursuers by taking a shortcut through the alley.
examples.cn: 他通过走小巷捷径成功摆脱了追赶者。

examples.en: It took her years to shake off the negative reputation from her past mistakes.
examples.cn: 她花了多年时间才摆脱过去错误带来的负面声誉。

examples.en: The dog shook off the water after swimming in the lake.
examples.cn: 狗在湖里游泳后抖落了身上的水。

examples.en: She shook off the snow from her coat before entering the house.
examples.cn: 她进屋前抖落了外套上的雪。

examples.en: You must be kidding if you think I'll believe that outrageous story.
examples.cn: 如果你认为我会相信那个离谱的故事，那你一定是在开玩笑。

examples.en: I was just kidding when I said I'd quit my job tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我说我明天要辞职只是在开玩笑。

examples.en: She takes after her mother in both appearance and temperament.
examples.cn: 她在长相和性格上都像她的母亲。

examples.en: He takes after his grandfather, who was also an avid gardener.
examples.cn: 他像他的祖父，祖父也是个热心的园丁。

examples.en: She misplaced her trust in a colleague who later betrayed her confidence.
examples.cn: 她错误地信任了一位后来背叛她信任的同事。

examples.en: Investors often misplace trust in fraudulent schemes that promise high returns.
examples.cn: 投资者常常错误地信任承诺高回报的欺诈计划。

examples.en: He lost his job, and what is worse, his car broke down the same day.
examples.cn: 他丢了工作，更糟糕的是，他的车在同一天坏了。

examples.en: The storm damaged the roof, and what is worse, it flooded the basement.
examples.cn: 暴风雨损坏了屋顶，更糟糕的是，它淹没了地下室。

examples.en: Dopamine is a neural transmitter that plays a key role in reward and motivation.
examples.cn: 多巴胺是一种在奖励和动机中起关键作用的神经递质。

examples.en: Scientists are studying how neural transmitters affect mood disorders like depression.
examples.cn: 科学家正在研究神经递质如何影响抑郁症等情绪障碍。

examples.en: The government decided to move against the corrupt officials with new legislation.
examples.cn: 政府决定通过新立法来打击腐败官员。

examples.en: Activists are urging the public to move against environmental pollution.
examples.cn: 活动家们敦促公众采取行动对抗环境污染。

examples.en: Please inform me about any changes to the schedule as soon as possible.
examples.cn: 请尽快通知我日程的任何变化。

examples.en: The teacher informed the students about the upcoming exam dates.
examples.cn: 老师通知了学生们即将到来的考试日期。

examples.en: Despite his busy schedule, he always makes time for his family.
examples.cn: 尽管日程繁忙，他总是为家人抽出时间。

examples.en: You need to make time for exercise if you want to stay healthy.
examples.cn: 如果你想保持健康，就需要抽出时间锻炼。

examples.en: The construction project is under way and should be completed by next year.
examples.cn: 建筑工程正在进行中，应该明年完成。

examples.en: Negotiations between the two countries are under way to resolve the dispute.
examples.cn: 两国之间的谈判正在进行中，以解决争端。

examples.en: These plants are adapted to survive in arid desert conditions.
examples.cn: 这些植物适应在干旱的沙漠条件下生存。

examples.en: She quickly adapted to the new work environment after moving to a different city.
examples.cn: 搬到另一个城市后，她很快适应了新的工作环境。

examples.en: The speaker concluded her presentation with a powerful quote.
examples.cn: 演讲者以一句有力的引语结束了她的演讲。

examples.en: They concluded the meeting with a summary of the key decisions made.
examples.cn: 他们以总结做出的关键决定结束了会议。

examples.en: Make sure to plug in the charger before your phone battery dies.
examples.cn: 在手机电池耗尽前，确保插入充电器。

examples.en: He plugged in the laptop and started working on the report.
examples.cn: 他插上笔记本电脑的电源，开始写报告。

examples.en: You need to plug in the USB drive to transfer the files.
examples.cn: 你需要插入U盘来传输文件。

examples.en: The new software allows you to plug in various data sources for analysis.
examples.cn: 新软件允许你接入各种数据源进行分析。

examples.en: The discussion class encourages students to share their opinions on current events.
examples.cn: 讨论课鼓励学生分享他们对时事的看法。

examples.en: In the discussion class, we debated the ethical implications of artificial intelligence.
examples.cn: 在讨论课上，我们辩论了人工智能的伦理影响。

examples.en: The team showed determination to win by practicing extra hours every day.
examples.cn: 球队通过每天额外训练表现出获胜的决心。

examples.en: Despite the setbacks, she showed determination to win the championship.
examples.cn: 尽管遇到挫折，她表现出赢得冠军的决心。

examples.en: Always save a back-up copy of important documents to avoid data loss.
examples.cn: 总是保存重要文件的备份副本以避免数据丢失。

examples.en: He saved a back-up copy of the project files on an external hard drive.
examples.cn: 他在外部硬盘上保存了项目文件的备份副本。

examples.en: Scientists are trying to tease apart the various factors that contribute to climate change.
examples.cn: 科学家正试图梳理导致气候变化的各种因素。

examples.en: It can be difficult to tease apart the emotional and logical aspects of a decision.
examples.cn: 梳理决策的情感和逻辑方面可能很困难。

examples.en: Interactive games are a great way to engage children in learning.
examples.cn: 互动游戏是吸引儿童参与学习的好方法。

examples.en: Teachers use storytelling to engage children during class activities.
examples.cn: 老师用讲故事来让儿童参与课堂活动。

examples.en: I have no more patience for this nonsense.
examples.cn: 我对这种胡闹再也没有耐心了。

examples.en: There's no more milk in the fridge.
examples.cn: 冰箱里没有牛奶了。

examples.en: No more talking during the movie.
examples.cn: 看电影时不要再说话了。

examples.en: That's it, no more excuses.
examples.cn: 就这样，别再找借口了。

examples.en: The police worked tirelessly to catch criminals in the area.
examples.cn: 警方不懈努力抓捕该地区的罪犯。

examples.en: New technology helps detectives catch criminals faster.
examples.cn: 新技术帮助侦探更快地抓捕罪犯。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get the lead out of one's pants

examples.en: Get the lead out of your pants, or we'll be late for the meeting.
examples.cn: 快点，不然我们开会要迟到了。

examples.en: He needs to get the lead out of his pants if he wants to finish the project on time.
examples.cn: 如果他想按时完成项目，就得加快速度。

examples.en: I'm just stepping out for a quick coffee break.
examples.cn: 我只是出去喝杯咖啡休息一下。

examples.en: She stepped out of the room to take a phone call.
examples.cn: 她走出房间去接电话。

examples.en: They decided to step out for a night on the town.
examples.cn: 他们决定晚上出去城里玩。

examples.en: Let's step out and enjoy the weekend.
examples.cn: 我们出去享受周末吧。

examples.en: The student requested to get an extension of time for the assignment.
examples.cn: 学生请求延长作业的提交时间。

examples.en: We managed to get an extension of time to complete the project.
examples.cn: 我们设法获得了延长完成项目的时间。

examples.en: Witnesses must testify under oath in court.
examples.cn: 证人必须在法庭上宣誓作证。

examples.en: He lied under oath and faced perjury charges.
examples.cn: 他在宣誓后撒谎，面临伪证指控。

examples.en: The building was given over to community use.
examples.cn: 这栋建筑被用于社区用途。

examples.en: Her life was given over to charitable work.
examples.cn: 她的一生都奉献给了慈善工作。

examples.en: He was given over to despair after the loss.
examples.cn: 损失后他沉溺于绝望之中。

examples.en: She is given over to studying for her exams.
examples.cn: 她专注于为考试学习。

examples.en: Many people are afraid of public speaking.
examples.cn: 很多人害怕公开演讲。

examples.en: Don't be afraid to ask for help when you need it.
examples.cn: 需要帮助时不要害怕求助。

examples.en: I'm afraid that we might miss the deadline.
examples.cn: 我担心我们可能会错过截止日期。

examples.en: She is afraid of what the future holds.
examples.cn: 她对未来感到忧虑。

examples.en: I was intrigued by the mysterious plot of the novel.
examples.cn: 我被小说神秘的情节吸引了。

examples.en: Scientists are intrigued by the new discovery.
examples.cn: 科学家们对这个新发现很感兴趣。

definitions.meaning_cn: 获得良好视野，清楚看到

examples.en: From the hilltop, you can get a good view of the entire city.
examples.cn: 从山顶上，你可以清楚看到整个城市。

examples.en: We got a good view of the stage from our seats.
examples.cn: 从我们的座位上，我们清楚地看到了舞台。

examples.en: I tried to cheer her up with a funny story.
examples.cn: 我试图用一个有趣的故事让她振作起来。

examples.en: A visit from friends always cheers me up.
examples.cn: 朋友的来访总能让我振作起来。

examples.en: He put his friend up to playing a prank on the teacher.
examples.cn: 他怂恿他的朋友对老师恶作剧。

examples.en: Who put you up to this mischief?
examples.cn: 是谁怂恿你做这种恶作剧的？

examples.en: We walked across the bridge to get to the other side.
examples.cn: 我们步行穿过桥到达对岸。

examples.en: It's safe to walk across the street at the crosswalk.
examples.cn: 在人行横道上过马路是安全的。

examples.en: Ever since he got promoted, he's been giving himself airs.
examples.cn: 自从他升职后，就一直摆架子。

examples.en: Don't give yourself airs just because you have a fancy car.
examples.cn: 别因为你有辆豪车就装腔作势。

examples.en: Are you in on the surprise party planning?
examples.cn: 你参与惊喜派对的策划了吗？

examples.en: She was in on the secret from the beginning.
examples.cn: 她从一开始就知道这个秘密。

examples.en: If you don't study, you'll drop behind in class.
examples.cn: 如果你不学习，你会在班上落后。

examples.en: The runner dropped behind due to an injury.
examples.cn: 那名跑步者因受伤而掉队了。

examples.en: I have an extra ticket for the concert if you want to come.
examples.cn: 如果你想来，我有一张音乐会的额外票。

examples.en: They sold the extra tickets at a discount.
examples.cn: 他们以折扣价出售了多余的票。

examples.en: Can you put me up for the night?
examples.cn: 你能让我留宿一晚吗？

examples.en: They put up their relatives during the holidays.
examples.cn: 他们在假期期间留宿亲戚。

examples.en: We put up posters to advertise the event.
examples.cn: 我们张贴海报来宣传活动。

examples.en: He put up his hand to ask a question.
examples.cn: 他举手提问。

examples.en: The bank offers an interest-free overdraft for students.
examples.cn: 银行为学生提供免息透支。

examples.en: She used her interest-free overdraft to cover unexpected expenses.
examples.cn: 她用免息透支来支付意外开支。

examples.en: This room serves as a temporary office.
examples.cn: 这个房间充当临时办公室。

examples.en: Her experience serves as a valuable lesson for others.
examples.cn: 她的经验对其他人来说是一个宝贵的教训。

examples.en: The tool serves as a multipurpose device.
examples.cn: 这个工具用作多功能设备。

examples.en: This law serves as protection for consumers.
examples.cn: 这项法律用于保护消费者。

examples.en: He kept back some important details during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议上隐瞒了一些重要细节。

examples.en: She decided to keep back her true feelings to avoid conflict.
examples.cn: 她决定隐瞒真实感受以避免冲突。

examples.en: The police kept back the crowd from the accident scene.
examples.cn: 警察阻止人群靠近事故现场。

examples.en: Please keep back from the edge of the cliff for safety.
examples.cn: 为了安全，请远离悬崖边缘。

examples.en: The company keeps back a portion of profits for reinvestment.
examples.cn: 公司保留一部分利润用于再投资。

examples.en: Taxes are kept back from your salary each month.
examples.cn: 税款每月从你的工资中扣留。

examples.en: This suitcase has room for all your clothes.
examples.cn: 这个行李箱有空间容纳你所有的衣服。

examples.en: The auditorium has room for 500 people.
examples.cn: 礼堂可容纳500人。

examples.en: There is room for improvement in your writing skills.
examples.cn: 你的写作技巧有改进的余地。

examples.en: The project has room for creative ideas.
examples.cn: 这个项目有创意发展的空间。

examples.en: He decided to quit school to start his own business.
examples.cn: 他决定辍学去创业。

examples.en: Many students quit school due to financial difficulties.
examples.cn: 许多学生因经济困难而退学。

examples.en: Don't just stand around; help with the cleaning.
examples.cn: 别光站着，帮忙打扫一下。

examples.en: We stood around waiting for the bus to arrive.
examples.cn: 我们闲站着等公交车来。

examples.en: The dormitory area is quiet after 10 PM.
examples.cn: 宿舍区在晚上10点后很安静。

examples.en: Security is tight in the dormitory area of the campus.
examples.cn: 校园宿舍区的安保很严格。

examples.en: She took a refresher course in first aid last month.
examples.cn: 她上个月参加了一个急救进修课程。

examples.en: The company offers refresher courses for employees to update their skills.
examples.cn: 公司为员工提供进修课程以更新技能。

examples.en: He gave rein to his anger and shouted at everyone.
examples.cn: 他放任自己的愤怒，对每个人大喊大叫。

examples.en: Parents should not give rein to their children's bad habits.
examples.cn: 父母不应纵容孩子的坏习惯。

examples.en: The teams hammered out a deal after hours of discussion.
examples.cn: 经过数小时讨论，团队敲定了一项协议。

examples.en: They need to hammer out the details before signing the contract.
examples.cn: 他们需要在签署合同前敲定细节。

examples.en: She hammered out a plan for the project over the weekend.
examples.cn: 她在周末精心制定了一个项目计划。

examples.en: The writer hammered out the final draft of the novel.
examples.cn: 作家反复推敲完成了小说的最终稿。

examples.en: To my relief, the test results were negative.
examples.cn: 令我欣慰的是，测试结果是阴性的。

examples.en: To everyone's relief, the missing child was found safe.
examples.cn: 令所有人欣慰的是，失踪的孩子被安全找到了。

examples.en: I have never set foot in that country before.
examples.cn: 我以前从未踏入过那个国家。

examples.en: She was excited to set foot in the new office building.
examples.cn: 她兴奋地踏入了新的办公楼。

examples.en: The team performed well as a whole during the competition.
examples.cn: 团队在比赛中总体上表现良好。

examples.en: As a whole, the project was a success despite some challenges.
examples.cn: 尽管有些挑战，项目总体上成功了。

examples.en: It took me a while to get the feel of driving a manual car.
examples.cn: 我花了一段时间才熟悉开手动挡汽车。

examples.en: She quickly got the feel of the new software after some practice.
examples.cn: 经过一些练习，她很快熟悉了新软件。

examples.en: The government aims to maintain the status quo in the region.
examples.cn: 政府旨在维持该地区的现状。

examples.en: He is resistant to change and prefers the status quo.
examples.cn: 他抗拒改变，更喜欢现状。

examples.en: The campaign aims to educate the public about climate change.
examples.cn: 这项运动旨在教育公众关于气候变化。

examples.en: Schools should educate the public about healthy eating habits.
examples.cn: 学校应教育公众关于健康的饮食习惯。

examples.en: Please behave yourself at the dinner party.
examples.cn: 请在晚宴上规矩点。

examples.en: The teacher told the students to behave themselves during the field trip.
examples.cn: 老师告诉学生在实地考察时要行为端正。

examples.en: The kidnappers held the businessman to ransom for a large sum of money.
examples.cn: 绑匪勒索商人一大笔钱。

examples.en: He was held to ransom by his competitors who threatened to reveal his secrets.
examples.cn: 他被竞争对手要挟，威胁要揭露他的秘密。

examples.en: The company hired professional trainers to improve employee skills.
examples.cn: 公司聘请了专业培训师来提高员工技能。

examples.en: Professional trainers are essential for effective sports coaching.
examples.cn: 专业培训师对于有效的体育教练至关重要。

examples.en: She gained practical experience through internships during college.
examples.cn: 她通过大学期间的实习获得了实践经验。

examples.en: Practical experience is often more valuable than theoretical knowledge in this field.
examples.cn: 在这个领域，实践经验通常比理论知识更有价值。

examples.en: The students entered the classroom one by one.
examples.cn: 学生们一个接一个地进入教室。

examples.en: He solved the problems one by one until they were all finished.
examples.cn: 他一个接一个地解决问题，直到全部完成。

examples.en: The document is attached to the email for your review.
examples.cn: 文件附在电子邮件中供您审阅。

examples.en: This USB drive is attached to the computer for data transfer.
examples.cn: 这个U盘连接到电脑用于数据传输。

examples.en: She is very attached to her childhood home.
examples.cn: 她非常依恋她童年的家。

examples.en: He became attached to the stray cat he found in the park.
examples.cn: 他变得依恋在公园里发现的流浪猫。

examples.en: In the final round, he decided to go for broke and bet all his chips.
examples.cn: 在最后一轮，他决定孤注一掷，押上了所有筹码。

examples.en: She went for broke by quitting her job to start her own business.
examples.cn: 她孤注一掷，辞去工作创办了自己的公司。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take a dim view of sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事持不赞成或悲观的态度

examples.en: The manager takes a dim view of employees arriving late.
examples.cn: 经理对员工迟到持不赞成的态度。

examples.en: She takes a dim view of the new policy changes.
examples.cn: 她对新的政策变化持悲观看法。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在不利的一面，缺点方面

examples.en: On the minus side, the car has poor fuel efficiency.
examples.cn: 在缺点方面，这辆车的燃油效率很差。

examples.en: On the minus side, the project will require a large initial investment.
examples.cn: 在不利的一面，这个项目需要大量的初始投资。

examples.en: I need to get after my son to finish his homework.
examples.cn: 我需要催促我儿子完成他的作业。

examples.en: The boss got after the team for missing the deadline.
examples.cn: 老板因为团队错过了截止日期而批评了他们。

examples.en: The employees bucked against the new work schedule.
examples.cn: 员工们抵制新的工作时间表。

examples.en: He always bucks against authority figures.
examples.cn: 他总是反抗权威人物。

definitions.meaning_cn: 伸出橄榄枝，表示和解或和平意愿

examples.en: After the argument, she held out the olive branch by apologizing first.
examples.cn: 争吵后，她首先道歉，伸出了橄榄枝。

examples.en: The country held out the olive branch to its neighbors to improve relations.
examples.cn: 该国向邻国伸出橄榄枝以改善关系。

examples.en: He made a statement to the effect that he would resign soon.
examples.cn: 他发表声明，大意是他将很快辞职。

examples.en: The report concluded to the effect that more research is needed.
examples.cn: 报告得出结论，意思是需要更多研究。

examples.en: The company took a bath on that failed investment.
examples.cn: 公司在那次失败的投资中遭受了重大损失。

examples.en: He took a bath in the stock market crash.
examples.cn: 他在股市崩盘中损失惨重。

examples.en: We aim to finish the project by next month.
examples.cn: 我们的目标是在下个月完成这个项目。

examples.en: She aims to improve her English skills this year.
examples.cn: 她旨在今年提高她的英语技能。

examples.en: I can't help with that now; I have other fish to fry.
examples.cn: 我现在不能帮忙；我有更重要的事情要做。

examples.en: He declined the invitation because he had other fish to fry.
examples.cn: 他拒绝了邀请，因为他有更重要的事情。

examples.en: The study helped us get insight into consumer behavior.
examples.cn: 这项研究帮助我们深入了解消费者行为。

examples.en: She got insight into the problem after analyzing the data.
examples.cn: 分析数据后，她获得了对问题的洞察。

examples.en: His talent as a musician is beyond dispute.
examples.cn: 他作为音乐家的才华是无可争议的。

examples.en: The facts of the case are beyond dispute.
examples.cn: 案件的事实是不容置疑的。

examples.en: She leafed through the magazine while waiting.
examples.cn: 她等待时快速翻阅了杂志。

examples.en: He leafed through the report to get an overview.
examples.cn: 他浏览了报告以获取概览。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事有强烈的喜好或倾向

examples.en: She has a penchant for classical music.
examples.cn: 她对古典音乐有强烈的喜好。

examples.en: He has a penchant for taking risks in business.
examples.cn: 他在商业中有冒险的倾向。

examples.en: I woke up with a Charley horse in my calf.
examples.cn: 我醒来时小腿抽筋了。

examples.en: After the long run, he had a Charley horse in his thigh.
examples.cn: 长跑后，他的大腿肌肉痉挛了。

examples.en: Muscular cells contract to produce movement.
examples.cn: 肌肉细胞收缩以产生运动。

examples.en: The study focused on the function of muscular cells in the heart.
examples.cn: 这项研究专注于心脏中肌肉细胞的功能。

examples.en: Please notify me of any changes to the schedule.
examples.cn: 请通知我日程的任何变化。

examples.en: The company notified employees of the new policy.
examples.cn: 公司通知员工新政策。

examples.en: We spent the afternoon soaking up the sun on the beach.
examples.cn: 我们下午在海滩上晒太阳。

examples.en: He loves to soak up the sun in his backyard.
examples.cn: 他喜欢在后院享受阳光。

examples.en: Swale erosion can lead to soil degradation in agricultural areas.
examples.cn: 洼地侵蚀可能导致农业区的土壤退化。

examples.en: The project aims to prevent swale erosion through vegetation planting.
examples.cn: 该项目旨在通过植被种植防止沟壑侵蚀。

examples.en: He got the air after missing three deadlines.
examples.cn: 他错过了三个截止日期后被解雇了。

examples.en: She got the air from the club for breaking the rules.
examples.cn: 她因违反规定被俱乐部拒绝了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被抛弃或被甩（在恋爱关系中）

examples.en: He got the air when she found out he was cheating.
examples.cn: 当她发现他出轨时，他被甩了。

examples.en: After the argument, she gave him the air and ended the relationship.
examples.cn: 争吵后，她抛弃了他并结束了这段关系。

examples.en: I lose sleep over the upcoming exam.
examples.cn: 我为即将到来的考试失眠。

examples.en: She loses sleep because of her noisy neighbors.
examples.cn: 她因为吵闹的邻居睡眠不足。

examples.en: Don't lose sleep over that minor mistake.
examples.cn: 别为那个小错误过度担心。

examples.en: He loses sleep about his financial problems.
examples.cn: 他为财务问题焦虑得睡不着。

examples.en: Her opinion is different from mine.
examples.cn: 她的观点与我的不同。

examples.en: This model is different from the previous one.
examples.cn: 这个型号与之前的那个不同。

examples.en: Exercising regularly can help improve self-esteem.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼有助于提高自尊心。

examples.en: She took a course to improve her self-esteem.
examples.cn: 她参加了一个课程来提高自尊心。

examples.en: The baby made a noise while sleeping.
examples.cn: 婴儿睡觉时发出了声音。

examples.en: Please don't make a noise during the meeting.
examples.cn: 会议期间请不要发出噪音。

examples.en: The community made a noise about the new construction.
examples.cn: 社区对新建筑提出了抗议。

examples.en: He made a noise to get the teacher's attention.
examples.cn: 他发出声音以引起老师的注意。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get one's ducks in a row

definitions.meaning_cn: 把事情安排得井井有条

examples.en: Before the trip, she got her ducks in a row by packing early.
examples.cn: 旅行前，她早早打包，把事情安排得井井有条。

examples.en: He needs to get his ducks in a row before starting the project.
examples.cn: 他开始项目前需要把事情安排妥当。

examples.en: Carry on with your work despite the interruptions.
examples.cn: 尽管有干扰，继续你的工作。

examples.en: They decided to carry on the discussion tomorrow.
examples.cn: 他们决定明天继续讨论。

definitions.meaning_cn: 表现或行为（通常指不当行为）

examples.en: He carried on like a child when he didn't get his way.
examples.cn: 当他没得逞时，他表现得像个孩子。

examples.en: Stop carrying on and calm down.
examples.cn: 别闹了，冷静下来。

examples.en: The species is in danger of extinction.
examples.cn: 这个物种处于灭绝的危险中。

examples.en: He is in danger of losing his job.
examples.cn: 他处于失去工作的危险中。

examples.en: She is without question the best candidate.
examples.cn: 她毫无疑问是最佳候选人。

examples.en: The evidence proves his guilt without question.
examples.cn: 证据毫无疑问地证明了他的罪行。

examples.en: The company hopes to break even this year.
examples.cn: 公司希望今年能收支平衡。

examples.en: After the initial investment, they managed to break even.
examples.cn: 在初始投资后，他们设法做到了不赚不赔。

examples.en: There is a lack of resources in the area.
examples.cn: 该地区资源缺乏。

examples.en: His lack of experience showed in the presentation.
examples.cn: 他在演示中表现出经验不足。

examples.en: It was raining; even so, they went for a walk.
examples.cn: 天在下雨；尽管如此，他们还是去散步了。

examples.en: He was tired, but even so, he finished the task.
examples.cn: 他很累，但尽管如此，他还是完成了任务。

examples.en: She studies classical literature from ancient Greece.
examples.cn: 她研究古希腊的古典文学。

examples.en: Classical literature often explores timeless themes.
examples.cn: 古典文学常常探讨永恒的主题。

examples.en: Don't leave out any important details in your report.
examples.cn: 在你的报告中不要遗漏任何重要细节。

examples.en: He was left out of the team due to injury.
examples.cn: 他因伤被排除在团队之外。

examples.en: She takes her cue from her mentor in business decisions.
examples.cn: 她在商业决策上从她的导师那里得到提示。

examples.en: The actor took his cue from the director's instructions.
examples.cn: 演员从导演的指示中得到提示。

examples.en: She keeps her colleagues at arm's length to maintain professionalism.
examples.cn: 她与同事保持距离以维持专业性。

examples.en: He keeps suspicious people at arm's length.
examples.cn: 他与可疑的人保持距离。

examples.en: He resigned in disgrace after the scandal.
examples.cn: 丑闻后，他不光彩地辞职了。

examples.en: The politician left office in disgrace.
examples.cn: 这位政治家不光彩地离职了。

examples.en: After the accident, he came to his senses and apologized.
examples.cn: 事故后，他恢复理智并道歉了。

examples.en: She finally came to her senses and ended the toxic relationship.
examples.cn: 她终于醒悟过来，结束了这段有害的关系。

examples.en: Many self-made celebrities share their success stories online.
examples.cn: 许多白手起家的名人在网上分享他们的成功故事。

examples.en: He is a self-made celebrity who built his empire from scratch.
examples.cn: 他是一个白手起家的名人，从零开始建立了他的帝国。

examples.en: Skilled workers are in demand in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 技术行业对熟练工人的需求量大。

examples.en: This product is in demand during the holiday season.
examples.cn: 这个产品在假日季节很受欢迎。

examples.en: I'm on the way to the office and should arrive in 10 minutes.
examples.cn: 我正在去办公室的路上，应该10分钟后到。

examples.en: The package is on the way and will be delivered tomorrow.
examples.cn: 包裹在途中，明天会送达。

examples.en: Changes are on the way for the new policy implementation.
examples.cn: 新政策实施即将带来变化。

examples.en: With hard work, success is on the way.
examples.cn: 通过努力，成功即将到来。

examples.en: After 10 years, she decided to resign her position as CEO.
examples.cn: 10年后，她决定辞去CEO的职位。

examples.en: He resigned his position due to personal reasons.
examples.cn: 他因个人原因辞去了职位。

definitions.meaning_cn: 启动，开始进行（尤指项目或计划）

examples.en: The new startup is struggling to get off the ground without enough funding.
examples.cn: 这家新初创公司因资金不足而难以启动。

examples.en: Once we secure the permits, the construction project will get off the ground.
examples.cn: 一旦获得许可，建筑项目就会启动。

examples.en: The plane got off the ground smoothly despite the windy conditions.
examples.cn: 尽管有风，飞机还是平稳起飞了。

examples.en: Delays caused the flight to get off the ground an hour late.
examples.cn: 延误导致航班晚起飞一小时。

examples.en: Harvard and Stanford are considered elite universities worldwide.
examples.cn: 哈佛和斯坦福被认为是全球的精英大学。

examples.en: Admission to elite universities is highly competitive.
examples.cn: 进入精英大学的竞争非常激烈。

definitions.meaning_cn: 让某人做某事，安排某人做

examples.en: I'll have my assistant do the paperwork for the meeting.
examples.cn: 我会让我的助理处理会议的文件工作。

examples.en: She had the mechanic do a full check on her car.
examples.cn: 她让机械师对她的车进行了全面检查。

examples.en: After the company downsized, many employees got the ax.
examples.cn: 公司裁员后，许多员工被解雇了。

examples.en: He got the ax for consistently missing deadlines.
examples.cn: 他因屡次错过截止日期而被开除。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被取消，被终止（指项目或计划）

examples.en: Due to budget cuts, the research project got the ax.
examples.cn: 由于预算削减，这个研究项目被取消了。

examples.en: The TV show got the ax after low ratings in its first season.
examples.cn: 这部电视剧因第一季收视率低而被终止了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 聪明的学生，有才华的学生

examples.en: Bright students often excel in problem-solving tasks.
examples.cn: 聪明的学生通常在解决问题任务中表现出色。

examples.en: The school provides extra resources for bright students to thrive.
examples.cn: 学校为聪明的学生提供额外资源以促进其发展。

examples.en: In the dark cave, we had to feel our way along the walls.
examples.cn: 在黑暗的洞穴里，我们不得不沿着墙壁摸索前进。

examples.en: As a new manager, she is feeling her way through the team dynamics.
examples.cn: 作为新经理，她正在谨慎地处理团队动态。

examples.en: He's feeling his way into the new job by asking lots of questions.
examples.cn: 他通过问很多问题来试探了解新工作。

examples.en: Before making a decision, it's wise to feel your way and gather information.
examples.cn: 在做决定前，明智的做法是试探并收集信息。

examples.en: Maintaining a balanced diet is key to good health and energy levels.
examples.cn: 保持均衡饮食是良好健康和能量水平的关键。

examples.en: A balanced diet includes fruits, vegetables, proteins, and grains.
examples.cn: 均衡饮食包括水果、蔬菜、蛋白质和谷物。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因文化而异，不同文化间有差异

examples.en: Social norms differ from culture to culture, so it's important to be respectful when traveling.
examples.cn: 社会规范因文化而异，因此旅行时尊重他人很重要。

examples.en: The concept of personal space can differ from culture to culture.
examples.cn: 个人空间的概念可能因文化而异。

examples.en: Her innovative approach sets her apart from other designers in the industry.
examples.cn: 她的创新方法使她在行业中与其他设计师不同。

examples.en: The unique flavor of this coffee sets it apart from regular blends.
examples.cn: 这种咖啡的独特风味使其与常规混合咖啡区分开来。

examples.en: We need to set some funds apart for emergency expenses.
examples.cn: 我们需要预留一些资金用于紧急开支。

examples.en: He sets an hour apart each day for meditation and relaxation.
examples.cn: 他每天留出一小时用于冥想和放松。

examples.en: She stopped to take a selfie in front of the famous landmark.
examples.cn: 她在著名地标前停下来自拍。

examples.en: Taking a selfie has become a common way to capture memories.
examples.cn: 自拍已成为捕捉记忆的常见方式。

definitions.meaning_cn: 站在某人上方或旁边（常指监督或威胁）

examples.en: The teacher stood over the student to ensure he was working on the assignment.
examples.cn: 老师站在学生旁边以确保他在做作业。

examples.en: He felt uncomfortable when his boss stood over him during the presentation.
examples.cn: 当老板在演示时站在他上方，他感到不舒服。

examples.en: The manager stands over the team to make sure deadlines are met.
examples.cn: 经理监督团队以确保截止日期得到满足。

examples.en: Parents often stand over their children while they do homework.
examples.cn: 父母常在孩子做作业时监督他们。

definitions.meaning_cn: 获得进入权，获取访问权限

examples.en: With the correct password, you can gain access to the secure database.
examples.cn: 使用正确的密码，你可以获得安全数据库的访问权限。

examples.en: The new policy allows employees to gain access to flexible working hours.
examples.cn: 新政策允许员工获得灵活工作时间的权限。

definitions.meaning_cn: 接触到，利用（资源或机会）

examples.en: Students can gain access to online libraries for research purposes.
examples.cn: 学生可以接触到在线图书馆用于研究目的。

examples.en: Through networking, she gained access to valuable industry insights.
examples.cn: 通过社交，她接触到了宝贵的行业见解。

examples.en: I need to withdraw money from the cashpoint machine at the corner.
examples.cn: 我需要从街角的自动取款机取钱。

examples.en: Cashpoint machines are convenient for quick transactions outside bank hours.
examples.cn: 自动取款机在银行营业时间外进行快速交易很方便。

examples.en: A good working environment boosts employee morale and productivity.
examples.cn: 良好的工作环境能提升员工士气和生产力。

examples.en: Companies should strive to create a good working environment for their staff.
examples.cn: 公司应努力为员工创造良好的工作环境。

examples.en: There has been a significant improvement in the company's sales figures this quarter.
examples.cn: 本季度公司的销售数据有了显著改进。

examples.en: Regular practice leads to improvement in language skills over time.
examples.cn: 定期练习会随着时间的推移提高语言技能。

definitions.meaning_cn: 迅速转向，灵活改变方向（字面或比喻）

examples.en: The sports car can turn on a dime, making it great for tight corners.
examples.cn: 这辆跑车能迅速转向，非常适合急转弯。

examples.en: In business, the ability to turn on a dime can help adapt to market changes.
examples.cn: 在商业中，迅速转向的能力有助于适应市场变化。

examples.en: He can turn on a dime when new information comes to light.
examples.cn: 当新信息出现时，他能突然改变主意。

examples.en: The team had to turn on a dime after the client changed the requirements.
examples.cn: 客户改变要求后，团队不得不突然改变行动。

definitions.meaning_cn: 点击（计算机或设备上的按钮或链接）

examples.en: To open the file, simply click on the icon on your desktop.
examples.cn: 要打开文件，只需点击桌面上的图标。

examples.en: Click on the link to access the online registration form.
examples.cn: 点击链接访问在线注册表格。

examples.en: When he fell into the river, he immediately called for help.
examples.cn: 他掉进河里时，立即呼救。

examples.en: The stranded hikers had to call for help using their satellite phone.
examples.cn: 被困的徒步旅行者不得不用卫星电话求救。

examples.en: The situation calls for help from experienced professionals.
examples.cn: 这种情况需要经验丰富的专业人士的帮助。

examples.en: Her essay calls for help in understanding complex theories.
examples.cn: 她的论文需要帮助来理解复杂的理论。

examples.en: The Eiffel Tower is a popular sightseeing spot in Paris.
examples.cn: 埃菲尔铁塔是巴黎的热门观光景点。

examples.en: We visited several sightseeing spots during our trip to Japan.
examples.cn: 我们在日本旅行期间参观了几个观光景点。

examples.en: I decided to take my doctor's advice and start exercising regularly.
examples.cn: 我决定接受医生的建议，开始定期锻炼。

examples.en: She took her friend's advice and applied for the job.
examples.cn: 她接受了朋友的建议，申请了那份工作。

examples.en: Many rare species exist in the Amazon rainforest.
examples.cn: 许多稀有物种存在于亚马逊雨林中。

examples.en: Opportunities for growth exist in every challenge.
examples.cn: 成长的机会存在于每一个挑战中。

definitions.meaning_cn: 辱骂某人，给某人起绰号

examples.en: The bully called him names during recess.
examples.cn: 那个恶霸在课间休息时辱骂他。

examples.en: It's not polite to call people names just because you disagree with them.
examples.cn: 仅仅因为不同意就辱骂别人是不礼貌的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人感到骄傲，为某人争光

examples.en: Her academic achievements did her parents proud.
examples.cn: 她的学业成就让她的父母感到骄傲。

examples.en: The team's victory did the entire school proud.
examples.cn: 团队的胜利让整个学校都感到骄傲。

examples.en: The new TV show aims to increase ratings for the network.
examples.cn: 这部新电视节目旨在提高该电视网的收视率。

examples.en: Positive reviews helped increase the restaurant's ratings online.
examples.cn: 好评有助于提高这家餐厅的在线评分。

examples.en: The government plans to bring down inflation rates.
examples.cn: 政府计划降低通货膨胀率。

examples.en: Efforts to bring down crime in the city have been successful.
examples.cn: 降低城市犯罪率的努力已经取得了成功。

examples.en: The rebels attempted to bring down the regime.
examples.cn: 叛军试图推翻该政权。

examples.en: The scandal could bring down the entire administration.
examples.cn: 这起丑闻可能会推翻整个政府。

examples.en: I have my eye out for a good deal on a used car.
examples.cn: 我正在留意二手车的优惠交易。

examples.en: She has her eye out for opportunities to advance her career.
examples.cn: 她正在寻找职业发展的机会。

examples.en: After winning the award, he started to have a swelled head.
examples.cn: 获奖后，他开始变得自负。

examples.en: Don't let success give you a swelled head.
examples.cn: 不要让成功让你变得骄傲自大。

examples.en: The company decided to scale down its operations due to budget cuts.
examples.cn: 由于预算削减，公司决定缩减运营规模。

examples.en: We need to scale down the project to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 我们需要缩减项目规模以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: She did her utmost to finish the assignment on time.
examples.cn: 她竭尽全力按时完成作业。

examples.en: The rescue team did their utmost to save the trapped miners.
examples.cn: 救援队竭尽全力营救被困的矿工。

examples.en: After the meeting, he fell to work on the report.
examples.cn: 会议结束后，他开始着手写报告。

examples.en: The children fell to playing as soon as they arrived at the park.
examples.cn: 孩子们一到公园就开始玩耍。

examples.en: The responsibility fell to the oldest sibling.
examples.cn: 责任落到了最年长的兄弟姐妹身上。

examples.en: The city fell to enemy forces after a long siege.
examples.cn: 经过长期围困，这座城市落入了敌军手中。

examples.en: I met her a while back at a conference.
examples.cn: 我不久前在一次会议上见过她。

examples.en: He moved to New York a while back.
examples.cn: 他不久前搬到了纽约。

examples.en: He promised to help, but he let me down at the last minute.
examples.cn: 他答应帮忙，但在最后一刻让我失望了。

examples.en: Don't let your team down by not preparing for the presentation.
examples.cn: 不要因为没准备演讲而让你的团队失望。

examples.en: I am in sympathy with the victims of the disaster.
examples.cn: 我同情这场灾难的受害者。

examples.en: Many people are in sympathy with the environmental movement.
examples.cn: 许多人赞同环保运动。

examples.en: He proposed marriage to her on a beach at sunset.
examples.cn: 他在日落时的海滩上向她求婚。

examples.en: She was surprised when he proposed marriage after only six months of dating.
examples.cn: 当他在约会仅六个月后求婚时，她感到惊讶。

examples.en: The new law will come into operation next month.
examples.cn: 新法律将于下个月生效。

examples.en: The factory came into operation after extensive testing.
examples.cn: 经过广泛测试后，工厂开始运行。

examples.en: The government's infrastructure projects aim to create employment.
examples.cn: 政府的基础设施项目旨在创造就业机会。

examples.en: Small businesses are important to create employment in local communities.
examples.cn: 小企业对在当地社区创造就业机会很重要。

examples.en: Since it's raining, we may just as well stay indoors.
examples.cn: 既然下雨了，我们不妨待在室内。

examples.en: You may just as well ask for help if you're struggling with the task.
examples.cn: 如果你在任务上遇到困难，不妨寻求帮助。

examples.en: She only shares her deepest secrets with her close friends.
examples.cn: 她只与亲密朋友分享她最深的秘密。

examples.en: We've been close friends since childhood and trust each other completely.
examples.cn: 我们从小就是挚友，完全信任彼此。

examples.en: He is not always punctual, but he tries his best.
examples.cn: 他并非总是准时，但他尽力了。

examples.en: The weather in this region is not always sunny; it can be unpredictable.
examples.cn: 这个地区的天气不总是晴朗的；它可能变化无常。

examples.en: She took to painting as a hobby after retiring.
examples.cn: 退休后，她开始喜欢上绘画作为爱好。

examples.en: The children quickly took to their new teacher because of her kindness.
examples.cn: 孩子们很快对新老师产生了好感，因为她很友善。

examples.en: During the storm, they took to the basement for safety.
examples.cn: 暴风雨期间，他们逃往地下室以求安全。

examples.en: The fugitive took to the hills to avoid capture.
examples.cn: 逃犯躲到山里以避免被捕。

examples.en: My father worked as a civil servant in the government for over 30 years.
examples.cn: 我父亲在政府担任公务员超过30年。

examples.en: Civil servants are expected to uphold high ethical standards in their duties.
examples.cn: 公务员应在职责中坚持高道德标准。

examples.en: She tucks away her savings in a secret bank account.
examples.cn: 她把积蓄藏在一个秘密的银行账户里。

examples.en: We tucked away the old photos in a box in the attic.
examples.cn: 我们把旧照片存放在阁楼的一个盒子里。

examples.en: After the long hike, he tucked away a huge meal at the restaurant.
examples.cn: 长途徒步后，他在餐厅狼吞虎咽地吃了一顿大餐。

examples.en: The kids tucked away all the cookies in no time.
examples.cn: 孩子们很快就吃光了所有的饼干。

examples.en: Go on! Tell me what happened next in the story.
examples.cn: 继续！告诉我故事接下来发生了什么。

examples.en: When she hesitated, he encouraged her by saying, 'Go on, you can do it!'
examples.cn: 当她犹豫时，他鼓励她说：'继续，你能行的！'

examples.en: Go on! You're just making excuses for being late.
examples.cn: 得了吧！你只是在为迟到找借口。

examples.en: He claimed he saw a ghost, but we all said, 'Go on, that's impossible!'
examples.cn: 他声称看到了鬼，但我们都說：'别胡说了，那不可能！'

examples.en: The country is in the grip of a severe economic crisis.
examples.cn: 这个国家正处于严重的经济危机掌控中。

examples.en: He was in the grip of fear and couldn't move during the earthquake.
examples.cn: 地震时，他受恐惧控制，无法动弹。

examples.en: The bullies worked him over after school, leaving him with bruises.
examples.cn: 放学后，恶霸们殴打了他，留下瘀伤。

examples.en: In the movie, the gangsters worked over the informant to get information.
examples.cn: 在电影中，黑帮分子粗暴对待线人以获取信息。

examples.en: The detective worked over the suspect with intense questioning.
examples.cn: 侦探通过密集的审问仔细检查了嫌疑人。

examples.en: The coach worked over the team to improve their skills before the big game.
examples.cn: 教练在大赛前仔细处理球队以提高他们的技能。

examples.en: She talked her friend into joining the hiking trip despite the bad weather.
examples.cn: 尽管天气不好，她说服朋友参加了徒步旅行。

examples.en: He managed to talk his boss into giving him a raise after presenting his achievements.
examples.cn: 在展示成就后，他成功说服老板给他加薪。

examples.en: On weekends, they just sit around watching TV all day.
examples.cn: 周末，他们只是闲坐着看一整天电视。

examples.en: Don't just sit around; go out and do something productive!
examples.cn: 别只是无所事事；出去做些有成效的事！

examples.en: He was found in possession of illegal drugs during the police search.
examples.cn: 在警方搜查中，他被发现持有非法毒品。

examples.en: She is in possession of a rare antique that has been in her family for generations.
examples.cn: 她拥有一件稀有的古董，已在家族中传了几代。

examples.en: The giant panda was once on the brink of extinction but has since recovered due to conservation efforts.
examples.cn: 大熊猫曾一度濒临灭绝，但由于保护努力已恢复。

examples.en: Many species are on the brink of extinction due to habitat loss and climate change.
examples.cn: 由于栖息地丧失和气候变化，许多物种濒临灭绝。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put sth. in the way of sb.

definitions.meaning_cn: 阻碍某人，给某人设置障碍

examples.en: The new regulations put many obstacles in the way of small businesses trying to expand.
examples.cn: 新规定给试图扩张的小企业设置了许多障碍。

examples.en: She didn't want to put anything in the way of her children's education.
examples.cn: 她不想阻碍孩子们的教育。

examples.en: That cloud looks like a dragon in the sky.
examples.cn: 那朵云看起来像天空中的一条龙。

examples.en: She looks like her mother with the same smile and eyes.
examples.cn: 她看起来像她母亲，有着相同的微笑和眼睛。

examples.en: It looks like it's going to rain soon, so we should bring umbrellas.
examples.cn: 看起来好像很快要下雨了，所以我们应该带伞。

examples.en: He looks like he hasn't slept well, with dark circles under his eyes.
examples.cn: 他看起来好像没睡好，眼下有黑眼圈。

examples.en: Her performance was nearly perfect, earning her a standing ovation.
examples.cn: 她的表演近乎完美，赢得了起立鼓掌。

examples.en: The weather for the picnic was nearly perfect, with clear skies and a gentle breeze.
examples.cn: 野餐的天气近乎完美，天空晴朗，微风轻拂。

examples.en: If you study hard, you are more likely to pass the exam.
examples.cn: 如果你努力学习，你更可能通过考试。

examples.en: In winter, it is more likely to snow in mountainous regions.
examples.cn: 在冬季，山区更可能下雪。

examples.en: There are a lot of books on the shelf, covering various topics.
examples.cn: 书架上有许多书，涵盖各种主题。

examples.en: She has a lot of experience in managing projects, which makes her a valuable team member.
examples.cn: 她在管理项目方面有大量经验，这使她成为宝贵的团队成员。

examples.en: She has kept a diary since she was ten years old to record her daily thoughts.
examples.cn: 她从十岁起就记日记，记录日常想法。

examples.en: Keeping a diary helps him reflect on his experiences and personal growth.
examples.cn: 记日记帮助他反思经历和个人成长。

examples.en: The lawyer spoke on behalf of her client during the court hearing.
examples.cn: 律师在法庭听证会上代表她的客户发言。

examples.en: On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for your support.
examples.cn: 我代表整个团队，感谢您的支持。

examples.en: The new software is designed to meet the needs of both beginners and advanced users.
examples.cn: 新软件旨在满足初学者和高级用户的需求。

examples.en: A balanced diet is essential to meet one's nutritional needs for good health.
examples.cn: 均衡饮食对于满足营养需求以保持健康至关重要。

examples.en: The project was completed on schedule despite the challenges.
examples.cn: 尽管面临挑战，项目还是按时完成了。

examples.en: The train arrived on schedule, so we didn't have to wait.
examples.cn: 火车准时到达，所以我们不必等待。

examples.en: Can you lend me a hand with moving this heavy furniture?
examples.cn: 你能帮我搬一下这件重家具吗？

examples.en: She always lends a hand to her neighbors when they need help.
examples.cn: 当邻居需要帮助时，她总是伸出援手。

examples.en: I decided to go along with their plan because it seemed reasonable.
examples.cn: 我决定同意他们的计划，因为它看起来合理。

examples.en: He didn't want to go along with the decision, but he had no choice.
examples.cn: 他不想赞同这个决定，但别无选择。

examples.en: Would you like to go along with us to the concert tonight?
examples.cn: 你今晚想和我们一起去音乐会吗？

examples.en: She went along with her friends on the hiking trip.
examples.cn: 她和朋友们一起去徒步旅行。

definitions.meaning_cn: 闲站着，无所事事地站着

examples.en: Don't just stand about; help us clean up the room.
examples.cn: 别光站着，帮我们打扫房间。

examples.en: The workers were standing about waiting for instructions.
examples.cn: 工人们闲站着等待指示。

examples.en: You should make an effort to improve your English skills.
examples.cn: 你应该努力提高你的英语技能。

examples.en: He made an effort to arrive on time for the meeting.
examples.cn: 他努力准时参加会议。

examples.en: They adapted the novel for a television series.
examples.cn: 他们将这部小说改编成了电视剧。

examples.en: The software was adapted for use on mobile devices.
examples.cn: 这款软件被改编用于移动设备。

examples.en: This new policy aims to satisfy the need of low-income families.
examples.cn: 这项新政策旨在满足低收入家庭的需求。

examples.en: The company developed a product to satisfy the need of elderly users.
examples.cn: 公司开发了一款产品来满足老年用户的需求。

examples.en: We need to make a fire to keep warm in the cold night.
examples.cn: 我们需要生火在寒冷的夜晚保暖。

examples.en: He knows how to make a fire using only sticks and leaves.
examples.cn: 他知道如何只用树枝和树叶生火。

examples.en: The police charged him with theft after finding evidence.
examples.cn: 警方在找到证据后指控他犯有盗窃罪。

examples.en: She was charged with fraud for her involvement in the scam.
examples.cn: 她因参与诈骗而被指控犯有欺诈罪。

examples.en: The manager charged her with organizing the company event.
examples.cn: 经理委托她负责组织公司活动。

examples.en: He was charged with the task of training new employees.
examples.cn: 他被委托负责培训新员工的任务。

examples.en: The finish line is in sight, so keep running!
examples.cn: 终点线在望，继续跑！

examples.en: After hours of hiking, the mountain peak was finally in sight.
examples.cn: 经过数小时的徒步，山峰终于可见了。

examples.en: With the new contract, success is in sight for the business.
examples.cn: 有了新合同，企业的成功在望。

examples.en: Peace negotiations are in sight after years of conflict.
examples.cn: 经过多年的冲突，和平谈判在望。

examples.en: The city is promoting public transport to reduce private car use.
examples.cn: 该市正在推广公共交通以减少私家车使用。

examples.en: Private car use has increased significantly in urban areas.
examples.cn: 在城市地区，私家车使用显著增加。

examples.en: They managed to bring off the difficult project on time.
examples.cn: 他们设法按时完成了这个困难的项目。

examples.en: It was a risky plan, but she brought it off perfectly.
examples.cn: 这是一个冒险的计划，但她完美地实现了它。

examples.en: Please include a packing list with the shipment for customs clearance.
examples.cn: 请在货物中附上装箱单以便清关。

examples.en: The packing list details all items in the package.
examples.cn: 装箱单详细列出了包裹中的所有物品。

definitions.meaning_cn: 空中楼阁，不切实际的幻想

examples.en: His plan to become a millionaire overnight is just pie in the sky.
examples.cn: 他一夜成为百万富翁的计划只是空中楼阁。

examples.en: Don't believe those pie in the sky promises; they're unrealistic.
examples.cn: 别相信那些不切实际的承诺；它们不现实。

examples.en: You better watch your step on the icy sidewalk to avoid slipping.
examples.cn: 在结冰的人行道上，你最好小心行走以防滑倒。

examples.en: In this competitive industry, you better watch your step to stay ahead.
examples.cn: 在这个竞争激烈的行业，你最好谨慎行事以保持领先。

examples.en: Children are often curious about how things work.
examples.cn: 孩子们常常对事物如何运作感到好奇。

examples.en: She was curious about the new neighbor and decided to introduce herself.
examples.cn: 她对新邻居感到好奇，决定自我介绍。

examples.en: Many small businesses went to the wall during the economic crisis.
examples.cn: 在经济危机期间，许多小企业破产了。

examples.en: If we don't improve sales, our company might go to the wall.
examples.cn: 如果我们不提高销售额，我们的公司可能会失败。

examples.en: He went to the wall defending his principles in the argument.
examples.cn: 在争论中，他为捍卫自己的原则被逼到绝境。

examples.en: The team went to the wall but managed to win the game in the end.
examples.cn: 球队被逼到绝境，但最终设法赢得了比赛。

examples.en: Students learn about history from textbooks and documentaries.
examples.cn: 学生们从教科书和纪录片中了解历史。

examples.en: I want to learn about different cultures by traveling the world.
examples.cn: 我想通过环游世界来了解不同的文化。

examples.en: She came into a large fortune after her grandfather passed away.
examples.cn: 她的祖父去世后，她继承了一大笔财产。

examples.en: He came into the family business when he turned 30.
examples.cn: 他30岁时继承了家族企业。

examples.en: The new law will come into effect next month.
examples.cn: 新法律将于下个月生效。

examples.en: As winter approaches, the trees come into bloom in some regions.
examples.cn: 随着冬季临近，一些地区的树木开始开花。

examples.en: The more you practice, the more skilled you become.
examples.cn: 你练习得越多，就越熟练。

examples.en: The more he studied, the more confused he felt about the topic.
examples.cn: 他学得越多，对这个话题就越感到困惑。

examples.en: The hotel has a pool, and what's more, it's free for guests.
examples.cn: 这家酒店有游泳池，而且对客人免费。

examples.en: She's intelligent, and what's more, she works very hard.
examples.cn: 她很聪明，而且工作非常努力。

examples.en: Do you have this book in stock?
examples.cn: 这本书你们有现货吗？

examples.en: We have several sizes in stock for immediate delivery.
examples.cn: 我们有多种尺码的现货，可以立即发货。

examples.en: There's a long waiting list for the new iPhone.
examples.cn: 新款iPhone的等候名单很长。

examples.en: The restaurant has a long waiting list on weekends.
examples.cn: 这家餐厅周末的等候名单很长。

examples.en: Food prices have risen sharply this year.
examples.cn: 今年食品价格大幅上涨。

examples.en: The government is trying to control food prices.
examples.cn: 政府正试图控制食品价格。

examples.en: Let's run through the presentation one more time.
examples.cn: 让我们再快速排练一遍演示。

examples.en: He ran through the list of names quickly.
examples.cn: 他快速浏览了一遍名单。

examples.en: We've run through all our savings.
examples.cn: 我们已经用完了所有的积蓄。

examples.en: The battery ran through quickly in cold weather.
examples.cn: 在寒冷天气里电池很快就耗尽了。

examples.en: The novel's mysterious plot aroused my interest.
examples.cn: 这部小说神秘的情节引起了我的兴趣。

examples.en: His speech aroused the audience's interest in environmental issues.
examples.cn: 他的演讲引起了观众对环境问题的兴趣。

examples.en: Keep your eye out for any suspicious activity.
examples.cn: 留意任何可疑活动。

examples.en: I'm keeping my eye out for a good used car.
examples.cn: 我正在留意寻找一辆好的二手车。

examples.en: The people bowed down before the king.
examples.cn: 人们向国王鞠躬。

examples.en: He refused to bow down to pressure from his opponents.
examples.cn: 他拒绝屈服于对手的压力。

examples.en: Broadway is famous for its musical shows.
examples.cn: 百老汇以其音乐剧而闻名。

examples.en: We went to see several musical shows during our trip to London.
examples.cn: 我们在伦敦旅行期间去看了几场音乐表演。

examples.en: He turned about and walked away without a word.
examples.cn: 他转身一言不发地走开了。

examples.en: The company's fortunes turned about after the new CEO took over.
examples.cn: 新CEO接手后，公司的命运发生了转变。

examples.en: The teacher asked students to give comments on the story.
examples.cn: 老师让学生们对故事发表评论。

examples.en: I'd like to give comments on the proposed changes.
examples.cn: 我想对提议的更改发表评论。

examples.en: The child always gets his way by crying.
examples.cn: 这个孩子总是通过哭闹来达到目的。

examples.en: She usually gets her way in business negotiations.
examples.cn: 在商业谈判中她通常能如愿以偿。

examples.en: I'd be delighted to help you with your project.
examples.cn: 我很高兴帮助你完成项目。

examples.en: We were delighted to hear the good news.
examples.cn: 听到这个好消息我们很高兴。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在不损害...的情况下，不影响

examples.en: The agreement was made without prejudice to future negotiations.
examples.cn: 达成此协议不影响未来的谈判。

examples.en: The payment is accepted without prejudice to our rights.
examples.cn: 接受付款不影响我们的权利。

examples.en: The manager keeps tabs on all the projects.
examples.cn: 经理密切注意所有项目。

examples.en: Parents should keep tabs on their children's online activities.
examples.cn: 父母应该密切注意孩子的在线活动。

examples.en: He blacked out after hitting his head.
examples.cn: 他撞到头后昏厥了。

examples.en: The patient blacked out during the procedure.
examples.cn: 病人在手术过程中失去了知觉。

examples.en: The whole city blacked out during the storm.
examples.cn: 暴风雨期间整个城市停电了。

examples.en: During the war, there were frequent blackouts at night.
examples.cn: 战争期间，夜间经常实行灯火管制。

examples.en: As a music lover, she attends concerts regularly.
examples.cn: 作为一名音乐爱好者，她定期参加音乐会。

examples.en: This radio station is popular among music lovers.
examples.cn: 这个电台在音乐爱好者中很受欢迎。

examples.en: She began to despair of ever finding a job.
examples.cn: 她开始对找到工作感到绝望。

examples.en: I despair of him ever changing his habits.
examples.cn: 我对他改变习惯感到绝望。

examples.en: The video is available on demand.
examples.cn: 这个视频可以按需观看。

examples.en: Payment will be made on demand.
examples.cn: 一经要求即付款。

examples.en: It goes against the grain for him to be dishonest.
examples.cn: 不诚实违反了他的本性。

examples.en: Her decision went against the grain of company policy.
examples.cn: 她的决定违背了公司政策的常理。

examples.en: After the accident, he decided to mend his ways and drive more carefully.
examples.cn: 事故发生后，他决定改过自新，更加小心驾驶。

examples.en: The judge gave him a chance to mend his ways instead of sending him to prison.
examples.cn: 法官给了他一个改过自新的机会，而不是送他进监狱。

examples.en: We use disposable paper cups at the office to serve coffee to guests.
examples.cn: 我们在办公室使用一次性纸杯给客人提供咖啡。

examples.en: To reduce waste, some cafes have stopped offering disposable paper cups.
examples.cn: 为了减少浪费，一些咖啡馆已停止提供一次性纸杯。

examples.en: Can you have a look at this document and see if there are any errors?
examples.cn: 你能看一下这份文件，看看有没有错误吗？

examples.en: I'll have a look at the car engine to diagnose the problem.
examples.cn: 我会检查一下汽车引擎来诊断问题。

examples.en: Let's take five and grab a coffee before we continue the meeting.
examples.cn: 让我们休息五分钟，喝杯咖啡再继续开会。

examples.en: After two hours of studying, she decided to take five to relax.
examples.cn: 学习两小时后，她决定休息五分钟放松一下。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get up enough nerve to do sth.

examples.en: He finally got up enough nerve to ask his boss for a raise.
examples.cn: 他终于鼓起勇气向老板要求加薪。

examples.en: It took her weeks to get up enough nerve to try skydiving.
examples.cn: 她花了数周才鼓起勇气尝试跳伞。

examples.en: The river is heavily polluted due to industrial waste dumping.
examples.cn: 由于工业废料倾倒，这条河严重污染。

examples.en: Living in a heavily polluted city can lead to health problems.
examples.cn: 生活在严重污染的城市可能导致健康问题。

definitions.meaning_cn: 最新小玩意，最新科技产品

examples.en: He always buys the latest gadgets as soon as they are released.
examples.cn: 他总是最新小玩意一发布就购买。

examples.en: The store showcases the latest gadgets from various tech companies.
examples.cn: 这家商店展示来自不同科技公司的最新科技产品。

examples.en: The price of fruits can vary with the season.
examples.cn: 水果的价格可能随季节而变化。

examples.en: Her mood tends to vary with the weather.
examples.cn: 她的情绪往往随天气而变化。

examples.en: We need to get cracking if we want to finish this project on time.
examples.cn: 如果我们想按时完成这个项目，就需要开始行动。

examples.en: Get cracking on your homework before it gets too late.
examples.cn: 赶紧做你的作业，别太晚了。

examples.en: She spoke on her colleague's behalf at the conference.
examples.cn: 她在会议上代表她的同事发言。

examples.en: I'll sign the contract on your behalf since you're unavailable.
examples.cn: 既然你不在，我将代表你签署合同。

examples.en: This neighborhood has gone to the dogs since the new management took over.
examples.cn: 自从新管理层接手后，这个社区就衰败了。

examples.en: If we don't maintain the equipment, the whole system will go to the dogs.
examples.cn: 如果我们不维护设备，整个系统就会堕落。

examples.en: The workers decided to stick out for better working conditions.
examples.cn: 工人们决定坚持要求更好的工作条件。

examples.en: She stuck out for a higher salary during the job interview.
examples.cn: 她在工作面试中争取更高的薪水。

examples.en: Vaccines help protect against certain diseases.
examples.cn: 疫苗有助于防止某些疾病。

examples.en: Wearing sunscreen can protect against skin damage from the sun.
examples.cn: 涂防晒霜可以保护免受太阳对皮肤的伤害。

examples.en: Many people watch videos online to learn new skills.
examples.cn: 许多人在线观看视频以学习新技能。

examples.en: She likes to watch videos online to relax after work.
examples.cn: 她喜欢下班后在线观看视频来放松。

examples.en: The team members support one another during difficult times.
examples.cn: 团队成员在困难时期互相支持。

examples.en: They promised to help one another with their studies.
examples.cn: 他们承诺在学业上彼此帮助。

definitions.meaning_cn: 抽出时间做某事，终于去做

examples.en: I've been meaning to clean the garage, but I haven't gotten around to it yet.
examples.cn: 我一直想清理车库，但还没抽出时间去做。

examples.en: She finally got around to reading that book she bought months ago.
examples.cn: 她终于抽出时间去读几个月前买的那本书。

examples.en: He decided to bring up the issue during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他决定在会议上提出这个问题。

examples.en: It's challenging to bring up children in a busy city.
examples.cn: 在繁忙的城市抚养孩子很有挑战性。

examples.en: His success story is a case in point of how hard work pays off.
examples.cn: 他的成功故事是努力会有回报的恰当例子。

examples.en: The recent data breach is a case in point of the need for better cybersecurity.
examples.cn: 最近的数据泄露是需要更好网络安全的例证。

examples.en: The thief ran off with the stolen goods before the police arrived.
examples.cn: 小偷在警察到达前带着赃物跑掉了。

examples.en: Can you run off a few copies of this report for the meeting?
examples.cn: 你能为会议复印几份这份报告吗？

valid_entries.original_phrase: give sb. a rough idea of sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 给某人一个大概的概念或了解

examples.en: Can you give me a rough idea of how much this project will cost?
examples.cn: 你能给我一个大概的概念，这个项目要花多少钱吗？

examples.en: The manager gave us a rough idea of the new marketing strategy.
examples.cn: 经理给了我们新营销策略的一个大概概念。

examples.en: She has an eye for beautiful antiques.
examples.cn: 她对美丽的古董有鉴赏力。

examples.en: He has an eye for detail in his architectural designs.
examples.cn: 他在建筑设计中注重细节。

definitions.meaning_cn: 完成或处理掉某事，以便继续其他事情

examples.en: Let's get this paperwork out of the way before the meeting.
examples.cn: 让我们在会议前把这些文书工作处理掉。

examples.en: I need to get my chores out of the way so I can relax.
examples.cn: 我需要完成家务，这样我才能放松。

examples.en: The child threw up after eating too much candy.
examples.cn: 孩子吃了太多糖果后呕吐了。

examples.en: She felt nauseous and had to throw up.
examples.cn: 她感到恶心，不得不呕吐。

examples.en: They threw up a temporary shelter after the storm.
examples.cn: 暴风雨后他们快速搭建了一个临时避难所。

examples.en: The company threw up a new website in just a week.
examples.cn: 公司在一周内就快速建成了一个新网站。

definitions.meaning_cn: 通过强制手段使某物通过

examples.en: They forced the water out through the pipe using pressure.
examples.cn: 他们用压力迫使水通过管道流出。

examples.en: The protesters forced their way out through the barricade.
examples.cn: 抗议者强行通过路障出去。

examples.en: He decided to skip a lecture to catch up on sleep.
examples.cn: 他决定逃课去补觉。

examples.en: If you skip a lecture, you might miss important information.
examples.cn: 如果你错过讲座，可能会漏掉重要信息。

examples.en: Just give it to me straight—did I get the job?
examples.cn: 直截了当地告诉我——我得到这份工作了吗？

examples.en: She gave it to him straight about his poor performance.
examples.cn: 她直截了当地告诉他表现不佳。

examples.en: The boss gave her a free hand to manage the project.
examples.cn: 老板给了她自由处理权来管理这个项目。

examples.en: Parents should give their children a free hand in choosing their hobbies.
examples.cn: 父母应该给孩子自由选择爱好的权利。

definitions.meaning_cn: 给某人带来名声或声誉

examples.en: His honesty gave him a reputation for trustworthiness.
examples.cn: 他的诚实给他带来了可信赖的名声。

examples.en: The scandal gave the politician a bad reputation.
examples.cn: 丑闻给这位政治家带来了坏名声。

examples.en: The new building has ramps for people with disabilities.
examples.cn: 新大楼为残疾人设置了坡道。
