examples.en: Society should provide equal opportunities for people with disabilities.
examples.cn: 社会应该为残疾人提供平等的机会。

examples.en: The store sells all kinds of fruits and vegetables.
examples.cn: 这家商店出售各种各样的水果和蔬菜。

examples.en: She has all kinds of hobbies, from painting to hiking.
examples.cn: 她有各种各样的爱好，从绘画到徒步旅行。

examples.en: At the end of the year, the company takes stock of its inventory.
examples.cn: 年底时，公司盘点库存。

examples.en: It's time to take stock of your life and set new goals.
examples.cn: 是时候评估你的生活并设定新目标了。

examples.en: She has more than ten years of experience in this field.
examples.cn: 她在这个领域有超过十年的经验。

examples.en: The project cost more than we expected.
examples.cn: 这个项目的花费超过了我们的预期。

definitions.meaning_cn: 跟上或保持与某事物的同步

examples.en: It's hard to keep up with the latest technology trends.
examples.cn: 很难跟上最新的技术趋势。

examples.en: She exercises regularly to keep up with her fitness goals.
examples.cn: 她定期锻炼以跟上她的健身目标。

examples.en: The children are eager to open their presents on Christmas morning.
examples.cn: 孩子们渴望在圣诞节早上打开礼物。

examples.en: He is eager to start his new job next week.
examples.cn: 他渴望下周开始他的新工作。

examples.en: The magician's tricks were beyond belief.
examples.cn: 魔术师的戏法令人难以置信。

examples.en: Her kindness to strangers is beyond belief.
examples.cn: 她对陌生人的善良令人难以置信。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have a bee in one's bonnet

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事念念不忘或固执己见

examples.en: He has a bee in his bonnet about recycling and talks about it constantly.
examples.cn: 他对回收利用念念不忘，经常谈论它。

examples.en: She has a bee in her bonnet that the project will fail, despite evidence to the contrary.
examples.cn: 她固执地认为这个项目会失败，尽管有相反的证据。

examples.en: She sighed in relief when she heard the good news.
examples.cn: 当她听到好消息时，她如释重负地叹了口气。

examples.en: He smiled in relief after passing the difficult exam.
examples.cn: 通过困难的考试后，他如释重负地笑了。

examples.en: You need to weigh up the pros and cons before making a decision.
examples.cn: 在做决定前，你需要权衡利弊。

examples.en: The jury weighed up the evidence carefully in the trial.
examples.cn: 陪审团在审判中仔细评估了证据。

examples.en: We are on the way toward achieving our sales targets for the year.
examples.cn: 我们正在通往实现年度销售目标的路上。

examples.en: The country is on the way toward economic recovery after the crisis.
examples.cn: 这个国家在危机后正在通往经济复苏的路上。

examples.en: She is busy with her homework and can't join us.
examples.cn: 她正忙于做作业，不能加入我们。

examples.en: He was busy with preparations for the conference all week.
examples.cn: 他整个星期都忙于会议准备工作。

examples.en: Online retailers like Amazon have transformed shopping habits.
examples.cn: 像亚马逊这样的在线零售商已经改变了购物习惯。

examples.en: Many traditional stores now compete with online retailers.
examples.cn: 许多传统商店现在与在线零售商竞争。

examples.en: The success of the project hinges upon securing adequate funding.
examples.cn: 项目的成功取决于能否获得足够的资金。

examples.en: His decision hinges upon the outcome of the meeting.
examples.cn: 他的决定取决于会议的结果。

examples.en: She always stands up for her friends when they are in trouble.
examples.cn: 当朋友遇到麻烦时，她总是支持他们。

examples.en: It's important to stand up for your beliefs in a debate.
examples.cn: 在辩论中维护自己的信念很重要。

examples.en: Let's break down the problem into smaller parts to solve it.
examples.cn: 让我们把问题分解成小部分来解决。

examples.en: The report breaks down the expenses by category.
examples.cn: 报告按类别细分了开支。

examples.en: My car broke down on the highway yesterday.
examples.cn: 我的车昨天在高速公路上抛锚了。

examples.en: The negotiations broke down due to disagreements.
examples.cn: 谈判因分歧而破裂。

examples.en: She broke down in tears after hearing the bad news.
examples.cn: 听到坏消息后，她崩溃大哭。

examples.en: He broke down under the pressure of the job.
examples.cn: 他在工作压力下情绪崩溃了。

examples.en: Reading books is a great way to expand your knowledge.
examples.cn: 读书是扩展知识的好方法。

examples.en: He traveled abroad to expand his knowledge of different cultures.
examples.cn: 他出国旅行以扩展对不同文化的了解。

examples.en: After months of debt, he finally got his head above water.
examples.cn: 经过数月的债务，他终于摆脱了困境。

examples.en: With this new job, I can get my head above water financially.
examples.cn: 有了这份新工作，我可以在经济上勉强维持。

examples.en: I see no objection to your proposal; let's proceed.
examples.cn: 我对你的提议没有异议，我们继续吧。

examples.en: The committee saw no objection to the new policy.
examples.cn: 委员会对新政策没有异议。

examples.en: The region decided to break away and form its own country.
examples.cn: 该地区决定脱离并成立自己的国家。

examples.en: She broke away from the group to explore on her own.
examples.cn: 她脱离小组独自探索。

examples.en: His fear got the better of him, and he couldn't speak.
examples.cn: 恐惧战胜了他，他无法说话。

examples.en: In the end, patience got the better of anger in the argument.
examples.cn: 最终，在争论中耐心战胜了愤怒。

examples.en: The workers are on strike for better wages.
examples.cn: 工人们正在罢工要求更高的工资。

examples.en: The airline staff were on strike, causing flight cancellations.
examples.cn: 航空公司员工在罢工，导致航班取消。

examples.en: This restaurant caters to vegetarian customers.
examples.cn: 这家餐厅迎合素食顾客。

examples.en: The school caters to the needs of students with disabilities.
examples.cn: 学校满足残疾学生的需求。

examples.en: We'll finish the project one way or another by Friday.
examples.cn: 无论如何，我们会在周五前完成这个项目。

examples.en: One way or another, I'll find a solution to this problem.
examples.cn: 无论如何，我会找到这个问题的解决方案。

examples.en: He decided to go cold turkey and quit smoking immediately.
examples.cn: 他决定突然戒除，立即戒烟。

examples.en: After years of drinking, she went cold turkey and hasn't touched alcohol since.
examples.cn: 多年饮酒后，她突然戒除，从此再没碰过酒。

examples.en: Please count up all the votes and announce the result.
examples.cn: 请计算所有选票并宣布结果。

examples.en: She counted up the expenses to see how much she spent.
examples.cn: 她把开支加起来看花了多少钱。

examples.en: The divorce rate has been increasing in many countries.
examples.cn: 许多国家的离婚率一直在上升。

examples.en: Researchers study the divorce rate to understand social trends.
examples.cn: 研究人员研究离婚率以了解社会趋势。

examples.en: She draws on her experience to solve new problems.
examples.cn: 她利用自己的经验来解决新问题。

examples.en: The author draws on historical events for inspiration.
examples.cn: 作者从历史事件中汲取灵感。

examples.en: You should stick to your diet to lose weight effectively.
examples.cn: 你应该坚持节食以有效减肥。

examples.en: He sticks to the rules even when it's inconvenient.
examples.cn: 即使不方便，他也遵守规则。

definitions.meaning_cn: 感到毛骨悚然，起鸡皮疙瘩

examples.en: That old house gives me the creeps at night.
examples.cn: 那栋老房子在晚上让我感到毛骨悚然。

examples.en: I have the creeps whenever I watch horror movies.
examples.cn: 每当我看恐怖电影时，我都会起鸡皮疙瘩。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人沟通成功，让某人理解

examples.en: I tried to explain, but I couldn't get through to him.
examples.cn: 我试图解释，但无法让他理解。

examples.en: After many attempts, she finally got through to her stubborn friend.
examples.cn: 经过多次尝试，她终于与固执的朋友沟通成功。

definitions.meaning_cn: 轻视或不当回事地对待某事

examples.en: He made light of his injury, but it turned out to be serious.
examples.cn: 他轻描淡写地对待自己的伤势，但结果证明很严重。

examples.en: Don't make light of her concerns; they are valid.
examples.cn: 不要轻视她的担忧；这些担忧是合理的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 表示完全同意或确认某事正确

examples.en: You got that right—this is the best pizza in town.
examples.cn: 你说得对——这是镇上最好的披萨。

examples.en: If you think it's too expensive, you got that right.
examples.cn: 如果你觉得太贵了，你说得没错。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在生活中取得成功或进步

examples.en: She worked hard to get on in life and became a successful lawyer.
examples.cn: 她努力工作以在生活中取得成功，成为了一名成功的律师。

examples.en: Education is key to getting on in life.
examples.cn: 教育是在生活中取得进步的关键。

examples.en: We need to pack up our camping gear before leaving.
examples.cn: 我们需要在离开前收拾好露营装备。

examples.en: She packed up her books and moved to a new apartment.
examples.cn: 她收拾好书籍，搬到了新公寓。

examples.en: The computer packed up in the middle of my work.
examples.cn: 电脑在我工作到一半时停止了运行。

examples.en: Let's pack up for the day and go home.
examples.cn: 我们今天收工回家吧。

examples.en: After much discussion, they settled upon a date for the wedding.
examples.cn: 经过多次讨论，他们决定了婚礼的日期。

examples.en: We settled upon blue as the color for the new logo.
examples.cn: 我们选择了蓝色作为新标志的颜色。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take a hard line with sb.

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某人采取强硬或严格的态度

examples.en: The government took a hard line with protesters to maintain order.
examples.cn: 政府对抗议者采取强硬态度以维持秩序。

examples.en: Parents should take a hard line with children who break rules.
examples.cn: 父母应对违反规则的孩子采取严格态度。

examples.en: The class scored with an average of 85% on the test.
examples.cn: 这个班级在测试中平均得分为85%。

examples.en: The company produces with an average of 100 units per day.
examples.cn: 该公司平均每天生产100个单位。

definitions.meaning_cn: 表示类似的事物或情况

examples.en: We discussed movies, books, and that sort of thing.
examples.cn: 我们讨论了电影、书籍以及类似的东西。

examples.en: He's into hiking, camping, that sort of thing.
examples.cn: 他喜欢徒步、露营之类的事情。

examples.en: The music was playing at full blast, so we couldn't hear each other.
examples.cn: 音乐以最大音量播放，所以我们听不到彼此说话。

examples.en: The factory operates at full blast during peak season.
examples.cn: 工厂在旺季以最大强度运行。

examples.en: We divided up the tasks among team members.
examples.cn: 我们在团队成员之间分配了任务。

examples.en: The inheritance was divided up equally among the siblings.
examples.cn: 遗产在兄弟姐妹之间平均分配。

examples.en: Poor sanitation in the area led to disease outbreaks.
examples.cn: 该地区卫生条件差导致了疾病爆发。

examples.en: Improving poor sanitation is crucial for public health.
examples.cn: 改善卫生条件差对公共卫生至关重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 表示两种或多种可能性

examples.en: Whether you go or stay, let me know your decision.
examples.cn: 无论你是去是留，请告诉我你的决定。

examples.en: We'll proceed whether it rains or shines.
examples.cn: 无论下雨还是晴天，我们都会继续。

examples.en: The new factory has been in operation since January.
examples.cn: 新工厂自一月份以来一直在运行。

examples.en: The system is currently in operation and functioning well.
examples.cn: 该系统目前正在运行且功能良好。

examples.en: Parents often buy educational toys to help children learn.
examples.cn: 父母经常购买教育性玩具来帮助孩子学习。

examples.en: This educational toy teaches basic math skills.
examples.cn: 这个教育性玩具教授基础数学技能。

examples.en: It took her time to come to grips with the loss of her job.
examples.cn: 她花了一些时间来认真处理失业的问题。

examples.en: We need to come to grips with the challenges ahead.
examples.cn: 我们需要认真处理前方的挑战。

examples.en: A strange thing happened to me on the way home.
examples.cn: 在回家的路上，一件奇怪的事发生在我身上。

examples.en: What happened to him after the accident?
examples.cn: 事故后他发生了什么？

examples.en: Separate the eggs into whites and yolks.
examples.cn: 将鸡蛋分成蛋白和蛋黄。

examples.en: We separated the students into groups for the project.
examples.cn: 我们将学生分成小组进行项目。

examples.en: In the debate, she refused to take sides.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她拒绝支持任何一方。

examples.en: Parents should avoid taking sides in sibling arguments.
examples.cn: 父母应避免在兄弟姐妹的争吵中偏袒一方。

examples.en: To some extent, I agree with your point.
examples.cn: 在某种程度上，我同意你的观点。

examples.en: The problem is solved to some extent, but not completely.
examples.cn: 问题在某种程度上解决了，但并非完全解决。

examples.en: Students must complete the course to get credit.
examples.cn: 学生必须完成课程才能获得学分。

examples.en: She got credit for her innovative research.
examples.cn: 她因其创新研究获得了认可。

examples.en: It's hard to get credit with a low credit score.
examples.cn: 信用评分低时很难获得信贷。

examples.en: Small businesses often struggle to get credit from banks.
examples.cn: 小企业通常难以从银行获得信贷。

definitions.meaning_cn: 有暧昧关系或正在进行某事

examples.en: They have a thing going, but they're not officially dating.
examples.cn: 他们之间有暧昧关系，但还没有正式交往。

examples.en: We have a thing going with that new project at work.
examples.cn: 我们在工作中那个新项目上进展顺利。

examples.en: She felt she had a raw deal when she was passed over for promotion.
examples.cn: 当她被忽略晋升时，她觉得自己受到了不公平待遇。

examples.en: The workers had a raw deal with the new contract terms.
examples.cn: 工人们在新合同条款下受到了不公平待遇。

examples.en: Many shops on high streets are struggling due to online competition.
examples.cn: 由于在线竞争，主要商业街上的许多商店都在挣扎。

examples.en: You can find the bank on high streets in most towns.
examples.cn: 在大多数城镇的主要商业街上都能找到银行。

examples.en: Murder and robbery are considered serious crimes.
examples.cn: 谋杀和抢劫被认为是严重罪行。

examples.en: The police prioritize investigating serious crimes.
examples.cn: 警方优先调查严重罪行。

examples.en: She bought the dress on impulse without thinking about the cost.
examples.cn: 她一时冲动买了那条裙子，没考虑价格。

examples.en: He decided to travel on impulse and booked a flight immediately.
examples.cn: 他一时冲动决定旅行，并立即预订了航班。

valid_entries.original_phrase: make a point of doing sth.

examples.en: I make a point of exercising every morning to stay healthy.
examples.cn: 我特意每天早上锻炼以保持健康。

examples.en: She makes a point of thanking her team after every project.
examples.cn: 她在每个项目后都特意感谢她的团队。

examples.en: Well done on completing the marathon!
examples.cn: 完成马拉松，做得好！

examples.en: The teacher said 'well done' to the students for their hard work.
examples.cn: 老师对学生的辛勤工作说“做得好”。

examples.en: I prefer my steak well done, not rare.
examples.cn: 我喜欢牛排熟透的，不是生的。

examples.en: The chicken was well done and safe to eat.
examples.cn: 鸡肉熟透了，可以安全食用。

examples.en: The company provides employees with health insurance.
examples.cn: 公司为员工提供健康保险。

examples.en: Can you provide me with more details about the event?
examples.cn: 你能提供给我更多关于活动的细节吗？

examples.en: This old car screams for a repair.
examples.cn: 这辆旧车迫切需要修理。

examples.en: The situation screams for immediate attention.
examples.cn: 这种情况迫切需要立即关注。

examples.en: His constant complaining really gets on my nerves.
examples.cn: 他不断的抱怨真的惹恼了我。

examples.en: The loud music from next door is getting on her nerves.
examples.cn: 隔壁的吵闹音乐正在惹恼她。

examples.en: The rebels took up arms against the government.
examples.cn: 叛军拿起武器反对政府。

examples.en: They decided to take up arms against the invading forces.
examples.cn: 他们决定拿起武器反对入侵的军队。

examples.en: This shirt goes well with those pants.
examples.cn: 这件衬衫和那条裤子很相配。

examples.en: I'll go with you to the store.
examples.cn: 我会和你一起去商店。

examples.en: I'm going to have a day off tomorrow to relax.
examples.cn: 我明天要休息一天来放松。

examples.en: She has a day off every week to spend time with family.
examples.cn: 她每周休息一天来陪伴家人。

examples.en: Your achievements do credit to your hard work.
examples.cn: 你的成就为你的辛勤工作增光。

examples.en: The team's performance did credit to their coach.
examples.cn: 团队的表现为他们教练增光。

examples.en: She always shops around to get the best deal.
examples.cn: 她总是货比三家以获得最优惠的交易。

examples.en: We negotiated hard to get the best deal on the car.
examples.cn: 我们努力谈判以获得汽车的最优惠交易。

examples.en: I need to choose a paper topic for my history class.
examples.cn: 我需要为我的历史课选择一个论文主题。

examples.en: Her paper topic focuses on climate change effects.
examples.cn: 她的论文主题聚焦于气候变化的影响。

examples.en: The expenses add up to over $1000.
examples.cn: 费用总计超过1000美元。

examples.en: All these small efforts add up to significant progress.
examples.cn: 所有这些小努力总计达到显著的进步。

examples.en: I need to enquire about the availability of rooms.
examples.cn: 我需要询问关于房间的可用性。

examples.en: She enquired about the job application process.
examples.cn: 她询问了关于工作申请流程。

examples.en: He went off half-cocked and made a decision without all the facts.
examples.cn: 他仓促行动，在没有所有事实的情况下做出了决定。

examples.en: Don't go off half-cocked; let's plan this carefully.
examples.cn: 不要仓促行动；让我们仔细计划。

examples.en: I always enjoy the company of my friends on weekends.
examples.cn: 我总是享受周末朋友的陪伴。

examples.en: She enjoys the company of her grandchildren.
examples.cn: 她享受孙辈的陪伴。

examples.en: Local charity groups organized a food drive for the homeless.
examples.cn: 当地慈善团体为无家可归者组织了一次食品募捐活动。

examples.en: Many charity groups rely on volunteers to run their operations.
examples.cn: 许多慈善团体依靠志愿者来运营他们的活动。

examples.en: The hot shower steamed up the bathroom mirror.
examples.cn: 热水淋浴使浴室的镜子起雾了。

examples.en: Cold weather can steam up car windows quickly.
examples.cn: 寒冷的天气会使车窗迅速起雾。

examples.en: The unfair criticism really steamed him up during the meeting.
examples.cn: 不公平的批评在会议期间真的让他很生气。

examples.en: She gets steamed up whenever someone questions her decisions.
examples.cn: 每当有人质疑她的决定时，她就会变得激动。

examples.en: The hotel staff is at your service 24 hours a day.
examples.cn: 酒店员工全天24小时听候您的吩咐。

examples.en: As your assistant, I am at your service for any tasks you need.
examples.cn: 作为您的助手，我随时听候您的吩咐处理任何任务。

examples.en: The presentation will begin with an overview of the project.
examples.cn: 演示将以项目概述开始。

examples.en: Let's begin with a simple exercise to warm up.
examples.cn: 让我们从一个简单的练习开始来热身。

examples.en: The bully threatened to give him a black eye if he didn't hand over his lunch money.
examples.cn: 那个恶霸威胁说，如果他不交出午餐钱，就把他打得鼻青脸肿。

examples.en: During the fight, one of the players gave the other a black eye.
examples.cn: 在打斗中，一名球员把另一名打得鼻青脸肿。

examples.en: The scandal gave the company a black eye in the public's view.
examples.cn: 这起丑闻损害了公司在公众眼中的声誉。

examples.en: His careless comments gave the team a black eye during the negotiations.
examples.cn: 他粗心的评论在谈判期间损害了团队的声誉。

examples.en: Despite the provocation, she managed to keep her temper and respond calmly.
examples.cn: 尽管受到挑衅，她还是设法忍住脾气，冷静回应。

examples.en: It's important to keep your temper in stressful situations at work.
examples.cn: 在工作中的压力情况下，忍住脾气很重要。

examples.en: She plans to complete a degree in engineering next year.
examples.cn: 她计划明年完成工程学学位。

examples.en: After completing a degree in biology, he pursued a career in research.
examples.cn: 在完成生物学学位后，他从事了研究工作。

examples.en: You can exchange the defective product for a new one at the store.
examples.cn: 你可以在商店将有缺陷的产品换成一个新的。

examples.en: He exchanged his old car for a more fuel-efficient model.
examples.cn: 他用旧车换了一款更省油的型号。

examples.en: Can you look after my dog while I'm on vacation?
examples.cn: 我度假期间，你能照顾我的狗吗？

examples.en: She looks after her elderly parents with great care.
examples.cn: 她非常细心地照顾年迈的父母。

examples.en: The movie is based upon a true story from the 19th century.
examples.cn: 这部电影基于19世纪的一个真实故事。

examples.en: Our decision should be based upon solid evidence, not assumptions.
examples.cn: 我们的决定应基于确凿的证据，而不是假设。

examples.en: Let's kick about some ideas for the new marketing campaign.
examples.cn: 让我们随意讨论一下新营销活动的一些想法。

examples.en: We kicked about the proposal over coffee before making a decision.
examples.cn: 我们在做决定前，边喝咖啡边随意讨论了提案。

examples.en: That old bicycle has been kicking about in the garage for years.
examples.cn: 那辆旧自行车在车库里闲置了好几年。

examples.en: There are a few tools kicking about that we could use for the repair.
examples.cn: 有几件工具闲置着，我们可以用来修理。

examples.en: The company aims to tap into the growing market for eco-friendly products.
examples.cn: 该公司旨在利用不断增长的环保产品市场。

examples.en: By using social media, we can tap into a wider audience.
examples.cn: 通过使用社交媒体，我们可以接入更广泛的受众。

examples.en: He held the mistake over her head to get her to agree to his terms.
examples.cn: 他用那个错误威胁她，让她同意他的条件。

examples.en: Don't let them hold that old debt over your head; it's been settled.
examples.cn: 别让他们用那笔旧债威胁你；已经还清了。

examples.en: The manager will hold the team accountable for meeting the project deadline.
examples.cn: 经理将让团队对按时完成项目负责。

examples.en: In a democracy, leaders are held accountable for their actions by the public.
examples.cn: 在民主国家，领导人的行为由公众负责。

examples.en: After months of losses, the business has turned the corner and is now profitable.
examples.cn: 经过数月的亏损，企业已渡过难关，现在开始盈利。

examples.en: Her health has turned the corner since she started the new treatment.
examples.cn: 自从开始新治疗后，她的健康状况已开始好转。

definitions.meaning_cn: 提神的东西（如饮料或活动）

examples.en: I need a pick-me-up like a cup of coffee to get through the afternoon.
examples.cn: 我需要一杯咖啡这样的提神东西来度过下午。

examples.en: A short walk outside can be a great pick-me-up when you're feeling tired.
examples.cn: 当你感到疲倦时，到外面短暂散步可以是一个很好的提神活动。

examples.en: The high cost of the project gave the committee pause before approving it.
examples.cn: 项目的高成本让委员会在批准前停下来思考。

examples.en: His unexpected resignation gave everyone in the office pause.
examples.cn: 他意外的辞职让办公室里的每个人都停下来思考。

examples.en: Even after moving abroad, she stays in touch with her old friends via video calls.
examples.cn: 即使在移居国外后，她仍通过视频通话与老朋友保持联系。

examples.en: It's important to stay in touch with industry trends to remain competitive.
examples.cn: 与行业趋势保持联系以保持竞争力很重要。

examples.en: The union decided to hold out for better wages and working conditions.
examples.cn: 工会决定坚持要求更好的工资和工作条件。

examples.en: She's holding out for a job offer that matches her career goals.
examples.cn: 她坚持要求一份符合她职业目标的工作机会。

definitions.meaning_cn: 会计能力，指在会计领域所需的技能、知识和专业能力

examples.en: The job requires strong accounting competencies, including proficiency in financial software.
examples.cn: 这份工作要求具备强大的会计能力，包括熟练使用财务软件。

examples.en: Developing accounting competencies is essential for career advancement in finance.
examples.cn: 培养会计能力对于在金融领域的职业发展至关重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 保持冷静，在压力或困难情况下保持镇定

examples.en: During the crisis, she managed to keep her head and make rational decisions.
examples.cn: 在危机期间，她设法保持冷静并做出理性决定。

examples.en: It's important to keep your head when dealing with emergencies.
examples.cn: 处理紧急情况时保持冷静很重要。

examples.en: They had to call off the meeting due to bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于天气恶劣，他们不得不取消会议。

examples.en: The event was called off at the last minute.
examples.cn: 活动在最后一刻被取消了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 杀一儆百，通过惩罚某人来警示他人

examples.en: The teacher made an example of the student who cheated to deter others.
examples.cn: 老师惩罚了作弊的学生以警示他人。

examples.en: The company made an example of the employee to enforce the new policy.
examples.cn: 公司惩罚了这名员工以强制执行新政策。

definitions.meaning_cn: 财务预算，指对收入和支出的计划

examples.en: The company's financial budget for next year includes increased marketing expenses.
examples.cn: 公司明年的财务预算包括增加的营销费用。

examples.en: Creating a personal financial budget helps manage spending effectively.
examples.cn: 制定个人财务预算有助于有效管理支出。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被征召入伍，强制加入军队

examples.en: During the war, many young men were drafted into the army.
examples.cn: 战争期间，许多年轻人被征召入伍。

examples.en: He was drafted into service after graduating from college.
examples.cn: 大学毕业后，他被征召服役。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被选入，被招募加入某个团队或组织

examples.en: She was drafted into the national team for her exceptional skills.
examples.cn: 她因出色的技能被选入国家队。

examples.en: The player was drafted into the professional league last year.
examples.cn: 这名球员去年被选入职业联赛。

examples.en: Please get out of my way; I'm in a hurry.
examples.cn: 请让开，我赶时间。

examples.en: He asked the crowd to get out of his way so he could pass.
examples.cn: 他请人群让开以便通过。

definitions.meaning_cn: 不干涉，不妨碍某人做某事

examples.en: I'll get out of your way so you can focus on your work.
examples.cn: 我会不打扰你，让你专注于工作。

examples.en: They decided to get out of the manager's way and let him handle the project.
examples.cn: 他们决定不干涉经理，让他处理这个项目。

examples.en: Her ideas are in tune with the company's values.
examples.cn: 她的想法与公司的价值观协调一致。

examples.en: The team needs to be in tune with each other to succeed.
examples.cn: 团队需要彼此协调一致才能成功。

examples.en: He is in tune with the latest trends in technology.
examples.cn: 他了解技术的最新趋势。

examples.en: Staying in tune with customer needs is crucial for business.
examples.cn: 了解客户需求对业务至关重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 人类活动，指人类进行的各种行为

examples.en: Human activities have a significant impact on the environment.
examples.cn: 人类活动对环境有重大影响。

examples.en: The study focuses on human activities in urban areas.
examples.cn: 这项研究关注城市地区的人类活动。

examples.en: The dog tore at the fabric with its teeth.
examples.cn: 狗用牙齿撕扯布料。

examples.en: She tore at the package to open it quickly.
examples.cn: 她撕扯包裹以快速打开。

examples.en: The memory of the loss still tears at her heart.
examples.cn: 失去的记忆仍然折磨着她的心。

examples.en: Guilt can tear at a person's conscience over time.
examples.cn: 内疚会随着时间的推移折磨一个人的良心。

definitions.meaning_cn: 复印机，用于复制文档的设备

examples.en: The office has a new copying machine that is very efficient.
examples.cn: 办公室有一台非常高效的新复印机。

examples.en: Please use the copying machine to duplicate these papers.
examples.cn: 请使用复印机复制这些文件。

definitions.meaning_cn: 胡闹，浪费时间做愚蠢的事

examples.en: Stop fooling about and get to work!
examples.cn: 别胡闹了，开始工作吧！

examples.en: They were fooling about in the park instead of studying.
examples.cn: 他们在公园胡闹而不是学习。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have a thing going with sb.

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人有暧昧关系或浪漫关系

examples.en: Rumors say she has a thing going with her coworker.
examples.cn: 传闻她与同事有暧昧关系。

examples.en: Do you think they have a thing going with each other?
examples.cn: 你觉得他们之间有浪漫关系吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人有持续的合作或联系

examples.en: He has a thing going with a local supplier for regular deliveries.
examples.cn: 他与当地供应商有持续的合作关系以定期交货。

examples.en: The artist has a thing going with a gallery for exhibitions.
examples.cn: 这位艺术家与画廊有持续的合作关系举办展览。

definitions.meaning_cn: 犯罪率，指特定地区或时间内犯罪发生的频率

examples.en: The crime rate in the city has decreased over the past year.
examples.cn: 该城市的犯罪率在过去一年有所下降。

examples.en: High crime rates can affect property values in an area.
examples.cn: 高犯罪率会影响一个地区的房产价值。

examples.en: With hard work, you stand a chance of winning the competition.
examples.cn: 通过努力，你有机会赢得比赛。

examples.en: Do you think we stand a chance of getting the contract?
examples.cn: 你认为我们有机会获得合同吗？

examples.en: The expenses amount to over $1000 this month.
examples.cn: 本月的费用总计超过1000美元。

examples.en: Her savings amount to a significant sum for retirement.
examples.cn: 她的储蓄总计为一笔可观的退休金。

examples.en: His actions amount to a betrayal of trust.
examples.cn: 他的行为相当于背叛信任。

examples.en: The new policy amounts to a major change in strategy.
examples.cn: 新政策意味着战略上的重大改变。

definitions.meaning_cn: 惩罚某人以警示他人，杀一儆百

examples.en: The judge made an example of the criminal to deter others.
examples.cn: 法官惩罚了这名罪犯以警示他人。

examples.en: The company made an example of the employee for violating the rules.
examples.cn: 公司惩罚了这名违反规定的员工作为警示。

examples.en: The store is close to my house, so I walk there.
examples.cn: 商店靠近我家，所以我步行去。

examples.en: We live close to the beach for easy access.
examples.cn: 我们住在海滩附近以便轻松前往。

examples.en: The project is close to completion after months of work.
examples.cn: 经过数月工作，这个项目接近完成。

examples.en: She is close to tears after hearing the bad news.
examples.cn: 听到坏消息后，她几乎要哭了。

examples.en: He is very close to his family and visits them often.
examples.cn: 他与家人关系非常亲密，经常看望他们。

examples.en: They have been close to each other since childhood.
examples.cn: 他们从小关系就很亲密。

definitions.meaning_cn: 有透支，指银行账户余额为负

examples.en: I have an overdraft on my account, so I need to deposit money soon.
examples.cn: 我的账户有透支，所以我需要尽快存钱。

examples.en: Having an overdraft can incur high fees from the bank.
examples.cn: 有透支可能会产生银行的高额费用。

definitions.meaning_cn: 新闻报道，媒体对事件的报道

examples.en: The news coverage of the election was extensive and detailed.
examples.cn: 对选举的新闻报道广泛而详细。

examples.en: Good news coverage helps inform the public about important issues.
examples.cn: 良好的新闻报道有助于公众了解重要问题。

definitions.meaning_cn: 消息不灵通的；了解不充分的

examples.en: He made an ill-informed decision because he didn't research the market properly.
examples.cn: 他做出了一个消息不灵通的决定，因为没有好好研究市场。

examples.en: The journalist's article was criticized for being ill-informed about the local customs.
examples.cn: 这位记者的文章因对当地习俗了解不充分而受到批评。

examples.en: I have confidence in her ability to lead the team successfully.
examples.cn: 我对她成功领导团队的能力有信心。

examples.en: Investors have confidence in the company's long-term growth strategy.
examples.cn: 投资者对公司的长期增长战略有信心。

definitions.meaning_cn: 进展顺利；有好事在进行中

examples.en: They have a good thing going with their new business partnership.
examples.cn: 他们的新商业伙伴关系进展顺利。

examples.en: Don't ruin it—we have a good thing going here with this project.
examples.cn: 别搞砸了——我们在这个项目上进展得很顺利。

definitions.meaning_cn: 向某人报复；与某人扯平

examples.en: He wanted to get even with his colleague for stealing his idea.
examples.cn: 他想向偷了他创意的同事报复。

examples.en: She got even with her friend by playing a harmless prank.
examples.cn: 她通过一个无害的恶作剧与朋友扯平了。

examples.en: The party was in full swing by the time we arrived.
examples.cn: 我们到达时，派对正处在高潮。

examples.en: Construction on the new building is in full swing.
examples.cn: 新大楼的建设正在全面展开。

examples.en: She tripped over a loose cable on the floor.
examples.cn: 她被地板上松脱的电缆绊倒了。

examples.en: He tripped over his words during the important presentation.
examples.cn: 他在重要演讲中说话出错了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 从...到...变化；在...范围内变动

examples.en: Prices vary from $10 to $50 depending on the model.
examples.cn: 价格根据型号从10美元到50美元不等。

examples.en: Opinions on the issue vary from strong support to complete opposition.
examples.cn: 对这个问题的意见从强烈支持到完全反对都有。

examples.en: Many pop singers perform at large concerts to huge audiences.
examples.cn: 许多流行歌手在大型音乐会上为众多观众表演。

examples.en: Pop singers often release new albums to stay relevant in the industry.
examples.cn: 流行歌手经常发布新专辑以在行业中保持影响力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人非常恼火；逼得某人发疯

examples.en: The constant noise from the construction site is driving me up the wall.
examples.cn: 建筑工地的持续噪音让我非常恼火。

examples.en: Her habit of interrupting others drives her colleagues up the wall.
examples.cn: 她打断别人的习惯让她的同事们逼得发疯。

examples.en: We have a meeting scheduled for the day after tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我们安排在后天开会。

examples.en: The package is expected to arrive the day after tomorrow.
examples.cn: 包裹预计在后天到达。

examples.en: Parents must fulfill childcare duties to ensure their children's well-being.
examples.cn: 父母必须履行育儿职责以确保孩子的福祉。

examples.en: She balances her career while fulfilling childcare duties at home.
examples.cn: 她在平衡事业的同时在家履行育儿职责。

examples.en: This dish has a unique taste of spices from the region.
examples.cn: 这道菜有该地区香料的独特味道。

examples.en: Traveling gave her a taste of different cultures around the world.
examples.cn: 旅行让她体验了世界各地不同的文化。

definitions.meaning_cn: 盲目相信某事；未经证实就接受

examples.en: You shouldn't take everything you read on the internet on faith.
examples.cn: 你不应该盲目相信在网上读到的一切。

examples.en: He took her promise on faith without asking for proof.
examples.cn: 他未经证实就盲目相信了她的承诺。

examples.en: The hotel charges $200 per night for a standard room.
examples.cn: 这家酒店的标准间每晚收费200美元。

examples.en: They charge extra for delivery services.
examples.cn: 他们对送货服务额外收费。

examples.en: She argued for stricter environmental regulations in the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议上主张更严格的环境法规。

examples.en: The lawyer argued for his client's innocence in court.
examples.cn: 律师在法庭上为他的客户的无罪辩护。

examples.en: We stopped by the lake to enjoy the scenery during our hike.
examples.cn: 我们在徒步旅行时停在湖边欣赏风景。

examples.en: Tourists often visit this park to enjoy the scenic views.
examples.cn: 游客经常参观这个公园以欣赏风景。

examples.en: Finding a balance between work and personal life is important for well-being.
examples.cn: 找到工作和个人生活之间的平衡对福祉很重要。

examples.en: The policy aims to strike a balance between economic growth and environmental protection.
examples.cn: 这项政策旨在实现经济增长和环境保护之间的平衡。

examples.en: We had a ball at the beach party last weekend.
examples.cn: 我们上周末在海滩派对上玩得很开心。

examples.en: The kids had a ball playing games in the park.
examples.cn: 孩子们在公园里玩游戏玩得很开心。

definitions.meaning_cn: 给...在...上领先起步的优势

examples.en: Starting the project early gave us a head start on the competition.
examples.cn: 提前开始项目让我们在竞争中有了领先起步的优势。

examples.en: Her parents gave her a head start on learning languages by teaching her from a young age.
examples.cn: 她的父母从小教她语言，给了她在学习语言上领先起步的优势。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在其他方面；以其他方式

examples.en: The plan failed financially, but it succeeded in other ways, such as building team morale.
examples.cn: 这个计划在财务上失败了，但在其他方面成功了，比如提升了团队士气。

examples.en: You can contribute to the community in other ways, not just through donations.
examples.cn: 你可以以其他方式为社区做贡献，不仅仅是捐款。

definitions.meaning_cn: 覆盖或延伸到某个区域

examples.en: The wildfire spread over thousands of acres in just a few days.
examples.cn: 野火在短短几天内蔓延了数千英亩。

examples.en: She spread the map over the table to plan the route.
examples.cn: 她把地图铺在桌子上规划路线。

examples.en: The payments are spread over twelve months to ease the financial burden.
examples.cn: 付款分十二个月进行，以减轻财务负担。

examples.en: We should spread the workload over the week to avoid burnout.
examples.cn: 我们应该把工作量分散到一周内，避免过度劳累。

examples.en: The rapid population expansion in urban areas has led to housing shortages.
examples.cn: 城市地区人口的快速增长导致了住房短缺。

examples.en: Scientists study population expansion to predict future resource needs.
examples.cn: 科学家研究人口增长以预测未来的资源需求。

examples.en: The population expansion of invasive species threatens local ecosystems.
examples.cn: 入侵物种的数量增加威胁着当地生态系统。

examples.en: Conservation efforts aim to control population expansion of pests.
examples.cn: 保护工作旨在控制害虫数量的增加。

valid_entries.original_phrase: on the tip of one's tongue

definitions.meaning_cn: 话到嘴边却一时想不起来

examples.en: Her name is on the tip of my tongue, but I just can't recall it right now.
examples.cn: 她的名字就在我嘴边，但我一时想不起来。

examples.en: The answer was on the tip of his tongue during the quiz, but he blanked out.
examples.cn: 测验时答案就在他嘴边，但他脑子一片空白。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在困难面前保持坚强和不露情感

examples.en: Despite the loss, he kept a stiff upper lip and congratulated the winner.
examples.cn: 尽管输了，他仍保持坚强，并向获胜者表示祝贺。

examples.en: She kept a stiff upper lip during the crisis to reassure her team.
examples.cn: 在危机期间，她保持坚强以安抚团队。

examples.en: I have a sweet tooth, so I always save room for dessert.
examples.cn: 我喜欢吃甜食，所以总会留点肚子吃甜点。

examples.en: She has a sweet tooth and can't resist chocolate cakes.
examples.cn: 她喜欢吃甜食，无法抗拒巧克力蛋糕。

examples.en: The new museum aims to attract tourists with its interactive exhibits.
examples.cn: 新博物馆旨在通过互动展览吸引游客。

examples.en: Beautiful beaches attract tourists from all over the world.
examples.cn: 美丽的海滩吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

definitions.meaning_cn: 行李柜台，通常指机场办理托运的地方

examples.en: Please proceed to the baggage counter to check in your luggage.
examples.cn: 请前往行李柜台办理行李托运。

examples.en: The baggage counter at the airport was crowded with travelers.
examples.cn: 机场的行李柜台挤满了旅客。

examples.en: A good set of kitchen utensils makes cooking much easier.
examples.cn: 一套好的厨房用具能让烹饪变得更容易。

examples.en: She organized all her kitchen utensils in the drawer for quick access.
examples.cn: 她把所有厨房用具整理在抽屉里，方便取用。

examples.en: The company has a vacant position for a marketing manager.
examples.cn: 公司有一个市场营销经理的空缺职位。

examples.en: She applied for the vacant position as soon as it was advertised.
examples.cn: 她一看到广告就申请了这个空缺职位。

examples.en: You need to concentrate on doing your homework without distractions.
examples.cn: 你需要专注于做作业，不要分心。

examples.en: He concentrated on doing the task perfectly to impress his boss.
examples.cn: 他专注于完美地完成任务，以给老板留下好印象。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事视而不见或故意忽略

examples.en: The manager turned a blind eye to the minor violations to maintain team morale.
examples.cn: 经理对轻微违规行为视而不见，以保持团队士气。

examples.en: She turned a blind eye to her friend's mistakes to avoid conflict.
examples.cn: 她对朋友的错误视而不见，以避免冲突。

examples.en: The boss called him on the carpet for missing the deadline.
examples.cn: 老板因他错过截止日期而严厉批评了他。

examples.en: She was called on the carpet by her teacher for cheating on the test.
examples.cn: 她因考试作弊被老师严厉训斥。

examples.en: The two teams stood off in a tense match until the final minutes.
examples.cn: 两支队伍在紧张的比赛中对峙，直到最后几分钟。

examples.en: Negotiators stood off over the terms of the agreement for hours.
examples.cn: 谈判代表就协议条款僵持了数小时。

examples.en: He stood off from the crowd to observe the event quietly.
examples.cn: 他与人群保持距离，安静地观察活动。

examples.en: The cat stood off from the new dog until it felt safe.
examples.cn: 猫与新来的狗保持距离，直到感到安全。

examples.en: This tradition originates from ancient cultural practices.
examples.cn: 这个传统起源于古老的文化习俗。

examples.en: The rumor originated from a misunderstanding among colleagues.
examples.cn: 这个谣言源于同事间的误解。

definitions.meaning_cn: 组织能力，指有效安排和管理事务的技能

examples.en: Good organizational skills are essential for project managers.
examples.cn: 良好的组织能力对项目经理至关重要。

examples.en: She demonstrated strong organizational skills by planning the event flawlessly.
examples.cn: 她通过完美策划活动展示了强大的组织能力。

examples.en: Of late, there has been a noticeable increase in online shopping.
examples.cn: 近来，网上购物有明显增加。

examples.en: He has been very busy of late with his new job.
examples.cn: 他最近因新工作非常忙碌。

definitions.meaning_cn: 尽自己的一份力或责任

examples.en: Everyone needs to do their share to keep the community clean.
examples.cn: 每个人都需要尽自己的一份力来保持社区清洁。

examples.en: She did her share of the work and helped the team succeed.
examples.cn: 她尽了自己的一份力，帮助团队取得成功。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get to the heart of the matter

definitions.meaning_cn: 触及问题的核心或本质

examples.en: The detective quickly got to the heart of the matter by interviewing key witnesses.
examples.cn: 侦探通过采访关键证人迅速触及了问题的核心。

examples.en: To solve the conflict, we need to get to the heart of the matter and address the root cause.
examples.cn: 要解决冲突，我们需要触及问题的核心并处理根本原因。

definitions.meaning_cn: 就某人而言或从某人的角度

examples.en: For my part, I believe we should invest more in renewable energy.
examples.cn: 就我而言，我认为我们应该在可再生能源上投入更多。

examples.en: For her part, she agreed to take on additional responsibilities.
examples.cn: 就她而言，她同意承担额外的责任。

examples.en: The new policy is in effect as of today.
examples.cn: 新政策从今天起生效。

examples.en: In effect, the company is operating at a loss.
examples.cn: 实际上，公司正在亏损运营。

examples.en: The contract remains in effect for five years.
examples.cn: 合同在五年内保持有效。

examples.en: The emergency measures are still in effect.
examples.cn: 紧急措施仍然有效。

examples.en: The scientific study of climate change is crucial.
examples.cn: 对气候变化的科学研究至关重要。

examples.en: She published a scientific study on marine biology.
examples.cn: 她发表了一篇关于海洋生物学的科学研究。

examples.en: He excels in scientific study at university.
examples.cn: 他在大学的科学学科中表现出色。

examples.en: Scientific study requires rigorous methodology.
examples.cn: 科学学习需要严谨的方法论。

examples.en: He had a narrow escape from the car accident.
examples.cn: 他在车祸中侥幸逃脱。

examples.en: They had a narrow escape when the building collapsed.
examples.cn: 大楼倒塌时，他们死里逃生。

examples.en: I finally laid my hands on that rare book.
examples.cn: 我终于得到了那本稀有书籍。

examples.en: She laid her hands on some valuable information.
examples.cn: 她获取了一些有价值的信息。

examples.en: He laid his hands on the steering wheel.
examples.cn: 他抓住了方向盘。

examples.en: The child laid his hands on the toy eagerly.
examples.cn: 孩子急切地抓住了玩具。

examples.en: She has a busy schedule with meetings all day.
examples.cn: 她日程繁忙，整天都在开会。

examples.en: Managing a busy schedule can be stressful.
examples.cn: 管理繁忙的日程可能会有压力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 一线希望，乌云背后的幸福线

examples.en: Every cloud has a silver lining.
examples.cn: 每朵乌云背后都有一线希望。

examples.en: The silver lining of the pandemic was more family time.
examples.cn: 疫情的一线希望是更多的家庭时光。

examples.en: Good computer skills are essential for this job.
examples.cn: 良好的计算机技能对这份工作至关重要。

examples.en: He improved his computer skills through online courses.
examples.cn: 他通过在线课程提高了计算机技能。

examples.en: They decided to make peace with each other after the argument.
examples.cn: 争论后，他们决定与彼此和解。

examples.en: It's time to make peace with your old friend.
examples.cn: 是时候与你的老朋友和解了。

examples.en: I'll ring you back in ten minutes.
examples.cn: 我十分钟后给你回电话。

examples.en: She asked him to ring back later.
examples.cn: 她让他稍后回电话。

examples.en: The bell rang back after a short silence.
examples.cn: 短暂的沉默后，铃声再次响起。

examples.en: His words rang back in her mind.
examples.cn: 他的话在她脑海中再次响起。

examples.en: She pored through the documents to find evidence.
examples.cn: 她仔细阅读文件以寻找证据。

examples.en: He pored through the data for hours.
examples.cn: 他花了几个小时深入研究数据。

examples.en: There is a growing demand for renewable energy.
examples.cn: 对可再生能源的需求日益增长。

examples.en: A growing demand for skilled workers is evident.
examples.cn: 对熟练工人的需求日益增长是显而易见的。

examples.en: Senior citizens often receive discounts.
examples.cn: 老年人通常享受折扣。

examples.en: Programs for senior citizens are expanding.
examples.cn: 针对老年人的项目正在扩展。

examples.en: She outlined her idea for the project in the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议上概述了她的项目想法。

examples.en: He outlined his idea briefly before discussing details.
examples.cn: 他在讨论细节前简要概述了他的想法。

examples.en: Without a plan, you'll get nowhere.
examples.cn: 没有计划，你将一事无成。

examples.en: The negotiations got nowhere after hours of discussion.
examples.cn: 经过数小时讨论，谈判毫无进展。

examples.en: These materials lend themselves to creative projects.
examples.cn: 这些材料适合于创意项目。

examples.en: The quiet environment lends itself to studying.
examples.cn: 安静的环境适用于学习。

examples.en: We need to step up our efforts to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 我们需要加强努力以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: The company stepped up production to meet demand.
examples.cn: 公司增加了产量以满足需求。

examples.en: He stepped up to lead the team in the crisis.
examples.cn: 他在危机中站出来领导团队。

examples.en: She stepped up and took charge of the event.
examples.cn: 她站出来负责这次活动。

examples.en: The bus route goes through the city center.
examples.cn: 这条公交路线穿过市中心。

examples.en: Check the bus route before you travel.
examples.cn: 出行前检查公交路线。

examples.en: She teaches subjects like math and science.
examples.cn: 她教授数学和科学等科目。

examples.en: Teachers often specialize in specific subjects they teach.
examples.cn: 教师通常专攻他们教授的特定科目。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被...的光芒或魅力所迷惑或震撼

examples.en: She was dazzled by the bright lights of the city.
examples.cn: 她被城市的明亮灯光所震撼。

examples.en: He was dazzled by her intelligence and charm.
examples.cn: 他被她的智慧和魅力所迷惑。

examples.en: The driver was dazzled by the oncoming headlights.
examples.cn: 司机被迎面而来的车灯晃得看不清。

examples.en: I was dazzled by the sun reflecting off the snow.
examples.cn: 我被雪反射的阳光晃得睁不开眼。

definitions.meaning_cn: 保持技能或兴趣，不荒废

examples.en: Even after retirement, he keeps his hand in by playing chess weekly.
examples.cn: 即使退休后，他每周下棋以保持棋艺。

examples.en: She keeps her hand in with painting by taking occasional classes.
examples.cn: 她偶尔上课以保持绘画技能。

valid_entries.original_phrase: make hay while the sun is shining

definitions.meaning_cn: 趁热打铁，抓住有利时机

examples.en: With the market booming, we should make hay while the sun is shining and invest now.
examples.cn: 市场繁荣时，我们应该趁热打铁，现在就投资。

examples.en: She made hay while the sun was shining by finishing all her work during the quiet morning.
examples.cn: 她趁早晨安静时完成了所有工作，抓住了有利时机。

examples.en: I'll phone up the restaurant to make a reservation.
examples.cn: 我会打电话给餐厅预订。

examples.en: She phoned up her friend to chat about the news.
examples.cn: 她打电话给朋友聊新闻。

examples.en: Farmers grow crops like wheat and corn in this region.
examples.cn: 农民在这个地区种植小麦和玉米等农作物。

examples.en: They grow crops organically to protect the environment.
examples.cn: 他们有机种植农作物以保护环境。

examples.en: He works best under pressure, meeting tight deadlines.
examples.cn: 他在压力下工作得最好，能按时完成紧迫任务。

examples.en: The team is under pressure to win the championship this year.
examples.cn: 团队今年承受着赢得冠军的压力。

examples.en: The material deforms under pressure in the experiment.
examples.cn: 在实验中，材料在压力下变形。

examples.en: Gases compress under pressure in the container.
examples.cn: 气体在容器中受压力压缩。

examples.en: He got into trouble for breaking the school rules.
examples.cn: 他因违反校规而陷入麻烦。

examples.en: If you don't pay the bill on time, you might get into trouble with the company.
examples.cn: 如果你不按时付账单，可能会和公司陷入困境。

examples.en: Since we're already here, we might as well visit the museum.
examples.cn: 既然我们已经在这里了，不妨参观一下博物馆。

examples.en: You might as well start studying now to avoid last-minute stress.
examples.cn: 你最好现在就开始学习，以避免最后一刻的压力。

examples.en: After the party, I'll drive home carefully.
examples.cn: 派对结束后，我会小心开车回家。

examples.en: She drives home every evening after work.
examples.cn: 她每晚下班后开车回家。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人充分理解或接受某个观点

examples.en: The teacher used examples to drive home the importance of safety.
examples.cn: 老师用例子使学生充分理解安全的重要性。

examples.en: He drove home his argument with strong evidence during the debate.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，他用强有力的证据使他的论点被接受。

examples.en: She went through a difficult time after losing her job.
examples.cn: 失业后，她经历了一段困难时期。

examples.en: The company is going through major changes this year.
examples.cn: 公司今年正在经历重大变革。

examples.en: Please go through the document before signing it.
examples.cn: 请在签署前仔细检查文件。

examples.en: The auditor went through the financial records thoroughly.
examples.cn: 审计员彻底审查了财务记录。

examples.en: We went through all the snacks during the movie.
examples.cn: 看电影时我们吃完了所有零食。

examples.en: He goes through a lot of paper in his printing business.
examples.cn: 在他的印刷业务中，他用了很多纸。

definitions.meaning_cn: 清醒过来，从醉酒中恢复

examples.en: He drank some coffee to sober up before driving.
examples.cn: 他喝了些咖啡以在开车前清醒过来。

examples.en: It took her a few hours to sober up after the party.
examples.cn: 派对后，她花了几个小时才从醉酒中恢复。

examples.en: The bad news made everyone sober up and focus on the problem.
examples.cn: 坏消息使每个人都变得严肃并专注于问题。

examples.en: After the initial excitement, the team sobered up to plan realistically.
examples.cn: 最初的兴奋过后，团队冷静下来进行现实规划。

definitions.meaning_cn: 没有受到伤害，安然无恙

examples.en: Don't worry, the children came to no harm during the storm.
examples.cn: 别担心，孩子们在暴风雨中没有受到伤害。

examples.en: The package was delivered and came to no harm in transit.
examples.cn: 包裹已送达，在运输过程中安然无恙。

examples.en: He turned a deaf ear to all the criticism and continued his work.
examples.cn: 他对所有批评充耳不闻，继续工作。

examples.en: She turned a deaf ear to their pleas for help.
examples.cn: 她对他们的求助置之不理。

examples.en: The manager is responsible to the board of directors for company performance.
examples.cn: 经理对公司绩效向董事会负责。

examples.en: In this role, you will be responsible to the team leader for project updates.
examples.cn: 在这个职位上，你将向团队领导负责项目更新。

examples.en: The candidate is trying to draw support for her environmental policies.
examples.cn: 候选人正试图争取对她环境政策的支持。

examples.en: They organized events to draw support for the charity cause.
examples.cn: 他们组织活动以争取对慈善事业的支持。

definitions.meaning_cn: 私人住宅，指个人拥有的非商业性住所

examples.en: The celebrity's private residence is heavily guarded to ensure privacy.
examples.cn: 这位名人的私人住宅戒备森严，以确保隐私。

examples.en: You need permission to enter a private residence without the owner's consent.
examples.cn: 未经业主同意，进入私人住宅需要许可。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为...做准备，提前安排或训练

examples.en: Students should prepare for the exam by reviewing all the materials.
examples.cn: 学生应通过复习所有材料来为考试做准备。

examples.en: We need to prepare for the worst-case scenario in this project.
examples.cn: 我们需要为这个项目的最坏情况做准备。

definitions.meaning_cn: 达到标准，符合规定的要求

examples.en: The new product must meet the standard before it can be released to the market.
examples.cn: 新产品必须达到标准才能投放市场。

examples.en: Her performance didn't meet the standard required for promotion.
examples.cn: 她的表现未达到晋升所需的标准。

definitions.meaning_cn: 首先，用于列举理由或观点

examples.en: I don't want to go to that restaurant; for one thing, it's too expensive.
examples.cn: 我不想去那家餐厅；首先，它太贵了。

examples.en: For one thing, the weather is bad, so we should postpone the trip.
examples.cn: 首先，天气不好，所以我们应该推迟旅行。

definitions.meaning_cn: 逐渐减弱或平息，如噪音、风暴或情绪

examples.en: The storm will die down by evening, so we can go out then.
examples.cn: 风暴将在傍晚逐渐减弱，那时我们可以出去。

examples.en: After the argument, the tension in the room slowly died down.
examples.cn: 争论过后，房间里的紧张气氛逐渐平息。

definitions.meaning_cn: 国民生产总值，衡量一个国家经济总产出的指标

examples.en: The country's gross national product increased by 3% last year.
examples.cn: 该国的国民生产总值去年增长了3%。

examples.en: Economists use gross national product to assess economic health.
examples.cn: 经济学家使用国民生产总值来评估经济健康状况。

examples.en: She could see through his lies immediately.
examples.cn: 她立刻就看穿了他的谎言。

examples.en: It's hard to see through a well-crafted disguise.
examples.cn: 很难看穿精心设计的伪装。

examples.en: He promised to see the project through to completion.
examples.cn: 他承诺会坚持完成这个项目。

examples.en: We'll see you through this difficult time.
examples.cn: 我们会支持你度过这个困难时期。

definitions.meaning_cn: 收集信息，系统地获取数据或事实

examples.en: The team needs to collect information before making a decision.
examples.cn: 团队需要在做决定前收集信息。

examples.en: She collected information from various sources for her report.
examples.cn: 她从各种来源收集信息来写报告。

definitions.meaning_cn: 拥堵税，对在交通拥堵区域行驶的车辆征收的费用

examples.en: London's congestion tax aims to reduce traffic in the city center.
examples.cn: 伦敦的拥堵税旨在减少市中心的交通流量。

examples.en: Drivers must pay a congestion tax to enter the designated zone during peak hours.
examples.cn: 司机在高峰时段进入指定区域必须支付拥堵税。

valid_entries.original_phrase: look like the cat that swallowed the canary

definitions.meaning_cn: 看起来得意洋洋或沾沾自喜，通常因为做了坏事或知道了秘密

examples.en: After winning the game, he looked like the cat that swallowed the canary.
examples.cn: 赢得比赛后，他看起来得意洋洋。

examples.en: She had a secret and looked like the cat that swallowed the canary all day.
examples.cn: 她有个秘密，一整天都看起来沾沾自喜。

definitions.meaning_cn: 相处融洽，与他人关系友好

examples.en: My siblings and I get along very well.
examples.cn: 我的兄弟姐妹和我相处得非常融洽。

examples.en: It's important to get along with your coworkers in a professional setting.
examples.cn: 在职业环境中，与同事相处融洽很重要。

examples.en: How are you getting along with your studies?
examples.cn: 你的学习进展如何？

examples.en: We need to get along with the project to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 我们需要推进项目以赶上截止日期。

definitions.meaning_cn: 减弱或停止，如雨、压力或活动

examples.en: The rain finally let up after hours of heavy downpour.
examples.cn: 大雨持续数小时后终于减弱了。

examples.en: The pressure at work never seems to let up.
examples.cn: 工作压力似乎从未减弱。

definitions.meaning_cn: 有先发优势，比别人早开始或领先

examples.en: She had a head start in the race because she trained earlier.
examples.cn: 她在比赛中占有先发优势，因为她训练得更早。

examples.en: Learning a language as a child gives you a head start in fluency.
examples.cn: 从小学习语言能让你在流利度上占有先发优势。

definitions.meaning_cn: 失声，暂时无法说话，通常由于疾病或过度使用

examples.en: After shouting at the concert, I lost my voice for a day.
examples.cn: 在音乐会上大喊后，我失声了一天。

examples.en: She lost her voice due to a severe cold.
examples.cn: 由于重感冒，她失声了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 生怕，以免，表示担心某事发生而采取预防措施

examples.en: He left early for fear that he would miss the train.
examples.cn: 他早早离开，生怕错过火车。

examples.en: She double-checked the report for fear that there might be errors.
examples.cn: 她反复检查报告，以免有错误。

definitions.meaning_cn: 承担责任，承认错误或过失

examples.en: He decided to take the blame for the team's failure.
examples.cn: 他决定为团队的失败承担责任。

examples.en: It's honorable to take the blame when you've made a mistake.
examples.cn: 犯错时承担责任是光荣的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 严厉打击，采取严厉措施制止非法或不道德行为

examples.en: The government is cracking down on tax evasion.
examples.cn: 政府正在严厉打击逃税行为。

examples.en: Police are cracking down on speeding in residential areas.
examples.cn: 警方正在严厉打击住宅区的超速行为。

definitions.meaning_cn: 收集起来，把分散的东西聚在一起

examples.en: Please gather up all the toys and put them in the box.
examples.cn: 请把所有玩具收集起来放进盒子里。

examples.en: She gathered up her courage and spoke in front of the crowd.
examples.cn: 她鼓起勇气在人群面前发言。

definitions.meaning_cn: 亲自动手，参与实际工作，通常指体力或脏活

examples.en: The manager isn't afraid to get his hands dirty and help with the manual labor.
examples.cn: 经理不怕亲自动手帮忙干体力活。

examples.en: To succeed in this business, you have to be willing to get your hands dirty.
examples.cn: 要在这个行业成功，你必须愿意亲自动手。

examples.en: I need some time to think over your proposal before I decide.
examples.cn: 我需要一些时间仔细考虑你的提议再做决定。

examples.en: He thought over the problem and came up with a solution.
examples.cn: 他仔细考虑了这个问题并想出了解决方案。

examples.en: The committee is made up of representatives from each department.
examples.cn: 委员会由各部门的代表组成。

examples.en: Water is made up of hydrogen and oxygen atoms.
examples.cn: 水由氢原子和氧原子组成。

examples.en: Lucky you! You got the last ticket to the concert.
examples.cn: 你真幸运！你拿到了音乐会的最后一张票。

examples.en: Lucky you, finding that vintage watch at a flea market.
examples.cn: 你真幸运，在跳蚤市场找到了那块复古手表。

examples.en: The criminal managed to escape punishment due to lack of evidence.
examples.cn: 由于证据不足，罪犯设法逃脱了惩罚。

examples.en: He thought he could escape punishment by fleeing the country.
examples.cn: 他以为通过逃离国家就能逃脱惩罚。

examples.en: She decided to cast away her old clothes and start fresh.
examples.cn: 她决定丢弃旧衣服，重新开始。

examples.en: The sailor was cast away on a deserted island after the shipwreck.
examples.cn: 海难后，水手被抛弃在一个荒岛上。

examples.en: Don't pass up this opportunity to study abroad.
examples.cn: 不要错过这个出国留学的机会。

examples.en: He passed up the chance to invest in the startup, which later became successful.
examples.cn: 他放弃了投资那家初创公司的机会，后来它成功了。

examples.en: She has great respect for her elders.
examples.cn: 她对长辈非常尊重。

examples.en: The team showed respect for the opponent's skills.
examples.cn: 团队对对手的技能表示尊重。

examples.en: Please help yourself to some cookies from the plate.
examples.cn: 请自取盘子里的饼干。

examples.en: At the buffet, guests are encouraged to help themselves to the food.
examples.cn: 在自助餐上，鼓励客人自取食物。

examples.en: Parents should be strict with their children about homework.
examples.cn: 父母应该对孩子的作业严格要求。

examples.en: The teacher is strict with deadlines for assignments.
examples.cn: 老师对作业的截止日期很严格。

examples.en: The two boxers squared off in the ring before the match began.
examples.cn: 比赛开始前，两位拳击手在拳击台上摆好架势。

examples.en: The rival companies squared off in a fierce marketing battle.
examples.cn: 竞争对手公司在激烈的营销战中准备对抗。

examples.en: To some degree, I agree with your point about climate change.
examples.cn: 在某种程度上，我同意你关于气候变化的观点。

examples.en: The success of the project depends to some degree on external funding.
examples.cn: 项目的成功在某种程度上取决于外部资金。

examples.en: He failed in his attempt to climb the mountain due to bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于恶劣天气，他攀登这座山的尝试失败了。

examples.en: The company failed in its mission to reduce plastic waste.
examples.cn: 公司在减少塑料废物的使命上失败了。

examples.en: This software enables users to edit videos easily.
examples.cn: 这个软件使用户能够轻松编辑视频。

examples.en: The scholarship enabled her to attend university.
examples.cn: 奖学金使她能够上大学。

examples.en: Her English improved by leaps and bounds after living abroad.
examples.cn: 在国外生活后，她的英语飞速提高。

examples.en: The company's profits grew by leaps and bounds last quarter.
examples.cn: 上个季度，公司的利润大幅度增长。

examples.en: Her facial expression showed she was surprised by the news.
examples.cn: 她的面部表情显示她对这消息感到惊讶。

examples.en: Actors use facial expressions to convey emotions on stage.
examples.cn: 演员在舞台上使用面部表情来传达情感。

examples.en: I bought a can of cola from the soda machine in the hallway.
examples.cn: 我从走廊的苏打水贩卖机买了一罐可乐。

examples.en: The soda machine at the office is out of order again.
examples.cn: 办公室的苏打水贩卖机又坏了。

examples.en: The new curriculum places emphasis on critical thinking skills.
examples.cn: 新课程强调批判性思维技能。

examples.en: There is a strong emphasis on teamwork in this company.
examples.cn: 这家公司非常强调团队合作。

examples.en: Volunteering can make a difference in your community.
examples.cn: 志愿服务可以在你的社区产生影响。

examples.en: Every small action can make a difference in protecting the environment.
examples.cn: 每一个小行动都能在保护环境方面有所作为。

examples.en: I prefer to meet clients in person rather than over video call.
examples.cn: 我更喜欢亲自会见客户，而不是通过视频通话。

examples.en: She delivered the award in person at the ceremony.
examples.cn: 她在颁奖典礼上亲自颁发了奖项。

examples.en: He apologized of his own accord without anyone asking him to.
examples.cn: 他自愿道歉，没有人要求他这样做。

examples.en: The child cleaned his room of his own accord.
examples.cn: 孩子主动打扫了他的房间。

examples.en: She turned round to see who was calling her name.
examples.cn: 她转身看是谁在叫她的名字。

examples.en: The car turned round at the end of the street.
examples.cn: 汽车在街道尽头回转了。

examples.en: The hikers were in danger when the storm hit.
examples.cn: 暴风雨来临时，徒步旅行者处于危险之中。

examples.en: If you don't wear a seatbelt, you'll be in danger in an accident.
examples.cn: 如果不系安全带，发生事故时你会处于危险之中。

examples.en: After he helped me move, I owe him a favor.
examples.cn: 他帮我搬家后，我欠他一个人情。

examples.en: She owes me a favor from last year's project.
examples.cn: 她因为去年的项目欠我一个人情。

examples.en: The new software will improve efficiency in our office.
examples.cn: 新软件将提高我们办公室的效率。

examples.en: We need to improve efficiency to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 我们需要提高效率以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: During the power outage, we had to go without electricity for hours.
examples.cn: 停电期间，我们不得不忍受几个小时没有电。

examples.en: He can go without sleep for days when working on a project.
examples.cn: 在做项目时，他可以几天不睡觉。

examples.en: To save money, she decided to go without her morning coffee.
examples.cn: 为了省钱，她决定放弃早上的咖啡。

examples.en: You can go without the extra details in the report.
examples.cn: 你可以省去报告中的额外细节。

examples.en: I can't put my hands on my keys; have you seen them?
examples.cn: 我找不到我的钥匙了，你看到了吗？

examples.en: She quickly put her hands on the document in the file cabinet.
examples.cn: 她很快在文件柜里找到了那份文件。

examples.en: Don't put your hands on the hot stove.
examples.cn: 不要触摸热的炉子。

examples.en: He put his hands on the steering wheel and started the car.
examples.cn: 他抓住方向盘，启动了汽车。

examples.en: The company gained an unfair advantage over competitors by using insider information.
examples.cn: 该公司通过使用内幕信息获得了对竞争对手的不公平优势。

examples.en: Cheating in the exam allowed him to gain an unfair advantage over his classmates.
examples.cn: 考试作弊让他获得了对同学的不公平优势。

definitions.meaning_cn: 扬起眉毛（表示惊讶、怀疑或不赞同）

examples.en: When he announced his resignation, everyone raised their eyebrows.
examples.cn: 当他宣布辞职时，所有人都扬起了眉毛。

examples.en: She raised her eyebrows at the outrageous price.
examples.cn: 她对离谱的价格扬起了眉毛。

definitions.meaning_cn: 穿透某人（指子弹等），或比喻深深影响某人

examples.en: The bullet went right through him, causing serious injury.
examples.cn: 子弹穿透了他，造成了严重伤害。

examples.en: Her harsh words went right through him, leaving him upset.
examples.cn: 她尖刻的话语深深影响了他，让他很沮丧。

examples.en: It took months to get the new business off the ground.
examples.cn: 花了几个月时间才让新业务启动起来。

examples.en: We need funding to get this project off the ground.
examples.cn: 我们需要资金来启动这个项目。

examples.en: They plan to tear down the old building to make space for a park.
examples.cn: 他们计划拆除旧建筑，为公园腾出空间。

examples.en: The city tore down the unsafe bridge.
examples.cn: 城市拆除了不安全的桥梁。

examples.en: He tends to tear down others' ideas in meetings.
examples.cn: 他倾向于在会议上贬低别人的想法。

examples.en: The review tore down the movie for its poor acting.
examples.cn: 评论因演技差而批评了这部电影。

examples.en: He idled away the afternoon watching TV.
examples.cn: 他看电视虚度了整个下午。

examples.en: Don't idle away your youth; study hard.
examples.cn: 不要虚度青春，努力学习。

examples.en: The company booked a charter flight for the employees' retreat.
examples.cn: 公司为员工度假预订了包机航班。

examples.en: Charter flights are often cheaper for group travel.
examples.cn: 对于团体旅行，包机航班通常更便宜。

examples.en: I read news stories every morning to stay informed.
examples.cn: 我每天早上阅读新闻报道以保持信息灵通。

examples.en: She enjoys reading news stories about technology.
examples.cn: 她喜欢阅读关于技术的新闻报道。

examples.en: Technology and finance are considered high-paying industries.
examples.cn: 技术和金融被认为是高薪行业。

examples.en: He chose a career in a high-paying industry to support his family.
examples.cn: 他选择在高薪行业工作以养家糊口。

definitions.meaning_cn: 国会记录（美国国会的官方议事录）

examples.en: The speech was published in the Congressional Record.
examples.cn: 演讲被发表在国会记录中。

examples.en: Researchers often refer to the Congressional Record for historical debates.
examples.cn: 研究人员经常参考国会记录来了解历史辩论。

examples.en: Please refrain from smoking in this area.
examples.cn: 请避免在这个区域吸烟。

examples.en: He refrained from commenting on the sensitive issue.
examples.cn: 他克制自己不对这个敏感问题发表评论。

valid_entries.original_phrase: see a man about a dog

definitions.meaning_cn: 委婉说法，表示要去处理私事或上厕所

examples.en: He excused himself, saying he had to see a man about a dog.
examples.cn: 他借口说要去处理点私事。

examples.en: When she left the meeting, she joked she was going to see a man about a dog.
examples.cn: 当她离开会议时，她开玩笑说要去处理点私事。

examples.en: We decided to go out for dinner tonight.
examples.cn: 我们决定今晚出去吃晚饭。

examples.en: She likes to go out with friends on weekends.
examples.cn: 她喜欢在周末和朋友外出。

examples.en: The fire went out after we added water.
examples.cn: 我们加水后，火熄灭了。

examples.en: Make sure the lights go out when you leave.
examples.cn: 离开时确保灯熄灭。

examples.en: That style of clothing has gone out of fashion.
examples.cn: 那种服装风格已经过时了。

examples.en: Bell-bottom pants went out in the 1970s.
examples.cn: 喇叭裤在20世纪70年代就过时了。

examples.en: Smoking is correlated with an increased risk of lung cancer.
examples.cn: 吸烟与肺癌风险增加相关。

examples.en: Study hours are correlated with higher test scores.
examples.cn: 学习时间与更高的考试成绩相关。

definitions.meaning_cn: 偶然遇到或加入（一群人）

examples.en: He fell in with some old friends at the conference.
examples.cn: 他在会议上偶然遇到了一些老朋友。

examples.en: She fell in with a group of hikers during her trip.
examples.cn: 她在旅行中遇到了一群徒步旅行者并加入了他们。

examples.en: The committee fell in with the proposed changes.
examples.cn: 委员会同意了提议的变更。

examples.en: I fell in with her suggestion to postpone the meeting.
examples.cn: 我同意了她推迟会议的建议。

examples.en: Diamonds are one of the most valuable precious stones.
examples.cn: 钻石是最有价值的宝石之一。

examples.en: She wore a necklace adorned with precious stones.
examples.cn: 她戴了一条镶有宝石的项链。

examples.en: He got involved with a charity organization last year.
examples.cn: 他去年参与了一个慈善组织。

examples.en: She got involved with a complicated legal case.
examples.cn: 她卷入了一个复杂的法律案件。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人建立关系（常指浪漫或麻烦的）

examples.en: They got involved with each other during college.
examples.cn: 他们在大学期间建立了关系。

examples.en: I advise you not to get involved with that crowd.
examples.cn: 我建议你不要和那群人扯上关系。

examples.en: The security guard allowed us in after checking our IDs.
examples.cn: 保安检查了我们的身份证后允许我们进入。

examples.en: Pets are not allowed in this restaurant.
examples.cn: 这家餐厅不允许宠物进入。

examples.en: If you buy the car, we'll throw in a free GPS.
examples.cn: 如果你买这辆车，我们会额外赠送一个免费的GPS。

examples.en: She threw in some extra spices to enhance the flavor.
examples.cn: 她额外加了一些香料来提升味道。

examples.en: He threw in a joke to lighten the mood.
examples.cn: 他插了一个笑话来缓和气氛。

examples.en: During the debate, she threw in a crucial point.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她插入了一个关键点。

definitions.meaning_cn: 美丽的风景或自然景观

examples.en: The beautiful landscape of the mountains took our breath away.
examples.cn: 山区的美丽风景让我们惊叹不已。

examples.en: She painted a picture of the beautiful landscape she saw on her trip.
examples.cn: 她画了一幅她在旅行中看到的美丽风景的画。

examples.en: Car ownership has increased significantly in urban areas.
examples.cn: 城市地区的汽车所有权显著增加。

examples.en: The document proves his car ownership.
examples.cn: 这份文件证明了他的汽车所有权。

examples.en: The university offers a wide spectrum of courses.
examples.cn: 这所大学提供广泛的课程。

examples.en: There is a wide spectrum of opinions on this issue.
examples.cn: 在这个问题上有各种各样的意见。

examples.en: Under the circumstances, we decided to cancel the event.
examples.cn: 在这种情况下，我们决定取消活动。

examples.en: It was the best decision under the circumstances.
examples.cn: 在这种情况下，这是最好的决定。

examples.en: The criminal is now behind bars for his crimes.
examples.cn: 这名罪犯因他的罪行现在被关在监狱里。

examples.en: He spent ten years behind bars before being released.
examples.cn: 他在被释放前在监狱里度过了十年。

examples.en: We rounded off the evening with a toast.
examples.cn: 我们以祝酒圆满结束了这个晚上。

examples.en: She rounded off her presentation with a summary.
examples.cn: 她以总结圆满结束了她的演示。

examples.en: Round off the number to the nearest whole number.
examples.cn: 将这个数字四舍五入到最接近的整数。

examples.en: The total was rounded off to $100.
examples.cn: 总额被四舍五入到100美元。

examples.en: The local residents opposed the new construction project.
examples.cn: 当地居民反对新的建设项目。

examples.en: As a local resident, she knows all the best restaurants.
examples.cn: 作为当地居民，她知道所有最好的餐厅。

examples.en: He admitted he was in the wrong after the argument.
examples.cn: 争论后他承认自己错了。

examples.en: If you're in the wrong, you should apologize.
examples.cn: 如果你错了，你应该道歉。

examples.en: She worked hard to get ahead of her competitors.
examples.cn: 她努力工作以领先于她的竞争对手。

examples.en: The company aims to get ahead of the market trends.
examples.cn: 公司旨在领先于市场趋势。

examples.en: Let's get ahead of the schedule by starting early.
examples.cn: 让我们提前开始以赶在计划前面。

examples.en: He got ahead of the problem by addressing it immediately.
examples.cn: 他通过立即处理问题来提前应对。

definitions.meaning_cn: 证书课程，通常短期并颁发证书

examples.en: She completed a certificate course in digital marketing.
examples.cn: 她完成了一个数字营销的证书课程。

examples.en: The university offers a certificate course in project management.
examples.cn: 这所大学提供项目管理证书课程。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have a good grasp of advanced technology

examples.en: Engineers need to have a good grasp of advanced technology.
examples.cn: 工程师需要熟练掌握先进技术。

examples.en: He has a good grasp of advanced technology, which helps in his job.
examples.cn: 他熟练掌握先进技术，这有助于他的工作。

examples.en: She knows how to deal with difficult customers.
examples.cn: 她知道如何处理难缠的客户。

examples.en: We need to deal with this issue immediately.
examples.cn: 我们需要立即处理这个问题。

examples.en: Our company deals with suppliers from around the world.
examples.cn: 我们公司与来自世界各地的供应商打交道。

examples.en: He deals with financial transactions daily.
examples.cn: 他每天处理金融交易。

examples.en: Let go of the rope before you fall.
examples.cn: 在你摔倒之前放开绳子。

examples.en: She let go of the balloon and watched it float away.
examples.cn: 她放开了气球，看着它飘走。

examples.en: The company had to let go of several employees due to budget cuts.
examples.cn: 由于预算削减，公司不得不解雇几名员工。

examples.en: He was let go from his job last month.
examples.cn: 他上个月被解雇了。

examples.en: It's time to let go of the past and move on.
examples.cn: 是时候放下过去，继续前进了。

examples.en: She struggled to let go of her anger.
examples.cn: 她努力放下她的愤怒。

examples.en: The document in question is missing from the files.
examples.cn: 讨论中的文件从档案中丢失了。

examples.en: The person in question denied the allegations.
examples.cn: 讨论中的人否认了这些指控。

definitions.meaning_cn: 心地善良，有金子般的心

examples.en: Despite his rough exterior, he has a heart of gold.
examples.cn: 尽管他外表粗犷，但他心地善良。

examples.en: She has a heart of gold and always helps those in need.
examples.cn: 她心地善良，总是帮助那些需要帮助的人。

definitions.meaning_cn: 决心做某事，专注于某事

examples.en: She is intent on finishing her degree this year.
examples.cn: 她决心今年完成学位。

examples.en: He was intent on proving his theory correct.
examples.cn: 他专注于证明他的理论是正确的。

examples.en: It's hard to tell the twins apart.
examples.cn: 很难区分这对双胞胎。

examples.en: Can you tell the original painting apart from the copy?
examples.cn: 你能辨别出原画和复制品吗？

examples.en: He showed courtesy by holding the door open for her.
examples.cn: 他很有礼貌地为她开着门。

examples.en: It's important to show courtesy to your elders.
examples.cn: 对长辈表现出尊重很重要。

examples.en: They are hunting for a new apartment in the city.
examples.cn: 他们正在城市里寻找新公寓。

examples.en: I've been hunting for my keys all morning.
examples.cn: 我一整个早上都在找我的钥匙。

definitions.meaning_cn: 创造历史，做出重大成就

examples.en: She made history by becoming the first woman to win the award.
examples.cn: 她成为第一位获得该奖项的女性，创造了历史。

examples.en: The team made history with their unprecedented victory.
examples.cn: 这支队伍以史无前例的胜利创造了历史。

definitions.meaning_cn: 堵住或围住，使无法移动

examples.en: My car was blocked in by other vehicles in the parking lot.
examples.cn: 我的车在停车场被其他车辆堵住了。

examples.en: The protesters blocked in the entrance to the building.
examples.cn: 抗议者堵住了大楼的入口。

definitions.meaning_cn: 我怀疑...，表示不确定性或质疑

examples.en: I doubt he will arrive on time.
examples.cn: 我怀疑他会准时到达。

examples.en: I doubt the truth of that statement.
examples.cn: 我怀疑那个陈述的真实性。

examples.en: You can borrow my car so long as you return it by tonight.
examples.cn: 只要你今晚还回来，就可以借我的车。

examples.en: So long as you study hard, you will pass the exam.
examples.cn: 只要你努力学习，就会通过考试。

examples.en: The area is now free of pollution after the cleanup.
examples.cn: 清理后，该地区现在没有污染了。

examples.en: She wants to be free of all her debts.
examples.cn: 她想摆脱所有的债务。

definitions.meaning_cn: 看不起或轻视某人或某物

examples.en: He looks down on people who don't have a college degree.
examples.cn: 他看不起没有大学学位的人。

examples.en: Don't look down on others just because they are different.
examples.cn: 不要因为别人不同就看不起他们。

examples.en: Proper disposal of household waste is important for the environment.
examples.cn: 正确处理家庭垃圾对环境很重要。

examples.en: The city collects household waste every Tuesday.
examples.cn: 城市每周二收集家庭垃圾。

examples.en: The police suspect him of theft.
examples.cn: 警方怀疑他盗窃。

examples.en: I suspect her of lying about her whereabouts.
examples.cn: 我怀疑她在行踪上撒谎。

examples.en: She leads a healthy life by exercising regularly and eating well.
examples.cn: 她通过定期锻炼和健康饮食来过健康的生活。

examples.en: To lead a healthy life, avoid smoking and excessive drinking.
examples.cn: 要过健康的生活，避免吸烟和过量饮酒。

examples.en: He bought a bunch of flowers for his mother.
examples.cn: 他给母亲买了一束花。

examples.en: A bunch of kids were playing in the park.
examples.cn: 一群孩子在公园里玩耍。

examples.en: High medical expenses can be a burden for many families.
examples.cn: 高额医疗费用对许多家庭来说可能是个负担。

examples.en: The insurance helps cover high medical expenses.
examples.cn: 保险有助于支付高额医疗费用。

examples.en: The car ran down a pedestrian on the street.
examples.cn: 汽车在街上撞倒了一个行人。

examples.en: He always runs down his colleagues in meetings.
examples.cn: 他总是在会议上批评他的同事。

examples.en: This key doesn't fit into the lock.
examples.cn: 这把钥匙不适合这个锁。

examples.en: She fits into the new team very well.
examples.cn: 她很好地融入了新团队。

examples.en: Please confirm your reservation by calling the hotel.
examples.cn: 请致电酒店确认您的预订。

examples.en: I need to confirm my flight reservation before traveling.
examples.cn: 旅行前我需要确认我的航班预订。

examples.en: Bear in mind that the deadline is next Friday.
examples.cn: 记住截止日期是下周五。

examples.en: When planning the trip, bear in mind the weather conditions.
examples.cn: 计划旅行时，要考虑天气条件。

examples.en: The documentary shows animals living in the raw, without human interference.
examples.cn: 这部纪录片展示了动物在自然状态下的生活，没有人类干预。

examples.en: He prefers to sleep in the raw during hot summer nights.
examples.cn: 在炎热的夏夜，他喜欢裸睡。

examples.en: She decided to donate her old clothes to the local charity.
examples.cn: 她决定把旧衣服捐给当地的慈善机构。

examples.en: The company will donate a portion of its profits to environmental causes.
examples.cn: 公司将把一部分利润捐赠给环保事业。

examples.en: Judging from the dark clouds, it might rain soon.
examples.cn: 从乌云来看，可能很快就要下雨了。

examples.en: Judging from his smile, he seems very happy with the results.
examples.cn: 从他的笑容来看，他似乎对结果非常满意。

examples.en: The new smartphone will be on sale starting next week.
examples.cn: 这款新智能手机将于下周开始销售。

examples.en: These shoes are on sale for 50% off this weekend.
examples.cn: 这双鞋本周末特价，打五折。

examples.en: I can't say for certain when the project will be completed.
examples.cn: 我不能肯定地说项目何时能完成。

examples.en: She knew for certain that she had made the right decision.
examples.cn: 她确信自己做出了正确的决定。

examples.en: The sales representative visited our office to demonstrate the new software.
examples.cn: 销售代表来我们办公室演示新软件。

examples.en: As a sales representative, he travels frequently to meet with clients.
examples.cn: 作为销售代表，他经常出差会见客户。

valid_entries.original_phrase: on the one hand ... on the other hand

examples.en: On the one hand, the job offers a high salary; on the other hand, it requires long hours.
examples.cn: 一方面，这份工作薪水高；另一方面，它需要长时间工作。

examples.en: On the one hand, moving to a new city is exciting; on the other hand, it can be stressful.
examples.cn: 一方面，搬到新城市令人兴奋；另一方面，它可能带来压力。

examples.en: The hikers were careful not to get close to the edge of the cliff.
examples.cn: 徒步旅行者小心不靠近悬崖边缘。

examples.en: Over time, they managed to get close to each other and become good friends.
examples.cn: 随着时间的推移，他们设法接近彼此并成为了好朋友。

examples.en: She devotes most of her time to volunteering at the animal shelter.
examples.cn: 她把大部分时间都奉献给了动物收容所的志愿工作。

examples.en: He decided to devote his life to scientific research.
examples.cn: 他决定将一生奉献给科学研究。

definitions.meaning_cn: 险些发生事故；差一点就出事

examples.en: The two cars had a near miss at the intersection, but no one was hurt.
examples.cn: 两辆车在十字路口险些相撞，但没有人受伤。

examples.en: We had a near miss when the tree branch fell just inches from our heads.
examples.cn: 树枝掉下来离我们的头只有几英寸，我们差一点就出事了。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take sth. with a pinch of salt

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事持保留态度；半信半疑

examples.en: You should take his promises with a pinch of salt; he often doesn't follow through.
examples.cn: 你应该对他的承诺持保留态度，他经常不兑现。

examples.en: I take rumors with a pinch of salt until I see official confirmation.
examples.cn: 在见到官方确认之前，我对谣言半信半疑。

examples.en: People started to queue up early in the morning to buy tickets for the concert.
examples.cn: 人们一大早就开始排队购买音乐会门票。

examples.en: We had to queue up for over an hour at the airport security checkpoint.
examples.cn: 我们不得不在机场安检处排队等候一个多小时。

examples.en: The police are searching for an escaping criminal who fled from the prison last night.
examples.cn: 警方正在搜寻一名昨晚从监狱逃跑的逃犯。

examples.en: Residents were warned to stay indoors due to an escaping criminal in the area.
examples.cn: 由于该地区有一名逃犯，居民被警告待在室内。

examples.en: She put on her coat before going outside in the cold weather.
examples.cn: 在寒冷的天气外出前，她穿上了外套。

examples.en: The school will put on a play for the end-of-year celebration.
examples.cn: 学校将为年终庆祝活动上演一出戏剧。

examples.en: He has put on a few pounds since he stopped exercising regularly.
examples.cn: 自从他停止定期锻炼以来，体重增加了几磅。

examples.en: She put on a brave face even though she was feeling nervous.
examples.cn: 尽管感到紧张，她还是装出一副勇敢的样子。

examples.en: On paper, the plan looks perfect, but we need to test it in practice.
examples.cn: 理论上，这个计划看起来完美，但我们需要在实践中测试它。

examples.en: The agreement is solid on paper, but we must ensure both parties comply.
examples.cn: 协议在书面形式上很牢固，但我们必须确保双方都遵守。

examples.en: Let's solve this problem once and for all so it doesn't come up again.
examples.cn: 让我们一劳永逸地解决这个问题，这样它就不会再出现了。

examples.en: The court's decision settled the dispute once and for all.
examples.cn: 法院的判决彻底解决了这场纠纷。

examples.en: Doctors and firefighters often have high-stress jobs due to the life-or-death situations they face.
examples.cn: 医生和消防员通常有高压工作，因为他们面临生死攸关的情况。

examples.en: Many people in high-stress jobs practice mindfulness to manage their anxiety.
examples.cn: 许多从事高压工作的人练习正念来管理焦虑。

examples.en: The store agreed to give me a refund because the product was defective.
examples.cn: 商店同意给我退款，因为产品有缺陷。

examples.en: If you're not satisfied, we can give you a refund within 30 days of purchase.
examples.cn: 如果您不满意，我们可以在购买后30天内给您退款。

examples.en: The new policy has been reviewed as a positive step towards environmental protection.
examples.cn: 新政策被评价为向环境保护迈出的积极一步。

examples.en: His performance in the play was reviewed as outstanding by the critics.
examples.cn: 他在戏剧中的表演被评论家评价为出色。

examples.en: I would like to thank everyone for their support during this project.
examples.cn: 我想感谢大家在这个项目期间的支持。

examples.en: She would like to visit Japan next year to experience the culture.
examples.cn: 她明年想去日本体验文化。

examples.en: She prepared thoroughly for her job interview at the tech company.
examples.cn: 她为科技公司的求职面试做了充分准备。

examples.en: The job interview lasted two hours and included a practical test.
examples.cn: 这次求职面试持续了两小时，包括一项实践测试。

examples.en: The runner in second place is gaining on the leader in the final lap.
examples.cn: 第二名的选手在最后一圈逐渐赶上了领先者。

examples.en: Our sales team is gaining on our competitors in the market share race.
examples.cn: 我们的销售团队在市场份额竞争中逐渐赶上了竞争对手。

examples.en: I try to do exercise for at least 30 minutes every morning.
examples.cn: 我尽量每天早上至少锻炼30分钟。

examples.en: Doing regular exercise can improve both physical and mental health.
examples.cn: 定期做运动可以改善身心健康。

examples.en: The benefit concert raised over $50,000 for disaster relief efforts.
examples.cn: 这场慈善音乐会为救灾工作筹集了超过5万美元。

examples.en: Many famous musicians performed at the benefit concert for children's education.
examples.cn: 许多著名音乐家在为儿童教育举办的义演中表演。

examples.en: The company decided to branch out into the Asian market to increase its global presence.
examples.cn: 公司决定拓展亚洲市场以增加全球影响力。

examples.en: After years in publishing, she branched out to start her own consulting firm.
examples.cn: 在出版业工作多年后，她拓展业务创办了自己的咨询公司。

definitions.meaning_cn: 把某人理想化，过度崇拜

examples.en: Fans often put celebrities on a pedestal, ignoring their human flaws.
examples.cn: 粉丝们常常把名人理想化，忽视他们的人性缺点。

examples.en: It's unhealthy to put your partner on a pedestal in a relationship.
examples.cn: 在恋爱关系中过度崇拜伴侣是不健康的。

examples.en: Advances in space science have led to discoveries about distant planets.
examples.cn: 空间科学的进步带来了关于遥远行星的发现。

examples.en: She pursued a degree in space science to work at NASA one day.
examples.cn: 她攻读空间科学学位，希望有一天能在NASA工作。

examples.en: During the drought, the villagers had to survive on limited water supplies.
examples.cn: 干旱期间，村民们不得不依靠有限的水源生存。

examples.en: Many students survive on a tight budget while in college.
examples.cn: 许多大学生靠紧张的预算维持生活。

examples.en: After graduation, he plans to go into the field of medicine.
examples.cn: 毕业后，他计划进入医学领域。

examples.en: Let's go into more detail about the project timeline.
examples.cn: 让我们更详细地讨论项目时间表。

examples.en: The committee will go into the causes of the accident next week.
examples.cn: 委员会下周将深入调查事故原因。

examples.en: We need to go into the financial records to find the discrepancy.
examples.cn: 我们需要深入研究财务记录以找出差异。

examples.en: Other than John, no one knew about the surprise party.
examples.cn: 除了约翰，没人知道这个惊喜派对。

examples.en: I have no plans other than to relax this weekend.
examples.cn: 我这个周末除了放松没有其他计划。

examples.en: The insurance company will pay out the claim within two weeks.
examples.cn: 保险公司将在两周内支付索赔。

examples.en: The lottery winner received a lump sum payout of $10 million.
examples.cn: 彩票中奖者一次性收到了1000万美元的支付。

examples.en: Tourists visit the city in large numbers during the summer festival.
examples.cn: 夏季节日期间，大量游客参观这座城市。

examples.en: Protesters gathered in large numbers to demand political reform.
examples.cn: 抗议者大量聚集要求政治改革。

valid_entries.original_phrase: bridge the gap between rich and poor

examples.en: Government policies aim to bridge the gap between rich and poor through tax reforms.
examples.cn: 政府政策旨在通过税制改革缩小贫富差距。

examples.en: Education is often seen as a way to bridge the gap between rich and poor.
examples.cn: 教育常被视为缩小贫富差距的一种方式。

examples.en: She built her business from scratch with just a small loan.
examples.cn: 她仅凭一小笔贷款白手起家创办了自己的企业。

examples.en: I decided to bake the cake from scratch instead of using a mix.
examples.cn: 我决定从零开始烤蛋糕，而不是用预拌粉。

examples.en: She hit on a brilliant idea for the marketing campaign during the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议上想到了一个绝妙的营销活动创意。

examples.en: Researchers hit on a new method to treat the disease by accident.
examples.cn: 研究人员偶然发现了一种治疗该疾病的新方法。

examples.en: He tried to hit on her at the bar, but she wasn't interested.
examples.cn: 他试图在酒吧搭讪她，但她不感兴趣。

examples.en: It's inappropriate to hit on coworkers in a professional setting.
examples.cn: 在职业场合搭讪同事是不合适的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 说最后一句话，在争论中占上风

examples.en: In every argument, he always has to get the last word.
examples.cn: 每次争论中，他总是要说最后一句话。

examples.en: She made a clever retort to get the last word in the debate.
examples.cn: 她机智地反驳，在辩论中占了上风。

examples.en: Despite the setback, she took the criticism in stride and improved her work.
examples.cn: 尽管遇到挫折，她从容应对批评并改进了工作。

examples.en: He takes challenges in stride, viewing them as opportunities to grow.
examples.cn: 他坦然接受挑战，将其视为成长的机会。

definitions.meaning_cn: 市场导向的，以市场为中心的

examples.en: The company adopted a market-oriented approach to better meet customer needs.
examples.cn: 公司采用市场导向的方法以更好地满足客户需求。

examples.en: Market-oriented reforms have boosted economic growth in the region.
examples.cn: 市场导向的改革促进了该地区的经济增长。

definitions.meaning_cn: 解决污染问题，治理污染

examples.en: Governments worldwide are implementing policies to tackle pollution effectively.
examples.cn: 世界各国政府正在实施政策以有效治理污染。

examples.en: New technologies are being developed to tackle pollution in urban areas.
examples.cn: 正在开发新技术以解决城市地区的污染问题。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人建立稳定的恋爱关系

examples.en: They decided to go steady with each other after dating for a few months.
examples.cn: 约会几个月后，他们决定建立稳定的恋爱关系。

examples.en: My parents didn't allow me to go steady with anyone in high school.
examples.cn: 我父母不允许我在高中时与任何人建立稳定的恋爱关系。
