examples.en: When you arrive at the museum, take some time to have a look around.
examples.cn: 到达博物馆时，花点时间四处看看。

examples.en: I like to have a look around new cities to get a feel for the local culture.
examples.cn: 我喜欢在新城市四处看看，感受当地文化。

examples.en: As the CEO, she calls the tune on all major company decisions.
examples.cn: 作为首席执行官，她对所有重大公司决策发号施令。

examples.en: In this partnership, the investor calls the tune because they provided most of the capital.
examples.cn: 在这个合伙关系中，投资者掌控局面，因为他们提供了大部分资金。

examples.en: The project requires a large amount of funding to be completed on time.
examples.cn: 这个项目需要大量资金才能按时完成。

examples.en: She spent a large amount of time preparing for the presentation.
examples.cn: 她花了大量时间准备这次演示。

examples.en: To improve his health, he decided to cut down on sugar and processed foods.
examples.cn: 为了改善健康，他决定减少糖和加工食品的摄入。

examples.en: The company needs to cut down on expenses to stay profitable during the economic downturn.
examples.cn: 公司需要削减开支，以在经济低迷时期保持盈利。

examples.en: She was engaged to her high school sweetheart for two years before they got married.
examples.cn: 她与高中时的恋人订婚两年后才结婚。

examples.en: He announced that he is engaged to his partner and they plan to wed next summer.
examples.cn: 他宣布与伴侣订婚，并计划明年夏天结婚。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get a rough idea of sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事有个大致的了解

examples.en: After reading the summary, I got a rough idea of what the book is about.
examples.cn: 读完摘要后，我对这本书的内容有了大致的了解。

examples.en: The manager gave us a brief overview to help us get a rough idea of the new project.
examples.cn: 经理给我们做了简要概述，帮助我们大致了解新项目。

examples.en: International aid is crucial for supporting development in impoverished countries.
examples.cn: 国际援助对于支持贫困国家的发展至关重要。

examples.en: Many impoverished countries struggle with access to clean water and healthcare.
examples.cn: 许多贫困国家难以获得清洁水和医疗保健。

examples.en: The city implemented policies to curb car use and reduce traffic congestion.
examples.cn: 该市实施政策限制汽车使用，以减少交通拥堵。

examples.en: To combat air pollution, governments are encouraging public transport to curb car use.
examples.cn: 为了对抗空气污染，政府鼓励公共交通以限制汽车使用。

examples.en: When moving abroad, it's important to learn the language to integrate with locals.
examples.cn: 移居国外时，学习当地语言以与当地人融合很重要。

examples.en: Volunteering in community events helped her integrate with locals in her new neighborhood.
examples.cn: 参与社区活动的志愿服务帮助她与新社区的当地人融合。

examples.en: I haven't seen my old friend for ages; we should catch up soon.
examples.cn: 我很久没见到老朋友了；我们应该尽快叙叙旧。

examples.en: She's been working on that report for ages and still hasn't finished it.
examples.cn: 她做那份报告已经很久了，但还没完成。

examples.en: The government launched new programs to reduce poverty in rural areas.
examples.cn: 政府启动了新项目以减少农村地区的贫困。

examples.en: Education and job opportunities are key strategies to reduce poverty globally.
examples.cn: 教育和就业机会是全球减少贫困的关键策略。

examples.en: At the party, they went hog wild and danced until the early morning.
examples.cn: 在派对上，他们疯狂行事，跳舞直到凌晨。

examples.en: When shopping during the sale, she went hog wild and bought more than she needed.
examples.cn: 在促销期间购物时，她放纵自己，买了超出需要的东西。

examples.en: I'm not sure how to go about fixing this computer issue; maybe I should ask for help.
examples.cn: 我不确定如何着手解决这个电脑问题；也许我应该寻求帮助。

examples.en: She went about organizing the event by first creating a detailed plan.
examples.cn: 她通过首先制定详细计划来着手组织这次活动。

examples.en: I can't put up with his constant complaining anymore; it's too annoying.
examples.cn: 我再也无法容忍他不断的抱怨了；这太烦人了。

examples.en: She has to put up with a long commute every day to get to work.
examples.cn: 她每天不得不忍受长时间的通勤去上班。

examples.en: After the team disbanded, he decided to go it alone and start his own business.
examples.cn: 团队解散后，他决定独自行动，创办自己的企业。

examples.en: She prefers to go it alone on hiking trips rather than joining a group.
examples.cn: 她更喜欢在徒步旅行中单干，而不是加入团队。

examples.en: In the Internet age, information is accessible at our fingertips.
examples.cn: 在互联网时代，信息触手可及。

examples.en: The Internet age has revolutionized how we communicate and do business.
examples.cn: 互联网时代彻底改变了我们沟通和做生意的方式。

examples.en: We need to speed up the production process to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 我们需要加快生产过程以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: The car sped up as it entered the highway.
examples.cn: 汽车进入高速公路时加速了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 轻易逃脱惩罚，受到轻微处理

examples.en: He got off lightly with just a warning after breaking the school rules.
examples.cn: 违反校规后，他轻易逃脱惩罚，只受到了警告。

examples.en: Despite the serious mistake, she got off lightly because her boss was understanding.
examples.cn: 尽管犯了严重错误，但由于老板的理解，她受到了轻微处理。

examples.en: He spent $2000 on a new stereo system for his living room.
examples.cn: 他花了2000美元为客厅买了一套新的立体声音响系统。

examples.en: The stereo system produces high-quality sound with clear bass.
examples.cn: 这套立体声音响系统能产生高质量的声音，低音清晰。

examples.en: She makes her living as a freelance writer.
examples.cn: 她以自由撰稿人的身份谋生。

examples.en: In rural areas, many people make their living from farming.
examples.cn: 在农村地区，许多人靠务农谋生。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在幕后准备着，随时可以上场

examples.en: The understudy was waiting in the wings in case the lead actor got sick.
examples.cn: 替补演员在幕后等着，以防主角生病。

examples.en: Several new products are in the wings and will be launched next year.
examples.cn: 几款新产品已准备就绪，将于明年推出。

examples.en: The new teacher is very popular with the students.
examples.cn: 新老师很受学生欢迎。

examples.en: This brand of smartphone is popular with young adults.
examples.cn: 这个品牌的智能手机很受年轻人欢迎。

examples.en: Please close up the shop before you leave.
examples.cn: 离开前请把店关好。

examples.en: He closed up the book and put it back on the shelf.
examples.cn: 他合上书，把它放回书架。

examples.en: The photographer took a picture close up to capture the details.
examples.cn: 摄影师靠近拍摄以捕捉细节。

examples.en: Look at the insect close up through this magnifying glass.
examples.cn: 用这个放大镜靠近观察昆虫。

examples.en: I was shocked to hear about the accident.
examples.cn: 听到事故的消息，我感到震惊。

examples.en: She was shocked to discover the truth.
examples.cn: 她发现真相后感到震惊。

examples.en: You should take notice of the warning signs.
examples.cn: 你应该注意警告标志。

examples.en: He didn't take notice of the changes in the schedule.
examples.cn: 他没有注意到日程表的变化。

examples.en: The offer is limited to the first 100 customers.
examples.cn: 此优惠仅限于前100名顾客。

examples.en: His knowledge is limited to basic mathematics.
examples.cn: 他的知识仅限于基础数学。

examples.en: His constant complaining really gets my goat.
examples.cn: 他不停的抱怨真的让我很生气。

examples.en: The noisy neighbors get her goat every weekend.
examples.cn: 吵闹的邻居每个周末都惹她生气。

examples.en: I am allergic to peanuts, so I avoid them.
examples.cn: 我对花生过敏，所以避免食用。

examples.en: She is allergic to pollen and sneezes a lot in spring.
examples.cn: 她对花粉过敏，春天时经常打喷嚏。

examples.en: He is allergic to bureaucracy and avoids red tape.
examples.cn: 他厌恶官僚主义，避免繁文缛节。

examples.en: She is allergic to dishonesty and values integrity.
examples.cn: 她反感不诚实，重视诚信。

examples.en: The weather turned out to be sunny despite the forecast.
examples.cn: 尽管预报有雨，结果天气是晴朗的。

examples.en: He turned out to be a reliable friend in times of need.
examples.cn: 在需要时，他结果是一个可靠的朋友。

examples.en: Let's knock off early today and go for a drink.
examples.cn: 我们今天早点下班去喝一杯吧。

examples.en: He knocks off at 5 PM every day.
examples.cn: 他每天下午5点下班。

examples.en: The strong wind knocked off several tree branches.
examples.cn: 强风击倒了几根树枝。

examples.en: He accidentally knocked off the vase from the table.
examples.cn: 他不小心把花瓶从桌子上撞倒了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 仿制，抄袭（通常指廉价复制品）

examples.en: This cheap watch is a knock off of a luxury brand.
examples.cn: 这块廉价手表是奢侈品牌的仿制品。

examples.en: They were selling knock off designer bags at the market.
examples.cn: 他们在市场上销售仿制的设计师包包。

examples.en: The mayor held a press conference to address the issue.
examples.cn: 市长举行新闻发布会来讨论这个问题。

examples.en: The company announced its new product at a press conference.
examples.cn: 公司在新闻发布会上宣布了新产品。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have half a notion to do sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 有点想做某事（但可能不会做）

examples.en: I have half a notion to quit my job and travel the world.
examples.cn: 我有点想辞职去环游世界。

examples.en: She had half a notion to call him, but decided against it.
examples.cn: 她有点想给他打电话，但决定不打了。

examples.en: The department chair will review the new curriculum proposals.
examples.cn: 系主任将审查新的课程提案。

examples.en: She was appointed as the department chair last year.
examples.cn: 她去年被任命为系主任。

examples.en: We watched the solar eclipse through special glasses.
examples.cn: 我们通过特殊眼镜观看了日食。

examples.en: A total solar eclipse is a rare astronomical event.
examples.cn: 日全食是一种罕见的天文事件。

examples.en: The movie used impressive special effects to create the fantasy world.
examples.cn: 这部电影使用令人印象深刻的特效来创造奇幻世界。

examples.en: Modern special effects make action scenes more realistic.
examples.cn: 现代特效使动作场景更加逼真。

examples.en: I'm bored to death with this repetitive work.
examples.cn: 我对这种重复性工作感到极度无聊。

examples.en: She was scared to death when she heard the noise.
examples.cn: 听到噪音时，她害怕得要死。

examples.en: The disease can be fatal if left untreated to death.
examples.cn: 如果任其发展致死，这种疾病可能是致命的。

examples.en: He was beaten to death in the altercation.
examples.cn: 他在争执中被殴打致死。

examples.en: Our team has the advantage over theirs due to more experience.
examples.cn: 由于经验更丰富，我们队比他们队有优势。

examples.en: In this negotiation, we have the advantage over the other party.
examples.cn: 在这次谈判中，我们比对方有优势。

valid_entries.original_phrase: give one a run for one's money

definitions.meaning_cn: 给某人带来激烈竞争，让某人付出巨大努力才能获胜

examples.en: The underdog team gave the champions a real run for their money in the final match.
examples.cn: 在决赛中，弱队让冠军队伍付出了巨大努力才获胜。

examples.en: Her innovative design gave the established brands a run for their money in the market.
examples.cn: 她的创新设计让市场上的老牌品牌面临激烈竞争。

definitions.meaning_cn: 止痛药，缓解疼痛的物质或药物

examples.en: I took a pain reliever for my headache, and it worked within minutes.
examples.cn: 我吃了止痛药治疗头痛，几分钟内就见效了。

examples.en: Over-the-counter pain relievers like ibuprofen are commonly used for minor aches.
examples.cn: 像布洛芬这样的非处方止痛药常用于缓解轻微疼痛。

definitions.meaning_cn: 完全地，彻底地，从里到外

examples.en: She is a professional through and through, always meeting deadlines with high quality.
examples.cn: 她是个彻头彻尾的专业人士，总能高质量地按时完成任务。

examples.en: The document was checked through and through to ensure there were no errors.
examples.cn: 这份文件被彻底检查，以确保没有任何错误。

definitions.meaning_cn: 批判性思维能力，分析和评估信息的能力

examples.en: Developing critical thinking skills is essential for solving complex problems in the workplace.
examples.cn: 培养批判性思维能力对于解决工作中的复杂问题至关重要。

examples.en: The course aims to enhance students' critical thinking skills through debate and analysis.
examples.cn: 这门课程旨在通过辩论和分析提高学生的批判性思维能力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 排除在外，不让进入；在体育比赛中使对手无法得分

examples.en: They shut out the noise by closing the windows and using earplugs.
examples.cn: 他们通过关窗和使用耳塞来隔绝噪音。

examples.en: The home team shut out their opponents with a score of 3-0 in the soccer match.
examples.cn: 在足球比赛中，主队以3-0的比分零封了对手。

definitions.meaning_cn: 适合做某事，有资格或能力做某事

examples.en: After months of training, she is fit to run the marathon next week.
examples.cn: 经过几个月的训练，她适合参加下周的马拉松比赛。

examples.en: Only certified professionals are fit to handle this delicate equipment.
examples.cn: 只有持证的专业人员才有资格操作这台精密设备。

definitions.meaning_cn: 得到公平对待，获得公正的机会

examples.en: In the job interview, he felt he didn't get a fair shake because the questions were biased.
examples.cn: 在求职面试中，他觉得没有得到公平对待，因为问题带有偏见。

examples.en: The new policy ensures that all employees get a fair shake in promotion opportunities.
examples.cn: 新政策确保所有员工在晋升机会上都能得到公平对待。

examples.en: Please turn off the lights before you leave the room to save energy.
examples.cn: 请在离开房间前关灯以节约能源。

examples.en: His arrogant attitude really turns people off during meetings.
examples.cn: 他傲慢的态度在会议中真的让人失去兴趣。

definitions.meaning_cn: 过着舒适的生活，生活安逸

examples.en: After retiring, they moved to the countryside to live a comfortable life away from the city hustle.
examples.cn: 退休后，他们搬到乡下，远离城市喧嚣，过着舒适的生活。

examples.en: With a stable job and good savings, she can live a comfortable life without financial stress.
examples.cn: 有一份稳定的工作和良好的储蓄，她可以过着没有经济压力的舒适生活。

valid_entries.original_phrase: if you give one an inch, one will take a mile

definitions.meaning_cn: 得寸进尺，如果给予一点让步，对方会要求更多

examples.en: I lent him my car for one day, and now he wants it for a week—if you give him an inch, he'll take a mile.
examples.cn: 我把车借给他一天，现在他想借一周——真是得寸进尺。

examples.en: In negotiations, be cautious not to give too much initially, as if you give an inch, they'll take a mile.
examples.cn: 在谈判中，要谨慎不要一开始就让步太多，因为得寸进尺。

examples.en: At the beginning of the year, we set new goals for our team to achieve.
examples.cn: 在年初，我们为团队设定了新的目标。

examples.en: The professor outlined the course syllabus at the beginning of the semester.
examples.cn: 教授在学期开始时概述了课程大纲。

examples.en: Since she caught the flu, she has had a poor appetite and barely eats anything.
examples.cn: 自从得了流感，她食欲不振，几乎不吃东西。

examples.en: Stress can cause people to have a poor appetite, affecting their overall health.
examples.cn: 压力会导致人们食欲不振，影响整体健康。

examples.en: In the fog, I could barely make out the road signs ahead.
examples.cn: 在雾中，我几乎辨认不出前方的路标。

examples.en: Can you make out what he's saying in this noisy room?
examples.cn: 在这个嘈杂的房间里，你能理解他在说什么吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 爆炸性新闻，引起轰动或震惊的消息

examples.en: The explosive news about the company's scandal spread quickly across social media.
examples.cn: 关于公司丑闻的爆炸性新闻在社交媒体上迅速传播。

examples.en: Journalists uncovered explosive news that could change the outcome of the election.
examples.cn: 记者揭露了可能改变选举结果的爆炸性新闻。

examples.en: For the present, we'll postpone the meeting until more information is available.
examples.cn: 目前，我们将推迟会议，直到获得更多信息。

examples.en: This solution works for the present, but we need a long-term plan.
examples.cn: 这个解决方案暂时有效，但我们需要一个长期计划。

definitions.meaning_cn: 自由地，有权做某事；未被监禁

examples.en: You are at liberty to choose any topic for your research paper.
examples.cn: 你可以自由选择研究论文的任何主题。

examples.en: After the trial, the defendant was found not guilty and set at liberty.
examples.cn: 审判后，被告被判无罪并获释。

definitions.meaning_cn: 向...提供...，供应某物给某人

examples.en: The company supplies local schools with free textbooks every year.
examples.cn: 这家公司每年向当地学校提供免费教科书。

examples.en: We need to supply the team with the necessary tools to complete the project on time.
examples.cn: 我们需要向团队提供必要的工具，以按时完成项目。

examples.en: The harsh punishment deprived him of his freedom for several years.
examples.cn: 严厉的惩罚剥夺了他几年的自由。

examples.en: Poverty can deprive children of access to quality education and healthcare.
examples.cn: 贫困可能剥夺儿童获得优质教育和医疗保健的机会。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's words stick in one's throat

definitions.meaning_cn: 话到嘴边说不出口，因情绪激动或困难而无法表达

examples.en: When he tried to apologize, his words stuck in his throat, and he couldn't speak.
examples.cn: 当他试图道歉时，话到嘴边说不出口，无法言语。

examples.en: She had her words stick in her throat as she delivered the sad news to her family.
examples.cn: 当她向家人传达这个悲伤的消息时，话到嘴边说不出口。

definitions.meaning_cn: 受贪婪驱使，因贪欲而行动

examples.en: The corrupt official was motivated by greed, accepting bribes for personal gain.
examples.cn: 这名腐败官员受贪婪驱使，为个人利益接受贿赂。

examples.en: Some companies are motivated by greed, prioritizing profits over environmental concerns.
examples.cn: 一些公司受贪婪驱使，将利润置于环境问题之上。

valid_entries.original_phrase: make a big deal about sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事大惊小怪或过分重视

examples.en: Don't make a big deal about the spilled milk; just clean it up.
examples.cn: 别对洒了的牛奶大惊小怪，清理干净就行。

examples.en: She made a big deal about her promotion, throwing a huge party.
examples.cn: 她对升职大做文章，办了个盛大的派对。

examples.en: When they argued about politics, they really made the fur fly.
examples.cn: 他们争论政治时，真的吵得不可开交。

examples.en: His criticism at the meeting made the fur fly among the team members.
examples.cn: 他在会议上的批评引发了团队成员间的激烈争吵。

examples.en: She finished her homework in no time and went out to play.
examples.cn: 她很快完成了作业，然后出去玩。

examples.en: With his help, we fixed the car in no time.
examples.cn: 在他的帮助下，我们很快就修好了车。

examples.en: I'll always stand by my friends in times of trouble.
examples.cn: 在困难时期，我会一直支持我的朋友。

examples.en: He stood by his wife during the scandal, showing great loyalty.
examples.cn: 在丑闻期间，他忠于妻子，表现出极大的忠诚。

examples.en: The rescue team is standing by for any emergency calls.
examples.cn: 救援队随时待命，准备应对紧急呼叫。

examples.en: Please stand by while we connect you to the manager.
examples.cn: 请稍等，我们正在为您转接经理。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在消费文化中，强调商品购买和消费的社会环境

examples.en: In a consumer culture, people often buy things they don't really need.
examples.cn: 在消费文化中，人们经常购买他们并不真正需要的东西。

examples.en: Advertising thrives in a consumer culture by promoting constant spending.
examples.cn: 广告在消费文化中蓬勃发展，通过促进持续消费。

definitions.meaning_cn: 替代性工作，非传统或灵活的工作形式

examples.en: Freelancing is a popular form of alternative work in the gig economy.
examples.cn: 自由职业是零工经济中一种流行的替代性工作形式。

examples.en: She chose alternative work like remote jobs to balance her lifestyle.
examples.cn: 她选择了远程工作等替代性工作来平衡生活方式。

definitions.meaning_cn: 宜居行星，适合生命生存的行星

examples.en: Scientists are searching for habitable planets beyond our solar system.
examples.cn: 科学家正在太阳系外寻找宜居行星。

examples.en: The discovery of a habitable planet could revolutionize our understanding of life.
examples.cn: 发现一颗宜居行星可能会彻底改变我们对生命的理解。

examples.en: She's been out of sorts all day because of the bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于天气不好，她一整天都心情不佳。

examples.en: He felt out of sorts after missing his morning coffee.
examples.cn: 错过早上的咖啡后，他感到身体不适。

examples.en: The law prohibits minors from purchasing alcohol.
examples.cn: 法律禁止未成年人购买酒精饮料。

examples.en: The company policy prohibits employees from using personal devices at work.
examples.cn: 公司政策禁止员工在工作时使用个人设备。

examples.en: Her approach to problem-solving is very systematic and efficient.
examples.cn: 她解决问题的方法非常系统且高效。

examples.en: We need a new approach to marketing to reach younger audiences.
examples.cn: 我们需要一种新的营销方法来接触年轻受众。

examples.en: He is something of an expert in ancient history.
examples.cn: 他在某种程度上是古代史方面的专家。

examples.en: The movie was something of a disappointment after all the hype.
examples.cn: 在所有的炒作之后，这部电影有点令人失望。

definitions.meaning_cn: 束手无策，受限制无法行动

examples.en: Due to budget cuts, the manager had his hands tied and couldn't hire new staff.
examples.cn: 由于预算削减，经理束手无策，无法雇佣新员工。

examples.en: She wanted to help, but with the strict rules, she had her hands tied.
examples.cn: 她想帮忙，但由于严格的规定，她束手无策。

examples.en: She told me the news in confidence, so please don't share it.
examples.cn: 她私下告诉我这个消息，所以请不要泄露。

examples.en: The documents were shared in confidence between the two companies.
examples.cn: 这些文件是在两家公司之间保密共享的。

examples.en: As an undergraduate student, she is majoring in biology.
examples.cn: 作为一名本科生，她主修生物学。

examples.en: Undergraduate students often live on campus during their first year.
examples.cn: 本科生通常在第一年住在校园里。

examples.en: The deadline put pressure upon the team to finish the project quickly.
examples.cn: 截止日期给团队施加压力，要求他们快速完成项目。

examples.en: Parents sometimes put pressure upon their children to excel academically.
examples.cn: 父母有时会给孩子施加压力，要求他们在学业上出类拔萃。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因禁闭或无聊而变得烦躁不安

examples.en: After being stuck indoors for a week, he started to go stir crazy.
examples.cn: 在室内困了一周后，他开始变得烦躁不安。

examples.en: The long winter made everyone go stir crazy from lack of outdoor activities.
examples.cn: 漫长的冬天让每个人都因缺乏户外活动而变得烦躁不安。

examples.en: He was in and out of the office all morning for meetings.
examples.cn: 他整个上午都在办公室进进出出开会。

examples.en: The cat kept going in and out through the pet door.
examples.cn: 猫不停地通过宠物门进进出出。

examples.en: She had an in and out relationship with her boyfriend last year.
examples.cn: 去年她和男友的关系时好时坏。

examples.en: His health has been in and out, requiring frequent doctor visits.
examples.cn: 他的健康状况不稳定，需要经常看医生。

examples.en: The noisy neighbor made a nuisance of himself by playing loud music late at night.
examples.cn: 吵闹的邻居在深夜播放大声音乐，惹人讨厌。

examples.en: Don't make a nuisance of yourself at the party by interrupting conversations.
examples.cn: 别在派对上打断谈话惹人讨厌。

examples.en: I agree with you that we should start the project earlier.
examples.cn: 我同意你的意见，我们应该早点开始这个项目。

examples.en: She agreed with her colleague's proposal during the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议上同意了同事的提议。

examples.en: Spicy food doesn't agree with me; it upsets my stomach.
examples.cn: 辛辣食物不适合我，会让我的胃不舒服。

examples.en: The humid climate here agrees with her health better than the dry one back home.
examples.cn: 这里潮湿的气候比家乡干燥的气候更适合她的健康。

definitions.meaning_cn: 商业用途的，用于商业的

examples.en: This software is licensed for used commercially in large corporations.
examples.cn: 这款软件已获许可，可在大型公司中商业使用。

examples.en: The new material is safe and effective for used commercially in packaging.
examples.cn: 这种新材料安全有效，可用于商业包装。

definitions.meaning_cn: 提前完成，比计划时间早

examples.en: The construction team finished the project ahead of schedule.
examples.cn: 施工团队提前完成了项目。

examples.en: We delivered the report ahead of schedule, which impressed the client.
examples.cn: 我们提前提交了报告，给客户留下了深刻印象。

examples.en: The party formed a government in coalition with several smaller groups.
examples.cn: 该党与几个小团体结盟组建了政府。

examples.en: They worked in coalition with environmental organizations to pass the bill.
examples.cn: 他们与环保组织合作通过了该法案。

examples.en: Deep down, she knew the truth but was afraid to admit it.
examples.cn: 内心深处，她知道真相但不敢承认。

examples.en: He seems tough, but deep down he's very kind.
examples.cn: 他看起来很坚强，但本质上非常善良。

examples.en: After finishing the work, I just sat back and watched a movie.
examples.cn: 完成工作后，我放松下来看了一部电影。

examples.en: You can't just sit back and let others do all the work.
examples.cn: 你不能只是袖手旁观，让别人做所有的工作。

examples.en: His criticism really got my back up during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他的批评在会议上真的让我生气了。

examples.en: She gets her back up whenever someone questions her decisions.
examples.cn: 每当有人质疑她的决定时，她就会变得防御性。

definitions.meaning_cn: 提供对某事的深刻理解或见解

examples.en: The documentary gives an insight into the lives of endangered species.
examples.cn: 这部纪录片提供了对濒危物种生活的深刻见解。

examples.en: Her research gives an insight into how climate change affects agriculture.
examples.cn: 她的研究提供了关于气候变化如何影响农业的深刻理解。

examples.en: The company played off its competitors to get a better deal.
examples.cn: 该公司利用竞争对手以获得更好的交易。

examples.en: He played off their rivalry to advance his own career.
examples.cn: 他操纵他们的竞争来推进自己的职业生涯。

examples.en: The tied game will be played off next week.
examples.cn: 平局的比赛将在下周举行加时赛。

examples.en: They had to play off to determine the champion.
examples.cn: 他们必须进行决胜局来确定冠军。

examples.en: We were caught in a traffic jam on the way to the airport.
examples.cn: 我们在去机场的路上被困在交通堵塞中。

examples.en: He was caught in a conflict between his friends.
examples.cn: 他被卷入朋友之间的冲突中。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因某事而打架或激烈争吵

examples.en: The two neighbors came to blows over a parking space.
examples.cn: 两个邻居因一个停车位而打架。

examples.en: They almost came to blows over the political debate.
examples.cn: 他们因政治辩论几乎激烈争吵起来。

definitions.meaning_cn: 大声压倒或阻止某人说话

examples.en: The protesters tried to shout down the speaker at the rally.
examples.cn: 抗议者试图在集会上大声压倒演讲者。

examples.en: He was shouted down when he expressed an unpopular opinion.
examples.cn: 当他表达不受欢迎的意见时，被大声阻止了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 身体技能，如运动或手工能力

examples.en: Athletes develop physical skills through rigorous training.
examples.cn: 运动员通过严格训练发展身体技能。

examples.en: Carpentry requires good physical skills and attention to detail.
examples.cn: 木工需要良好的身体技能和对细节的关注。

examples.en: She loves to take photographs of nature during her travels.
examples.cn: 她喜欢在旅行中拍摄自然照片。

examples.en: He took photographs at the wedding to capture the special moments.
examples.cn: 他在婚礼上拍照以捕捉特殊时刻。

examples.en: Can I get a hand with moving this heavy furniture?
examples.cn: 我能得到帮助搬动这件重家具吗？

examples.en: She got a hand with her homework from her older brother.
examples.cn: 她从哥哥那里得到了做作业的帮助。

examples.en: Five plus three is equal to eight.
examples.cn: 五加三等于八。

examples.en: Her dedication is equal to that of any professional athlete.
examples.cn: 她的奉献精神相当于任何职业运动员。

examples.en: He is equal to the task of managing the project.
examples.cn: 他有能力应对管理这个项目的任务。

examples.en: She proved she was equal to the challenges of the new job.
examples.cn: 她证明了自己有能力应对新工作的挑战。

examples.en: Please attach the file to your email before sending it.
examples.cn: 请在发送前将文件附加到您的电子邮件中。

examples.en: The document is attached to the report for reference.
examples.cn: 该文档附加在报告上以供参考。

examples.en: Certain conditions attach to this agreement.
examples.cn: 某些条件归属于本协议。

examples.en: Significant risks attach to investing in startups.
examples.cn: 投资初创企业伴随着重大风险。

examples.en: The outcome of the election is still in the balance.
examples.cn: 选举的结果仍然悬而未决。

examples.en: His future career hangs in the balance after the scandal.
examples.cn: 丑闻后，他未来的职业生涯悬而未决。

examples.en: Many people regard him as a hero for his bravery.
examples.cn: 许多人因他的勇敢而将他视为英雄。

examples.en: She is regarded as an expert in her field.
examples.cn: 她被认为是她所在领域的专家。

examples.en: I'll get back to you with the details by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我明天会回复您详细信息。

examples.en: He promised to get back to me after checking the schedule.
examples.cn: 他答应在检查日程后联系我。

examples.en: The caterpillar turned into a beautiful butterfly.
examples.cn: 毛毛虫变成了一只美丽的蝴蝶。

examples.en: Their small startup turned into a successful company.
examples.cn: 他们的小初创公司变成了一家成功的公司。

definitions.meaning_cn: 接近或近乎（如边界或极端）

examples.en: His behavior borders on rudeness sometimes.
examples.cn: 他的行为有时近乎粗鲁。

examples.en: The town borders on the national park, offering stunning views.
examples.cn: 该镇接近国家公园，提供壮丽的景色。

examples.en: I had to break the news to my parents that I failed the exam.
examples.cn: 我不得不向父母透露我考试不及格的坏消息。

examples.en: The doctor gently broke the news to the patient about the diagnosis.
examples.cn: 医生温和地向病人透露了诊断结果。

examples.en: Moving to a new city is a great opportunity to make new friends.
examples.cn: 搬到新城市是结交新朋友的好机会。

examples.en: She joined a club to make new friends with similar interests.
examples.cn: 她加入了一个俱乐部，以结交志趣相投的新朋友。

examples.en: Please leave me alone; I need some time to think.
examples.cn: 请别打扰我，我需要一些时间思考。

examples.en: The cat was sleeping, so we decided to leave it alone.
examples.cn: 猫在睡觉，所以我们决定不打扰它。

examples.en: The government should leave the market alone to regulate itself.
examples.cn: 政府应该放任市场自我调节。

examples.en: He prefers to leave his children alone to solve their own problems.
examples.cn: 他更喜欢放任孩子们自己解决问题。

examples.en: We made our way through the crowded street to reach the concert.
examples.cn: 我们穿过拥挤的街道前往音乐会。

examples.en: She made her way to the top of the mountain after hours of hiking.
examples.cn: 经过数小时徒步后，她成功登上了山顶。

examples.en: He worked hard to make his way in the competitive industry.
examples.cn: 他努力工作，在竞争激烈的行业中取得了成功。

examples.en: She is making her way up the corporate ladder quickly.
examples.cn: 她在公司晋升很快，取得了显著进展。

examples.en: Please write your report in English for the international team.
examples.cn: 请用英语撰写报告，以便国际团队阅读。

examples.en: She can speak fluently in English after years of practice.
examples.cn: 经过多年练习，她能流利地用英语交谈。

examples.en: The word 'computer' has a specific meaning in English.
examples.cn: 在英语中，“computer”这个词有特定的含义。

examples.en: In English, adjectives usually come before nouns.
examples.cn: 在英语中，形容词通常放在名词前面。

examples.en: It's not likely to rain today, according to the forecast.
examples.cn: 根据预报，今天不太可能下雨。

examples.en: He is not likely to agree with such a risky plan.
examples.cn: 他不太可能同意如此冒险的计划。

examples.en: The report is based on statistical data collected over five years.
examples.cn: 这份报告基于五年收集的统计数据。

examples.en: Accurate statistical data is essential for making informed decisions.
examples.cn: 准确的统计数据对于做出明智决策至关重要。

examples.en: His part-time job helps cover living expenses while he studies.
examples.cn: 他的兼职工作帮助支付学习期间的生活费用。

examples.en: The scholarship is enough to cover living expenses for the semester.
examples.cn: 这笔奖学金足以支付这个学期的生活费用。

examples.en: The professor exhausted the topic of climate change in his lecture.
examples.cn: 教授在讲座中详尽讨论了气候变化这个话题。

examples.en: We exhausted the topic of budget cuts during the meeting.
examples.cn: 我们在会议上详尽讨论了预算削减这个话题。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get off on the wrong foot

definitions.meaning_cn: 一开始就出问题，开头不顺

examples.en: I got off on the wrong foot with my new boss by being late on the first day.
examples.cn: 我第一天上班迟到，和新老板一开始就关系不顺。

examples.en: Their project got off on the wrong foot due to miscommunication.
examples.cn: 由于沟通不畅，他们的项目一开始就出问题了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 站出来，主动提供信息或帮助

examples.en: Witnesses are encouraged to come forward with any information about the crime.
examples.cn: 鼓励目击者站出来提供有关犯罪的任何信息。

examples.en: She came forward to volunteer for the charity event.
examples.cn: 她主动站出来志愿参加慈善活动。

examples.en: New evidence has come forward in the investigation.
examples.cn: 调查中出现了新的证据。

examples.en: Opportunities often come forward when you least expect them.
examples.cn: 机会往往在你最不经意的时候出现。

examples.en: He drove away quickly after dropping off the package.
examples.cn: 他放下包裹后迅速驱车离开了。

examples.en: We watched the car drive away into the distance.
examples.cn: 我们看着汽车驱车离开，消失在远方。

examples.en: The loud noise drove away the birds from the garden.
examples.cn: 巨大的噪音把鸟从花园里赶走了。

examples.en: High prices are driving away customers from the store.
examples.cn: 高价格正在赶走商店的顾客。

examples.en: The annual office party is a chance for employees to socialize.
examples.cn: 年度办公室聚会是员工社交的机会。

examples.en: We organized an office party to celebrate the project's success.
examples.cn: 我们组织了一次办公室聚会来庆祝项目的成功。

examples.en: The startup is having growing pains as it expands rapidly.
examples.cn: 这家初创公司在快速扩张时正经历成长中的困难。

examples.en: Teenagers often have growing pains as they adjust to new responsibilities.
examples.cn: 青少年在适应新责任时常常经历成长中的困难。

examples.en: The award ceremony for the film festival will be held next week.
examples.cn: 电影节的颁奖典礼将于下周举行。

examples.en: She felt honored to attend the award ceremony for scientific achievements.
examples.cn: 她感到荣幸能参加科学成就的颁奖典礼。

examples.en: He took sick leave to recover from the flu.
examples.cn: 他请了病假来从流感中恢复。

examples.en: Employees are entitled to paid sick leave according to company policy.
examples.cn: 根据公司政策，员工有权享受带薪病假。

examples.en: The cat curled up on the sofa and fell asleep.
examples.cn: 猫蜷缩在沙发上睡着了。

examples.en: She curled up with a book on a rainy afternoon.
examples.cn: 在一个下雨的下午，她蜷缩着看书。

examples.en: The edges of the paper curled up due to the humidity.
examples.cn: 由于潮湿，纸的边缘卷曲了。

examples.en: He curled up his fingers into a fist.
examples.cn: 他把手指卷曲成拳头。

examples.en: He held up the trophy for everyone to see.
examples.cn: 他举起奖杯让每个人都能看到。

examples.en: The pillars hold up the roof of the building.
examples.cn: 柱子支撑着建筑物的屋顶。

examples.en: Traffic held up our journey for an hour.
examples.cn: 交通使我们的旅程延迟了一个小时。

examples.en: The strike held up production at the factory.
examples.cn: 罢工阻碍了工厂的生产。

examples.en: The masked men held up the bank yesterday.
examples.cn: 昨天蒙面人抢劫了银行。

examples.en: He was arrested for holding up a convenience store.
examples.cn: 他因抢劫便利店而被捕。

examples.en: In a sense, all art is subjective.
examples.cn: 在某种意义上，所有艺术都是主观的。

examples.en: He was right in a sense, but missed the bigger picture.
examples.cn: 在某种意义上他是对的，但忽略了更大的局面。

definitions.meaning_cn: 软饮料，不含酒精的饮料

examples.en: I prefer soft drinks like cola over alcoholic beverages.
examples.cn: 比起酒精饮料，我更喜欢可乐这样的软饮料。

examples.en: The restaurant offers a variety of soft drinks including juice and soda.
examples.cn: 这家餐厅提供多种软饮料，包括果汁和苏打水。

examples.en: I need to make a call to my boss to discuss the project.
examples.cn: 我需要给老板打个电话讨论这个项目。

examples.en: She made a call to customer service to report the issue.
examples.cn: 她给客服打了个电话报告这个问题。

examples.en: The manager made a call to postpone the meeting.
examples.cn: 经理决定推迟会议。

examples.en: He made a call to action in his speech to inspire the team.
examples.cn: 他在演讲中发出行动呼吁以激励团队。

examples.en: You should act on the advice of your doctor for better health.
examples.cn: 你应该根据医生的建议行动以改善健康。

examples.en: The police acted on the tip-off and arrested the suspect.
examples.cn: 警方根据线报行动并逮捕了嫌疑人。

examples.en: This medication acts on the nervous system to reduce pain.
examples.cn: 这种药物作用于神经系统以减轻疼痛。

examples.en: The chemical acts on the metal to prevent rust.
examples.cn: 这种化学物质作用于金属以防止生锈。

examples.en: We will notify you of the results in due course.
examples.cn: 我们会在适当的时候通知你结果。

examples.en: In due course, all the details will become clear.
examples.cn: 最终，所有细节都会变得清晰。

examples.en: It's important to handle enquiries politely to maintain good customer relations.
examples.cn: 礼貌地处理询问对于维持良好的客户关系很重要。

examples.en: She always handles enquiries politely, even under pressure.
examples.cn: 即使在压力下，她也总是礼貌地处理询问。

examples.en: If you stick at your studies, you'll eventually succeed.
examples.cn: 如果你坚持学习，最终会成功的。

examples.en: He stuck at the task until it was completed.
examples.cn: 他坚持完成任务直到完成。

examples.en: The memory of that day sticks at my mind.
examples.cn: 那天的记忆一直停留在我的脑海中。

examples.en: The price seems to stick at this level for now.
examples.cn: 价格目前似乎停留在这个水平。

examples.en: A healthy diet can boost your immune system.
examples.cn: 健康的饮食可以增强你的免疫系统。

examples.en: The immune system fights off infections and diseases.
examples.cn: 免疫系统抵抗感染和疾病。

examples.en: She has a reputation as a reliable employee.
examples.cn: 她以可靠的员工而闻名。

examples.en: The company has a reputation as an innovator in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 这家公司以科技行业的创新者而闻名。

examples.en: Together with my friends, I went to the concert.
examples.cn: 我和朋友们一起去听了音乐会。

examples.en: The report, together with the data, was submitted to the committee.
examples.cn: 报告连同数据一起提交给了委员会。

examples.en: Teachers must maintain discipline in the classroom for effective learning.
examples.cn: 教师必须在课堂上维持纪律以实现有效学习。

examples.en: The manager works hard to maintain discipline among the team members.
examples.cn: 经理努力在团队成员中维持纪律。

examples.en: The bullies ganged up on the new student at school.
examples.cn: 霸凌者们在学校联合起来对付新同学。

examples.en: They ganged up on him during the debate to weaken his argument.
examples.cn: 他们在辩论中联合起来对付他以削弱他的论点。

examples.en: At the end of the year, we take stock of our achievements and challenges.
examples.cn: 在年底，我们评估我们的成就和挑战。

examples.en: It's time to take stock of the situation before making a decision.
examples.cn: 在做出决定之前，是时候评估一下情况了。

examples.en: Please submit your report by Friday at the latest.
examples.cn: 请最迟在周五提交你的报告。

examples.en: We expect to finish the project by next month at the latest.
examples.cn: 我们期望最迟在下个月完成这个项目。

examples.en: The city has seen a rise in juvenile delinquency in recent years.
examples.cn: 近年来，这个城市的青少年犯罪有所增加。

examples.en: Programs aimed at reducing juvenile delinquency focus on education and support.
examples.cn: 旨在减少青少年犯罪的项目侧重于教育和支持。

examples.en: Stop beating around the bush and come to the point.
examples.cn: 别拐弯抹角了，切入正题吧。

examples.en: In his presentation, he quickly came to the point to save time.
examples.cn: 在他的演示中，他很快切入正题以节省时间。

examples.en: Her response to the question was thoughtful and detailed.
examples.cn: 她对问题的回应是深思熟虑且详细的。

examples.en: The company issued a response to the customer complaints.
examples.cn: 公司对客户投诉做出了回应。

examples.en: The government is cracking down on illegal activities.
examples.cn: 政府正在严厉打击非法活动。

examples.en: Police cracked down on the protest to maintain order.
examples.cn: 警方镇压了抗议以维持秩序。

examples.en: She embarked on a new career in marketing.
examples.cn: 她开始了市场营销的新职业。

examples.en: The team embarked on the project with enthusiasm.
examples.cn: 团队热情地着手进行这个项目。

examples.en: He carved out a successful niche in the competitive market.
examples.cn: 他在竞争激烈的市场中开辟了一个成功的利基市场。

examples.en: She carved out time in her busy schedule for exercise.
examples.cn: 她在繁忙的日程中挤出时间锻炼。

examples.en: The artist carved out a beautiful sculpture from wood.
examples.cn: 艺术家用木头雕刻出了一座美丽的雕塑。

examples.en: They carved out a path through the forest for the hikers.
examples.cn: 他们为徒步者开辟了一条穿过森林的小路。

examples.en: I love the hustle and bustle of city life.
examples.cn: 我喜欢城市生活的熙熙攘攘。

examples.en: The market was full of hustle and bustle on Saturday morning.
examples.cn: 周六早晨的市场充满了繁忙喧闹。

examples.en: You should stay away from that dangerous neighborhood.
examples.cn: 你应该远离那个危险的街区。

examples.en: The doctor advised him to stay away from sugary foods.
examples.cn: 医生建议他避开含糖食物。

examples.en: She was caught up in the excitement of the concert.
examples.cn: 她被音乐会的兴奋气氛所感染。

examples.en: He got caught up in office politics and lost focus on his work.
examples.cn: 他卷入了办公室政治，失去了对工作的专注。

examples.en: The benefits of economic growth should trickle down to all citizens.
examples.cn: 经济增长的好处应该涓滴到所有公民。

examples.en: Wealth doesn't always trickle down from the rich to the poor.
examples.cn: 财富并不总是从富人涓滴到穷人。

examples.en: The government is investing in state housing for low-income families.
examples.cn: 政府正在投资为低收入家庭提供国家住房。

examples.en: State housing projects aim to provide affordable homes.
examples.cn: 国家住房项目旨在提供负担得起的住房。

examples.en: She decided to pursue further education after graduating.
examples.cn: 她决定毕业后继续进修。

examples.en: Further education courses are available at the local college.
examples.cn: 当地学院提供继续教育课程。

examples.en: A Swiss Army knife always comes in handy during camping trips.
examples.cn: 瑞士军刀在露营旅行中总是派上用场。

examples.en: His language skills came in handy when traveling abroad.
examples.cn: 他的语言技能在国外旅行时很有用。

examples.en: Let's go back to the main topic of discussion.
examples.cn: 让我们回到讨论的主要话题。

examples.en: He plans to go back to his hometown after retirement.
examples.cn: 他计划退休后返回家乡。

examples.en: The firefighters held the flames at bay until reinforcements arrived.
examples.cn: 消防员阻止了火焰蔓延，直到增援到达。

examples.en: She held her emotions at bay during the difficult meeting.
examples.cn: 在艰难的会议中，她控制住了自己的情绪。

examples.en: Employees have access to the company's database.
examples.cn: 员工有权使用公司的数据库。

examples.en: Students have access to the library 24/7.
examples.cn: 学生可以全天候使用图书馆。

definitions.meaning_cn: 坚决反对，采取强硬立场

examples.en: The parent put their foot down and said no to the late-night party.
examples.cn: 家长坚决反对，不允许参加深夜派对。

examples.en: The manager put his foot down on the issue of workplace safety.
examples.cn: 经理在工作场所安全问题上采取了强硬立场。

examples.en: After the fire, they had to start from scratch to rebuild their home.
examples.cn: 火灾后，他们不得不从头开始重建家园。

examples.en: He decided to start from scratch with a new business idea.
examples.cn: 他决定用一个新商业想法白手起家。

examples.en: This table is made out of solid oak.
examples.cn: 这张桌子由实心橡木制成。

examples.en: The sculpture is made out of recycled materials.
examples.cn: 这个雕塑由回收材料制成。

examples.en: They set the captured bird loose back into the wild.
examples.cn: 他们将捕获的鸟放回野外。

examples.en: The rumor set loose a wave of panic in the community.
examples.cn: 谣言在社区中引发了一波恐慌。

examples.en: The apartment is for lease starting next month.
examples.cn: 这套公寓从下个月起供出租。

examples.en: There's a commercial space for lease in the downtown area.
examples.cn: 市中心有一个商业空间供出租。

examples.en: The comment sparked off a heated debate.
examples.cn: 这个评论引发了一场激烈的辩论。

examples.en: The incident sparked off a series of protests.
examples.cn: 这个事件触发了一系列抗议活动。

examples.en: Students must submit a tutorial paper by the end of the semester.
examples.cn: 学生必须在学期末提交一篇辅导论文。

examples.en: The tutorial paper covered advanced topics in physics.
examples.cn: 这篇教程论文涵盖了物理学的高级主题。

examples.en: We kicked around some ideas for the new project.
examples.cn: 我们随意讨论了一些新项目的想法。

examples.en: Let's kick around the possibility of moving to a new office.
examples.cn: 让我们考虑一下搬到新办公室的可能性。

examples.en: He felt like he was being kicked around by his boss.
examples.cn: 他觉得自己被老板粗暴对待。

examples.en: After graduation, he kicked around Europe for a year.
examples.cn: 毕业后，他在欧洲游荡了一年。

definitions.meaning_cn: 突然想起或意识到某事

examples.en: Come to think of it, I did see her at the store yesterday.
examples.cn: 突然想起来，我昨天确实在商店看到她了。

examples.en: Come to think of it, we should have booked the tickets earlier.
examples.cn: 突然意识到，我们本应该早点订票的。

examples.en: I stumbled on an old photo album while cleaning the attic.
examples.cn: 打扫阁楼时，我偶然发现了一本旧相册。

examples.en: She stumbled on a great restaurant during her trip.
examples.cn: 旅行期间，她偶然发现了一家很棒的餐厅。

definitions.meaning_cn: 勉强应付或凑合使用某物

examples.en: We can get by with just one car for now.
examples.cn: 目前我们凑合用一辆车就行。

examples.en: He gets by with a small income but manages to save some money.
examples.cn: 他靠微薄的收入勉强应付，但还能存点钱。

examples.en: The manager took him to task for missing the deadline.
examples.cn: 经理因他错过截止日期而严厉批评了他。

examples.en: She was taken to task by her parents for her poor grades.
examples.cn: 她因成绩差被父母责备。

examples.en: By and by, the sun began to set over the horizon.
examples.cn: 不久以后，太阳开始在地平线上落下。

examples.en: You'll understand the situation by and by.
examples.cn: 你逐渐会理解这个情况的。

examples.en: The company offers telephone rental for short-term events.
examples.cn: 该公司为短期活动提供电话租赁服务。

examples.en: We considered telephone rental instead of buying new phones.
examples.cn: 我们考虑租赁电话而不是购买新手机。

definitions.meaning_cn: 忙碌地四处走动或传播消息

examples.en: Bees were buzzing around the flowers in the garden.
examples.cn: 蜜蜂在花园的花朵周围忙碌地飞来飞去。

examples.en: Rumors are buzzing around the office about the merger.
examples.cn: 关于合并的谣言在办公室里四处传播。

definitions.meaning_cn: 进入全面活跃或高潮阶段

examples.en: The party got into full swing after midnight.
examples.cn: 午夜后派对进入了高潮阶段。

examples.en: Production is getting into full swing with the new machinery.
examples.cn: 随着新机器的使用，生产正进入全面活跃阶段。

examples.en: Data processing is essential for analyzing large datasets.
examples.cn: 数据处理对于分析大型数据集至关重要。

examples.en: The company upgraded its data processing systems to improve efficiency.
examples.cn: 该公司升级了数据处理系统以提高效率。

examples.en: His skills are far beyond those of his peers.
examples.cn: 他的技能远远超过了他的同龄人。

examples.en: The village is far beyond the mountains, isolated from the city.
examples.cn: 村庄远在山脉之外，与城市隔绝。

examples.en: The waiter will wait on you shortly.
examples.cn: 服务员很快就会来服侍您。

examples.en: She waited on her elderly mother with great care.
examples.cn: 她精心服侍年迈的母亲。

examples.en: We are waiting on the results of the test before proceeding.
examples.cn: 我们在等待测试结果，然后再继续。

examples.en: He's waiting on a call from the job interview.
examples.cn: 他在等待工作面试的电话。

definitions.meaning_cn: 公平对待，即使对不喜欢的人或事也给予应得的认可

examples.en: I don't like him, but give the devil his due, he is a hard worker.
examples.cn: 我不喜欢他，但公平地说，他是个努力工作的人。

examples.en: Give the devil his due, the plan was well thought out, even if it failed.
examples.cn: 公平对待，这个计划考虑得很周全，即使它失败了。

examples.en: Weight lifting is a popular way to build muscle strength.
examples.cn: 举重是增强肌肉力量的流行方式。

examples.en: She includes weight lifting in her weekly exercise routine.
examples.cn: 她将举重纳入每周的锻炼计划中。

examples.en: He awoke to the reality of his financial problems.
examples.cn: 他意识到了自己财务问题的现实。

examples.en: The public is slowly awaking to the dangers of climate change.
examples.cn: 公众正逐渐意识到气候变化的危险。

examples.en: Many English words derive from Latin.
examples.cn: 许多英语单词源自拉丁语。

examples.en: The theory derives from extensive research in the field.
examples.cn: 这个理论来源于该领域的广泛研究。

examples.en: She lived through two world wars and many hardships.
examples.cn: 她经历了两次世界大战和许多艰难困苦。

examples.en: It's amazing how people live through natural disasters and rebuild.
examples.cn: 人们经历自然灾害并重建，这真是令人惊叹。

examples.en: The meeting dragged on for hours without any conclusion.
examples.cn: 会议拖延了数小时，没有任何结论。

examples.en: The legal case has been dragging on for years.
examples.cn: 这个法律案件已经拖延了多年。

examples.en: We sat on the balcony to enjoy the view of the ocean.
examples.cn: 我们坐在阳台上欣赏海景。

examples.en: Tourists often stop here to enjoy the view of the mountains.
examples.cn: 游客经常在这里停下来欣赏山景。

definitions.meaning_cn: 大萧条（指20世纪30年代的全球经济危机）

examples.en: The Great Depression caused widespread unemployment in the 1930s.
examples.cn: 大萧条在20世纪30年代导致了广泛的失业。

examples.en: Many families struggled during the Great Depression.
examples.cn: 许多家庭在大萧条期间挣扎求生。

definitions.meaning_cn: 令人惊叹，美得让人窒息

examples.en: The view from the mountaintop took my breath away.
examples.cn: 山顶的景色美得让我窒息。

examples.en: Her performance in the play took everyone's breath away.
examples.cn: 她在剧中的表演让所有人都惊叹不已。

examples.en: The sudden news of his promotion took his breath away.
examples.cn: 他突然晋升的消息让他震惊得说不出话。

examples.en: The beauty of the ancient temple took the tourists' breath away.
examples.cn: 古庙的美丽让游客们惊讶不已。

examples.en: The two friends helped each other with their homework.
examples.cn: 这两个朋友互相帮助做作业。

examples.en: They looked at each other and smiled.
examples.cn: 他们彼此对视并微笑。

examples.en: We visited several war museums during our trip to Europe.
examples.cn: 我们在欧洲旅行期间参观了几家战争博物馆。

examples.en: The war museum displays artifacts from World War II.
examples.cn: 这家战争博物馆展示了二战时期的文物。

examples.en: He had to raise his voice to be heard over the noise.
examples.cn: 他不得不提高声音以便在噪音中被听到。

examples.en: Please don't raise your voice during the meeting.
examples.cn: 请不要在会议期间大声说话。

examples.en: She raised her voice in anger when she heard the news.
examples.cn: 听到这个消息时，她生气地提高了声音。

examples.en: The teacher rarely raises her voice at the students.
examples.cn: 老师很少对学生大声呵斥。

examples.en: We need to go across the bridge to reach the other side.
examples.cn: 我们需要穿过桥才能到达另一边。

examples.en: The message went across the country quickly.
examples.cn: 这个消息迅速传遍了全国。

examples.en: His ideas didn't go across well with the committee.
examples.cn: 他的想法没有被委员会很好地接受。

examples.en: The joke went across the room, and everyone laughed.
examples.cn: 这个笑话被大家理解了，所有人都笑了。

examples.en: She decided to pursue a career in medicine.
examples.cn: 她决定追求医学职业。

examples.en: He is pursuing a career as a software engineer.
examples.cn: 他正在追求软件工程师的职业。

examples.en: Can you cover for me at the meeting tomorrow?
examples.cn: 你能在明天的会议上代替我吗？

examples.en: She covered for her colleague who was sick.
examples.cn: 她顶替了生病的同事。

examples.en: He covered for his friend by lying to the teacher.
examples.cn: 他通过向老师撒谎来掩护他的朋友。

examples.en: They covered for each other's mistakes at work.
examples.cn: 他们在工作中互相掩饰错误。

examples.en: He stripped down to his shorts before jumping into the pool.
examples.cn: 他脱掉衣服只剩短裤，然后跳进游泳池。

examples.en: The doctor asked the patient to strip down for the examination.
examples.cn: 医生要求病人脱掉衣服进行检查。

examples.en: They stripped down the engine to repair it.
examples.cn: 他们拆卸了发动机进行修理。

examples.en: The software was stripped down to its basic features.
examples.cn: 这个软件被简化到基本功能。

examples.en: I spaced out during the boring lecture.
examples.cn: 我在无聊的讲座中走神了。

examples.en: He often spaces out when he's tired.
examples.cn: 他累的时候经常发呆。

examples.en: Space out the plants so they have room to grow.
examples.cn: 把植物间隔开，这样它们有生长空间。

examples.en: The events were spaced out over several weeks.
examples.cn: 这些事件分散在几周内。

examples.en: She prevailed on her friend to join the club.
examples.cn: 她说服她的朋友加入俱乐部。

examples.en: He prevailed on the committee to approve the proposal.
examples.cn: 他劝服委员会批准了这个提议。

definitions.meaning_cn: 看起来非常漂亮或富有

examples.en: She looked like a million dollars in her new dress.
examples.cn: 她穿着新裙子看起来非常漂亮。

examples.en: After the makeover, he looked like a million dollars.
examples.cn: 改造后，他看起来非常富有魅力。

examples.en: Shake up the bottle before opening it.
examples.cn: 打开瓶子前先摇动它。

examples.en: The earthquake shook up the entire city.
examples.cn: 地震震动了整个城市。

examples.en: The new CEO plans to shake up the company's management.
examples.cn: 新CEO计划重组公司的管理层。

examples.en: The policy shake-up improved efficiency.
examples.cn: 政策改革提高了效率。

examples.en: She freaked out when she saw the spider.
examples.cn: 她看到蜘蛛时惊慌失措。

examples.en: Don't freak out; everything will be fine.
examples.cn: 别紧张，一切都会好的。

examples.en: The concert freaked out the fans.
examples.cn: 音乐会令粉丝们兴奋不已。

examples.en: He freaked out over the new video game release.
examples.cn: 他对新视频游戏的发布激动不已。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get on the good side of sb.

definitions.meaning_cn: 讨好某人，赢得某人的好感

examples.en: He tried to get on the good side of his new boss.
examples.cn: 他试图讨好他的新老板。

examples.en: Getting on the good side of the teacher can help with grades.
examples.cn: 赢得老师的好感有助于提高成绩。

examples.en: The company launched a new advertising campaign for its product.
examples.cn: 公司为其产品推出了新的广告活动。

examples.en: The advertising campaign increased sales by 20%.
examples.cn: 这次广告活动使销售额增加了20%。

examples.en: Children often have abundant energy to play all day.
examples.cn: 孩子们通常精力充沛，可以玩一整天。

examples.en: After a good night's sleep, she had abundant energy for work.
examples.cn: 睡了一晚好觉后，她精力充沛地工作。

examples.en: He knocked up his neighbor early in the morning.
examples.cn: 他一大早敲门叫醒了他的邻居。

examples.en: Can you knock me up at 6 AM tomorrow?
examples.cn: 你能明天早上6点敲门叫醒我吗？

examples.en: He accidentally knocked up his girlfriend.
examples.cn: 他不小心让他的女朋友怀孕了。

examples.en: They got married after she was knocked up.
examples.cn: 她怀孕后他们结婚了。

examples.en: The students' union organized a charity event.
examples.cn: 学生会组织了一场慈善活动。

examples.en: She is the president of the students' union.
examples.cn: 她是学生会的主席。

examples.en: The party came to life when the music started.
examples.cn: 音乐开始时，派对变得活跃起来。

examples.en: The old story came to life in the movie adaptation.
examples.cn: 这个古老的故事在电影改编中变得生动。

examples.en: The patient came to life after the surgery.
examples.cn: 手术后病人苏醒了。

examples.en: The garden comes to life in the spring.
examples.cn: 花园在春天恢复生机。

definitions.meaning_cn: 服务费，额外收取的费用

examples.en: The restaurant adds a 10% service charge to all bills.
examples.cn: 这家餐厅在所有账单上加收10%的服务费。

examples.en: The hotel's service charge covers amenities like housekeeping and concierge.
examples.cn: 酒店的服务费包括客房清洁和礼宾服务等设施。

definitions.meaning_cn: 手续费，银行或金融机构收取的费用

examples.en: There is a monthly service charge for maintaining the checking account.
examples.cn: 维护支票账户每月需支付手续费。

examples.en: The bank waived the service charge for premium customers.
examples.cn: 银行为优质客户免除了手续费。

examples.en: She got mad when her brother broke her favorite toy.
examples.cn: 她弟弟弄坏了她最喜欢的玩具时，她生气了。

examples.en: Don't get mad at me for telling the truth.
examples.cn: 别因为我说了实话就对我发火。

examples.en: The crowd got mad when the band started playing their hit song.
examples.cn: 乐队开始演奏他们的热门歌曲时，人群变得狂热起来。

examples.en: He got mad with excitement after winning the lottery.
examples.cn: 他中了彩票后兴奋得发狂。

examples.en: The human race has made significant advancements in technology over the centuries.
examples.cn: 几个世纪以来，人类在技术上取得了重大进步。

examples.en: Climate change is a challenge that affects the entire human race.
examples.cn: 气候变化是影响全人类的挑战。

examples.en: Students benefit from hands-on learning experiences.
examples.cn: 学生从实践学习经验中受益。

examples.en: The company will benefit from the new tax incentives.
examples.cn: 公司将受益于新的税收优惠政策。

definitions.meaning_cn: 翻新旧建筑，修复老建筑

examples.en: The city plans to renovate old buildings in the historic district.
examples.cn: 该市计划翻新历史街区的旧建筑。

examples.en: They hired a contractor to renovate old buildings for modern use.
examples.cn: 他们聘请了承包商翻新旧建筑以供现代使用。

definitions.meaning_cn: 鸟类迁徙，鸟类的季节性移动

examples.en: Bird migration is a fascinating natural phenomenon observed worldwide.
examples.cn: 鸟类迁徙是世界范围内观察到的迷人自然现象。

examples.en: Scientists study bird migration patterns to understand climate effects.
examples.cn: 科学家研究鸟类迁徙模式以了解气候影响。

examples.en: Employees are expected to complete tasks by the deadline.
examples.cn: 员工应在截止日期前完成任务。

examples.en: She uses a checklist to help her complete tasks efficiently.
examples.cn: 她使用清单来帮助高效完成任务。

examples.en: Many people view him as a role model for his charitable work.
examples.cn: 许多人因他的慈善工作而将他视为榜样。

examples.en: She views the challenge as an opportunity to grow.
examples.cn: 她将挑战视为成长的机会。

definitions.meaning_cn: 成功完成某事，实现（困难的事）

examples.en: Against all odds, they managed to bring off the difficult project.
examples.cn: 尽管困难重重，他们还是成功完成了这个艰难的项目。

examples.en: He brought off a stunning victory in the final match.
examples.cn: 他在决赛中取得了惊人的胜利。

examples.en: Athletes often go to the limit to achieve their personal best.
examples.cn: 运动员常常竭尽全力以达到个人最佳成绩。

examples.en: The team went to the limit to meet the tight deadline.
examples.cn: 团队竭尽全力以赶上紧迫的截止日期。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在...上进行实验，用...做试验

examples.en: Researchers experiment on mice to study disease treatments.
examples.cn: 研究人员在小鼠身上进行实验以研究疾病治疗方法。

examples.en: It is unethical to experiment on humans without consent.
examples.cn: 未经同意在人类身上进行实验是不道德的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 住房开发商，房地产开发商

examples.en: Housing developers are building new apartments in the suburban area.
examples.cn: 住房开发商正在郊区建造新公寓。

examples.en: The city council works with housing developers to plan affordable homes.
examples.cn: 市议会与住房开发商合作规划经济适用房。

examples.en: The new policy will open up trade opportunities with other countries.
examples.cn: 新政策将开放与其他国家的贸易机会。

examples.en: She decided to open up about her feelings to her friend.
examples.cn: 她决定向朋友敞开心扉谈论自己的感受。

examples.en: The café will open up at 7 AM every morning.
examples.cn: 这家咖啡馆每天早上7点开始营业。

examples.en: They plan to open up a new store in the mall next month.
examples.cn: 他们计划下个月在商场开一家新店。

examples.en: The survey method used in the study involved online questionnaires.
examples.cn: 该研究中使用的调查方法包括在线问卷。

examples.en: Researchers compared different survey methods to gather accurate data.
examples.cn: 研究人员比较了不同的调查方法以收集准确数据。

examples.en: After the explanation, I finally get it.
examples.cn: 解释之后，我终于明白了。

examples.en: Do you get it? It's a simple concept.
examples.cn: 你明白了吗？这是个简单的概念。

examples.en: I need to get it from the store before it closes.
examples.cn: 我需要在商店关门前得到它。

examples.en: She worked hard to get it, and now she's proud of her achievement.
examples.cn: 她努力工作以获得它，现在她为自己的成就感到自豪。

definitions.meaning_cn: 传统化石燃料，如煤、石油、天然气

examples.en: Many countries are reducing their reliance on traditional fossil fuels.
examples.cn: 许多国家正在减少对传统化石燃料的依赖。

examples.en: Traditional fossil fuels contribute significantly to greenhouse gas emissions.
examples.cn: 传统化石燃料对温室气体排放有显著贡献。

examples.en: He plans to leave school after graduating high school.
examples.cn: 他计划高中毕业后离开学校。

examples.en: Some students leave school early to start working.
examples.cn: 一些学生早早离开学校开始工作。

examples.en: She polished up the silverware before the dinner party.
examples.cn: 她在晚宴前擦亮了银器。

examples.en: He spent hours polishing up his car to make it shine.
examples.cn: 他花了几个小时抛光他的车，让它闪闪发光。

examples.en: Before the presentation, she polished up her speech.
examples.cn: 在演讲前，她完善了她的讲话。

examples.en: He needs to polish up his resume to apply for the job.
examples.cn: 他需要改进简历以申请这份工作。

examples.en: He tried to gloss over the mistakes in the report.
examples.cn: 他试图掩盖报告中的错误。

examples.en: Politicians often gloss over difficult issues during debates.
examples.cn: 政治家在辩论中常常掩饰困难的问题。

examples.en: Rust can eat away at metal over time.
examples.cn: 锈会随着时间的推移侵蚀金属。

examples.en: Worry began to eat away at her confidence.
examples.cn: 担忧开始逐渐侵蚀她的信心。

examples.en: The termites are eating away at the wooden structure.
examples.cn: 白蚁正在慢慢吃掉木结构。

examples.en: He ate away at the large pizza by himself.
examples.cn: 他一个人慢慢吃掉了整个大披萨。

examples.en: I don't have time for another meeting today.
examples.cn: 我今天没时间再开一个会了。

examples.en: Do you have time for a quick coffee?
examples.cn: 你有时间喝杯咖啡吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 愿意为某事或某人花费时间

examples.en: She always has time for her friends, no matter how busy she is.
examples.cn: 无论多忙，她总是愿意为朋友花时间。

examples.en: He doesn't have time for trivial complaints.
examples.cn: 他不愿意为琐碎的抱怨浪费时间。

valid_entries.original_phrase: make out a check to sb.

examples.en: Please make out a check to John Smith for the invoice amount.
examples.cn: 请开具一张给约翰·史密斯的支票，金额为发票总额。

examples.en: I'll make out a check to the charity organization as a donation.
examples.cn: 我会开具一张支票给慈善机构作为捐款。

examples.en: He broke the chocolate into chunks of various sizes.
examples.cn: 他把巧克力掰成了大小不一的块。

examples.en: The report contains chunks of data that need analysis.
examples.cn: 报告包含大量需要分析的数据。

examples.en: She read the book in chunks of two chapters at a time.
examples.cn: 她每次读这本书的两章部分。

examples.en: The project is divided into manageable chunks of work.
examples.cn: 这个项目被分成了可管理的部分。

definitions.meaning_cn: 开某人的玩笑或恶作剧

examples.en: The kids love to play jokes on their teacher during April Fools' Day.
examples.cn: 孩子们喜欢在愚人节时开老师的玩笑。

examples.en: He often plays jokes on his colleagues to lighten the mood.
examples.cn: 他经常开同事的玩笑来活跃气氛。

examples.en: The new software is designed to meet the needs of small businesses.
examples.cn: 新软件旨在满足小企业的需求。

examples.en: We must meet the basic needs of all community members.
examples.cn: 我们必须满足所有社区成员的基本需求。

definitions.meaning_cn: 食物链（生态学中的捕食关系）

examples.en: Lions are at the top of the food chain in their habitat.
examples.cn: 狮子在其栖息地中处于食物链的顶端。

examples.en: Pollution can disrupt the entire food chain in an ecosystem.
examples.cn: 污染会破坏生态系统中整个食物链。

examples.en: The company aims to control every step of the food chain from farm to table.
examples.cn: 该公司旨在控制从农场到餐桌的每一步供应链。

examples.en: Small retailers are often at the bottom of the food chain in this industry.
examples.cn: 小零售商在这个行业中通常处于层级底部。

examples.en: I don't like spicy food, and for that matter, I avoid anything too salty.
examples.cn: 我不喜欢辣食，就此而言，我也避免任何太咸的东西。

examples.en: She's not interested in politics, or for that matter, any serious discussions.
examples.cn: 她对政治不感兴趣，同样地，对任何严肃的讨论也不感兴趣。

examples.en: Most freshmen are required to live on campus during their first year.
examples.cn: 大多数新生在第一年被要求住在校园内。

examples.en: Living on campus makes it easier to attend early morning classes.
examples.cn: 住在校园内使得参加早课更容易。

examples.en: He's such a tedious fellow, always talking about the same old topics.
examples.cn: 他是个如此乏味的人，总是谈论同样老套的话题。

examples.en: Avoid that tedious fellow at parties; he'll bore you with long stories.
examples.cn: 在派对上避开那个乏味的人；他会用长篇大论让你厌烦。

examples.en: The police stopped the thief from escaping.
examples.cn: 警察阻止了小偷逃跑。

examples.en: She tried to stop her child from eating too much candy.
examples.cn: 她试图阻止她的孩子吃太多糖果。

examples.en: In all likelihood, it will rain tomorrow, so bring an umbrella.
examples.cn: 很可能明天会下雨，所以带把伞。

examples.en: The project will, in all likelihood, be completed by next month.
examples.cn: 这个项目十有八九会在下个月完成。

definitions.meaning_cn: 想要提神的东西（如咖啡或零食）

examples.en: After a long day, I want a pick-me-up like a cup of coffee.
examples.cn: 漫长的一天后，我想要一杯咖啡这样的提神物。

examples.en: She said she wants a pick-me-up to boost her energy in the afternoon.
examples.cn: 她说她想要一个提神物来在下午提升精力。

examples.en: When feeling down, he wants a pick-me-up from a funny movie.
examples.cn: 情绪低落时，他想要一部搞笑电影来鼓舞自己。

examples.en: The team wants a pick-me-up after the loss, so the coach gave a motivational speech.
examples.cn: 输球后，团队想要一个激励，所以教练发表了鼓舞人心的讲话。

examples.en: She is learning to cope with the stress of her new job.
examples.cn: 她正在学习应对新工作的压力。

examples.en: It's hard to cope with the loss of a loved one.
examples.cn: 很难应对失去亲人的痛苦。

examples.en: A new issue came up during the meeting that we need to address.
examples.cn: 会议中出现了一个我们需要解决的新问题。

examples.en: His name came up in conversation as a potential candidate.
examples.cn: 在谈话中，他的名字被提及为潜在候选人。

examples.en: The deadline is coming up soon, so we need to hurry.
examples.cn: 截止日期快到了，所以我们需要加快速度。

examples.en: My birthday is coming up next week.
examples.cn: 我的生日下周就要到了。

examples.en: The flag is flying at the top of the building.
examples.cn: 旗帜在大楼的顶部飘扬。

examples.en: Write your name at the top of the page.
examples.cn: 在页面的顶部写下你的名字。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在...的领先位置或最佳状态

examples.en: She is at the top of her class in mathematics.
examples.cn: 她在数学班上名列前茅。

examples.en: The company remains at the top of the industry in innovation.
examples.cn: 该公司在创新方面仍处于行业领先位置。

examples.en: The small startup developed into a multinational corporation.
examples.cn: 这家小初创公司发展成了一家跨国公司。

examples.en: Their friendship developed into a romantic relationship over time.
examples.cn: 随着时间的推移，他们的友谊发展成了恋爱关系。

examples.en: I usually fall asleep within minutes of going to bed.
examples.cn: 我通常上床后几分钟内就入睡。

examples.en: The baby fell asleep in her mother's arms.
examples.cn: 婴儿在母亲的怀抱中睡着了。

examples.en: Scientists have linked smoking to various health problems.
examples.cn: 科学家已将吸烟与各种健康问题联系起来。

examples.en: The article links economic growth to technological innovation.
examples.cn: 这篇文章将经济增长与技术革新联系起来。

examples.en: The security team kept the protesters at bay during the event.
examples.cn: 安保团队在活动期间控制住了抗议者。

examples.en: Regular exercise helps keep illnesses at bay.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼有助于控制疾病。

examples.en: The mirror reflects back your image clearly.
examples.cn: 镜子清晰地反射出你的影像。

examples.en: She likes to reflect back on her childhood memories.
examples.cn: 她喜欢回想她的童年记忆。

examples.en: The car got stuck in the mud during the heavy rain.
examples.cn: 大雨中，汽车陷进了泥里。

examples.en: I got stuck on a difficult math problem for hours.
examples.cn: 我被一道数学难题困住了几个小时。

examples.en: The negotiations got stuck over the budget details.
examples.cn: 谈判因预算细节问题陷入僵局。

examples.en: She got stuck in a dead-end job and couldn't find a way out.
examples.cn: 她陷入了一份没有前途的工作，找不到出路。

examples.en: The constant traffic noise from the highway makes it hard to sleep at night.
examples.cn: 高速公路持续的交通噪音让人晚上难以入睡。

examples.en: Living in the city center exposes you to high levels of traffic noise.
examples.cn: 住在市中心会让你暴露在高水平的交通噪音中。

examples.en: Welsh is a minority language in the United Kingdom, spoken mainly in Wales.
examples.cn: 威尔士语是英国的少数民族语言，主要在威尔士使用。

examples.en: Efforts are being made to preserve minority languages that are at risk of extinction.
examples.cn: 人们正在努力保护濒临灭绝的少数民族语言。

examples.en: He went ape when he found out his car had been scratched.
examples.cn: 他发现自己的车被刮花时，气得发疯。

examples.en: The fans went ape after their team scored the winning goal.
examples.cn: 球迷们在球队打入制胜球后变得疯狂起来。

examples.en: The company introduced merit pay to reward employees based on their performance.
examples.cn: 公司引入了绩效工资，根据员工的表现给予奖励。

examples.en: Merit pay systems can motivate workers to achieve higher productivity.
examples.cn: 绩效工资制度可以激励工人提高生产力。

examples.en: Cotton is a common plant fiber used in textile manufacturing.
examples.cn: 棉花是一种常用于纺织制造的植物纤维。

examples.en: Plant fibers like hemp are being explored for sustainable packaging solutions.
examples.cn: 像大麻这样的植物纤维正在被探索用于可持续包装解决方案。

examples.en: After traveling the world, she saw her problems in perspective and felt less stressed.
examples.cn: 环游世界后，她正确地看待了自己的问题，压力减轻了。

examples.en: It's important to keep things in perspective when facing challenges.
examples.cn: 面对挑战时，保持正确看待事物很重要。

examples.en: The doctor gave a prescription for antibiotics to treat the infection.
examples.cn: 医生开了抗生素处方来治疗感染。

examples.en: Only licensed physicians can legally give a prescription for controlled substances.
examples.cn: 只有持牌医生才能合法开具管制药物的处方。

examples.en: I leave home early to avoid rush-hour traffic and get to work on time.
examples.cn: 我早早出门以避开高峰时段交通，准时上班。

examples.en: Using public transport can help you avoid rush-hour traffic jams.
examples.cn: 使用公共交通可以帮助你避开高峰时段的交通堵塞。

examples.en: She had a hand in organizing the charity event, helping with the logistics.
examples.cn: 她参与了慈善活动的组织，协助了后勤工作。

examples.en: The manager suspected that an insider had a hand in the security breach.
examples.cn: 经理怀疑有内部人员参与了安全漏洞事件。

examples.en: Every so often, I like to take a break and go for a walk in the park.
examples.cn: 偶尔，我喜欢休息一下，去公园散步。

examples.en: He checks his email every so often to stay updated on work matters.
examples.cn: 他时不时地查看电子邮件，以了解工作动态。

examples.en: Strong analytical skills are essential for solving complex problems in engineering.
examples.cn: 强大的分析能力对于解决工程中的复杂问题至关重要。

examples.en: The job requires candidates to demonstrate their analytical skills through case studies.
examples.cn: 这份工作要求候选人通过案例研究展示他们的分析能力。

valid_entries.original_phrase: use resources in an environmentally friendly way

definitions.meaning_cn: 以环保的方式使用资源

examples.en: Companies are encouraged to use resources in an environmentally friendly way to reduce their carbon footprint.
examples.cn: 鼓励公司以环保的方式使用资源，以减少碳足迹。

examples.en: Using resources in an environmentally friendly way includes recycling and conserving water.
examples.cn: 以环保的方式使用资源包括回收利用和节约用水。

examples.en: The committee was in agreement with the proposed changes to the policy.
examples.cn: 委员会同意对政策提出的修改。

examples.en: Her findings are in agreement with previous research on the topic.
examples.cn: 她的发现与之前关于该主题的研究一致。

examples.en: It takes a few minutes for the computer to boot up after being turned off.
examples.cn: 计算机关机后启动需要几分钟时间。

examples.en: Make sure to boot up the system before running the software installation.
examples.cn: 在运行软件安装之前，确保启动系统。

examples.en: The rain should ease up by the afternoon, according to the weather forecast.
examples.cn: 根据天气预报，雨势应该在下午减轻。

examples.en: He needs to ease up on his workload to avoid burnout.
examples.cn: 他需要减轻工作量以避免精疲力竭。

examples.en: The difficult project put her skills to the test, but she succeeded.
examples.cn: 这个困难的项目考验了她的技能，但她成功了。

examples.en: Emergency situations put the team's preparedness to the test.
examples.cn: 紧急情况考验了团队的准备情况。

examples.en: He promised on his honor to return the borrowed money by next week.
examples.cn: 他以名誉担保，承诺下周前归还借的钱。

examples.en: Students are expected to complete the exam on their honor, without cheating.
examples.cn: 学生应以名誉担保完成考试，不作弊。

examples.en: Extending the deadline is out of the question due to strict regulations.
examples.cn: 由于严格的规定，延长截止日期是不可能的。

examples.en: Buying a new car right now is out of the question because of budget constraints.
examples.cn: 由于预算限制，现在买新车是不可能的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 用于提出建议或询问意见，相当于“...怎么样？”

examples.en: What about going to the movies tonight?
examples.cn: 今晚去看电影怎么样？

examples.en: What about trying the new restaurant?
examples.cn: 试试那家新餐厅怎么样？

definitions.meaning_cn: 用于询问或提及被忽略的事物，相当于“那...呢？”

examples.en: I'll have coffee, what about you?
examples.cn: 我要咖啡，你呢？

examples.en: We discussed the budget, but what about the timeline?
examples.cn: 我们讨论了预算，但时间线呢？

definitions.meaning_cn: 在会议或讨论中，允许听众提问或发言

examples.en: After the presentation, the moderator will open the floor for questions.
examples.cn: 演示结束后，主持人将开放提问环节。

examples.en: Let's open the floor to any comments from the audience.
examples.cn: 让我们开放给听众发表任何评论。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对音乐、语言等有良好的听觉辨别能力或天赋

examples.en: She has an ear for languages and picks them up quickly.
examples.cn: 她对语言有天赋，学得很快。

examples.en: He has an ear for classical music and can identify composers easily.
examples.cn: 他对古典音乐有鉴赏力，能轻松识别作曲家。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人处于焦虑或紧张等待的状态

examples.en: The suspenseful movie kept the audience on tenterhooks.
examples.cn: 这部悬疑电影让观众紧张不已。

examples.en: Waiting for the exam results kept her on tenterhooks all week.
examples.cn: 等待考试结果让她整个星期都焦虑不安。

definitions.meaning_cn: 可供购买或使用，特价或促销中

examples.en: There are many discounts on offer during the holiday sale.
examples.cn: 假日促销期间有许多折扣可供选择。

examples.en: The new software features are on offer for a limited time.
examples.cn: 新软件功能限时提供。

examples.en: Several job positions are on offer at the company.
examples.cn: 公司提供多个职位。

examples.en: Help is on offer if you need it.
examples.cn: 如果需要，可以提供帮助。

examples.en: To make a long story short, we decided to cancel the trip.
examples.cn: 长话短说，我们决定取消旅行。

examples.en: Make a long story short, he got the job after all.
examples.cn: 简而言之，他最终还是得到了那份工作。

examples.en: I ran into an old friend at the supermarket yesterday.
examples.cn: 昨天我在超市偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

examples.en: She ran into her teacher while walking in the park.
examples.cn: 她在公园散步时偶然遇到了她的老师。

examples.en: The project ran into some unexpected delays.
examples.cn: 项目遇到了一些意外的延误。

examples.en: We ran into financial trouble last year.
examples.cn: 去年我们遇到了财务困难。

examples.en: The car ran into a tree during the storm.
examples.cn: 暴风雨中汽车撞到了一棵树。

examples.en: He ran into the wall while playing basketball.
examples.cn: 他打篮球时撞到了墙上。

definitions.meaning_cn: 通过锻炼使肌肉更结实或身体更健康

examples.en: She exercises regularly to tone up her muscles.
examples.cn: 她定期锻炼以使肌肉更结实。

examples.en: He started running to tone up before the summer.
examples.cn: 他开始跑步以在夏天前让身体更健康。

definitions.meaning_cn: 重新提起不愉快的往事

examples.en: He always rakes up old arguments during family gatherings.
examples.cn: 他总是在家庭聚会上重提旧争论。

examples.en: Don't rake up past mistakes; let's focus on the future.
examples.cn: 不要重提过去的错误；让我们专注于未来。

examples.en: She raked up the leaves in the yard.
examples.cn: 她用耙子收集了院子里的树叶。

examples.en: He raked up the soil before planting the seeds.
examples.cn: 他在播种前用耙子整理了土壤。

definitions.meaning_cn: 愿意做某事，表示同意或准备做

examples.en: I am willing to help you with your homework.
examples.cn: 我愿意帮你做作业。

examples.en: She is willing to take on extra responsibilities at work.
examples.cn: 她愿意在工作中承担额外的责任。

examples.en: It took me a while to take in all the details of the plan.
examples.cn: 我花了一些时间才理解计划的所有细节。

examples.en: She couldn't take in the shocking news immediately.
examples.cn: 她无法立即吸收这个令人震惊的消息。

examples.en: They took in a stray cat last winter.
examples.cn: 去年冬天他们收留了一只流浪猫。

examples.en: The shelter takes in homeless people during cold nights.
examples.cn: 收容所在寒冷的夜晚接纳无家可归的人。

examples.en: The tour takes in several historical sites.
examples.cn: 这次旅行涵盖了几个历史遗址。

examples.en: The report takes in all aspects of the issue.
examples.cn: 报告涵盖了问题的所有方面。

definitions.meaning_cn: 冒险，面临危险或不确定性

examples.en: Investing in stocks runs risks of losing money.
examples.cn: 投资股票有亏钱的风险。

examples.en: He runs risks by driving without a seatbelt.
examples.cn: 他不系安全带开车是在冒险。

examples.en: Please turn over the page to continue reading.
examples.cn: 请翻到下一页继续阅读。

examples.en: He turned over the pancake to cook the other side.
examples.cn: 他翻转了煎饼以烹饪另一面。

examples.en: The manager will turn over the project to the new team.
examples.cn: 经理将把项目移交给新团队。

examples.en: He turned over the evidence to the police.
examples.cn: 他把证据交给了警察。

examples.en: The company turns over millions of dollars annually.
examples.cn: 公司年营业额达数百万美元。

examples.en: The small shop turns over a modest profit each month.
examples.cn: 这家小店每月有适度的利润营业额。

definitions.meaning_cn: 毕业通知，通常指正式宣布毕业的卡片或信件

examples.en: She sent out graduation announcements to all her relatives.
examples.cn: 她向所有亲戚发出了毕业通知。

examples.en: The graduation announcements included the date and location of the ceremony.
examples.cn: 毕业通知包括了典礼的日期和地点。

examples.en: Economic factors have a bearing on investment decisions.
examples.cn: 经济因素对投资决策有影响。

examples.en: Her experience has a bearing on her ability to lead the team.
examples.cn: 她的经验对她领导团队的能力有影响。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因为，在于，用于解释原因或方式

examples.en: The plan is innovative in that it uses new technology.
examples.cn: 这个计划具有创新性，因为它使用了新技术。

examples.en: He succeeded in that he worked harder than anyone else.
examples.cn: 他成功了，因为他比任何人都更努力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 忙得团团转但无进展，做无用功

examples.en: We've been running around in circles trying to fix the bug.
examples.cn: 我们一直忙得团团转试图修复这个错误。

examples.en: Without a clear plan, you'll just run around in circles.
examples.cn: 没有明确的计划，你只会做无用功。

examples.en: He studies hard with the purpose of getting into a good university.
examples.cn: 他努力学习是为了进入一所好大学。

examples.en: The meeting was held with the purpose of discussing future strategies.
examples.cn: 召开会议的目的是讨论未来战略。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...远离或无关，保持距离

examples.en: His opinions are removed from the mainstream views.
examples.cn: 他的观点与主流观点无关。

examples.en: She tries to be removed from office politics.
examples.cn: 她试图远离办公室政治。

definitions.meaning_cn: 电视新闻，通过电视播报的新闻节目

examples.en: I watch TV news every evening to stay informed.
examples.cn: 我每晚看电视新闻以了解最新信息。

examples.en: TV news provides updates on current events around the world.
examples.cn: 电视新闻提供全球时事的最新报道。

examples.en: Take the smartphone for example, it has revolutionized communication.
examples.cn: 以智能手机为例，它彻底改变了通信方式。

examples.en: Take Shakespeare for example, his plays are still performed worldwide.
examples.cn: 以莎士比亚为例，他的戏剧仍在全球上演。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's tail between one's legs

definitions.meaning_cn: 夹着尾巴，表示羞愧或失败

examples.en: After losing the debate, he left with his tail between his legs.
examples.cn: 辩论失败后，他夹着尾巴离开了。

examples.en: The team had their tails between their legs after the embarrassing defeat.
examples.cn: 在尴尬的失败后，整个团队都夹着尾巴。

examples.en: After the argument, she needed to cool down before speaking again.
examples.cn: 争吵后，她需要冷静下来再说话。

examples.en: Let the engine cool down before checking the oil.
examples.cn: 在检查机油前，让发动机先降温。

examples.en: Cool down the soup before serving it to the children.
examples.cn: 给孩子们上汤前，先让它变凉。

examples.en: The evening breeze helped cool down the hot room.
examples.cn: 晚风帮助炎热的房间变凉。

examples.en: She will attend the tournament as a competitor next month.
examples.cn: 她下个月将作为参赛者参加锦标赛。

examples.en: Many fans attended the tournament to support their favorite teams.
examples.cn: 许多粉丝参加了锦标赛，支持他们最喜欢的队伍。

definitions.meaning_cn: 安然度过困境，成功应对

examples.en: Despite the company's bankruptcy, he landed on his feet with a new job.
examples.cn: 尽管公司破产，他找到新工作，安然度过了困境。

examples.en: After the divorce, she landed on her feet and started a successful business.
examples.cn: 离婚后，她成功应对，创办了一家成功的企业。

examples.en: I have no use for this old computer anymore.
examples.cn: 我不再需要这台旧电脑了。

examples.en: He has no use for people who don't keep their promises.
examples.cn: 他不重视不守承诺的人。

examples.en: The comedian's joke made the audience crack up.
examples.cn: 喜剧演员的笑话让观众大笑。

examples.en: We cracked up at the funny video online.
examples.cn: 我们在网上看到有趣的视频时大笑。

examples.en: Under too much stress, she cracked up and needed a break.
examples.cn: 压力过大，她精神崩溃，需要休息。

examples.en: He cracked up after working non-stop for weeks.
examples.cn: 连续工作几周后，他精神崩溃了。

examples.en: With this tight deadline, we have our work cut out for us.
examples.cn: 截止日期这么紧，我们面临艰巨任务。

examples.en: She has her work cut out to finish the project by Friday.
examples.cn: 她面临艰巨任务，要在周五前完成项目。

examples.en: A good leader has a strong sense of responsibility.
examples.cn: 一个好的领导者有强烈的责任感。

examples.en: He showed his sense of responsibility by always being on time.
examples.cn: 他总是准时，显示了他的责任感。

examples.en: I happened to see her at the supermarket yesterday.
examples.cn: 我昨天碰巧在超市看到她。

examples.en: Do you happen to know the answer to this question?
examples.cn: 你碰巧知道这个问题的答案吗？

examples.en: She was instrumental in securing the funding for the project.
examples.cn: 她在为项目争取资金中起了关键作用。

examples.en: His research was instrumental in developing the new vaccine.
examples.cn: 他的研究在开发新疫苗中起了关键作用。

examples.en: You are free to leave whenever you want.
examples.cn: 你可以随时自由离开。

examples.en: Students are free to choose their own topics for the essay.
examples.cn: 学生可以自由选择论文的主题。

examples.en: She arrived at the party with her children in tow.
examples.cn: 她带着孩子们跟随她参加了派对。

examples.en: The truck had a trailer in tow.
examples.cn: 卡车拖着一辆拖车。

examples.en: Hold tight to the railing when climbing the stairs.
examples.cn: 爬楼梯时抓紧栏杆。

examples.en: Hold tight, the situation will improve soon.
examples.cn: 坚持住，情况很快就会改善。

examples.en: He told the aggressive dog to back off.
examples.cn: 他让那只凶猛的狗后退。

examples.en: Back off and give me some space to think.
examples.cn: 退让一下，给我一些思考的空间。

examples.en: His schedule is in conflict with the meeting time.
examples.cn: 他的日程与会议时间冲突。

examples.en: The new policy is in conflict with existing laws.
examples.cn: 新政策与现有法律冲突。

examples.en: She dedicates her energy to helping the homeless.
examples.cn: 她致力于帮助无家可归者。

examples.en: He dedicated his energy to mastering the piano.
examples.cn: 他致力于掌握钢琴。

examples.en: He had a narrow escape from the car accident.
examples.cn: 他在车祸中侥幸逃脱。

examples.en: It was a narrow escape when the fire broke out.
examples.cn: 火灾发生时，那是一次侥幸逃脱。

examples.en: What do you make of this strange situation?
examples.cn: 你怎么理解这个奇怪的情况？

examples.en: I don't know what to make of his sudden resignation.
examples.cn: 我不知道如何看待他突然辞职。

examples.en: She showed talent in music from an early age.
examples.cn: 她从幼年起就显示出音乐天赋。

examples.en: From an early age, he was taught to respect others.
examples.cn: 从幼年起，他就被教导要尊重他人。

examples.en: The graduation ceremony will be held in the university auditorium next Friday.
examples.cn: 毕业典礼将于下周五在大学礼堂举行。

examples.en: She felt proud as she walked across the stage at her graduation ceremony.
examples.cn: 她在毕业典礼上走过舞台时感到自豪。

examples.en: If you go outside without an umbrella, you'll get wet in the rain.
examples.cn: 如果你不带伞出门，你会在雨中淋湿。

examples.en: The children got wet while playing in the sprinklers.
examples.cn: 孩子们在洒水器中玩耍时弄湿了。

examples.en: He achieved success at the expense of his health.
examples.cn: 他以健康为代价取得了成功。

examples.en: The company grew rapidly at the expense of employee well-being.
examples.cn: 公司以员工福祉为代价迅速增长。

examples.en: The manager needs to sign off on the budget before we proceed.
examples.cn: 经理需要在预算上签字同意，我们才能继续。

examples.en: The radio host signed off with a cheerful goodbye.
examples.cn: 电台主持人以愉快的告别结束了广播。

examples.en: She lives by the principle of honesty in all her dealings.
examples.cn: 她在所有交易中都遵循诚实的原则。

examples.en: He lives by fishing in the coastal village.
examples.cn: 他在沿海村庄以捕鱼为生。

examples.en: The company's registered capital is $1 million, as stated in the incorporation documents.
examples.cn: 根据公司注册文件，公司的注册资本为100万美元。

examples.en: Increasing the registered capital can enhance the firm's credibility with investors.
examples.cn: 增加注册资本可以提高公司与投资者的信誉。

definitions.meaning_cn: 充满憧憬，眼中有星星（形容兴奋或理想化）

examples.en: When she talks about becoming an actress, she has stars in her eyes.
examples.cn: 当她谈论成为演员时，她眼中充满了憧憬。

examples.en: He had stars in his eyes after meeting his childhood hero.
examples.cn: 见到童年偶像后，他眼中闪烁着兴奋的光芒。

examples.en: She used statistical data to support her argument in the research paper.
examples.cn: 她在研究论文中使用统计数据来支持她的论点。

examples.en: To support his argument, he cited several expert opinions during the discussion.
examples.cn: 为了支持他的论点，他在讨论中引用了多位专家的意见。

examples.en: I don't have time to do the laundry today because of my busy schedule.
examples.cn: 由于日程繁忙，我今天没时间洗衣服。

examples.en: Do you have time to do a quick review of the report before the meeting?
examples.cn: 会议前你有时间快速审查一下报告吗？

examples.en: I like to go for a jog in the park every morning to stay fit.
examples.cn: 我喜欢每天早上在公园慢跑以保持健康。

examples.en: She decided to go for a jog to clear her mind after work.
examples.cn: 她决定下班后去慢跑以清醒头脑。

examples.en: Students from low-income families may be exempted from tuition fees at this university.
examples.cn: 这所大学的低收入家庭学生可能被免除学费。

examples.en: He was exempted from tuition fees due to his outstanding academic performance.
examples.cn: 由于出色的学术表现，他被免除了学费。

examples.en: She is not only intelligent but also very hardworking.
examples.cn: 她不仅聪明，而且非常勤奋。

examples.en: The project requires not only funding but also technical expertise.
examples.cn: 这个项目不仅需要资金，还需要技术专长。

examples.en: Can you tell me about your trip to Japan?
examples.cn: 你能告诉我你的日本之旅吗？

examples.en: He told his friend about the new job opportunity.
examples.cn: 他告诉朋友关于新工作机会的事。

examples.en: They plan to host a party to celebrate their anniversary next weekend.
examples.cn: 他们计划下周末举办派对庆祝周年纪念。

examples.en: She loves to host a party at her home during the holidays.
examples.cn: 她喜欢在假期期间在家里举办派对。

examples.en: Climate change is causing more frequent extreme weather events worldwide.
examples.cn: 气候变化正在全球范围内导致更频繁的极端天气事件。

examples.en: Scientists are studying the impacts of climate change on polar ice caps.
examples.cn: 科学家正在研究气候变化对极地冰盖的影响。

examples.en: Despite the difficulties, she kept on doing her research until she succeeded.
