examples.cn: 尽管困难重重，她继续进行研究直到成功。

examples.en: He told me to keep on doing the exercises to improve my skills.
examples.cn: 他告诉我继续做练习以提高技能。

examples.en: The committee called the director to account for the financial discrepancies.
examples.cn: 委员会要求主任对财务差异负责。

examples.en: The public is calling the government to account for its environmental policies.
examples.cn: 公众正在要求政府对其环境政策负责。

examples.en: She keeps her emotions in check during stressful situations.
examples.cn: 她在压力情况下控制自己的情绪。

examples.en: The new regulations are designed to keep pollution levels in check.
examples.cn: 新法规旨在控制污染水平。

examples.en: We are running short of time to complete the project before the deadline.
examples.cn: 我们在截止日期前完成项目的时间短缺。

examples.en: The store ran short of supplies during the holiday sale.
examples.cn: 商店在假日促销期间供应短缺。

examples.en: He had to make up an excuse for being late to the meeting.
examples.cn: 他不得不为开会迟到编造一个借口。

examples.en: She tried to make up for her mistake by working extra hours.
examples.cn: 她试图通过加班来弥补自己的错误。

examples.en: Many species are going extinct due to habitat loss.
examples.cn: 由于栖息地丧失，许多物种正濒临灭绝。

examples.en: If we don't act now, these animals will be going extinct within decades.
examples.cn: 如果我们现在不采取行动，这些动物将在几十年内濒临灭绝。

examples.en: This software is out of date and needs an update.
examples.cn: 这个软件已经过时，需要更新。

examples.en: Her fashion sense is completely out of date.
examples.cn: 她的时尚感完全过时了。

examples.en: Don't eat that yogurt; it's out of date.
examples.cn: 别吃那个酸奶，它已经过期了。

examples.en: The coupon is out of date, so we can't use it.
examples.cn: 优惠券已过期，所以我们不能用。

examples.en: I need to make an appointment with the dentist for a check-up.
examples.cn: 我需要和牙医预约一次检查。

examples.en: She made an appointment with her lawyer to discuss the contract.
examples.cn: 她和律师预约讨论合同事宜。

examples.en: The popular toy is out of stock until next month.
examples.cn: 这款热门玩具缺货，要到下个月才有。

examples.en: We're sorry, but that item is out of stock at the moment.
examples.cn: 很抱歉，那个商品目前缺货。

examples.en: The project is all but finished; we just need to add the final touches.
examples.cn: 这个项目差不多完成了，我们只需要做最后的润色。

examples.en: He was all but certain he would win the competition.
examples.cn: 他几乎确定自己会赢得比赛。

examples.en: All but one of the students passed the exam.
examples.cn: 除了一个学生，其他人都通过了考试。

examples.en: She ate all but a small piece of the cake.
examples.cn: 除了一个小块，她把蛋糕都吃了。

examples.en: She excels in track and field events like sprinting and long jump.
examples.cn: 她在短跑和跳远等田径项目中表现出色。

examples.en: The school's track and field team won several medals at the competition.
examples.cn: 学校的田径队在比赛中赢得了多枚奖牌。

examples.en: The survey had a high response rate of 80%.
examples.cn: 这项调查的响应率高达80%。

examples.en: Improving the response rate is key to getting accurate data.
examples.cn: 提高回复率是获得准确数据的关键。

examples.en: The soldiers worked to liberate the city from enemy control.
examples.cn: 士兵们努力将这座城市从敌人控制中解放出来。

examples.en: Technology has liberated us from many tedious tasks.
examples.cn: 技术使我们从许多繁琐的任务中解放出来。

examples.en: There is an upper limit of $1000 for expenses on this trip.
examples.cn: 这次旅行的费用上限是1000美元。

examples.en: The upper limit for participants in the workshop is 20 people.
examples.cn: 研讨会参与人数的上限是20人。

examples.en: The hotel is located in the heart of downtown.
examples.cn: 这家酒店位于市中心的中心地带。

examples.en: They live in the heart of the forest, far from any city.
examples.cn: 他们住在森林的中心，远离任何城市。

examples.en: Trust is in the heart of any strong relationship.
examples.cn: 信任是任何牢固关系的核心。

examples.en: The issue lies in the heart of the debate.
examples.cn: 这个问题是辩论的核心。

examples.en: Vandals set fire to the abandoned building.
examples.cn: 破坏者放火烧了那栋废弃的建筑。

examples.en: He accidentally set fire to the papers while lighting a candle.
examples.cn: 他点蜡烛时不小心点燃了文件。

examples.en: In comparison to last year, sales have increased by 10%.
examples.cn: 与去年相比，销售额增长了10%。

examples.en: This car is very efficient in comparison to older models.
examples.cn: 与旧型号相比，这辆车非常高效。

examples.en: Please hold up your hand if you have a question.
examples.cn: 如果你有问题，请举手。

examples.en: The pillars hold up the entire structure of the building.
examples.cn: 这些柱子支撑着整栋建筑的结构。

examples.en: Traffic held up our journey for an hour.
examples.cn: 交通使我们的旅程延迟了一个小时。

examples.en: The bad weather held up the delivery of the packages.
examples.cn: 恶劣天气阻碍了包裹的投递。

examples.en: The masked men held up the bank at gunpoint.
examples.cn: 蒙面男子持枪抢劫了银行。

examples.en: He was arrested for holding up a convenience store.
examples.cn: 他因抢劫便利店而被捕。

examples.en: The melting point of ice is 0 degrees Celsius.
examples.cn: 冰的熔点是0摄氏度。

examples.en: Different metals have different melting points.
examples.cn: 不同的金属有不同的熔点。

examples.en: I need to cash the cheque at the bank today.
examples.cn: 我今天需要去银行兑现支票。

examples.en: You can cash the cheque at any branch of this bank.
examples.cn: 你可以在这家银行的任何分行兑现支票。

examples.en: After the massage, I felt completely relaxed.
examples.cn: 按摩后，我感到完全放松了。

examples.en: Listening to music helps me feel relaxed after a long day.
examples.cn: 听音乐帮助我在漫长的一天后感到放松。

examples.en: Let's start the ball rolling by introducing ourselves.
examples.cn: 让我们通过自我介绍来开始吧。

examples.en: She started the ball rolling on the project by sending out the first email.
examples.cn: 她通过发送第一封电子邮件启动了项目。

examples.en: She can cook dinner and help the kids with homework at the same time.
examples.cn: 她可以同时做晚餐和帮助孩子们做作业。

examples.en: The two events happened at the same time in different cities.
examples.cn: 这两个事件在不同城市同时发生。

examples.en: He is very talented, but at the same time, he needs to work harder.
examples.cn: 他很有天赋，然而，他需要更加努力。

examples.en: The plan is ambitious; at the same time, it is achievable.
examples.cn: 这个计划很有野心；另一方面，它是可以实现的。

examples.en: By studying harder, she got the advantage over her classmates.
examples.cn: 通过更努力学习，她胜过了她的同学。

examples.en: The team got the advantage over their rivals by scoring early in the game.
examples.cn: 球队通过在比赛早期得分占得了对手的上风。

definitions.meaning_cn: 震惊价值，指通过令人震惊的内容来吸引注意或产生效果

examples.en: The artist used graphic imagery for its shock value to provoke discussion.
examples.cn: 这位艺术家使用生动的图像以其震惊价值来引发讨论。

examples.en: The advertisement relied on shock value to stand out in a crowded market.
examples.cn: 这则广告依靠震惊价值在拥挤的市场中脱颖而出。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put one's foot in one's mouth

definitions.meaning_cn: 说错话，失言，无意中说了冒犯或愚蠢的话

examples.en: He really put his foot in his mouth when he joked about the boss's mistake.
examples.cn: 当他拿老板的错误开玩笑时，他真的说错话了。

examples.en: I put my foot in my mouth by accidentally revealing the surprise party.
examples.cn: 我不小心透露了惊喜派对，真是失言了。

examples.en: Please turn off the lights when you leave the room.
examples.cn: 离开房间时请关灯。

examples.en: She turned off the TV to focus on her homework.
examples.cn: 她关掉电视以专注于作业。

examples.en: His rude behavior really turned me off.
examples.cn: 他粗鲁的行为真的让我反感。

examples.en: The messy presentation turned off potential investors.
examples.cn: 混乱的演示让潜在投资者失去了兴趣。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put the cart before the horse

definitions.meaning_cn: 本末倒置，做事顺序颠倒

examples.en: Planning the party before inviting guests is putting the cart before the horse.
examples.cn: 在邀请客人之前计划派对是本末倒置。

examples.en: He's buying furniture before he even has a house—that's putting the cart before the horse.
examples.cn: 他连房子都没有就在买家具——这真是本末倒置。

definitions.meaning_cn: 室内设计师，负责规划和设计室内空间的专业人士

examples.en: The interior designer suggested using light colors to make the room feel larger.
examples.cn: 室内设计师建议使用浅色让房间感觉更大。

examples.en: She hired an interior designer to renovate her apartment.
examples.cn: 她雇了一位室内设计师来翻新她的公寓。

examples.en: The child clung on to his mother's hand in the crowded mall.
examples.cn: 在拥挤的商场里，孩子紧紧抓住妈妈的手。

examples.en: She clings on to old memories even though they make her sad.
examples.cn: 她紧紧抓住旧的记忆，即使它们让她伤心。

definitions.meaning_cn: 支付抵押贷款，定期偿还购房贷款

examples.en: They pay a mortgage of $1,500 every month for their house.
examples.cn: 他们每月支付1500美元的抵押贷款来供房。

examples.en: It's important to budget carefully to pay a mortgage on time.
examples.cn: 仔细预算以按时支付抵押贷款很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 低密度社区，人口或建筑密度较低的区域

examples.en: Low-density neighbourhoods often have more green spaces and larger yards.
examples.cn: 低密度社区通常有更多的绿地和更大的院子。

examples.en: Many people prefer low-density neighbourhoods for their quiet and privacy.
examples.cn: 许多人更喜欢低密度社区，因为它们安静且私密。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被...打断或点缀，指事件或过程中有间歇性的插入

examples.en: The lecture was punctuated by frequent questions from the audience.
examples.cn: 讲座被观众频繁的提问打断。

examples.en: Her speech was punctuated by moments of silence for emphasis.
examples.cn: 她的演讲被强调性的沉默时刻点缀。

definitions.meaning_cn: 逃跑，赶紧跑开，通常指在紧急情况下

examples.en: When the alarm sounded, they decided to make a run for it.
examples.cn: 警报响起时，他们决定逃跑。

examples.en: He made a run for it as soon as he saw the police approaching.
examples.cn: 他一看到警察靠近就赶紧跑开了。

examples.en: We spent the afternoon wandering about the old town.
examples.cn: 我们下午在古镇闲逛。

examples.en: He likes to wander about in the park to clear his mind.
examples.cn: 他喜欢在公园里闲逛以清空思绪。

examples.en: The balloon floated in the air for hours.
examples.cn: 气球在空中漂浮了几个小时。

examples.en: Birds fly in the air with ease.
examples.cn: 鸟儿在空中轻松飞翔。

examples.en: The decision is still in the air until the meeting next week.
examples.cn: 决定仍然悬而未决，直到下周的会议。

examples.en: There's a sense of excitement in the air before the festival.
examples.cn: 节日前有一种兴奋感弥漫在空气中。

definitions.meaning_cn: 用言语表达，将想法或感受说出来

examples.en: It's hard to put my gratitude into words.
examples.cn: 很难用言语表达我的感激之情。

examples.en: She finally put her fears into words during the therapy session.
examples.cn: 在治疗期间，她终于用言语表达了自己的恐惧。

examples.en: You should take advantage of the discount before it expires.
examples.cn: 你应该在折扣过期前利用它。

examples.en: He took advantage of the sunny weather to go for a hike.
examples.cn: 他利用晴朗的天气去远足。

examples.en: It's wrong to take advantage of someone's kindness.
examples.cn: 占某人善良的便宜是错误的。

examples.en: The company was accused of taking advantage of its workers.
examples.cn: 这家公司被指控剥削工人。

definitions.meaning_cn: 冷落某人，故意不理睬或冷淡对待

examples.en: After the argument, she gave him the cold shoulder for days.
examples.cn: 争吵后，她冷落了他好几天。

examples.en: He felt hurt when his friends gave him the cold shoulder at the party.
examples.cn: 当朋友们在派对上冷落他时，他感到受伤。

definitions.meaning_cn: 实验站，进行科学实验或研究的设施

examples.en: The agricultural experimental station tests new crop varieties.
examples.cn: 农业实验站测试新的作物品种。

examples.en: Researchers at the experimental station are studying climate change effects.
examples.cn: 实验站的研究人员正在研究气候变化的影响。

definitions.meaning_cn: 加上，与...结合，表示附加因素

examples.en: His talent, coupled with hard work, led to his success.
examples.cn: 他的天赋加上努力工作，导致了他的成功。

examples.en: The high cost, coupled with the long commute, made her reconsider the job offer.
examples.cn: 高成本加上长通勤时间，让她重新考虑这份工作邀请。

examples.en: It's pointless to argue with someone who won't listen.
examples.cn: 与一个不听的人争论是徒劳的。

examples.en: She often argues with her brother over trivial matters.
examples.cn: 她经常和哥哥为琐事争吵。

definitions.meaning_cn: 青一块紫一块，指身体因受伤而瘀伤

examples.en: After the fall, his leg was black and blue.
examples.cn: 摔倒后，他的腿青一块紫一块。

examples.en: The boxer was black and blue after the intense match.
examples.cn: 激烈的比赛后，拳击手身上青一块紫一块。

examples.en: He was the last person to leave the building.
examples.cn: 他是最后一个离开大楼的人。

examples.en: This is the last piece of cake.
examples.cn: 这是最后一块蛋糕。

examples.en: She finished in last place in the race.
examples.cn: 她在比赛中获得了最后一名。

examples.en: The last of the guests have departed.
examples.cn: 最后的客人已经离开了。

examples.en: I saw him last week.
examples.cn: 我上周见过他。

examples.en: She spoke last at the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议上最后发言。

examples.en: She has five years of working experience in marketing.
examples.cn: 她有五年的市场营销工作经验。

examples.en: This job requires prior working experience in the field.
examples.cn: 这份工作要求有该领域的先前工作经验。

examples.en: He made a comment about the new policy.
examples.cn: 他对新政策发表了评论。

examples.en: Please feel free to make a comment on the proposal.
examples.cn: 请随意对提案发表评论。

examples.en: The public turned against the politician after the scandal.
examples.cn: 丑闻后，公众反对这位政治家。

examples.en: He turned against his former allies.
examples.cn: 他背叛了以前的盟友。

examples.en: Despite early setbacks, she got the last laugh by winning the competition.
examples.cn: 尽管早期遇到挫折，她通过赢得比赛笑到了最后。

examples.en: He was mocked at first, but he got the last laugh when his idea succeeded.
examples.cn: 他起初被嘲笑，但当他的想法成功时，他笑到了最后。

examples.en: She gave a brief introduction to the topic.
examples.cn: 她对主题做了简要介绍。

examples.en: The book includes a brief introduction to each chapter.
examples.cn: 这本书包括每章的简要介绍。

examples.en: He hopes to find employment in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 他希望在科技行业找到工作。

examples.en: After graduating, she quickly found employment at a local firm.
examples.cn: 毕业后，她很快在当地一家公司找到了工作。

examples.en: We go hiking once in a while.
examples.cn: 我们偶尔去远足。

examples.en: He visits his grandparents once in a while.
examples.cn: 他偶尔去看望他的祖父母。

examples.en: Please pay attention to the instructions.
examples.cn: 请注意指示。

examples.en: She didn't pay attention to the warning signs.
examples.cn: 她没有注意警告标志。

examples.en: One dollar is equivalent to about 7 yuan.
examples.cn: 一美元大约相当于7元人民币。

examples.en: This certificate is equivalent to a bachelor's degree.
examples.cn: 这个证书等同于学士学位。

examples.en: The ozone layer protects Earth from harmful UV rays.
examples.cn: 臭氧层保护地球免受有害紫外线的伤害。

examples.en: Pollution has caused damage to the ozone layer.
examples.cn: 污染对臭氧层造成了损害。

examples.en: Her talent is without compare in the industry.
examples.cn: 她的才华在行业中无与伦比。

examples.en: The beauty of the landscape is without compare.
examples.cn: 风景之美无可比拟。

examples.en: They cut corners to finish the project quickly, but the quality suffered.
examples.cn: 他们为了快速完成项目而偷工减料，但质量受损了。

examples.en: Don't cut corners when it comes to safety.
examples.cn: 在安全问题上不要走捷径。

examples.en: He spends hours in front of a screen every day.
examples.cn: 他每天花几个小时在屏幕前。

examples.en: Children should limit their time in front of a screen.
examples.cn: 孩子们应该限制在屏幕前的时间。

examples.en: We strive to provide excellent customer service.
examples.cn: 我们努力提供优质的客户服务。

examples.en: She strives to improve her skills every day.
examples.cn: 她每天努力提升自己的技能。

examples.en: He acted in the knowledge of the risks involved.
examples.cn: 他在知道涉及风险的情况下采取了行动。

examples.en: She made the decision in the knowledge of all the facts.
examples.cn: 她在知道所有事实的情况下做出了决定。

examples.en: She exercises regularly to stay in shape.
examples.cn: 她定期锻炼以保持身体健康。

examples.en: After the injury, it took months for him to get back in shape.
examples.cn: 受伤后，他花了几个月才恢复状态。

examples.en: I haven't heard from him till now.
examples.cn: 直到现在我还没有收到他的消息。

examples.en: Till now, the project has been successful.
examples.cn: 直到现在，这个项目一直很成功。

examples.en: I prefer instant coffee in the morning because it's quick to prepare.
examples.cn: 我早上更喜欢速溶咖啡，因为它准备起来很快。

examples.en: She always keeps a jar of instant coffee in her office for emergencies.
examples.cn: 她总是在办公室里放一罐速溶咖啡以备不时之需。

examples.en: The government provides financial help to low-income families.
examples.cn: 政府向低收入家庭提供经济援助。

examples.en: He applied for financial help from the university to cover his tuition fees.
examples.cn: 他向大学申请经济援助以支付学费。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将某物带回或归还到某处

examples.en: Please bring the book back to the library by Friday.
examples.cn: 请在周五前把书带回图书馆。

examples.en: She brought the conversation back to the main topic.
examples.cn: 她把对话带回到主要话题上。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使回忆起或联想到某事

examples.en: The old song brings me back to my childhood.
examples.cn: 这首老歌让我回忆起童年。

examples.en: The smell of rain brings back memories of summer vacations.
examples.cn: 雨的味道让我联想到暑假的回忆。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为现代建筑让路或腾出空间

examples.en: The old houses were demolished to make way for modern buildings.
examples.cn: 旧房子被拆除，为现代建筑让路。

examples.en: The city is making way for modern buildings to attract more businesses.
examples.cn: 这座城市正在为现代建筑腾出空间以吸引更多企业。

examples.en: The car moved forward slowly in the traffic jam.
examples.cn: 汽车在交通堵塞中缓慢向前移动。

examples.en: Please move forward in the queue to make space for others.
examples.cn: 请在队列中向前移动，为其他人腾出空间。

examples.en: After the setback, the team decided to move forward with the project.
examples.cn: 挫折之后，团队决定继续推进这个项目。

examples.en: It's important to learn from past mistakes and move forward in life.
examples.cn: 从过去的错误中学习并在生活中继续前进是很重要的。

examples.en: He is bad at math and often needs extra help.
examples.cn: 他不擅长数学，经常需要额外帮助。

examples.en: I'm bad at remembering names, so I use a notebook.
examples.cn: 我不擅长记住名字，所以我用笔记本。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have a free hand with sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事有自由处理权或不受限制

examples.en: The manager gave her a free hand with the new marketing campaign.
examples.cn: 经理让她自由处理新的营销活动。

examples.en: He has a free hand with the budget, so he can make decisions quickly.
examples.cn: 他对预算有自由处理权，因此可以快速做出决定。

examples.en: I've got to finish this report by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我必须在明天之前完成这份报告。

examples.en: You've got to see that movie; it's amazing!
examples.cn: 你必须看那部电影；它太棒了！

definitions.meaning_cn: 揭露或使某事为人所知

examples.en: The investigation brought to light new evidence in the case.
examples.cn: 调查揭露了案件中的新证据。

examples.en: The documentary brought to light the struggles of endangered species.
examples.cn: 这部纪录片揭示了濒危物种的困境。

examples.en: There is a generation gap between my parents and me regarding technology use.
examples.cn: 在技术使用方面，我和父母之间存在代沟。

examples.en: The generation gap often leads to misunderstandings in families.
examples.cn: 代沟常常导致家庭中的误解。

examples.en: The company will come out with a new smartphone next month.
examples.cn: 这家公司下个月将推出一款新智能手机。

examples.en: She came out with a book that became a bestseller.
examples.cn: 她出版了一本成为畅销书的书。

examples.en: He suddenly came out with a surprising confession.
examples.cn: 他突然说出了令人惊讶的坦白。

examples.en: During the meeting, she came out with a brilliant idea.
examples.cn: 在会议期间，她说出了一个绝妙的主意。

examples.en: The child tried to catch at the balloon as it floated away.
examples.cn: 孩子试图抓住飘走的气球。

examples.en: He caught at the rope to prevent himself from falling.
examples.cn: 他抓住绳子以防止自己摔倒。

examples.en: She caught at the chance to study abroad.
examples.cn: 她抓住了出国留学的机会。

examples.en: Entrepreneurs should catch at new market trends.
examples.cn: 企业家应该抓住新的市场趋势。

examples.en: Despite difficulties, they carried through the plan successfully.
examples.cn: 尽管有困难，他们成功地完成了这个计划。

examples.en: He carried through his promise to donate to charity.
examples.cn: 他贯彻了向慈善机构捐款的承诺。

definitions.meaning_cn: 支持或帮助某人度过困难

examples.en: Her friends carried her through the tough times.
examples.cn: 她的朋友们帮助她度过了艰难时期。

examples.en: The team's spirit carried them through the competition.
examples.cn: 团队的精神支持他们度过了比赛。

definitions.meaning_cn: 忙于某事或手头有很多事要做

examples.en: She has her hands full with three young children.
examples.cn: 她忙于照顾三个年幼的孩子。

examples.en: I have my hands full with work this week, so I can't go out.
examples.cn: 我这周工作很忙，所以不能出去。

definitions.meaning_cn: 有点疯狂或精神不正常

examples.en: He must have a screw loose to think that plan will work.
examples.cn: 他一定是疯了才会认为那个计划会成功。

examples.en: After hearing his bizarre story, I thought he had a screw loose.
examples.cn: 听完他离奇的故事后，我觉得他精神不正常。

examples.en: The activists struggle against environmental pollution.
examples.cn: 活动家们与环境污染作斗争。

examples.en: He struggled against his illness for years before recovering.
examples.cn: 他与疾病斗争了多年才康复。

examples.en: I am tired of eating the same food every day.
examples.cn: 我对每天吃同样的食物感到厌倦。

examples.en: She is tired of waiting for his response.
examples.cn: 她对等待他的回应感到厌倦。

examples.en: To live a healthy life, she exercises regularly and eats balanced meals.
examples.cn: 为了过健康的生活，她定期锻炼并吃均衡的饮食。

examples.en: He decided to live a healthy life by quitting smoking and reducing stress.
examples.cn: 他决定通过戒烟和减轻压力来过健康的生活。

examples.en: We stopped to admire the scenery from the mountain top.
examples.cn: 我们停下来欣赏山顶的风景。

examples.en: She loves to admire the scenery while hiking in the countryside.
examples.cn: 她喜欢在乡村徒步时欣赏风景。

examples.en: Please send the document via email by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 请明天前通过电子邮件发送文件。

examples.en: We confirmed the meeting details via email.
examples.cn: 我们通过电子邮件确认了会议细节。

examples.en: You can use a mobile phone to make calls and send texts.
examples.cn: 你可以用手机打电话和发短信。

examples.en: It's important to use a mobile phone responsibly while driving.
examples.cn: 开车时负责任地使用手机很重要。

examples.en: Pollution can damage the beautiful landscape of our national parks.
examples.cn: 污染会破坏我们国家公园的美丽风景。

examples.en: Construction projects should avoid damaging the beautiful landscape.
examples.cn: 建设项目应避免破坏美丽的风景。

examples.en: I thought it would rain, and sure enough, it started pouring.
examples.cn: 我以为会下雨，果然开始下大雨了。

examples.en: He predicted the team would win, and sure enough, they did.
examples.cn: 他预测球队会赢，确实他们赢了。

examples.en: We camped in sight of the mountain peak.
examples.cn: 我们在山峰的视线范围内扎营。

examples.en: Keep the emergency exit in sight of all employees.
examples.cn: 让所有员工都能看到紧急出口。

examples.en: I meant to call you, but it completely slipped my mind.
examples.cn: 我本想给你打电话，但完全忘记了。

examples.en: Don't let important deadlines slip your mind.
examples.cn: 不要让重要的截止日期被疏忽。

examples.en: News reports indicated a rise in unemployment rates.
examples.cn: 新闻报道显示失业率上升。

examples.en: I rely on news reports to stay informed about current events.
examples.cn: 我依靠新闻报道来了解时事。

examples.en: He took his daughter in his arms after a long trip.
examples.cn: 长途旅行后，他拥抱了他的女儿。

examples.en: She took the crying child in her arms to comfort him.
examples.cn: 她拥抱哭泣的孩子来安慰他。

examples.en: Many students receive vocational training to prepare for specific careers.
examples.cn: 许多学生接受职业培训为特定职业做准备。

examples.en: The company offers employees the chance to receive vocational training.
examples.cn: 公司为员工提供接受职业培训的机会。

examples.en: Hundreds of people attended the concert last night.
examples.cn: 昨晚有数百人参加了音乐会。

examples.en: There are hundreds of different species in this forest.
examples.cn: 这片森林里有成百上千种不同的物种。

examples.en: Many patients suffer with chronic pain for years.
examples.cn: 许多患者多年来遭受慢性疼痛之苦。

examples.en: She suffers with anxiety during stressful situations.
examples.cn: 她在压力情况下忍受焦虑。

examples.en: What if we miss the train? We should leave early.
examples.cn: 如果我们错过火车会怎样？我们应该早点出发。

examples.en: What if it rains tomorrow? We need a backup plan.
examples.cn: 如果明天下雨会怎样？我们需要一个备用计划。

examples.en: The new product took the market by storm with its innovative features.
examples.cn: 新产品以其创新功能迅速征服了市场。

examples.en: The band took the music scene by storm after their debut album.
examples.cn: 这支乐队在首张专辑后风靡了音乐界。

examples.en: I take issue with your interpretation of the data.
examples.cn: 我对你数据的解释有异议。

examples.en: She took issue with the manager's decision during the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议上对经理的决定提出了争论。

examples.en: We need a quantity of paper for the printing job.
examples.cn: 我们需要一定数量的纸来完成印刷工作。

examples.en: A quantity of food was donated to the shelter.
examples.cn: 一些食物被捐赠给了收容所。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take off one's hat to sb.

examples.en: I take off my hat to the volunteers for their hard work.
examples.cn: 我向志愿者的辛勤工作致敬。

examples.en: We should take off our hats to the medical staff during the pandemic.
examples.cn: 疫情期间，我们应该向医护人员表示钦佩。

definitions.meaning_cn: 居于次要地位，充当配角

examples.en: In that company, marketing plays second fiddle to sales.
examples.cn: 在那家公司，营销居于销售的次要地位。

examples.en: He didn't want to play second fiddle to his more famous colleague.
examples.cn: 他不想为他更著名的同事充当配角。

examples.en: Prices are high relative to average incomes in this city.
examples.cn: 相对于这个城市的平均收入，价格很高。

examples.en: Her success is relative to the effort she puts in.
examples.cn: 她的成功与她付出的努力相关。

examples.en: The cat likes to jump on the sofa to nap.
examples.cn: 猫喜欢跳上沙发小睡。

examples.en: Investors jumped on the chance to buy stocks at a low price.
examples.cn: 投资者迅速抓住机会以低价购买股票。

examples.en: I have no idea where she went after the party.
examples.cn: 我不知道派对后她去了哪里。

examples.en: He had no idea how to solve the complex math problem.
examples.cn: 他对如何解决这个复杂的数学问题毫无头绪。

examples.en: Many countries have strict regulations for labeling GM food.
examples.cn: 许多国家对转基因食品的标签有严格规定。

examples.en: The debate over GM food safety continues among scientists.
examples.cn: 关于转基因食品安全的争论在科学家中持续进行。

examples.en: The team reached a consensus on the project timeline.
examples.cn: 团队就项目时间表达成了共识。

examples.en: There is broad consensus on the need for environmental protection.
examples.cn: 关于环境保护的必要性存在广泛共识。

examples.en: Solar and wind power are popular alternative energy sources.
examples.cn: 太阳能和风能是流行的替代能源。

examples.en: Investing in alternative energy sources can reduce carbon emissions.
examples.cn: 投资替代能源可以减少碳排放。

examples.en: The dam uses water flow to generate electricity.
examples.cn: 大坝利用水流发电。

examples.en: Solar panels generate electricity from sunlight.
examples.cn: 太阳能电池板利用阳光发电。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人解决某事（通常指争论或问题）

examples.en: I need to have it out with my roommate about the noise.
examples.cn: 我需要和室友解决噪音问题。

examples.en: They decided to have their differences out with a calm discussion.
examples.cn: 他们决定通过冷静讨论来解决分歧。

definitions.meaning_cn: 公制尺（以厘米和毫米为单位）

examples.en: Use a metric ruler to measure the length in centimeters.
examples.cn: 使用公制尺以厘米为单位测量长度。

examples.en: The metric ruler is essential for science experiments.
examples.cn: 公制尺对科学实验至关重要。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put all one's eggs in one basket

definitions.meaning_cn: 孤注一掷；把所有资源投入一个地方

examples.en: Investing all your money in one stock is like putting all your eggs in one basket.
examples.cn: 把所有钱投资在一只股票上就像孤注一掷。

examples.en: Diversify your investments to avoid putting all your eggs in one basket.
examples.cn: 分散投资以避免孤注一掷。

examples.en: She promised to see the project through to completion.
examples.cn: 她承诺坚持完成这个项目。

examples.en: It's important to see your commitments through.
examples.cn: 坚持完成你的承诺很重要。

examples.en: We need to lock in the prices before they increase.
examples.cn: 我们需要在价格上涨前锁定价格。

examples.en: The contract locks in the terms for five years.
examples.cn: 合同锁定了五年的条款。

examples.en: The children are eager for the holiday to begin.
examples.cn: 孩子们渴望假期开始。

examples.en: She is eager for new challenges in her career.
examples.cn: 她渴望职业生涯中的新挑战。

examples.en: The eyes and ears are important sensory organs.
examples.cn: 眼睛和耳朵是重要的感觉器官。

examples.en: Sensory organs help organisms interact with their environment.
examples.cn: 感觉器官帮助生物体与环境互动。

examples.en: The chef serves the steak with roasted vegetables.
examples.cn: 厨师将牛排与烤蔬菜一起提供。

examples.en: Coffee is often served with milk and sugar.
examples.cn: 咖啡通常与牛奶和糖一起提供。

examples.en: Please write down the instructions for reference.
examples.cn: 请写下说明以供参考。

examples.en: He wrote down his thoughts in a journal.
examples.cn: 他在日记中写下了自己的想法。

examples.en: Book your tickets in advance to get a discount.
examples.cn: 提前预订门票以获得折扣。

examples.en: She prepared the materials in advance of the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议前提前准备了材料。

examples.en: Compost is made from decomposed organic material.
examples.cn: 堆肥由分解的有机材料制成。

examples.en: Organic material in soil improves plant growth.
examples.cn: 土壤中的有机材料促进植物生长。

examples.en: Fill the glass with water.
examples.cn: 用水填满玻璃杯。

examples.en: The room filled with laughter during the party.
examples.cn: 派对期间房间里充满了笑声。

examples.en: He managed to bring her around to his point of view.
examples.cn: 他设法说服她接受他的观点。

examples.en: The doctor brought the patient around after the surgery.
examples.cn: 手术后医生使病人恢复了意识。

examples.en: Owls are nocturnal animals that hunt at night.
examples.cn: 猫头鹰是夜间狩猎的夜行动物。

examples.en: Nocturnal animals have adapted to low-light conditions.
examples.cn: 夜行动物已经适应了低光条件。

examples.en: She has a food allergy to peanuts.
examples.cn: 她对花生有食物过敏。

examples.en: Food allergies can cause severe reactions in some people.
examples.cn: 食物过敏在某些人中可能引起严重反应。

examples.en: Her eyes gleamed with excitement.
examples.cn: 她的眼睛闪烁着兴奋的光芒。

examples.en: The polished metal gleamed with a bright shine.
examples.cn: 抛光的金属闪烁着明亮的光泽。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...相比，用于比较两个事物

examples.en: Compared to last year, sales have increased by 20%.
examples.cn: 与去年相比，销售额增长了20%。

examples.en: This car is much faster compared to the older model.
examples.cn: 与旧型号相比，这辆车快得多。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...互动，进行交流或相互影响

examples.en: Children need to interact with their peers to develop social skills.
examples.cn: 孩子们需要与同龄人互动以发展社交技能。

examples.en: The software allows users to interact with the interface easily.
examples.cn: 该软件允许用户轻松与界面互动。

examples.en: Many people are scared of public speaking.
examples.cn: 许多人害怕公开演讲。

examples.en: She is scared of spiders and always asks someone to remove them.
examples.cn: 她害怕蜘蛛，总是请别人把它们弄走。

definitions.meaning_cn: 首先，最初，用于强调事情的起点或原因

examples.en: Why did you invite him in the first place if you didn't want him here?
examples.cn: 如果你不想让他来，为什么一开始要邀请他？

examples.en: We should have planned the trip better in the first place.
examples.cn: 我们一开始就应该更好地计划这次旅行。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...有联系或关联，常用于描述关系或网络

examples.en: The company has links with several international partners.
examples.cn: 这家公司与几个国际合作伙伴有联系。

examples.en: He is suspected to have links with criminal organizations.
examples.cn: 他被怀疑与犯罪组织有联系。

definitions.meaning_cn: 可以说，在某种程度上，用于缓和或修饰陈述

examples.en: He is, as it were, the heart and soul of the team.
examples.cn: 他可以说是团队的核心和灵魂。

examples.en: The old building stands, as it were, as a monument to history.
examples.cn: 这座旧建筑在某种程度上是历史的纪念碑。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在舞台上，指表演或戏剧环境

examples.en: She felt nervous the first time she performed on the stage.
examples.cn: 她第一次在舞台上表演时感到紧张。

examples.en: The actor has spent decades on the stage and is highly respected.
examples.cn: 这位演员在舞台上度过了数十年，备受尊敬。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对抗肥胖，采取措施减少或预防肥胖

examples.en: Governments are implementing policies to combat obesity in children.
examples.cn: 政府正在实施政策以对抗儿童肥胖。

examples.en: Regular exercise and a balanced diet are key to combat obesity.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼和均衡饮食是对抗肥胖的关键。

definitions.meaning_cn: 鼻子堵塞，通常由感冒或过敏引起

examples.en: I can't sleep well when I have a stuffed nose from a cold.
examples.cn: 当我因感冒鼻子堵塞时，我睡不好觉。

examples.en: Allergies often cause her to have a stuffed nose in the spring.
examples.cn: 过敏常常使她在春天鼻子堵塞。

definitions.meaning_cn: 阅读速度慢的人，可能指阅读能力或习惯

examples.en: As a slow reader, he takes longer to finish books but enjoys them thoroughly.
examples.cn: 作为一个阅读速度慢的人，他需要更长时间读完书，但充分享受阅读。

examples.en: Teachers provide extra support for slow readers in the classroom.
examples.cn: 老师在课堂上为阅读速度慢的学生提供额外支持。

examples.en: On hot days, we often go for a swim at the local pool.
examples.cn: 在炎热的日子里，我们经常去当地游泳池游泳。

examples.en: She likes to go for a swim in the ocean to relax.
examples.cn: 她喜欢去海里游泳以放松身心。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...合作进行游戏或活动，强调协作

examples.en: The children learned to play in cooperation with each other during the game.
examples.cn: 孩子们在游戏中学会了彼此合作玩耍。

examples.en: The team will play in cooperation with local clubs to organize the event.
examples.cn: 该团队将与当地俱乐部合作组织活动。

definitions.meaning_cn: 维持终身关系，指长期保持联系或友谊

examples.en: They have managed to maintain a lifelong relationship despite living in different countries.
examples.cn: 尽管生活在不同的国家，他们设法维持了终身关系。

examples.en: It takes effort and communication to maintain a lifelong relationship with friends.
examples.cn: 与朋友维持终身关系需要努力和沟通。

definitions.meaning_cn: 本身，就其本身而言，用于强调事物的内在性质

examples.en: The idea in itself is good, but the execution needs improvement.
examples.cn: 这个想法本身是好的，但执行需要改进。

examples.en: Learning a new language is challenging in itself, but also rewarding.
examples.cn: 学习一门新语言本身具有挑战性，但也很有回报。

definitions.meaning_cn: 会有大麻烦，面临严重后果

examples.en: If you break that vase, you'll have hell to pay with your parents.
examples.cn: 如果你打碎那个花瓶，你会有大麻烦，父母会严厉惩罚你。

examples.en: He knew he would have hell to pay for missing the important meeting.
examples.cn: 他知道错过重要会议会有大麻烦。

definitions.meaning_cn: 以...为傲，对自己在某方面的成就感到自豪

examples.en: She prides herself upon her ability to speak multiple languages fluently.
examples.cn: 她以自己能流利说多种语言为傲。

examples.en: The company prides itself upon providing excellent customer service.
examples.cn: 这家公司以提供优质的客户服务为傲。

definitions.meaning_cn: 孤独感，感到孤立或缺乏陪伴的情感

examples.en: Moving to a new city often brings a sense of loneliness until you make friends.
examples.cn: 搬到一个新城市常常会带来孤独感，直到你交到朋友。

examples.en: Despite being surrounded by people, he sometimes experiences a sense of loneliness.
examples.cn: 尽管被人群包围，他有时会感到孤独。

definitions.meaning_cn: 继续前进，依赖于，或指乘坐交通工具

examples.en: The success of the project rides on the team's ability to meet deadlines.
examples.cn: 项目的成功依赖于团队按时完成任务的能力。

examples.en: We decided to ride on the bus to save time in traffic.
examples.cn: 我们决定乘坐公交车以节省交通时间。

definitions.meaning_cn: 非财务因素，指除金钱外的其他考虑因素，如环境或社会影响

examples.en: When making investment decisions, it's important to consider non-financial factors like sustainability.
examples.cn: 在做投资决策时，考虑可持续性等非财务因素很重要。

examples.en: Employee satisfaction is a key non-financial factor in company performance.
examples.cn: 员工满意度是公司绩效的一个关键非财务因素。

examples.en: At the worst, we'll have to postpone the trip until next month.
examples.cn: 在最坏的情况下，我们不得不将旅行推迟到下个月。

examples.en: Even at the worst, the company can still survive with some restructuring.
examples.cn: 即使在最坏的情况下，公司通过一些重组仍能生存。

examples.en: The police suspect him of stealing the valuable painting.
examples.cn: 警方怀疑他偷了那幅珍贵的画。

examples.en: I suspect her of lying about her qualifications on the resume.
examples.cn: 我怀疑她在简历上关于资历的说法不实。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take a load off one's feet

definitions.meaning_cn: 坐下休息，尤指长时间站立后

examples.en: After walking all day, I need to take a load off my feet.
examples.cn: 走了一整天后，我需要坐下休息一下。

examples.en: Come in and take a load off your feet; you must be tired from work.
examples.cn: 进来坐下休息吧，你工作一定很累了。

examples.en: Kepler's laws describe the planetary motions in our solar system.
examples.cn: 开普勒定律描述了太阳系中的行星运动。

examples.en: Scientists study planetary motions to understand gravitational forces.
examples.cn: 科学家研究行星运动以理解引力作用。

examples.en: She was on the point of leaving when the phone rang.
examples.cn: 她正要离开时电话响了。

examples.en: The project is on the point of completion after months of hard work.
examples.cn: 经过数月的努力，这个项目即将完成。

definitions.meaning_cn: 不损害合法权利，常用于法律语境表示保留权利

examples.en: The offer is made without prejudice to our right to pursue further claims.
examples.cn: 此提议不影响我们进一步索赔的权利。

examples.en: They settled the dispute without prejudice, allowing future negotiations.
examples.cn: 他们无损害地解决了争议，为未来谈判留有余地。

examples.en: It took me a while to get the hang of using this new software.
examples.cn: 我花了一些时间才掌握了使用这个新软件的窍门。

examples.en: Once you get the hang of driving a manual car, it becomes easy.
examples.cn: 一旦你掌握了开手动挡汽车的窍门，就会变得容易。

examples.en: This job offers excellent career prospects with opportunities for advancement.
examples.cn: 这份工作提供了极佳的职业前景，有晋升机会。

examples.en: She considered the career prospects before accepting the position abroad.
examples.cn: 她在接受国外职位前考虑了职业前景。

examples.en: The rumor quickly went the round of the office.
examples.cn: 谣言很快在办公室里传开了。

examples.en: News of the promotion went the round of the company in no time.
examples.cn: 晋升的消息立刻在公司里传遍了。

examples.en: The government is trying to hold inflation in check with new policies.
examples.cn: 政府正试图通过新政策控制通货膨胀。

examples.en: She held her emotions in check during the difficult meeting.
examples.cn: 在艰难的会议中，她抑制住了自己的情绪。

examples.en: The discussion revolved around the new marketing strategy.
examples.cn: 讨论围绕着新的营销策略展开。

examples.en: Her life revolves around her family and work.
examples.cn: 她的生活以家庭和工作为中心。

examples.en: He railed at the unfair treatment he received from his boss.
examples.cn: 他怒斥了老板对他的不公平待遇。

examples.en: She railed at the slow service in the restaurant.
examples.cn: 她抱怨餐厅服务太慢。

examples.en: Students must turn in their assignments by Friday.
examples.cn: 学生必须在周五前上交作业。

examples.en: He turned in his resignation letter yesterday.
examples.cn: 他昨天提交了辞职信。

examples.en: I'm tired; I think I'll turn in early tonight.
examples.cn: 我累了，今晚想早点睡觉。

examples.en: After the long journey, they turned in as soon as they got home.
examples.cn: 长途旅行后，他们一到家就去睡觉了。

examples.en: Despite the rain, we decided to press on with our hike.
examples.cn: 尽管下雨，我们决定继续徒步前进。

examples.en: The team pressed on with the project despite the challenges.
examples.cn: 尽管面临挑战，团队仍坚持不懈地推进项目。

examples.en: She enrolled in a diploma course in graphic design at the local college.
examples.cn: 她在当地学院报读了一个平面设计的文凭课程。

examples.en: This diploma course prepares students for careers in healthcare.
examples.cn: 这个文凭课程为学生从事医疗保健职业做准备。

examples.en: The artist used dark pigments to create a dramatic effect in the painting.
examples.cn: 艺术家使用深色颜料在画作中营造出戏剧性效果。

examples.en: Dark pigments like black and brown are common in traditional dyes.
examples.cn: 像黑色和棕色这样的深色颜料在传统染料中很常见。

examples.en: I decided to sign up for the yoga class starting next week.
examples.cn: 我决定报名参加下周开始的瑜伽课。

examples.en: He signed up for the marathon to raise money for charity.
examples.cn: 他报名参加马拉松为慈善筹款。

examples.en: Many students rely on a student loan to pay for their university tuition.
examples.cn: 许多学生依靠学生贷款支付大学学费。

examples.en: She applied for a student loan to cover her living expenses while studying.
examples.cn: 她申请了学生贷款以支付学习期间的生活费用。

examples.en: Air fares tend to be higher during the holiday season.
examples.cn: 节假日期间机票价格往往更高。

examples.en: We compared air fares from different airlines before booking our flight.
examples.cn: 我们在预订航班前比较了不同航空公司的机票价格。

examples.en: I'm busy at the moment, can I call you back later?
examples.cn: 我此刻很忙，可以稍后回电吗？

examples.en: At the moment, we have no vacancies in our department.
examples.cn: 目前我们部门没有空缺职位。

examples.en: You should take out insurance before your trip abroad.
examples.cn: 出国旅行前你应该购买保险。

examples.en: They took out insurance on their new house immediately after purchase.
examples.cn: 他们买下新房子后立即购买了保险。

examples.en: She bought the expensive dress on impulse and later regretted it.
examples.cn: 她冲动买下了那件昂贵的裙子，后来后悔了。

examples.en: Many people buy snacks on impulse while waiting in checkout lines.
examples.cn: 许多人在排队结账时会冲动购买零食。

examples.en: All their careful planning came to nothing when the project was canceled.
examples.cn: 项目取消后，他们所有的精心计划都无果而终。

examples.en: The negotiations came to nothing after both sides refused to compromise.
examples.cn: 双方拒绝妥协后，谈判以失败告终。

examples.en: She got all dolled up for her high school reunion.
examples.cn: 她为高中同学聚会精心打扮了一番。

examples.en: We're getting dolled up to go to the fancy restaurant tonight.
examples.cn: 我们今晚要精心打扮去那家高级餐厅。

examples.en: He was torn between accepting the job offer and staying with his current company.
examples.cn: 他在接受工作邀请和留在现任公司之间难以抉择。

examples.en: I'm torn between going to the beach or visiting the museum this weekend.
examples.cn: 这个周末我在去海滩和参观博物馆之间难以抉择。

examples.en: The elevation of his status came with increased responsibilities.
examples.cn: 他地位的提升伴随着责任的增加。

examples.en: The elevation of the platform made it easier for everyone to see.
examples.cn: 平台的升高让每个人都能更容易看到。

examples.en: The elevation of this mountain is over 3,000 meters.
examples.cn: 这座山的海拔高度超过3000米。

examples.en: Cities at high elevation often have cooler temperatures.
examples.cn: 高海拔城市通常气温较低。

examples.en: To my knowledge, the meeting has been postponed until next week.
examples.cn: 据我所知，会议已推迟到下周。

examples.en: To her knowledge, no one has ever solved this puzzle completely.
examples.cn: 据她所知，从未有人完全解开过这个谜题。

examples.en: I usually come home around 6 PM after work.
examples.cn: 我通常下班后晚上6点左右回家。

examples.en: The children were excited to come home for the holidays.
examples.cn: 孩子们很高兴回家过节。

examples.en: The importance of family finally came home to him after his father's illness.
examples.cn: 父亲生病后，家庭的重要性终于让他明白了。

examples.en: The reality of the situation came home when she saw the damage firsthand.
examples.cn: 当她亲眼看到损坏情况时，才真正明白了局势的严重性。

examples.en: I wouldn't trade places with anyone in the world right now.
examples.cn: 我现在不会和世界上任何人交换位置。

examples.en: Sometimes I wish I could trade places with my more successful sibling.
examples.cn: 有时我希望能和更成功的兄弟姐妹交换位置。

examples.en: She's always been keen on classical music.
examples.cn: 她一直对古典音乐很感兴趣。

examples.en: Are you keen on joining us for dinner tonight?
examples.cn: 你今晚有兴趣和我们一起吃晚饭吗？

examples.en: The city planning department uses aerial photographs to map urban development.
examples.cn: 城市规划部门使用航拍照片来绘制城市发展地图。

examples.en: This aerial photograph clearly shows the pattern of crop circles in the field.
examples.cn: 这张航拍照片清晰地显示了田地里麦田圈的图案。

examples.en: Our company will be exhibiting at the international trade show next month.
examples.cn: 我们公司将在下个月的国际贸易展览会上参展。

examples.en: The annual electronics trade show attracts buyers from around the world.
examples.cn: 年度电子贸易展览会吸引了来自世界各地的买家。

examples.en: The teacher singled out three students for special praise.
examples.cn: 老师特别表扬了三名学生。

examples.en: Why do you always single me out for criticism?
examples.cn: 你为什么总是单独批评我？

examples.en: We'll have to make do with what we have until the supplies arrive.
examples.cn: 在补给到达之前，我们只能凑合使用现有的东西。

examples.en: When the power went out, we made do with candles and flashlights.
examples.cn: 停电时，我们凑合使用蜡烛和手电筒。

examples.en: We plan to call on our grandparents this weekend.
examples.cn: 我们计划本周末去拜访祖父母。

examples.en: The sales representative calls on clients every Tuesday.
examples.cn: 销售代表每周二拜访客户。

examples.en: The president called on Congress to pass the legislation quickly.
examples.cn: 总统呼吁国会快速通过这项立法。

examples.en: I call on all citizens to participate in the community clean-up.
examples.cn: 我呼吁所有市民参与社区清洁活动。

examples.en: After months of losses, the company finally turned the corner and started making profits.
examples.cn: 经过数月的亏损，公司终于渡过难关开始盈利。

examples.en: The patient turned the corner yesterday and is now recovering well.
examples.cn: 病人昨天病情好转，现在恢复得很好。

examples.en: Children should do their homework before watching television.
examples.cn: 孩子们应该在看电视前做作业。

examples.en: I need to do my math homework before class tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我需要在明天上课前完成数学作业。

examples.en: Before investing, it's important to do your homework on the company.
examples.cn: 投资前，对公司做准备工作很重要。

examples.en: She did her homework thoroughly before the important negotiation.
examples.cn: 她在重要谈判前做了充分的准备工作。

examples.en: The two brothers finally made peace after years of arguing.
examples.cn: 经过多年的争吵，两兄弟终于和解了。

examples.en: The warring nations agreed to make peace and end the conflict.
examples.cn: 交战国家同意讲和并结束冲突。

examples.en: You should make peace with your past mistakes and move forward.
examples.cn: 你应该与过去的错误和解，继续前进。

examples.en: It took years for her to make peace with the loss of her friend.
examples.cn: 她花了多年时间才与失去朋友的痛苦和解。

examples.en: The old factory burned down in the fire last night.
examples.cn: 昨晚那场大火把旧工厂烧毁了。

examples.en: If you're not careful, the whole forest could burn down.
examples.cn: 如果不小心，整片森林都可能被烧光。

examples.en: After the argument, his anger slowly burned down.
examples.cn: 争吵过后，他的怒火慢慢平息了。

examples.en: The fever should burn down by tomorrow morning.
examples.cn: 到明天早上，发烧应该会退下去。

examples.en: She can play several musical instruments, including the piano and violin.
examples.cn: 她会演奏好几种乐器，包括钢琴和小提琴。

examples.en: The museum has a collection of ancient musical instruments from around the world.
examples.cn: 博物馆收藏了来自世界各地的古代乐器。

examples.en: After winning the lottery, he decided to lead a life of luxury.
examples.cn: 中彩票后，他决定过奢侈的生活。

examples.en: The retired CEO now leads a life of luxury in his beachfront villa.
examples.cn: 那位退休的CEO现在在海滨别墅过着奢侈的生活。

examples.en: Conservationists plan to reintroduce wolves to the national park.
examples.cn: 环保主义者计划将狼重新引入国家公园。

examples.en: The program aims to reintroduce endangered species to their natural habitats.
examples.cn: 该项目旨在将濒危物种重新引入它们的自然栖息地。

examples.en: The government increased funding for social welfare programs.
examples.cn: 政府增加了对社会福利项目的资金投入。

examples.en: Access to social welfare is a basic right in many developed countries.
examples.cn: 在许多发达国家，享受社会福利是一项基本权利。

examples.en: After years of estrangement, she finally reconciled with her brother.
examples.cn: 疏远多年后，她终于和哥哥和解了。

examples.en: It's time to reconcile with your past mistakes and move forward.
examples.cn: 是时候与过去的错误和解，继续前进了。

examples.en: He struggled to reconcile his religious beliefs with scientific evidence.
examples.cn: 他努力调和自己的宗教信仰与科学证据。

examples.en: The accountant must reconcile the bank statement with the company's records.
examples.cn: 会计必须使银行对账单与公司记录一致。

examples.en: You need to make a choice between these two job offers.
examples.cn: 你需要在这两份工作邀请中做出选择。

examples.en: Making a choice can be difficult when all options seem good.
examples.cn: 当所有选项看起来都不错时，做出选择可能很困难。

examples.en: The teacher made an exception of John and allowed him to submit the assignment late.
examples.cn: 老师把约翰作为例外，允许他迟交作业。

examples.en: We usually don't allow pets, but we'll make an exception of your service dog.
examples.cn: 我们通常不允许宠物，但会把你的服务犬作为例外。

examples.en: The manager held the aggressive employee in check during the meeting.
examples.cn: 经理在会议期间控制住了那位咄咄逼人的员工。

examples.en: Parents must hold their children in check to ensure good behavior.
examples.cn: 父母必须约束孩子以确保良好行为。

examples.en: Are you ready for the exam tomorrow?
examples.cn: 你为明天的考试做好准备了吗？

examples.en: The team is ready for any challenges that may come.
examples.cn: 团队已为可能到来的任何挑战做好准备。

examples.en: She spoke on her own behalf at the court hearing.
examples.cn: 她在法庭听证会上代表自己发言。

examples.en: You must sign the contract on your own behalf, not for someone else.
examples.cn: 你必须代表自己签署合同，而不是替别人签。

examples.en: Don't put obstacles in my way when I'm trying to succeed.
examples.cn: 当我努力成功时，不要在我路上设置障碍。

examples.en: Fate seemed to put every possible difficulty in her way.
examples.cn: 命运似乎在她路上设置了所有可能的困难。

examples.en: The government's policy aims to expand productive forces through technological innovation.
examples.cn: 政府的政策旨在通过技术创新发展生产力。

examples.en: Investing in education is key to expanding productive forces in the long term.
examples.cn: 投资教育是长期发展生产力的关键。

examples.en: The new product didn't come up to our expectations.
examples.cn: 新产品没有达到我们的期望。

examples.en: His performance came up to the required standard.
examples.cn: 他的表现达到了要求的标准。

examples.en: A stranger came up to me and asked for directions.
examples.cn: 一个陌生人走近我，问路。

examples.en: She came up to the podium to give her speech.
examples.cn: 她走近讲台发表演讲。

examples.en: Even though we were worried, everything worked out for the best.
examples.cn: 尽管我们很担心，但结果一切都是最好的。

examples.en: I hope this difficult situation will work out for the best in the end.
examples.cn: 我希望这个困难局面最终会有最好的结果。

examples.en: Please come down from the ladder carefully.
examples.cn: 请小心地从梯子上下来。

examples.en: The price of oil has come down significantly this month.
examples.cn: 这个月油价大幅下降。

examples.en: The court will come down with a verdict next week.
examples.cn: 法庭将于下周作出裁决。

examples.en: Management finally came down in favor of the new proposal.
examples.cn: 管理层最终决定支持新提案。

examples.en: This tradition has come down through generations.
examples.cn: 这个传统世代流传下来。

examples.en: The story came down from my great-grandmother.
examples.cn: 这个故事是从我曾祖母那里流传下来的。

examples.en: The plane deviated from its original course due to bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于恶劣天气，飞机偏离了原定航线。

examples.en: We should not deviate from our core values.
examples.cn: 我们不应偏离核心价值观。

examples.en: I have a rough idea of what the project will cost.
examples.cn: 我对项目成本有个大概的想法。

examples.en: Can you give me a rough idea of when you'll arrive?
examples.cn: 你能给我个大概的想法，你什么时候到吗？

examples.en: His statement was self-contradictory and confused everyone.
examples.cn: 他的陈述自相矛盾，让所有人都困惑了。

examples.en: A self-contradictory argument cannot be logically valid.
examples.cn: 自相矛盾的论点在逻辑上不可能是有效的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 大发雷霆，歇斯底里发作

examples.en: My mom had a conniption fit when she saw the mess in my room.
examples.cn: 妈妈看到我房间一团糟时大发雷霆。

examples.en: He'll have a conniption fit if he finds out we lost the contract.
examples.cn: 如果他发现我们丢了合同，他会大发雷霆的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 忍耐着听完或看完（通常指无聊或冗长的事物）

examples.en: I had to sit through a three-hour lecture on tax regulations.
examples.cn: 我不得不忍耐着听完一场关于税务法规的三小时讲座。

examples.en: The children sat through the entire movie without complaining.
examples.cn: 孩子们毫无怨言地看完了整部电影。

definitions.meaning_cn: 消灭，彻底消除（常指生物或想法）

examples.en: The harsh winter killed off many of the insects in the garden.
examples.cn: 严冬消灭了花园里的许多昆虫。

examples.en: The company decided to kill off the unpopular product line.
examples.cn: 公司决定彻底淘汰那条不受欢迎的产品线。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为什么，怎么会（用于询问原因）

examples.en: How come you didn't tell me about the meeting?
examples.cn: 你怎么没告诉我开会的事？

examples.en: How come it's so cold in here?
examples.cn: 这里怎么会这么冷？

examples.en: The team needs to come up with creative ideas for the new marketing campaign.
examples.cn: 团队需要为新的营销活动提出创意想法。

examples.en: She always comes up with creative ideas for decorating her home.
examples.cn: 她总能想出装饰家居的创意点子。

examples.en: China implements a nine-year compulsory education system for all children.
examples.cn: 中国对所有儿童实行九年义务教育制度。

examples.en: The government has increased funding for nine-year compulsory education in rural areas.
examples.cn: 政府增加了对农村地区九年义务教育的资金投入。

definitions.meaning_cn: 搬入，迁入（新住所或领域）

examples.en: They plan to move into their new apartment next month.
examples.cn: 他们计划下个月搬入新公寓。

examples.en: The company is moving into the Asian market this year.
examples.cn: 公司今年将进军亚洲市场。

examples.en: He ate the cookies on the sly while no one was looking.
examples.cn: 他趁没人注意时偷偷吃了饼干。

examples.en: She checked her phone on the sly during the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在开会时偷偷查看了手机。

valid_entries.original_phrase: combine work and raising a family

examples.en: Many parents struggle to combine work and raising a family effectively.
examples.cn: 许多父母难以有效兼顾工作和养育家庭。

examples.en: Flexible hours help her combine work and raising a family.
examples.cn: 弹性工作时间帮助她兼顾工作和养育家庭。

examples.en: This company places a premium on employee creativity.
examples.cn: 这家公司高度重视员工的创造力。

examples.en: The school places a premium on academic excellence.
examples.cn: 这所学校高度重视学术卓越。

examples.en: Sunscreen helps protect your skin from sun damage.
examples.cn: 防晒霜有助于保护皮肤免受阳光伤害。

examples.en: The law protects consumers from fraudulent practices.
examples.cn: 法律保护消费者免受欺诈行为侵害。

examples.en: Poor diet can lead to various health problems.
examples.cn: 不良饮食可能导致各种健康问题。

examples.en: He has been dealing with chronic health problems for years.
examples.cn: 他多年来一直处理慢性健康问题。

examples.en: It's advisable to have a check-up once a year.
examples.cn: 建议每年进行一次体检。

examples.en: She went to the clinic to have a check-up for her persistent cough.
examples.cn: 她去诊所为持续咳嗽做了体检。

examples.en: If your visa is denied, you can reapply for it after six months.
examples.cn: 如果签证被拒，你可以在六个月后重新申请。

examples.en: He decided to reapply for the job after gaining more experience.
examples.cn: 在获得更多经验后，他决定重新申请那份工作。

examples.en: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
examples.cn: 她说了一个善意的谎言，以避免伤害他的感情。

examples.en: Sometimes it's kinder to tell a white lie than to be brutally honest.
examples.cn: 有时说善意的谎言比残酷的诚实更仁慈。

examples.en: I am certain of his honesty in this matter.
examples.cn: 我确信他在这件事上是诚实的。

examples.en: Are you certain of the meeting time?
examples.cn: 你确定会议时间吗？

examples.en: Keep on practicing, and you'll improve your skills.
examples.cn: 继续练习，你会提高技能的。

examples.en: Despite the difficulties, they kept on working towards their goal.
examples.cn: 尽管困难重重，他们仍继续朝着目标努力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 翻滚，滚动（物理动作或金融术语）

examples.en: The puppy loves to roll over on the grass.
examples.cn: 小狗喜欢在草地上打滚。

examples.en: You can roll over your retirement savings into a new account.
examples.cn: 你可以将退休储蓄转入新账户。

definitions.meaning_cn: 收到...的消息，听到...的音讯

examples.en: I haven't heard from my cousin since she moved abroad.
examples.cn: 自从表姐移居国外后，我就没收到她的消息了。

examples.en: We hope to hear from the committee by next week.
examples.cn: 我们希望在下周前收到委员会的消息。

definitions.meaning_cn: 健身房通行证或会员卡

examples.en: I bought a monthly gym pass to access the facilities.
examples.cn: 我买了一张月卡来使用健身房的设施。

examples.en: She lost her gym pass and had to get a replacement.
examples.cn: 她丢了健身房通行证，不得不补办一张。

definitions.meaning_cn: 顺便看望或检查某人或某物

examples.en: I'll look in on my grandmother on my way home.
examples.cn: 我回家路上会顺便看望一下我的祖母。

examples.en: Can you look in on the baby while I'm out?
examples.cn: 我出去的时候你能顺便看看宝宝吗？

examples.en: This product meets the requirements of safety regulations.
examples.cn: 这个产品符合安全法规的要求。

examples.en: She worked hard to meet the requirements of the job.
examples.cn: 她努力工作以满足这份工作的要求。

examples.en: He apologized to his friend for being late.
examples.cn: 他为迟到向朋友道歉。

examples.en: She apologized to the customer for the mistake.
examples.cn: 她为错误向客户道歉。

examples.en: Judging from his expression, he was not happy.
examples.cn: 从他的表情判断，他不高兴。

examples.en: We can judge from the data that sales are increasing.
examples.cn: 我们可以从数据判断销售额在增长。

definitions.meaning_cn: 不是...而是...，用于对比或纠正

examples.en: It's not a problem but an opportunity.
examples.cn: 这不是一个问题，而是一个机会。

examples.en: She is not tired but excited about the trip.
examples.cn: 她不累，而是对这次旅行感到兴奋。

examples.en: A well-balanced diet includes fruits and vegetables.
examples.cn: 均衡的饮食包括水果和蔬菜。

examples.en: He has a well-balanced approach to work and life.
examples.cn: 他对工作和生活有平衡良好的态度。

examples.en: The temperature dropped by degrees throughout the night.
examples.cn: 温度在夜间逐渐下降。

examples.en: She improved her skills by degrees through practice.
examples.cn: 她通过练习逐渐提高了技能。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对...是必不可少的或不可或缺的

examples.en: Water is indispensable to human survival.
examples.cn: 水对人类生存是必不可少的。

examples.en: Her expertise is indispensable to the project's success.
examples.cn: 她的专业知识对项目的成功是不可或缺的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在视线内，可见的；即将发生或实现

examples.en: The mountains were in sight as we drove closer.
examples.cn: 我们开车靠近时，山脉在视线内。

examples.en: Victory is in sight after months of hard work.
examples.cn: 经过数月的努力，胜利在望。

examples.en: The team gained ground in the second half of the game.
examples.cn: 球队在下半场比赛中取得了进展。

examples.en: New technologies are gaining ground in the market.
examples.cn: 新技术在市场上正占上风。

examples.en: He rarely speaks in public due to shyness.
examples.cn: 由于害羞，他很少在公众场合发言。

examples.en: They announced their engagement in public.
examples.cn: 他们公开宣布了订婚。

examples.en: I need to catch up on my homework this weekend.
examples.cn: 这个周末我需要赶上我的作业。

examples.en: Let's meet for coffee to catch up on old times.
examples.cn: 我们见面喝咖啡叙叙旧吧。

examples.en: Admission to the museum is no charge on Sundays.
examples.cn: 博物馆周日入场免费。

examples.en: They offered the service at no charge as a promotion.
examples.cn: 他们作为促销免费提供这项服务。

examples.en: She will stand in for the manager while he is on vacation.
examples.cn: 经理度假期间，她将代替他。

examples.en: An understudy stood in for the lead actor who was ill.
examples.cn: 一名替补演员顶替了生病的主演。

definitions.meaning_cn: 跌倒，摔倒；失败或不达标

examples.en: Be careful not to fall down on the slippery floor.
examples.cn: 小心别在滑的地板上跌倒。

examples.en: The plan fell down due to lack of funding.
examples.cn: 由于缺乏资金，这个计划失败了。

examples.en: He put forward a new idea at the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议上提出了一个新想法。

examples.en: She was put forward as a candidate for the position.
examples.cn: 她被推荐为该职位的候选人。

definitions.meaning_cn: 推迟，延期；用某事威胁或控制某人

examples.en: The meeting was held over until next week.
examples.cn: 会议被推迟到下周。

examples.en: He held the secret over her to get what he wanted.
examples.cn: 他用这个秘密威胁她以得到他想要的。

examples.en: Students acquire knowledge through reading and research.
examples.cn: 学生通过阅读和研究获取知识。

examples.en: It's important to acquire knowledge in various fields.
examples.cn: 在各个领域获取知识很重要。

examples.en: In the light of recent events, we need to reconsider our strategy.
examples.cn: 鉴于最近的事件，我们需要重新考虑我们的策略。

examples.en: The decision was made in the light of expert advice.
examples.cn: 这个决定是考虑到专家建议后做出的。

examples.en: This car is not as fast as the other one.
examples.cn: 这辆车不如另一辆快。

examples.en: She is not as tall as her brother.
examples.cn: 她不如她哥哥高。

examples.en: In practice, the theory is difficult to apply.
examples.cn: 实际上，这个理论很难应用。

examples.en: The plan sounds good, but in practice it may fail.
examples.cn: 这个计划听起来不错，但在实践中可能会失败。

valid_entries.original_phrase: come between sb. and sb. else

definitions.meaning_cn: 介入或破坏两人之间的关系

examples.en: Don't let money come between you and your friend.
examples.cn: 不要让金钱破坏你和朋友之间的关系。

examples.en: Her jealousy came between her and her partner.
examples.cn: 她的嫉妒心破坏了她和伴侣的关系。

examples.en: The government exerts pressure on the media.
examples.cn: 政府对媒体施加压力。

examples.en: He exerted his influence on the decision.
examples.cn: 他对这个决定施加了影响。

examples.en: Her kind words made me feel better.
examples.cn: 她善意的话语让我感觉好多了。

examples.en: A warm cup of tea can make you feel better when you're sick.
examples.cn: 生病时，一杯热茶能让你感觉好些。

examples.en: She does volunteer work at the local shelter.
examples.cn: 她在当地收容所做志愿工作。

examples.en: Volunteer work is a great way to give back to the community.
examples.cn: 志愿工作是回馈社区的好方法。

definitions.meaning_cn: 但是接着，然而另一方面

examples.en: I wanted to go, but then I remembered I had work.
examples.cn: 我想去，但接着我想起我有工作。

examples.en: The plan seemed perfect, but then problems arose.
examples.cn: 这个计划似乎很完美，但接着问题出现了。

examples.en: She demonstrated determination by finishing the marathon.
examples.cn: 她通过完成马拉松展示了决心。

examples.en: He demonstrated determination in overcoming the obstacles.
examples.cn: 他在克服障碍时展示了决心。

examples.en: The research excavation uncovered ancient artifacts.
examples.cn: 这次研究性挖掘发现了古代文物。

examples.en: They conducted a research excavation at the historical site.
examples.cn: 他们在历史遗址进行了研究性挖掘。

examples.en: Bear in mind that the deadline is tomorrow.
examples.cn: 记住截止日期是明天。

examples.en: You should bear the cost in mind before making a decision.
examples.cn: 在做决定前，你应该考虑到成本。

examples.en: She uses talcum powder to keep her skin dry.
examples.cn: 她用滑石粉来保持皮肤干燥。

examples.en: Talcum powder is often applied after a shower.
examples.cn: 滑石粉通常在淋浴后使用。

examples.en: Stay out of the kitchen while I'm cooking.
examples.cn: 我做饭时，待在厨房外面。

examples.en: The sign says 'Stay out' to keep people away.
examples.cn: 牌子上写着'禁止入内'以阻止人们进入。

examples.en: The high cost deters many from buying the product.
examples.cn: 高昂的成本阻止了许多人购买这个产品。

examples.en: Fear of punishment can deter people from committing crimes.
examples.cn: 对惩罚的恐惧可以阻止人们犯罪。

examples.en: She insists on paying the bill.
examples.cn: 她坚持要付账。

examples.en: He insisted on seeing the manager.
examples.cn: 他坚持要见经理。

examples.en: The child is running a temperature and needs rest.
examples.cn: 这个孩子在发烧，需要休息。

examples.en: If you run a temperature, you should see a doctor.
examples.cn: 如果你发烧了，应该去看医生。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have half a mind to do sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 有点想做某事（但可能不会做）

examples.en: I have half a mind to quit my job and travel.
examples.cn: 我有点想辞职去旅行。

examples.en: He had half a mind to tell her the truth.
examples.cn: 他有点想告诉她真相。

examples.en: Please take out the household rubbish.
examples.cn: 请把家庭垃圾拿出去。

examples.en: Household rubbish should be sorted for recycling.
examples.cn: 家庭垃圾应该分类以便回收。

examples.en: It looks as if it's going to rain.
examples.cn: 看起来好像要下雨了。

examples.en: She looks as if she's seen a ghost.
examples.cn: 她看起来好像见了鬼一样。

valid_entries.original_phrase: go so far as to say sth.

examples.en: He went so far as to say that the project was a failure.
examples.cn: 他甚至说这个项目是失败的。

examples.en: I wouldn't go so far as to say she's dishonest.
examples.cn: 我不会甚至说她不诚实。

examples.en: He focused on his work to the exclusion of everything else.
examples.cn: 他专注于工作，以至于排除了其他一切。

examples.en: The policy favors one group to the exclusion of others.
examples.cn: 这个政策偏袒一个群体，排除了其他群体。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事感到厌倦或失去耐心

examples.en: I'm getting tired of eating the same food every day.
examples.cn: 我开始厌倦每天吃同样的食物了。

examples.en: She got tired of waiting and decided to leave.
examples.cn: 她等得不耐烦了，决定离开。

definitions.meaning_cn: 紧急出口，用于火灾等紧急情况疏散

examples.en: Please locate the nearest fire exit when you enter the building.
examples.cn: 进入大楼时请找到最近的紧急出口。

examples.en: The fire exit must be kept clear at all times.
examples.cn: 紧急出口必须始终保持畅通。

examples.en: We should make use of this opportunity to learn new skills.
examples.cn: 我们应该利用这个机会学习新技能。

examples.en: He made use of old materials to build a shed.
examples.cn: 他利用旧材料搭建了一个棚子。

definitions.meaning_cn: 当涉及到或谈到某个话题时

examples.en: When it comes to cooking, she is an expert.
examples.cn: 谈到烹饪，她是个专家。

examples.en: He is very confident when it comes to public speaking.
examples.cn: 当涉及公开演讲时，他非常自信。

examples.en: When the bear appeared, they had to run for their lives.
examples.cn: 熊出现时，他们不得不拼命逃跑。

examples.en: The villagers ran for their lives during the flood.
examples.cn: 洪水期间，村民们拼命逃跑保命。

examples.en: Can you help out with the dishes after dinner?
examples.cn: 晚饭后你能帮忙洗碗吗？

examples.en: She helped out at the local shelter during the holidays.
examples.cn: 假期期间她在当地收容所帮忙。

examples.en: His fashion sense is a bit behind the times.
examples.cn: 他的时尚感有点落伍了。

examples.en: The company's technology is behind the times compared to competitors.
examples.cn: 与竞争对手相比，这家公司的技术落后了。

examples.en: Government programs aim to support low income people.
examples.cn: 政府计划旨在支持低收入人群。

examples.en: Low income people often struggle to afford healthcare.
examples.cn: 低收入人群常常难以负担医疗费用。

examples.en: I'll try to fit the meeting into my schedule next week.
examples.cn: 我会试着把会议安排进下周的日程中。

examples.en: Can you fit a quick call into your schedule today?
examples.cn: 你今天能安排一个简短的通话吗？

examples.en: The two friends walked side by side along the beach.
examples.cn: 两个朋友沿着海滩并肩行走。

examples.en: The paintings were hung side by side in the gallery.
examples.cn: 画作在画廊里并排悬挂。

examples.en: He decided to drop out of college to start a business.
examples.cn: 他决定从大学辍学去创业。

examples.en: Many students drop out due to financial difficulties.
examples.cn: 许多学生因经济困难而辍学。

examples.en: He died of a heart attack last year.
examples.cn: 他去年死于心脏病发作。

examples.en: Many people in history died of infectious diseases.
examples.cn: 历史上许多人死于传染病。

examples.en: I'm having a hard time understanding this math problem.
examples.cn: 我在理解这道数学题上很吃力。

examples.en: She had a hard time adjusting to the new city.
examples.cn: 她很难适应新城市。

examples.en: I have to finish this report by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我必须在明天之前完成这份报告。

examples.en: You have to wear a seatbelt while driving.
examples.cn: 开车时必须系安全带。

examples.en: Our company is in competition with several larger firms.
examples.cn: 我们公司与几家大公司竞争。

examples.en: She is in competition with top athletes from around the world.
examples.cn: 她与来自世界各地的顶尖运动员竞争。

definitions.meaning_cn: 同时处理多个角色或任务

examples.en: As a working parent, she has to juggle different roles every day.
examples.cn: 作为在职父母，她每天必须同时处理多个角色。

examples.en: He juggles different roles as a manager, mentor, and team member.
examples.cn: 他同时扮演经理、导师和团队成员的不同角色。

examples.en: We went to the airport to see off our friends.
examples.cn: 我们去机场为朋友们送行。

examples.en: She saw off her son as he left for college.
examples.cn: 她送儿子去上大学。

examples.en: The city is famous for its landmark and historic sites.
examples.cn: 这座城市以其地标和历史遗址而闻名。

examples.en: We visited several landmark and historic sites during our trip.
examples.cn: 我们在旅行期间参观了几处地标和历史遗址。

examples.en: None but the brave deserve the fair.
examples.cn: 只有勇者才配得上美人。

examples.en: He trusts none but his closest friends.
examples.cn: 他只信任他最亲密的朋友。

examples.en: His comment about the weather was beside the point in our budget discussion.
examples.cn: 在我们预算讨论中，他关于天气的评论离题了。

examples.en: Whether you like the color is beside the point; we need to focus on functionality.
examples.cn: 你是否喜欢这个颜色不相关；我们需要关注功能性。

examples.en: She used a knife to scrape off the old paint from the wall.
examples.cn: 她用刀刮掉了墙上的旧油漆。

examples.en: You should scrape off the ice from your car windshield before driving.
examples.cn: 开车前你应该刮掉汽车挡风玻璃上的冰。

examples.en: The scientific discovery of penicillin revolutionized medicine.
examples.cn: 青霉素的科学发现彻底改变了医学。

examples.en: This new scientific discovery could lead to more efficient energy sources.
examples.cn: 这项新的科学发现可能带来更高效的能源。

examples.en: He decided to sit out the game due to a minor injury.
examples.cn: 由于轻微受伤，他决定不参加这场比赛。

examples.en: I'll sit out this round of negotiations and let others handle it.
examples.cn: 我将不参与这轮谈判，让其他人处理。

examples.en: We had to sit out the storm in a shelter.
examples.cn: 我们不得不在避难所里等待风暴结束。

examples.en: She chose to sit out the boring lecture until it was over.
examples.cn: 她选择等待无聊的讲座结束。

definitions.meaning_cn: 宽泛的主张，笼统的说法

examples.en: The advertisement made broad claims about the product's effectiveness without evidence.
examples.cn: 广告对产品的有效性做出了没有证据的宽泛主张。

examples.en: Avoid making broad claims in your essay; be specific with examples.
examples.cn: 在你的文章中避免做出笼统的说法；用例子具体说明。

examples.en: The two companies joined hands to develop a new technology.
examples.cn: 两家公司携手合作开发了一项新技术。

examples.en: Let's join hands to clean up the community park this weekend.
examples.cn: 让我们这个周末携手合作清理社区公园。

examples.en: Keep your eyes peeled for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
examples.cn: 密切注意社区里任何可疑的活动。

examples.en: I'm keeping my eyes peeled for a good deal on a used car.
examples.cn: 我正在留神寻找一辆二手车的优惠交易。

examples.en: It took her a while to fit in with the new team at work.
examples.cn: 她花了一段时间才适应工作中的新团队。

examples.en: His ideas didn't fit in with the company's traditional approach.
examples.cn: 他的想法与公司的传统方法不融合。

examples.en: There is a heavy demand for electric vehicles due to environmental concerns.
examples.cn: 由于环境问题，对电动汽车有高需求。

examples.en: The new smartphone model created a heavy demand for accessories.
examples.cn: 新款智能手机型号创造了对配件的高需求。

examples.en: The children are eager for the summer vacation to start.
examples.cn: 孩子们渴望暑假开始。

examples.en: She is eager for feedback on her latest project.
examples.cn: 她热切期待对她最新项目的反馈。

examples.en: He visits his hometown once in a blue moon since moving abroad.
examples.cn: 自从移居国外后，他千载难逢地回一次家乡。

examples.en: Getting a perfect score on that test happens once in a blue moon.
examples.cn: 在那次考试中得满分是极其罕见的。

examples.en: The new policy proved to be effective in reducing waste.
examples.cn: 新政策证明在减少浪费方面是有效的。

examples.en: His prediction proved to be accurate after the election results.
examples.cn: 选举结果后，他的预测证明是准确的。

valid_entries.original_phrase: keep a civil tongue in one's head

examples.en: During the debate, please keep a civil tongue in your head and avoid personal attacks.
examples.cn: 在辩论期间，请说话礼貌，避免人身攻击。

examples.en: My grandmother always told us to keep a civil tongue in our heads when speaking to elders.
examples.cn: 我祖母总是告诉我们对长辈说话时要言辞文明。

examples.en: Could you do the honors and cut the cake at the party?
examples.cn: 你能在派对上主持切蛋糕吗？

examples.en: As the host, I'll do the honors and introduce our guest speaker.
examples.cn: 作为主持人，我将执行介绍我们特邀演讲者的荣誉性任务。

examples.en: Our plans for a picnic fell through because of the rain.
examples.cn: 我们野餐的计划因为下雨而落空了。

examples.en: The business deal fell through at the last minute due to funding issues.
examples.cn: 由于资金问题，这笔商业交易在最后一刻失败了。

examples.en: Good managerial skills are essential for leading a team effectively.
examples.cn: 良好的管理技能对于有效领导团队至关重要。

examples.en: She improved her managerial skills through training and experience.
examples.cn: 她通过培训和经验提高了她的管理技能。

examples.en: I like to read books in my spare time to relax.
examples.cn: 我喜欢在空闲时间读书来放松。

examples.en: He uses his spare time to volunteer at the local shelter.
examples.cn: 他利用业余时间在当地收容所做志愿者。

examples.en: The company aims to make profits by expanding into new markets.
examples.cn: 公司旨在通过拓展新市场来盈利。

examples.en: Small businesses often struggle to make profits in their first year.
examples.cn: 小企业通常在头一年难以赚钱。

examples.en: The Gulf Stream is a warm ocean current that affects Europe's climate.
examples.cn: 墨西哥湾流是影响欧洲气候的温暖洋流。

examples.en: Scientists study ocean currents to understand climate patterns.
examples.cn: 科学家研究洋流以理解气候模式。

definitions.meaning_cn: 情感支持，指提供安慰、鼓励或理解以帮助他人应对情绪困扰

examples.en: She provided emotional support to her friend during the difficult divorce.
examples.cn: 在朋友艰难的离婚期间，她提供了情感支持。

examples.en: The therapy dog offers emotional support to patients in the hospital.
examples.cn: 治疗犬为医院里的病人提供情感支持。

definitions.meaning_cn: 情感支持动物，特指为有心理健康需求的人提供陪伴的动物

examples.en: He registered his dog as an emotional support animal to help with his anxiety.
examples.cn: 他将自己的狗注册为情感支持动物，以帮助缓解焦虑。

examples.en: Airlines have specific policies for passengers traveling with emotional support animals.
examples.cn: 航空公司对携带情感支持动物旅行的乘客有具体政策。

definitions.meaning_cn: 参加会议，指参与或出席正式或非正式的会议

examples.en: Managers are required to attend meetings every Monday to discuss project updates.
examples.cn: 经理们需要每周一参加会议，讨论项目进展。

examples.en: She will attend meetings with international clients next week.
examples.cn: 她下周将参加与国际客户的会议。

definitions.meaning_cn: 动物测试，指在动物身上进行的科学实验，常用于医学或产品安全研究

examples.en: Animal tests are conducted to ensure the safety of new pharmaceuticals before human trials.
examples.cn: 在人体试验之前，进行动物测试以确保新药的安全性。

examples.en: Many cosmetics companies have banned animal tests due to ethical concerns.
examples.cn: 由于伦理问题，许多化妆品公司已禁止动物测试。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被放弃或忽略，指计划、想法或规则不再被考虑或执行

examples.en: Due to budget cuts, our expansion plans went by the board.
examples.cn: 由于预算削减，我们的扩张计划被放弃了。

examples.en: Old traditions often go by the board in rapidly changing societies.
examples.cn: 在快速变化的社会中，旧传统常常被忽略。

definitions.meaning_cn: 理解暗示或信息，指明白某人的意图或传达的内容

examples.en: After I ignored his calls, he finally got the message that I wasn't interested.
examples.cn: 在我忽略他的电话后，他终于明白我不感兴趣了。

examples.en: The team got the message from the manager to work harder after the poor performance review.
examples.cn: 在绩效评估不佳后，团队明白了经理要他们更努力工作的信息。

definitions.meaning_cn: 忍不住做某事，指无法控制地做某事，通常由于习惯或强烈情感

examples.en: I can't help laughing when I watch that comedy show.
examples.cn: 我看那个喜剧节目时忍不住笑。

examples.en: She can't help worrying about her children when they're away.
examples.cn: 当孩子们不在身边时，她忍不住担心他们。

definitions.meaning_cn: 沉溺于，指完全投入或放纵于某种情感、活动或状态

examples.en: He abandoned himself to despair after losing his job.
examples.cn: 失业后，他沉溺于绝望之中。

examples.en: On vacation, she abandoned herself to the joy of relaxation.
examples.cn: 度假时，她沉溺于放松的快乐中。

definitions.meaning_cn: 本地企业高管，指在特定地区工作或负责本地业务的高级管理人员

examples.en: The local business executive was interviewed about the new factory opening.
examples.cn: 这位本地企业高管接受了关于新工厂开业的采访。

examples.en: As a local business executive, she focuses on community engagement and growth.
examples.cn: 作为本地企业高管，她专注于社区参与和发展。

definitions.meaning_cn: 身体不适或生病，通常指轻微疾病如感冒

examples.en: I'm feeling under the weather today, so I'll work from home.
examples.cn: 我今天感觉身体不适，所以会在家工作。

examples.en: She stayed in bed because she was under the weather with a cold.
examples.cn: 她因感冒身体不适而待在床上。

definitions.meaning_cn: 突然哭起来，指因情绪激动而开始哭泣

examples.en: When she heard the sad news, she broke out into tears.
examples.cn: 当她听到这个悲伤的消息时，突然哭了起来。

examples.en: The child broke out into tears after losing his favorite toy.
examples.cn: 孩子丢了最喜欢的玩具后，突然哭了起来。

definitions.meaning_cn: 计入或贡献于，指某事物被包括在总数或评估中

examples.en: Your homework grades count towards 30% of your final score.
examples.cn: 你的作业成绩计入最终分数的30%。

examples.en: Volunteer hours can count towards community service requirements.
examples.cn: 志愿服务时间可以计入社区服务要求。

definitions.meaning_cn: 保护性关税，指政府对进口商品征收的税，以保护国内产业免受外国竞争

examples.en: The government imposed a protective tariff on steel imports to support local manufacturers.
examples.cn: 政府对钢铁进口征收保护性关税，以支持本地制造商。

examples.en: Protective tariffs can lead to trade disputes between countries.
examples.cn: 保护性关税可能导致国家间的贸易争端。

definitions.meaning_cn: 电影明星，指在电影行业中著名的演员

examples.en: Movie stars often attend red carpet events to promote their films.
examples.cn: 电影明星经常参加红毯活动来宣传他们的电影。

examples.en: Many children dream of becoming movie stars when they grow up.
examples.cn: 许多孩子梦想长大后成为电影明星。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...斗争或努力应对，指面对困难、问题或挑战

examples.en: She struggles with anxiety in social situations.
examples.cn: 她在社交场合中与焦虑作斗争。

examples.en: Many students struggle with math homework without proper guidance.
examples.cn: 许多学生在没有适当指导的情况下努力应对数学作业。

definitions.meaning_cn: 跌倒或翻倒，指失去平衡而倒下

examples.en: The toddler fell over while learning to walk.
examples.cn: 这个学步的孩子在学习走路时跌倒了。

examples.en: Be careful not to fall over on the icy sidewalk.
examples.cn: 小心别在结冰的人行道上跌倒。

definitions.meaning_cn: 失败或崩溃，指计划或系统出现问题

examples.en: The project fell over due to lack of funding.
examples.cn: 由于缺乏资金，这个项目失败了。

examples.en: Their negotiation fell over at the last minute.
examples.cn: 他们的谈判在最后一刻崩溃了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在运输中，指货物或人员正在从一地移动到另一地的过程中

examples.en: Your package is in transit and should arrive by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 您的包裹在运输中，应该明天到达。

examples.en: Passengers in transit at the airport can use the lounge facilities.
examples.cn: 在机场中转的乘客可以使用休息室设施。

definitions.meaning_cn: 底线或最终结果，在商业中指净利润或关键事实

examples.en: The bottom line is that we need to increase sales to stay profitable.
examples.cn: 底线是我们需要增加销售额以保持盈利。

examples.en: After all discussions, the bottom line is that the project must be completed on time.
examples.cn: 经过所有讨论，最终结果是项目必须按时完成。

definitions.meaning_cn: 基本事实或要点，指最重要的方面

examples.en: The bottom line is that honesty is always the best policy.
examples.cn: 要点是诚实总是上策。

examples.en: In any argument, the bottom line should be finding a solution.
examples.cn: 在任何争论中，要点应该是找到解决方案。

definitions.meaning_cn: 高度重视，指特别重视或珍视某事物

examples.en: This company puts a premium on innovation and creativity.
examples.cn: 这家公司高度重视创新和创造力。

examples.en: Parents often put a premium on their children's education.
examples.cn: 父母通常高度重视孩子的教育。

definitions.meaning_cn: 调皮捣蛋或行为不端，通常指儿童或宠物

examples.en: The kids started to act up when they were bored.
examples.cn: 孩子们无聊时开始调皮捣蛋。

examples.en: My dog acts up whenever we have guests over.
examples.cn: 每当我们有客人来时，我的狗就会行为不端。

definitions.meaning_cn: 出故障或运作不正常，指机器或身体部位

examples.en: My computer is acting up again; I might need to restart it.
examples.cn: 我的电脑又出故障了；我可能需要重启它。

examples.en: His knee has been acting up since the injury.
examples.cn: 自从受伤后，他的膝盖一直运作不正常。

definitions.meaning_cn: 防护服，用于保护穿着者免受伤害或污染的衣物

examples.en: Workers in the chemical plant must wear protective clothes at all times.
examples.cn: 化工厂的工人必须始终穿着防护服。

examples.en: The firefighter's protective clothes shielded him from the intense heat.
examples.cn: 消防员的防护服保护他免受高温伤害。

definitions.meaning_cn: 值得做某事，表示某事有价值或有益处

examples.en: Learning a new language is worth doing for career advancement.
examples.cn: 学习一门新语言对职业发展来说是值得的。

examples.en: The hike was tiring, but the view from the top was worth doing.
examples.cn: 徒步很累，但山顶的景色值得这么做。

definitions.meaning_cn: 挥手示意让开，或比喻性地表示不理会或拒绝

examples.en: He waved aside the waiter's offer to help with his bags.
examples.cn: 他挥手示意服务员不用帮他拿包。

examples.en: She waved aside the criticism and continued with her project.
examples.cn: 她不理会批评，继续她的项目。

examples.en: Let's get the meeting started on time.
examples.cn: 让我们准时开始会议。

examples.en: He got the car started after a few tries.
examples.cn: 他试了几次后启动了汽车。

examples.en: There isn't much in the way of entertainment in this small town.
examples.cn: 这个小镇在娱乐方面没什么可提供的。

examples.en: What do you have in the way of vegetarian options?
examples.cn: 你们有什么素食选择？

examples.en: She convinced me of the importance of recycling.
examples.cn: 她让我相信了回收的重要性。

examples.en: The evidence convinced the jury of his innocence.
examples.cn: 证据使陪审团相信了他的清白。

examples.en: The decision was made in the interest of the company's shareholders.
examples.cn: 这个决定是为了公司股东的利益而做出的。

examples.en: In the interest of public safety, the road was closed.
examples.cn: 为了公共安全，道路被关闭了。

examples.en: Keep your shirt on, we'll get there soon.
examples.cn: 冷静点，我们很快就到了。

examples.en: He told his friend to keep his shirt on during the argument.
examples.cn: 在争论中，他告诉朋友要保持冷静。

definitions.meaning_cn: 跟上某人，保持与某人的联系或同步

examples.en: She walks so fast that I can't keep up with her.
examples.cn: 她走得很快，我跟不上她。

examples.en: I try to keep up with my old friends through social media.
examples.cn: 我试图通过社交媒体与老朋友保持联系。

definitions.meaning_cn: 低风险投资，指损失可能性较小的投资

examples.en: Government bonds are considered a low-risk investment.
examples.cn: 政府债券被认为是低风险投资。

examples.en: For retirees, a low-risk investment portfolio is often recommended.
examples.cn: 对于退休人员，通常推荐低风险投资组合。

definitions.meaning_cn: 公平地说，用于引入一个平衡的观点

examples.en: To be fair, he did apologize for his mistake.
examples.cn: 公平地说，他确实为他的错误道歉了。

examples.en: To be fair, the movie had some good special effects.
examples.cn: 公平地说，这部电影有一些好的特效。

examples.en: Please separate the recyclables from the regular trash.
examples.cn: 请将可回收物与普通垃圾分开。

examples.en: It's important to separate personal feelings from professional decisions.
examples.cn: 将个人情感与职业决策分开很重要。

examples.en: Parents should have control over their children's internet usage.
examples.cn: 父母应该对孩子使用互联网有控制权。

examples.en: The manager has full control over the project budget.
examples.cn: 经理对项目预算有完全控制权。

definitions.meaning_cn: 短信，通过手机发送的文本信息

examples.en: Text messaging has become a popular way to communicate quickly.
examples.cn: 短信已成为快速沟通的流行方式。

examples.en: She prefers text messaging over phone calls for casual chats.
examples.cn: 对于随意聊天，她更喜欢短信而不是电话。

examples.en: The company is faced with financial difficulties.
examples.cn: 公司面临财务困难。

examples.en: When faced with a challenge, she always stays positive.
examples.cn: 当面临挑战时，她总是保持积极。

examples.en: He tried to smooth over the disagreement between his friends.
examples.cn: 他试图缓和朋友之间的分歧。

examples.en: A good apology can smooth over many misunderstandings.
examples.cn: 一个好的道歉可以平息许多误解。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使...入睡，或委婉地表示对宠物实施安乐死

examples.en: The lullaby put the baby to sleep quickly.
examples.cn: 摇篮曲让宝宝很快入睡。

examples.en: They had to put their old dog to sleep due to illness.
examples.cn: 由于疾病，他们不得不对老狗实施安乐死。

examples.en: The company launched a series of new products this year.
examples.cn: 公司今年推出了一系列新产品。

examples.en: A series of unfortunate events led to their downfall.
examples.cn: 一连串不幸事件导致了他们的失败。

examples.en: The soil is deficient in nutrients, so plants don't grow well.
examples.cn: 土壤缺乏养分，所以植物长得不好。

examples.en: His diet is deficient in vitamin C.
examples.cn: 他的饮食缺乏维生素C。

examples.en: Don't take your health for granted; it's precious.
examples.cn: 不要把你的健康视为理所当然；它很宝贵。

examples.en: She took his kindness for granted and never thanked him.
examples.cn: 她认为他的善良是理所当然的，从未感谢过他。

definitions.meaning_cn: 假设...为真，未经证实就接受

examples.en: In the argument, we can't take that premise for granted.
examples.cn: 在论证中，我们不能未经证实就接受那个前提。

examples.en: He took it for granted that everyone would agree with his plan.
examples.cn: 他理所当然地认为每个人都会同意他的计划。

examples.en: You can tell by her accent that she's from London.
examples.cn: 从她的口音可以判断她来自伦敦。

examples.en: I could tell by the smell that dinner was ready.
examples.cn: 通过气味我能判断晚餐准备好了。

examples.en: On weekends, we like to do some activities like hiking or swimming.
examples.cn: 周末，我们喜欢做一些活动，比如徒步或游泳。

examples.en: The children will do some activities at the summer camp.
examples.cn: 孩子们将在夏令营做一些活动。

examples.en: Be sure to lock the door when you leave.
examples.cn: 离开时务必锁门。

examples.en: I'll be sure to call you tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我一定会明天给你打电话。

examples.en: Recent technological advances have revolutionized communication.
