examples.cn: 最近的技术进步彻底改变了通信方式。

examples.en: The company invests heavily in technological advances to stay competitive.
examples.cn: 这家公司大力投资技术进步以保持竞争力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 某人有优势或有利条件

examples.en: She has a lot going for her with her talent and hard work.
examples.cn: 凭借她的才华和努力，她有很多优势。

examples.en: He has something going for him because of his connections.
examples.cn: 由于他的人脉，他有一些有利条件。

examples.en: As of today, the new policy is in effect.
examples.cn: 自今日起，新政策生效。

examples.en: The report is accurate as of last month.
examples.cn: 这份报告截至上个月是准确的。

examples.en: Stop fooling around and get to work!
examples.cn: 别胡闹了，开始工作吧！

examples.en: They were just fooling around in the park.
examples.cn: 他们只是在公园里胡闹。

examples.en: He's not serious; he's just fooling around with her.
examples.cn: 他不是认真的；他只是和她调情。

examples.en: They fooled around for a while before dating.
examples.cn: 他们在约会前调情了一段时间。

examples.en: Oil does not mix with water.
examples.cn: 油不溶于水。

examples.en: She likes to mix with people from different backgrounds.
examples.cn: 她喜欢与不同背景的人交往。

examples.en: He shut himself away to study for the exam.
examples.cn: 他把自己关起来准备考试。

examples.en: The old documents were shut away in a vault.
examples.cn: 旧文件被锁在保险库里。

examples.en: She touched up the painting to fix some flaws.
examples.cn: 她修饰了这幅画以修复一些瑕疵。

examples.en: I need to touch up this report before submitting it.
examples.cn: 我需要在提交前润色这份报告。

examples.en: He touched up the settings on the camera.
examples.cn: 他微调了相机的设置。

examples.en: Can you touch up the volume on the TV?
examples.cn: 你能调一下电视的音量吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 开放票（如未解决的客服问题）

examples.en: There's still an open ticket for the software bug.
examples.cn: 软件漏洞还有一个未解决的工单。

examples.en: Please check the open tickets in the system.
examples.cn: 请检查系统中的开放工单。

definitions.meaning_cn: 开放票（如可改签的机票）

examples.en: I bought an open ticket so I can change my flight date.
examples.cn: 我买了一张开放票，以便更改航班日期。

examples.en: Open tickets offer more flexibility for travelers.
examples.cn: 开放票为旅行者提供了更多灵活性。

examples.en: Get off my tail! I'm driving safely.
examples.cn: 别跟着我！我开得很安全。

examples.en: He told his boss to get off his tail about the deadline.
examples.cn: 他告诉老板别在截止日期上催他了。

examples.en: If you get a fever, you should rest and drink fluids.
examples.cn: 如果你发烧了，应该休息并多喝水。

examples.en: She got a fever after being out in the rain.
examples.cn: 她在雨中外出后发烧了。

examples.en: I love you as much as she does.
examples.cn: 我和她一样爱你。

examples.en: He works as much as possible to save money.
examples.cn: 他尽可能多工作以省钱。

examples.en: As much as I want to help, I can't.
examples.cn: 尽管我想帮忙，但我不能。

examples.en: As much as it pains me, I have to say no.
examples.cn: 虽然这让我痛苦，但我必须拒绝。

examples.en: Take care on your trip!
examples.cn: 旅途保重！

examples.en: She always takes care when handling fragile items.
examples.cn: 她处理易碎物品时总是很小心。

examples.en: He takes care of his elderly parents.
examples.cn: 他照顾年迈的父母。

examples.en: Can you take care of the dog while I'm away?
examples.cn: 我不在时你能照顾这只狗吗？

examples.en: They offered a part exchange for my old car.
examples.cn: 他们为我的旧车提供了部分交换。

examples.en: Part exchange can reduce the cost of a new purchase.
examples.cn: 部分交换可以降低新购物的成本。

examples.en: She works as a teacher at the local school.
examples.cn: 她在当地学校担任教师。

examples.en: He worked as a consultant for several years.
examples.cn: 他担任顾问工作了好几年。

examples.en: In most cases, the problem can be solved easily.
examples.cn: 在大多数情况下，这个问题可以轻松解决。

examples.en: In most cases, he arrives on time.
examples.cn: 在大多数情况下，他准时到达。

examples.en: She's been on a diet for two months to lose weight.
examples.cn: 她为了减肥已经节食两个月了。

examples.en: After the holidays, I need to go on a diet to get back in shape.
examples.cn: 假期过后，我需要节食来恢复身材。

examples.en: He had to slam on the brakes to avoid hitting the deer.
examples.cn: 他不得不猛踩刹车以避免撞到鹿。

examples.en: When the light turned red, she slammed on the brakes suddenly.
examples.cn: 当红灯亮起时，她突然猛踩刹车。

examples.en: The critic slammed on the new movie for its poor plot.
examples.cn: 评论家严厉批评了这部新电影的情节糟糕。

examples.en: He slammed on the government's policies during the debate.
examples.cn: 他在辩论中猛烈抨击了政府的政策。

examples.en: If you keep practicing, you're bound to improve your skills.
examples.cn: 如果你坚持练习，你一定会提高你的技能。

examples.en: With such heavy rain, the match is bound to be postponed.
examples.cn: 下这么大的雨，比赛注定要被推迟。

examples.en: The company is bound to follow the new regulations.
examples.cn: 公司必须遵守新规定。

examples.en: As a citizen, you are bound to pay taxes.
examples.cn: 作为公民，你有义务纳税。

examples.en: She saved money so that she could buy a new car.
examples.cn: 她存钱是为了能买一辆新车。

examples.en: He spoke slowly so that everyone could understand him.
examples.cn: 他说得很慢，以便每个人都能理解他。

examples.en: The project will take no more than two weeks to complete.
examples.cn: 这个项目完成不会超过两周。

examples.en: He earns no more than $30,000 a year.
examples.cn: 他一年挣的钱不超过3万美元。

examples.en: It was no more than a minor mistake, so don't worry.
examples.cn: 这只不过是个小错误，所以别担心。

examples.en: She is no more than a beginner in this field.
examples.cn: 她在这个领域只不过是个初学者。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take a turn for the better

examples.en: After the treatment, his health took a turn for the better.
examples.cn: 治疗后，他的健康状况好转了。

examples.en: The economy is expected to take a turn for the better next year.
examples.cn: 预计经济明年会好转。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's heart set on sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 一心想要某物，决心得到

examples.en: She has her heart set on becoming a doctor.
examples.cn: 她一心想成为一名医生。

examples.en: He has his heart set on buying that vintage car.
examples.cn: 他决心要买那辆古董车。

examples.en: Don't get worked up over such a small issue.
examples.cn: 别为这么小的事情生气。

examples.en: He got worked up during the argument and started shouting.
examples.cn: 他在争论中变得激动并开始大喊大叫。

definitions.meaning_cn: 闭架书库（图书馆中不对外开放的区域）

examples.en: The rare books are kept in the closed stacks and require special permission to access.
examples.cn: 珍本书籍存放在闭架书库，需要特殊许可才能访问。

examples.en: In some libraries, the closed stacks are only open to researchers.
examples.cn: 在一些图书馆，闭架书库只对研究人员开放。

examples.en: I'm in the mood for pizza tonight.
examples.cn: 我今晚想吃披萨。

examples.en: She wasn't in the mood for watching a movie, so we went for a walk instead.
examples.cn: 她没有心情看电影，所以我们去散步了。

examples.en: It's time to take my break and have some coffee.
examples.cn: 是时候休息一下喝点咖啡了。

examples.en: Employees are allowed to take their breaks every two hours.
examples.cn: 员工被允许每两小时休息一次。

definitions.meaning_cn: 微弱的希望，渺茫的希望

examples.en: There's only a faint hope that the missing hiker will be found alive.
examples.cn: 失踪的徒步旅行者被活着找到的希望很渺茫。

examples.en: He clung to a faint hope that his application would be accepted.
examples.cn: 他抱着一丝微弱的希望，认为他的申请会被接受。

examples.en: We arrived at the ticket office, but we were out of luck as all tickets were sold out.
examples.cn: 我们到了售票处，但运气不好，所有票都卖光了。

examples.en: If you're looking for a job here, you might be out of luck because the market is slow.
examples.cn: 如果你想在这里找工作，你可能运气不好，因为市场不景气。

examples.en: The first item on the agenda is the budget discussion.
examples.cn: 议程上的第一个项目是预算讨论。

examples.en: We need to add this new issue as an item on the agenda for the next meeting.
examples.cn: 我们需要把这个新问题作为下次会议的议题添加到议程上。

examples.en: When planning the trip, we must take account of the weather conditions.
examples.cn: 计划旅行时，我们必须考虑到天气条件。

examples.en: The design takes account of the needs of elderly users.
examples.cn: 这个设计顾及了老年用户的需求。

examples.en: I opened a savings account to save money for my future studies.
examples.cn: 我开了一个储蓄账户，为将来的学习存钱。

examples.en: A savings account typically offers interest on the deposited funds.
examples.cn: 储蓄账户通常对存入的资金提供利息。

definitions.meaning_cn: 把某人误认为另一个人

examples.en: I took him for his brother because they look so similar.
examples.cn: 我把他误认为他的兄弟，因为他们长得太像了。

examples.en: She was taken for a celebrity due to her striking appearance.
examples.cn: 由于她引人注目的外表，她被误认为是一位名人。

definitions.meaning_cn: 认为某人是某种人（常带贬义）

examples.en: Don't take me for a fool; I know what you're up to.
examples.cn: 别把我当傻瓜；我知道你在搞什么鬼。

examples.en: He takes her for a reliable friend, but she often lets him down.
examples.cn: 他认为她是个可靠的朋友，但她经常让他失望。

examples.en: The internship offers opportunity for students to gain practical experience.
examples.cn: 这个实习为学生提供了获得实践经验的机会。

examples.en: This program offers opportunity for young artists to showcase their work.
examples.cn: 这个项目为年轻艺术家提供了展示作品的机会。

definitions.meaning_cn: 体面的薪水，不错的工资

examples.en: He earns a decent salary that allows him to live comfortably.
examples.cn: 他挣着一份体面的薪水，能让他生活舒适。

examples.en: The company offers a decent salary along with good benefits.
examples.cn: 公司提供不错的工资以及良好的福利。

examples.en: She had to keep up an act of being happy even though she was sad inside.
examples.cn: 即使内心悲伤，她也必须维持快乐的伪装。

examples.en: He kept up an act of confidence during the presentation, though he was nervous.
examples.cn: 在演示过程中，他继续假装自信，尽管他很紧张。

examples.en: We need to calculate the budget for next quarter before the meeting.
examples.cn: 我们需要在会议前计算下一季度的预算。

examples.en: She spent hours calculating the budget to ensure all expenses were covered.
examples.cn: 她花了几个小时计算预算，以确保所有费用都得到覆盖。

examples.en: The teacher caught him out when he tried to copy his friend's homework.
examples.cn: 当他试图抄袭朋友的作业时，老师发现了他。

examples.en: Her careful questions caught the suspect out in a lie.
examples.cn: 她仔细的问题发现了嫌疑人在说谎。

examples.en: The sudden rainstorm caught us out without umbrellas.
examples.cn: 突如其来的暴雨让我们措手不及，没带伞。

examples.en: The tricky exam question caught many students out.
examples.cn: 那道棘手的考试题目让许多学生措手不及。

examples.en: New cafes seem to sprout up on every corner in this neighborhood.
examples.cn: 这个街区的每个角落似乎都迅速出现了新咖啡馆。

examples.en: After the rain, mushrooms sprouted up overnight in the garden.
examples.cn: 雨后，花园里一夜之间长出了蘑菇。

definitions.meaning_cn: 离开或逃避（某地或某事）

examples.en: I need to get away from the city for a relaxing weekend.
examples.cn: 我需要离开城市去度一个放松的周末。

examples.en: He tried to get away from his stressful job by taking up a hobby.
examples.cn: 他试图通过培养一个爱好来逃避压力大的工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 摆脱（某人或某物的影响）

examples.en: It's hard to get away from the noise of construction nearby.
examples.cn: 很难摆脱附近施工的噪音。

examples.en: She wanted to get away from her overprotective parents and live independently.
examples.cn: 她想摆脱过度保护她的父母，独立生活。

examples.en: It took me a while to figure out how to use the new software.
examples.cn: 我花了一段时间才弄明白如何使用这个新软件。

examples.en: Can you figure out the answer to this math problem?
examples.cn: 你能解出这道数学题的答案吗？

examples.en: We need to figure out the total cost before making a decision.
examples.cn: 我们需要在做出决定前计算出总成本。

examples.en: She figured out the distance using a map and a ruler.
examples.cn: 她用地图和尺子计算出了距离。

examples.en: She has an interest in learning foreign languages and cultures.
examples.cn: 她对学习外语和文化感兴趣。

examples.en: He has always had an interest in astronomy since he was a child.
examples.cn: 他从小就对天文学感兴趣。

examples.en: The company has an interest in several startups in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 这家公司在科技行业的几家初创公司中拥有股份。

examples.en: They have an interest in the property and want to ensure its value increases.
examples.cn: 他们在这处房产中有利益，希望确保其价值增长。

examples.en: He took sick suddenly and had to cancel his appointments.
examples.cn: 他突然生病，不得不取消他的约会。

examples.en: Many employees took sick during the flu season, affecting productivity.
examples.cn: 流感季节期间，许多员工生病，影响了生产力。

examples.en: She always speaks up for her friends when they are unfairly criticized.
examples.cn: 当她的朋友受到不公正批评时，她总是为他们辩护。

examples.en: The lawyer spoke up for the defendant's rights in court.
examples.cn: 律师在法庭上为被告的权利辩护。

examples.en: I couldn't help laughing when I saw the funny video.
examples.cn: 当我看到那个有趣的视频时，我忍不住笑了。

examples.en: She couldn't help crying at the emotional ending of the movie.
examples.cn: 在电影感人的结尾处，她忍不住哭了。

examples.en: He set his heart on becoming a doctor from a young age.
examples.cn: 他从小就把心定在成为一名医生上。

examples.en: She set her heart on buying that vintage car, no matter the cost.
examples.cn: 她下定决心要买那辆古董车，无论代价如何。

examples.en: After a short break, we decided to travel on to the next city.
examples.cn: 短暂休息后，我们决定继续旅行到下一个城市。

examples.en: They traveled on through the night to reach their destination by morning.
examples.cn: 他们连夜继续旅行，以便在早上到达目的地。

examples.en: Tokyo is a megacity with a population of over 13 million people.
examples.cn: 东京是一个拥有超过1300万人口的超大城市。

examples.en: The small island has a village with a population of just 200 residents.
examples.cn: 这个小岛上有一个只有200名居民的村庄。

examples.en: The government tests fruits and vegetables for pesticide residue to ensure safety.
examples.cn: 政府检测水果和蔬菜中的农药残留以确保安全。

examples.en: Consumers are concerned about pesticide residue on their food and prefer organic options.
examples.cn: 消费者担心食物上的农药残留，更喜欢有机选择。

examples.en: The bank offers a savings account with a competitive interest rate of 2%.
examples.cn: 银行提供利率为2%的有竞争力的储蓄账户。

examples.en: Rising interest rates can make loans more expensive for borrowers.
examples.cn: 利率上升可能使借款人的贷款更加昂贵。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与邻居攀比，追求物质上的不落后

examples.en: They bought a new car just to keep up with the Joneses, even though their old one was fine.
examples.cn: 他们买了一辆新车只是为了与邻居攀比，尽管旧车还好好的。

examples.en: In some communities, there's pressure to keep up with the Joneses by having the latest gadgets.
examples.cn: 在一些社区，有通过拥有最新小工具来与邻居攀比的压力。

examples.en: It's important to differentiate between facts and opinions in academic writing.
examples.cn: 在学术写作中，区分事实和观点很重要。

examples.en: The expert can easily differentiate between genuine and counterfeit products.
examples.cn: 专家可以轻松区分真品和假冒产品。

definitions.meaning_cn: 给...留下深刻印象或受欢迎

examples.en: Her new song made a hit with audiences and quickly topped the charts.
examples.cn: 她的新歌给观众留下了深刻印象，并迅速登上了排行榜榜首。

examples.en: The comedian's jokes made a hit with the crowd, who laughed throughout the show.
examples.cn: 喜剧演员的笑话给人群留下了深刻印象，他们在整个演出中都笑了。

examples.en: The construction project got the go-ahead from the city council after months of review.
examples.cn: 经过数月的审查，这个建筑项目获得了市议会的批准。

examples.en: We can start the marketing campaign once we get the go-ahead from management.
examples.cn: 一旦获得管理层的批准，我们就可以开始营销活动。

examples.en: Investors can draw dividend from their stock holdings quarterly.
examples.cn: 投资者可以每季度从他们的股票持有中领取股息。

examples.en: She decided to draw dividend from her investments to supplement her retirement income.
examples.cn: 她决定从投资中领取股息来补充退休收入。

examples.en: A huge explosion rocked the city, causing widespread damage.
examples.cn: 一次巨大爆炸震撼了城市，造成了广泛的破坏。

examples.en: The firefighters responded quickly to the scene of the huge explosion.
examples.cn: 消防员迅速响应了巨大爆炸的现场。

examples.en: She has been suffering from insomnia for months, often lying awake until dawn.
examples.cn: 她患有失眠症已经好几个月了，经常躺到天亮也睡不着。

examples.en: Many people suffer from insomnia due to stress and anxiety.
examples.cn: 许多人因压力和焦虑而患有失眠症。

examples.en: Please go away and let me finish my work in peace.
examples.cn: 请走开，让我安静地完成工作。

examples.en: The pain will go away after you take this medicine.
examples.cn: 吃了这药后，疼痛就会消失。

examples.en: We plan to go away for the weekend to a quiet beach.
examples.cn: 我们计划周末去一个安静的海滩度假。

examples.en: He went away on a business trip to Japan last week.
examples.cn: 他上周去日本出差了。

examples.en: The company decided to computerise the service to improve efficiency and reduce errors.
examples.cn: 公司决定将服务计算机化以提高效率并减少错误。

examples.en: Many banks have computerised their customer service systems.
examples.cn: 许多银行已经将客户服务系统计算机化了。

examples.en: The key was found at the bottom of the drawer.
examples.cn: 钥匙在抽屉底部找到了。

examples.en: There is a note at the bottom of the page explaining the terms.
examples.cn: 页面底部有一个注释解释了条款。

examples.en: Lack of communication is at the bottom of most relationship problems.
examples.cn: 缺乏沟通是大多数关系问题的根本原因。

examples.en: Financial issues are often at the bottom of business failures.
examples.cn: 财务问题往往是企业失败的根本原因。

examples.en: The academic calendar for the upcoming year includes holidays and exam periods.
examples.cn: 下一年的校历包括了假期和考试期。

examples.en: Students should check the academic calendar for important dates like registration deadlines.
examples.cn: 学生应查看校历以了解注册截止日期等重要日期。

examples.en: She bent over backwards to help her friend move to a new apartment.
examples.cn: 她竭尽全力帮助朋友搬到新公寓。

examples.en: The company bends over backwards to ensure customer satisfaction.
examples.cn: 公司不遗余力地确保客户满意。

examples.en: Her mathematical talents were evident from a young age, solving complex problems easily.
examples.cn: 她从小就展现出数学才能，能轻松解决复杂问题。

examples.en: The school nurtures students with mathematical talents through special programs.
examples.cn: 学校通过特殊项目培养有数学才能的学生。

examples.en: It's important to be objective about the situation before making a decision.
examples.cn: 在做决定之前，对情况保持客观很重要。

examples.en: As a journalist, she tries to be objective about the news she reports.
examples.cn: 作为一名记者，她努力对她报道的新闻保持客观。

examples.en: The negotiations came to a dead end when neither side would compromise.
examples.cn: 当双方都不愿妥协时，谈判陷入了僵局。

examples.en: His research came to a dead end after he ran out of funding.
examples.cn: 他的研究在资金用完后走到了尽头。

examples.en: First and foremost, we need to ensure the safety of all employees.
examples.cn: 首先，我们需要确保所有员工的安全。

examples.en: He is first and foremost a teacher, dedicated to his students.
examples.cn: 他首先是一位老师，致力于他的学生。

examples.en: In a globalised world, businesses must adapt to international markets.
examples.cn: 在全球化的世界中，企业必须适应国际市场。

examples.en: Cultural exchange is essential in a globalised world to foster understanding.
examples.cn: 在全球化的世界中，文化交流对于促进理解至关重要。

examples.en: New evidence came to light that changed the course of the investigation.
examples.cn: 新证据暴露出来，改变了调查的方向。

examples.en: The scandal came to light after a whistleblower reported it.
examples.cn: 在举报人报告后，丑闻被发现了。

examples.en: I need to have my hair cut before the job interview next week.
examples.cn: 我需要在下周工作面试前理发。

examples.en: She had her hair cut short for the summer.
examples.cn: 她为了夏天把头发剪短了。

examples.en: They made a bargain with the supplier to get a better price.
examples.cn: 他们与供应商达成协议以获得更好的价格。

examples.en: He made a bargain with his friend to share the workload.
examples.cn: 他与朋友达成协议分担工作量。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's nose in a book

examples.en: She always has her nose in a book, even during breaks.
examples.cn: 她总是埋头读书，甚至在休息时间也是如此。

examples.en: As a child, he had his nose in a book most of the time.
examples.cn: 小时候，他大部分时间都专心阅读。

examples.en: After the fall, he struggled to his feet and continued walking.
examples.cn: 摔倒后，他挣扎着站起来继续走。

examples.en: The injured player struggled to his feet with the help of teammates.
examples.cn: 受伤的球员在队友的帮助下挣扎着站起来。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put one's nose to the grindstone

examples.en: With exams approaching, she put her nose to the grindstone and studied every day.
examples.cn: 随着考试临近，她埋头苦干，每天学习。

examples.en: He put his nose to the grindstone to finish the project on time.
examples.cn: 他努力工作以按时完成项目。

examples.en: You should drink at least eight glasses of water a day for good health.
examples.cn: 为了健康，你每天至少应该喝八杯水。

examples.en: At least we have a roof over our heads, even if it's small.
examples.cn: 至少我们有个遮风挡雨的地方，即使它很小。

examples.en: At least, we tried our best, even if we didn't succeed.
examples.cn: 无论如何，我们尽力了，即使没有成功。

examples.en: He's late, but at least he called to let us know.
examples.cn: 他迟到了，但不管怎样他打电话通知了我们。

examples.en: The exam results will be announced next Monday on the school website.
examples.cn: 考试成绩将于下周一在学校网站上公布。

examples.en: She was anxious about her exam results, hoping to get into a good university.
examples.cn: 她对考试成绩感到焦虑，希望能进入一所好大学。

examples.en: Parents are often concerned about their children's safety.
examples.cn: 父母常常担心孩子的安全。

examples.en: She is concerned about the environmental impact of the project.
examples.cn: 她关心这个项目对环境的影响。

examples.en: He was concerned about his friend's health after the accident.
examples.cn: 事故后，他挂念朋友的健康。

examples.en: The team is concerned about meeting the deadline.
examples.cn: 团队忧虑能否按时完成。

examples.en: The rescue team freed the trapped animal from the net.
examples.cn: 救援队把被困的动物从网中释放出来。

examples.en: She freed her mind from distractions to focus on work.
examples.cn: 她摆脱干扰，专注于工作。

examples.en: The new policy aims to free businesses from excessive regulations.
examples.cn: 新政策旨在免除企业过多的监管。

examples.en: He was freed from his duties after the investigation.
examples.cn: 调查后，他被解除了职责。

definitions.meaning_cn: 坚持不懈地做，努力从事

examples.en: She pegged away at her studies until she mastered the subject.
examples.cn: 她坚持不懈地学习，直到掌握了这门学科。

examples.en: He's been pegging away at the project for months.
examples.cn: 他几个月来一直在努力做这个项目。

examples.en: The discussion centred upon the main issues of the debate.
examples.cn: 讨论集中于辩论的主要问题。

examples.en: Her research centres upon climate change effects.
examples.cn: 她的研究以气候变化影响为中心。

examples.en: We must find ways to sustain our civilisation without harming the planet.
examples.cn: 我们必须找到在不伤害地球的情况下维持文明的方法。

examples.en: Sustainable practices are key to sustaining our civilisation for future generations.
examples.cn: 可持续实践是维持文明给后代的关键。

examples.en: She entered for the marathon to challenge herself.
examples.cn: 她报名参加马拉松来挑战自己。

examples.en: Students can enter for the competition by submitting their projects.
examples.cn: 学生可以通过提交项目来登记参与比赛。

examples.en: Due to work commitments, he couldn't attend the family event.
examples.cn: 由于工作承诺，他无法参加家庭活动。

examples.en: She manages her work commitments efficiently to maintain a work-life balance.
examples.cn: 她高效管理职业责任以保持工作与生活的平衡。

examples.en: In an emergency, it's important to get your wits about you and think clearly.
examples.cn: 紧急情况下，保持冷静并清晰思考很重要。

examples.en: After the shock, she got her wits about her and called for help.
examples.cn: 震惊之后，她恢复理智并呼救。

examples.en: I've just about finished my homework.
examples.cn: 我差不多完成了作业。

examples.en: The project is just about ready for launch.
examples.cn: 这个项目几乎准备好启动了。

examples.en: He just about made it to the meeting on time.
examples.cn: 他勉强准时赶到了会议。

examples.en: The car just about fits in the parking space.
examples.cn: 这辆车刚刚能停进车位。

examples.en: Employees are obliged to follow company policies.
examples.cn: 员工有义务遵守公司政策。

examples.en: He was obliged to pay the fine for the violation.
examples.cn: 他必须为违规支付罚款。

examples.en: I am obliged to you for your help.
examples.cn: 我感谢你的帮助。

examples.en: We are obliged to the community for their support.
examples.cn: 我们感激社区的支持。

examples.en: She keeps track of her expenses in a spreadsheet.
examples.cn: 她在电子表格中记录她的开支。

examples.en: It's hard to keep track of all the changes in the schedule.
examples.cn: 很难跟踪日程中的所有变化。

examples.en: Parents need to keep track of their children's online activities.
examples.cn: 父母需要关注孩子的在线活动。

examples.en: He keeps track of the latest news in his field.
examples.cn: 他留意他领域的最新新闻。

examples.en: She fell ill with the flu and had to stay home.
examples.cn: 她患了流感，不得不待在家里。

examples.en: Many people fall ill during the winter season.
examples.cn: 许多人在冬季生病。

examples.en: He tried to finish the report before the deadline.
examples.cn: 他尝试在截止日期前完成报告。

examples.en: She tries to exercise every day for her health.
examples.cn: 她为了健康努力每天锻炼。

definitions.meaning_cn: 愿意付出极大代价，不惜一切

examples.en: He would give his right arm for a chance to meet his idol.
examples.cn: 他愿意付出极大代价来见他的偶像。

examples.en: She'd give her right arm for a promotion at work.
examples.cn: 她不惜一切想要工作晋升。

examples.en: In comparison, the new model is much more efficient.
examples.cn: 相比之下，新模型效率高得多。

examples.en: Her performance was excellent in comparison to last year.
examples.cn: 比较而言，她的表现比去年优秀。

examples.en: The company plans to phase out the old software by next year.
examples.cn: 公司计划明年逐步淘汰旧软件。

examples.en: Governments are phasing out single-use plastics to reduce waste.
examples.cn: 政府正在逐步淘汰一次性塑料以减少浪费。

examples.en: New technologies can help improve productivity in the workplace.
examples.cn: 新技术可以帮助提高工作场所的生产力。

examples.en: Training programs are designed to improve productivity among employees.
examples.cn: 培训项目旨在提升员工的效率。

examples.en: The decision kicked up a lot of controversy among the staff.
examples.cn: 这个决定在员工中引起了很多争议。

examples.en: He kicked up a fuss when his order was delayed.
examples.cn: 订单延迟时，他激起了骚动。

examples.en: The children kicked up leaves while playing in the park.
examples.cn: 孩子们在公园玩耍时踢起了树叶。

examples.en: The wind kicked up dust on the road.
examples.cn: 风扬起了路上的灰尘。

examples.en: Factories must treat waste water before releasing it into rivers.
examples.cn: 工厂必须在将废水排入河流前进行处理。

examples.en: Proper management of waste water is crucial for public health.
examples.cn: 妥善管理污水对公共健康至关重要。

examples.en: Don't waste water by leaving the tap running.
examples.cn: 不要让水龙头开着浪费水。

examples.en: He wastes water by taking long showers.
examples.cn: 他洗长时间淋浴浪费水。

definitions.meaning_cn: 宽带连接，指高速互联网接入

examples.en: A stable broadband connection is essential for remote work.
examples.cn: 稳定的宽带连接对于远程工作至关重要。

examples.en: The company upgraded its broadband connection to fiber optics.
examples.cn: 该公司将其宽带连接升级为光纤。

examples.en: I need to put my hands on that document before the meeting.
examples.cn: 我需要在会议前找到那份文件。

examples.en: She managed to put her hands on a rare book at the library.
examples.cn: 她在图书馆设法找到了一本稀有书籍。

examples.en: Don't put your hands on the wet paint.
examples.cn: 不要触摸未干的油漆。

examples.en: He put his hands on the sculpture to feel its texture.
examples.cn: 他用手触摸雕塑以感受其质地。

examples.en: Let's meet up for coffee this weekend.
examples.cn: 我们这周末见面喝咖啡吧。

examples.en: They met up at the park to discuss the project.
examples.cn: 他们在公园见面讨论项目。

definitions.meaning_cn: 明确表达自己的立场或观点

examples.en: During the debate, she made her position clear on environmental issues.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她明确表达了自己在环境问题上的立场。

examples.en: The manager made his position clear regarding the new policy.
examples.cn: 经理就新政策明确表达了自己的立场。

definitions.meaning_cn: 少年犯，指犯罪的未成年人

examples.en: The program aims to rehabilitate young offenders.
examples.cn: 该项目旨在改造少年犯。

examples.en: Young offenders are often handled differently in the justice system.
examples.cn: 少年犯在司法系统中通常被区别对待。

definitions.meaning_cn: 兜圈子，指重复无进展或原地打转

examples.en: The discussion went in circles without reaching a conclusion.
examples.cn: 讨论兜圈子，没有得出结论。

examples.en: If we keep going in circles, we'll never solve this problem.
examples.cn: 如果我们继续兜圈子，永远解决不了这个问题。

definitions.meaning_cn: 登山，指攀登山峰的运动或活动

examples.en: Mountain climbing requires physical fitness and proper gear.
examples.cn: 登山需要良好的体力和合适的装备。

examples.en: They went mountain climbing in the Alps last summer.
examples.cn: 他们去年夏天去阿尔卑斯山登山了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 工作职责，指职位所要求的任务和义务

examples.en: Her job responsibility includes managing the team's budget.
examples.cn: 她的工作职责包括管理团队的预算。

examples.en: Understanding your job responsibility is key to performance.
examples.cn: 理解你的工作职责是表现的关键。

examples.en: The government implemented laws to curb smoking in public places.
examples.cn: 政府实施法律以控制公共场所吸烟。

examples.en: Efforts to curb smoking have led to a decline in lung cancer rates.
examples.cn: 控制吸烟的努力已导致肺癌率下降。

definitions.meaning_cn: 误导公众，指提供虚假或欺骗性信息

examples.en: The advertisement was accused of misleading the public about the product's benefits.
examples.cn: 该广告被指控在产品益处方面误导公众。

examples.en: Politicians should not mislead the public with false promises.
examples.cn: 政治家不应以虚假承诺误导公众。

examples.en: We need to make allowances for his inexperience in this role.
examples.cn: 我们需要考虑到他在这个角色上缺乏经验。

examples.en: The teacher made allowances for the student's illness when grading.
examples.cn: 老师在评分时体谅了学生的病情。

examples.en: Please take out the trash before you leave.
examples.cn: 请在离开前把垃圾拿出来。

examples.en: He took out his wallet to pay for the meal.
examples.cn: 他拿出钱包支付餐费。

examples.en: I'll take out pizza for dinner tonight.
examples.cn: 我今晚会外带披萨当晚餐。

examples.en: They prefer to take out food rather than dine in.
examples.cn: 他们更喜欢外带食物而不是堂食。

examples.en: The judge will deliver a judgment in the case next week.
examples.cn: 法官将在下周对此案作出判决。

examples.en: After reviewing the evidence, the court delivered a judgment of not guilty.
examples.cn: 审查证据后，法庭宣判无罪。

examples.en: Drastic climatic variation is affecting agriculture worldwide.
examples.cn: 剧烈的气候变化正在影响全球农业。

examples.en: Scientists study drastic climatic variation to predict future weather patterns.
examples.cn: 科学家研究剧烈的气候变化以预测未来天气模式。

examples.en: She is senior to me in the company hierarchy.
examples.cn: 她在公司层级中比我资历更深。

examples.en: My brother is senior to me by five years.
examples.cn: 我哥哥比我年长五岁。

definitions.meaning_cn: 领导技能，指引导和管理他人的能力

examples.en: Good leadership skills are essential for managing a team effectively.
examples.cn: 良好的领导技能对于有效管理团队至关重要。

examples.en: He developed his leadership skills through training and experience.
examples.cn: 他通过培训和经验发展了自己的领导技能。

definitions.meaning_cn: 更喜欢，表示在两个或多个选项中选择其一

examples.en: I prefer to drink tea rather than coffee in the morning.
examples.cn: 我早上更喜欢喝茶而不是咖啡。

examples.en: She prefers to work from home on Fridays.
examples.cn: 她更喜欢周五在家工作。

examples.en: Get a move on, or we'll be late for the movie.
examples.cn: 快点，否则我们看电影要迟到了。

examples.en: We need to get a move on to finish this project on time.
examples.cn: 我们需要赶紧完成这个项目以按时交付。

examples.en: Combine the flour with the eggs to make the dough.
examples.cn: 将面粉与鸡蛋混合制作面团。

examples.en: This software combines with other tools to enhance productivity.
examples.cn: 这款软件与其他工具结合以提高生产力。

examples.en: The company is lagging behind its competitors in technology.
examples.cn: 这家公司在技术上落后于竞争对手。

examples.en: She tends to lag behind during group hikes.
examples.cn: 在团体徒步时，她常常落在后面。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使（新物品）逐渐适应使用，磨合

examples.en: It takes time to break in a new pair of shoes.
examples.cn: 磨合一双新鞋需要时间。

examples.en: He's breaking in the new car by driving it gently.
examples.cn: 他通过轻柔驾驶来磨合这辆新车。

examples.en: Someone tried to break in through the back door last night.
examples.cn: 昨晚有人试图从后门闯入。

examples.en: The thieves broke in while the family was on vacation.
examples.cn: 小偷趁这家人度假时闯了进去。

examples.en: The government is faced with a difficult decision on the budget.
examples.cn: 政府在预算上面临一个艰难的决定。

examples.en: She was faced with the challenge of learning a new language.
examples.cn: 她面临着学习一门新语言的挑战。

examples.en: He struggled to get his point across during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议上努力传达自己的观点。

examples.en: Using simple language helps get the message across to children.
examples.cn: 使用简单的语言有助于让孩子们理解信息。

examples.en: There is some confusion as to the exact date of the event.
examples.cn: 关于活动的确切日期，存在一些困惑。

examples.en: As to your question, I will need to consult my notes.
examples.cn: 至于你的问题，我需要查阅我的笔记。

examples.en: I used to play the piano when I was younger.
examples.cn: 我年轻时常常弹钢琴。

examples.en: They used to live in the city before moving to the countryside.
examples.cn: 在搬到乡村之前，他们过去住在城市里。

valid_entries.original_phrase: kill two birds with one stone

examples.en: By combining the meetings, we can kill two birds with one stone.
examples.cn: 通过合并会议，我们可以一举两得。

examples.en: She killed two birds with one stone by exercising while listening to audiobooks.
examples.cn: 她通过边锻炼边听有声书，实现了一举两得。

examples.en: The chaos ensued from the sudden power outage.
examples.cn: 混乱是由突然停电引起的。

examples.en: Legal disputes often ensue from unclear contracts.
examples.cn: 法律纠纷常常由不明确的合同引起。

examples.en: All children are required to attend school until a certain age.
examples.cn: 所有儿童在达到一定年龄前都必须上学。

examples.en: She attends school in the city and commutes daily.
examples.cn: 她在城市上学，每天通勤。

examples.en: The festival showcases works by talented filmmakers from around the world.
examples.cn: 这个电影节展示了来自世界各地有才华的电影制作人的作品。

examples.en: Talented filmmakers often push the boundaries of storytelling.
examples.cn: 有才华的电影制作人常常突破讲故事的界限。

examples.en: We're on the same wavelength when it comes to project goals.
examples.cn: 在项目目标上，我们的想法一致。

examples.en: Good friends are often on the same wavelength without saying a word.
examples.cn: 好朋友常常无需言语就能心有灵犀。

examples.en: The smell in the kitchen was from rotten meat left in the fridge.
examples.cn: 厨房里的气味来自冰箱里留下的腐烂的肉。

examples.en: Eating rotten meat can cause food poisoning.
examples.cn: 吃腐烂的肉可能导致食物中毒。

valid_entries.original_phrase: give sb. the shirt off one's back

definitions.meaning_cn: 倾其所有帮助某人，非常慷慨

examples.en: He's so kind that he'd give you the shirt off his back if you needed it.
examples.cn: 他非常善良，如果你需要，他会倾其所有帮助你。

examples.en: In times of crisis, true friends give you the shirt off their back.
examples.cn: 在危机时刻，真正的朋友会非常慷慨地帮助你。

examples.en: Studies show that exercise correlates with better mental health.
examples.cn: 研究表明，锻炼与更好的心理健康相关。

examples.en: The data correlates with previous research findings.
examples.cn: 这些数据与之前的研究发现相关。

definitions.meaning_cn: 表现出主动性，积极主动

examples.en: Employees who show initiative are often promoted quickly.
examples.cn: 表现出主动性的员工常常晋升很快。

examples.en: She showed initiative by proposing a new solution to the problem.
examples.cn: 她通过提出问题的新解决方案，表现出了主动性。

examples.en: Schools should focus on helping students develop their talents.
examples.cn: 学校应专注于帮助学生培养他们的才能。

examples.en: He took extra classes to develop his musical talents.
examples.cn: 他上了额外的课程来发展他的音乐天赋。

examples.en: The teacher hushed up the noisy classroom.
examples.cn: 老师让吵闹的教室安静下来。

examples.en: The company tried to hush up the scandal to avoid bad publicity.
examples.cn: 公司试图掩盖丑闻以避免负面宣传。

examples.en: I'm looking for a new job in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 我正在科技行业寻找一份新工作。

examples.en: She looked for her keys everywhere but couldn't find them.
examples.cn: 她到处寻找她的钥匙，但找不到。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get sth. through one's thick skull

definitions.meaning_cn: 让某人理解（常用于表达不耐烦），开窍

examples.en: I've told him a hundred times, but I can't get it through his thick skull.
examples.cn: 我已经告诉他一百遍了，但我无法让他理解。

examples.en: It took a while to get the safety rules through his thick skull.
examples.cn: 花了一段时间才让他理解安全规则。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人感到恶心或厌恶

examples.en: The graphic details of the accident turned my stomach.
examples.cn: 事故的详细描述让我感到恶心。

examples.en: His rude comments about her appearance turned everyone's stomach.
examples.cn: 他对她外貌的粗鲁评论让所有人都感到厌恶。

definitions.meaning_cn: 反复提及某人的失败或错误以使其更难受

examples.en: After I lost the game, he kept rubbing it in by mentioning my mistakes.
examples.cn: 我输了比赛后，他不断提及我的错误来让我更难受。

examples.en: She didn't need to rub it in that I was late again.
examples.cn: 她没必要反复强调我又迟到了。

examples.en: The store sells fruits, vegetables, dairy products, and so forth.
examples.cn: 这家商店出售水果、蔬菜、乳制品等等。

examples.en: He listed his hobbies as reading, hiking, painting, and so forth.
examples.cn: 他列举了自己的爱好，如阅读、徒步、绘画等等。

examples.en: The government sent troops to crash the rebellion in the northern region.
examples.cn: 政府派遣军队镇压北部地区的叛乱。

examples.en: They managed to crash the rebellion before it could spread further.
examples.cn: 他们在叛乱进一步扩散前成功将其粉碎。

examples.en: She arranged for a taxi to pick us up at the airport.
examples.cn: 她安排了一辆出租车在机场接我们。

examples.en: He arranged for the meeting to be held next Monday.
examples.cn: 他安排会议在下周一举行。

definitions.meaning_cn: 把某人或某物包括在内

examples.en: Please count me in for the weekend trip.
examples.cn: 请把我也算进周末旅行中。

examples.en: Don't forget to count in the extra expenses when budgeting.
examples.cn: 做预算时别忘了把额外开支包括在内。

examples.en: We decided to take a stroll around the park after dinner.
examples.cn: 我们决定晚饭后在公园里散步。

examples.en: He likes to take a stroll around the neighborhood in the evenings.
examples.cn: 他喜欢晚上在附近散步。

examples.en: The package should weigh not more than 5 kilograms.
examples.cn: 包裹重量不应超过5公斤。

examples.en: She spent not more than an hour on the assignment.
examples.cn: 她在这项任务上花费了不超过一小时。

examples.en: He got into a mess by forgetting to pay his bills on time.
examples.cn: 他因忘记按时付账单而陷入困境。

examples.en: The project got into a mess due to poor planning.
examples.cn: 由于计划不周，这个项目陷入混乱。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事感到惊奇或惊讶

examples.en: I wonder at her ability to stay calm under pressure.
examples.cn: 我对她在压力下保持冷静的能力感到惊奇。

examples.en: They wondered at the beauty of the ancient architecture.
examples.cn: 他们对古建筑的美丽感到惊讶。

examples.en: The main course is cooking; in the meantime, let's have some appetizers.
examples.cn: 主菜正在烹饪；与此同时，我们吃些开胃菜吧。

examples.en: She is waiting for the results; in the meantime, she is looking for other opportunities.
examples.cn: 她在等待结果；在此期间，她正在寻找其他机会。

examples.en: The team worked hard to complete the project on time.
examples.cn: 团队努力工作以按时完成项目。

examples.en: She needs to complete the project by the end of the month.
examples.cn: 她需要在月底前完成这个项目。

examples.en: I'll wait for you at the entrance.
examples.cn: 我会在入口处等你。

examples.en: They are waiting for the bus to arrive.
examples.cn: 他们在等公交车到来。

valid_entries.original_phrase: go into one's song and dance about sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 开始长篇大论或夸张地谈论某事

examples.en: Every time he talks about his vacation, he goes into his song and dance about it.
examples.cn: 每次他谈论假期时，都会开始长篇大论。

examples.en: She went into her song and dance about how difficult the task was.
examples.cn: 她开始夸张地谈论这项任务有多难。

examples.en: He is accustomed to waking up early for work.
examples.cn: 他习惯于早起工作。

examples.en: She is accustomed to the cold weather after living there for years.
examples.cn: 在那里生活多年后，她习惯了寒冷的天气。

definitions.meaning_cn: 减轻某事的强度或不适

examples.en: A cup of tea can take the edge off your stress.
examples.cn: 一杯茶可以减轻你的压力。

examples.en: The painkiller took the edge off his headache.
examples.cn: 止痛药减轻了他的头痛。

definitions.meaning_cn: 种子繁殖，植物通过种子进行繁殖

examples.en: Seed reproduction is common in many flowering plants.
examples.cn: 种子繁殖在许多开花植物中很常见。

examples.en: The study focuses on the mechanisms of seed reproduction in crops.
examples.cn: 这项研究专注于作物种子繁殖的机制。

examples.en: The constant noise from the construction made him go around the bend.
examples.cn: 建筑工地的持续噪音让他发疯。

examples.en: She went around the bend when she found out about the mistake.
examples.cn: 当她发现这个错误时，她变得非常愤怒。

examples.en: This information is relevant to our discussion.
examples.cn: 这条信息与我们的讨论相关。

examples.en: His experience is relevant to the job requirements.
examples.cn: 他的经验与工作要求相关。

examples.en: She took a shine to the new puppy immediately.
examples.cn: 她立刻对那只新小狗产生了好感。

examples.en: He took a shine to classical music after attending the concert.
examples.cn: 参加音乐会后，他开始喜欢上古典音乐。

examples.en: The teacher held her up as an example of hard work.
examples.cn: 老师把她作为勤奋工作的榜样。

examples.en: They held the company up as an example of innovation.
examples.cn: 他们把这家公司作为创新的典范。

examples.en: They settled the dispute through mediation.
examples.cn: 他们通过调解解决了争端。

examples.en: The court helped settle the dispute between the neighbors.
examples.cn: 法院帮助解决了邻居之间的纠纷。

examples.en: His behavior is akin to that of a child.
examples.cn: 他的行为类似于孩子。

examples.en: The process is akin to baking a cake.
examples.cn: 这个过程类似于烤蛋糕。

examples.en: Environmental protection is crucial for future generations.
examples.cn: 环境保护对后代至关重要。

examples.en: The government has implemented new policies for environmental protection.
examples.cn: 政府实施了新的环境保护政策。

definitions.meaning_cn: 最近怎么样？或有什么事吗？（问候语）

examples.en: Hey, what's up? Haven't seen you in a while.
examples.cn: 嘿，最近怎么样？好久没见你了。

examples.en: What's up? You look worried.
examples.cn: 有什么事吗？你看起来很担心。

definitions.meaning_cn: 建立、设立或安排某事物

examples.en: They set up a new business last year.
examples.cn: 他们去年建立了一家新公司。

examples.en: Can you help me set up the meeting room?
examples.cn: 你能帮我安排会议室吗？

examples.en: He was set up by his rivals to take the blame.
examples.cn: 他被对手陷害来承担责任。

examples.en: The evidence suggests she was set up in the crime.
examples.cn: 证据表明她在这起犯罪中被诬陷了。

examples.en: She decided to take a hand in organizing the event.
examples.cn: 她决定参与组织这个活动。

examples.en: He took a hand in resolving the conflict.
examples.cn: 他介入解决了冲突。

definitions.meaning_cn: 做错事而未受惩罚或逃脱责任

examples.en: He got away with cheating on the test.
examples.cn: 他考试作弊而未受惩罚。

examples.en: They got away with breaking the rules because no one noticed.
examples.cn: 他们违反规则而逃脱了责任，因为没人注意到。

definitions.meaning_cn: 想象出或虚构出某事物

examples.en: She dreamed up a fantastic story for her novel.
examples.cn: 她为小说想象出了一个奇妙的故事。

examples.en: He dreamed up a new invention in his spare time.
examples.cn: 他在业余时间虚构了一项新发明。

examples.en: He went back on his word and didn't help as promised.
examples.cn: 他食言了，没有像承诺的那样提供帮助。

examples.en: It's important not to go back on your word in business.
examples.cn: 在商业中不食言很重要。

examples.en: Many young people admire celebrities for their talent.
examples.cn: 许多年轻人因名人的才华而钦佩他们。

examples.en: She admires celebrities who use their fame for good causes.
examples.cn: 她崇拜那些利用名声做好事的名人。

examples.en: She prepared an outline of her speech before writing it.
examples.cn: 她在写演讲稿之前准备了一个提纲。

examples.en: The outline of the speech included key points and examples.
examples.cn: 演讲的提纲包括了要点和例子。

definitions.meaning_cn: 知道或听说过某人或某事（但不一定详细了解）

examples.en: I know of him, but I've never met him personally.
examples.cn: 我听说过他，但从未亲自见过。

examples.en: Do you know of any good restaurants in this area?
examples.cn: 你知道这个地区有什么好餐厅吗？

examples.en: Web-based technology has revolutionized communication.
examples.cn: 基于网络的技术彻底改变了通信方式。

examples.en: The company uses web-based technology for its online services.
examples.cn: 这家公司使用基于网络的技术提供在线服务。

definitions.meaning_cn: 超出某人的理解能力或权限

examples.en: The technical details went over my head during the presentation.
examples.cn: 演示中的技术细节超出了我的理解能力。

examples.en: He went over his boss's head to complain to the manager.
examples.cn: 他越过上司向经理投诉。

definitions.meaning_cn: 依赖或信赖某人或某事物

examples.en: We place reliance on our team to complete the project.
examples.cn: 我们依赖团队来完成这个项目。

examples.en: It's unwise to place too much reliance on a single source.
examples.cn: 过度依赖单一来源是不明智的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 做自己擅长或喜欢的事，按自己的方式行事

examples.en: Just let him do his thing; he knows what he's doing.
examples.cn: 就让他按自己的方式行事吧；他知道自己在做什么。

examples.en: She does her thing in the art studio every weekend.
examples.cn: 她每个周末都在艺术工作室做自己喜欢的事。

examples.en: They developed a lifelong friendship during college.
examples.cn: 他们在大学期间建立了终身的友谊。

examples.en: It's rare to develop a lifelong friendship with someone you meet online.
examples.cn: 与在网上认识的人建立终身友谊是罕见的。

examples.en: The company profited from the new market trends.
examples.cn: 公司从新的市场趋势中获利。

examples.en: She profited from the experience by learning new skills.
examples.cn: 她通过这次经历学习新技能而受益。

definitions.meaning_cn: 获得盛大的送别或欢送

examples.en: The retiring CEO got a big send-off with speeches and gifts from the entire company.
examples.cn: 即将退休的首席执行官获得了全公司演讲和礼物的盛大欢送。

examples.en: When she moved abroad, her friends organized a big send-off party at the local pub.
examples.cn: 当她移居国外时，朋友们在当地酒吧组织了一场盛大的送别派对。

examples.en: After years of experience, he finally landed a well-paid job at a tech startup.
examples.cn: 经过多年的经验积累，他最终在一家科技初创公司找到了一份高薪工作。

examples.en: Many people seek a well-paid job to afford a comfortable lifestyle in the city.
examples.cn: 许多人寻求高薪工作以负担城市中的舒适生活。

examples.en: The coffee was too hot to drink immediately, so I waited a few minutes.
examples.cn: 咖啡太烫了，不能立即喝，所以我等了几分钟。

examples.en: She was too tired to finish the marathon, so she stopped halfway.
examples.cn: 她太累了，无法完成马拉松，所以中途停了下来。

definitions.meaning_cn: 尽管困难重重，出乎意料地成功

examples.en: Against all the odds, the small team won the championship despite being the underdogs.
examples.cn: 尽管困难重重，这支小团队作为劣势方赢得了冠军。

examples.en: She recovered from the illness against all the odds, amazing her doctors.
examples.cn: 她出乎意料地从疾病中康复，让医生们感到惊讶。

examples.en: Don't blame me for the delay; the traffic was terrible this morning.
examples.cn: 别因延误责备我；今天早上的交通太糟糕了。

examples.en: The manager blamed the employee for the mistake in the report.
examples.cn: 经理因报告中的错误责备了那名员工。

examples.en: Paris is famous for its tourist attractions like the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre.
examples.cn: 巴黎以其旅游景点如埃菲尔铁塔和卢浮宫而闻名。

examples.en: We visited several tourist attractions during our vacation in Japan.
examples.cn: 我们在日本度假期间参观了几个旅游景点。

examples.en: Prices vary from store to store, so it's good to compare before buying.
examples.cn: 价格因商店而异，所以购买前比较一下是好的。

examples.en: The weather can vary from sunny to rainy very quickly in this region.
examples.cn: 在这个地区，天气可以从晴天迅速变化到雨天。

definitions.meaning_cn: 玩得开心，度过愉快时光

examples.en: We had a good time at the beach yesterday, swimming and playing games.
examples.cn: 昨天我们在海滩玩得很开心，游泳和玩游戏。

examples.en: I hope you have a good time at the party tonight!
examples.cn: 我希望你今晚在派对上玩得开心！

examples.en: I booked the hotel room over the phone to confirm the details quickly.
examples.cn: 我通过电话预订了酒店房间以快速确认细节。

examples.en: She resolved the issue over the phone without needing to visit the office.
examples.cn: 她通过电话解决了问题，无需访问办公室。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对...产生疑虑或重新考虑

examples.en: After signing the contract, he had second thoughts about the job offer.
examples.cn: 签署合同后，他对这份工作邀请产生了疑虑。

examples.en: I'm having second thoughts about buying this car because of the high maintenance costs.
examples.cn: 由于高昂的维护成本，我正在重新考虑购买这辆车。

examples.en: His constant tapping on the desk really gets on my nerves during meetings.
examples.cn: 他在会议上不停地敲桌子真的让我很烦躁。

examples.en: Loud noises from the construction site are getting on the neighbors' nerves.
examples.cn: 建筑工地的噪音让邻居们很烦躁。

examples.en: The protest was a clear manifestation of public dissatisfaction with the new policy.
examples.cn: 这次抗议是公众对新政策不满的明确表现。

examples.en: Her kindness is a manifestation of her compassionate nature.
examples.cn: 她的善良是她同情心本质的体现。

examples.en: The deadline was extended, giving us an extra day's time to complete the project.
examples.cn: 截止日期延长了，给了我们额外一天的时间来完成项目。

examples.en: I need an extra day's time to review the documents before the meeting.
examples.cn: 在会议前，我需要额外一天的时间来审查文件。

examples.en: Please fill up the water bottle before we leave for the hike.
examples.cn: 在我们出发徒步前，请把水瓶装满。

examples.en: The gas station attendant helped me fill up the car's tank.
examples.cn: 加油站服务员帮我加满了汽车的油箱。

examples.en: Visiting the Grand Canyon is definitely worth doing if you're in the area.
examples.cn: 如果你在该地区，参观大峡谷绝对值得。

examples.en: Learning a new language is worth doing for both personal and professional growth.
examples.cn: 学习一门新语言对个人和职业成长都值得。

examples.en: The old heating system in the house broke down during the winter, so we had to repair it.
examples.cn: 房子里的旧供暖系统在冬天坏了，所以我们不得不修理它。

examples.en: Installing an energy-efficient heating system can reduce utility bills.
examples.cn: 安装节能供暖系统可以减少水电费。

examples.en: The president will deliver an address to the nation tonight on live television.
examples.cn: 总统今晚将在电视直播中向全国发表演讲。

examples.en: She delivered an inspiring address at the graduation ceremony.
examples.cn: 她在毕业典礼上发表了一场鼓舞人心的演讲。

examples.en: The children used colorful plastic beads to make necklaces in art class.
examples.cn: 孩子们在美术课上用彩色塑料珠子制作项链。

examples.en: You can find plastic beads in various sizes at the craft store.
examples.cn: 你可以在手工艺品店找到各种尺寸的塑料珠子。

examples.en: The new song made a hit on the charts within its first week of release.
examples.cn: 这首新歌在发布的第一周就在排行榜上大获成功。

examples.en: Her comedy show made a hit with audiences, leading to a second season.
examples.cn: 她的喜剧节目在观众中大受欢迎，导致了第二季的制作。

examples.en: The company took steps to prevent data breaches by upgrading its security systems.
examples.cn: 公司通过升级安全系统来采取措施预防数据泄露。

examples.en: We should take steps to prevent accidents by following safety protocols.
examples.cn: 我们应该通过遵循安全规程来采取措施预防事故。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将某事写下来或正式记录

examples.en: You should put your ideas on paper before the meeting.
examples.cn: 你应该在会议前把你的想法写下来。

examples.en: The agreement was finally put on paper after months of negotiation.
examples.cn: 经过数月的谈判，协议终于被正式记录下来。

examples.en: The architect put his vision on paper with detailed sketches.
examples.cn: 建筑师通过详细的草图将他的愿景具体化。

examples.en: Putting the business plan on paper helped clarify our goals.
examples.cn: 将商业计划写下来有助于明确我们的目标。

examples.en: The shy child grew into a confident public speaker.
examples.cn: 那个害羞的孩子逐渐成长为一名自信的公众演讲者。

examples.en: She grew into her new role as manager within a few months.
examples.cn: 她在几个月内逐渐适应了经理的新角色。

examples.en: Buy the shoes a size larger so he can grow into them.
examples.cn: 买大一号的鞋子，这样他长大些就能穿了。

examples.en: This jacket is too big now, but she'll grow into it next year.
examples.cn: 这件夹克现在太大了，但她明年长大些就会合身。

definitions.meaning_cn: 发展成某种状态或事物

examples.en: The small startup grew into a multinational corporation.
examples.cn: 这家小初创公司发展成了一家跨国公司。

examples.en: Their friendship grew into a deep and lasting bond.
examples.cn: 他们的友谊发展成了一种深厚而持久的纽带。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被录取或获准进入（如学校、医院）

examples.en: She got admitted to Harvard University with a full scholarship.
examples.cn: 她获得了全额奖学金，被哈佛大学录取。

examples.en: He got admitted to the hospital for emergency surgery.
examples.cn: 他因紧急手术被送入医院。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被允许加入（组织或团体）

examples.en: After a rigorous interview, he got admitted to the exclusive club.
examples.cn: 经过严格的面试后，他被允许加入这个独家俱乐部。

examples.en: The new member got admitted to the professional association last week.
examples.cn: 这位新成员上周被接纳加入了这个专业协会。

examples.en: If you don't study regularly, you'll fall behind in class.
examples.cn: 如果你不经常学习，你会在课堂上落后。

examples.en: The project fell behind schedule due to unexpected delays.
examples.cn: 由于意外的延误，项目进度落后了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 未能按时支付或履行义务

examples.en: Many families fell behind on their mortgage payments during the recession.
examples.cn: 在经济衰退期间，许多家庭未能按时支付抵押贷款。

examples.en: The company fell behind in its tax filings and faced penalties.
examples.cn: 该公司未能按时报税，面临了罚款。

examples.en: Take heart, things will get better soon.
examples.cn: 振作起来，情况很快就会好转的。

examples.en: She took heart from the support of her friends during tough times.
examples.cn: 在困难时期，她从朋友的支持中获得了勇气。

definitions.meaning_cn: 从某事中获得安慰或希望

examples.en: We can take heart in the fact that progress is being made.
examples.cn: 我们可以从正在取得进展这一事实中获得安慰。

examples.en: He took heart from the positive feedback on his work.
examples.cn: 他从对自己工作的积极反馈中获得了希望。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事做出反应或回应

examples.en: How did she react to the surprising news?
examples.cn: 她对这令人惊讶的消息有何反应？

examples.en: The market reacted positively to the new policy announcement.
examples.cn: 市场对新政策的宣布做出了积极反应。

definitions.meaning_cn: （化学或生物）对刺激产生反应

examples.en: The chemical compound reacts to heat by changing color.
examples.cn: 这种化合物对热产生反应，会改变颜色。

examples.en: The patient's body reacted to the medication with mild side effects.
examples.cn: 患者的身体对药物产生了轻微副作用的反应。

definitions.meaning_cn: 才艺表演（如电视节目或现场活动）

examples.en: The school's annual talent show features singing, dancing, and comedy acts.
examples.cn: 学校的年度才艺表演包括唱歌、舞蹈和喜剧表演。

examples.en: She won first prize in the local talent show with her piano performance.
examples.cn: 她在当地的才艺表演中以钢琴演奏获得了一等奖。

definitions.meaning_cn: 展示个人技能或天赋的场合

examples.en: The office party turned into a talent show with impromptu performances.
examples.cn: 办公室派对变成了一场即兴表演的才艺展示。

examples.en: At the family reunion, it's like a talent show with everyone sharing their hobbies.
examples.cn: 在家庭聚会上，就像一场才艺表演，每个人都在分享他们的爱好。

invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: get the gate (likely a typo for 'get the gate' meaning to be denied entry, but not standard; possible intended phrase: 'get the gate' as slang for being rejected, or 'get to the gate' for travel)

invalid_entries.original_phrase: prefer to do rather than to do
invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: prefer to do rather than do
figure as (if used in context like 'figure as a character') or correct to 'figure in' or 'figure out' based on intended meaning
have no choice but to do

examples.en: During the holiday season, the store does a land-office business.
examples.cn: 在假日季节，这家商店生意兴隆。

examples.en: The new restaurant is doing a land-office business since it opened.
examples.cn: 这家新餐厅自开业以来生意一直很兴隆。

invalid_entries.original_phrase: give sb. a reputation as a sb.
invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: give sb. a reputation as sb.

examples.en: Children often exhibit copy behavior when learning from adults.
examples.cn: 儿童在学习成人时经常表现出模仿行为。

examples.en: In social settings, copy behavior can lead to trends and fads.
examples.cn: 在社会环境中，模仿行为可能导致潮流和时尚。

invalid_entries.original_phrase: bring sb. up to date on ...
invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: bring someone up to date on something

invalid_entries.original_phrase: stand a chance of doing sth.
invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: stand a chance of doing something
furious with sb. about sth. or furious at sb. for sth.

invalid_entries.original_phrase: hold one's end of the bargain up
invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: hold up one's end of the bargain

invalid_entries.original_phrase: give sb. a hand for sth.
invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: give sb. a hand with sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 搜寻，找出（尤指难以找到的东西）

examples.en: I need to hunt up some old photos for the reunion.
examples.cn: 我需要为聚会找出一些旧照片。

examples.en: Can you hunt up that report I asked for?
examples.cn: 你能找出我要的那份报告吗？

invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: put over sth. (meaning to communicate or postpone)

examples.en: He put over his ideas clearly during the presentation.
examples.cn: 他在演示中清晰地传达了他的想法。

examples.en: It's hard to put over complex concepts to a general audience.
examples.cn: 向普通观众传达复杂概念很困难。

examples.en: The meeting was put over until next week due to scheduling conflicts.
examples.cn: 由于日程冲突，会议被推迟到下周。

examples.en: They decided to put over the decision until more information was available.
examples.cn: 他们决定推迟决定，直到获得更多信息。

invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: empty into (if intended as 'empty into' meaning to pour out contents into something, but typically phrased as 'empty into' is rare; more common: 'empty into' might be a typo for 'empty into' as in 'the river empties into the sea', but 'empty into' alone is incomplete; suggest 'empty into' as part of a phrase like 'empty something into')

invalid_entries.original_phrase: shake the lead out of one's pants
invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: shake the lead out (common idiom: 'shake the lead out' or 'shake a leg', meaning to hurry up; 'shake the lead out of one's pants' is a non-standard variation, likely a typo or creative extension)

invalid_entries.original_phrase: get one's hands full of sth.
invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: have one's hands full with sth.

examples.en: He doesn't let anyone push him around at work.
examples.cn: 他不让任何人在工作中欺凌他。

examples.en: The older kids used to push the younger ones around in the playground.
examples.cn: 大孩子们过去常在操场上摆布小孩子们。

invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: have one's address (if meant as 'know one's address') or 'have an address'
back of [something] (e.g., back of the room)
string out (if intended as 'string out' meaning to extend or arrange in a line, but it's uncommon; possibly a typo for 'string along' or 'stretch out')

examples.en: I'm fed up with all the delays in this project.
examples.cn: 我对这个项目的所有延误感到厌烦。

examples.en: She was fed up with his constant complaining.
examples.cn: 她受够了他不停的抱怨。

invalid_entries.correction_suggestion: light on (as in 'light on something' meaning lacking) or 'turn on the light'
make allowances (plural) or make an allowance
get the devil out of here
a heavy line (if referring to a thick line in drawing) or ambiguous; possible intended phrase: 'a hard line' (strict approach) or 'a heavy load' (burden)
consume with (if intended as part of a phrase like 'consume with passion')
pass by the board (likely a typo or misphrase; common phrase is 'go by the board' meaning to be abandoned or disregarded)
vertical wind is not a standard English phrase; possible corrections: 'vertical wind turbine' or 'vertical wind shear' if referring to specific contexts.
resemble telomeres (if referring to biological structures; otherwise, may be invalid if 'telomeres' is misspelled or out of context)
have foot-in-mouth syndrome or put one's foot in one's mouth

examples.en: She puts on airs to impress her new colleagues.
examples.cn: 她摆架子以给新同事留下印象。

examples.en: Don't put on airs; just be yourself.
examples.cn: 不要装腔作势，做你自己就好。
